Gak bɨsitno nandaŋek yokwikon naŋ pulugaŋ nepgul, uŋun do ya yaŋ gayɨsat.
Yut agak amɨn da gwak yokwi yaŋ yaŋek maba kɨgɨt, uŋun gwak tɨp kɨnda naŋ tɨdawit da akdak.
Yawe da iyɨ yo uŋun aban nin da kono yo masɨ masɨmɨsi asak.
Yawe on gɨldat uŋun nin do nimɨk. Nin kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek but galak nandaneŋ.
Yawe, gak da nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgi do gayamaŋ. Gak da nin paŋpulugaŋbɨ yo morap ano tagɨsi gɨn noman toni.
Yawe da manon abɨsak amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da yo tagɨsi aŋ ɨmjak. Yawe da yutnon nin mani aŋkɨsineŋ.
Yawe uŋun Piŋkop. Uŋun da teŋteŋɨ nimɨsak. Kɨndap kɨlɨŋ tɨmɨgek kɨŋ alta aŋgwasɨni.
Gak Piŋkopno, do ya yaŋ gayɨsat. Gak Piŋkopno, do mango awɨgɨsat.
Yawe aŋpakni uŋun tagɨsi, do ya yaŋ iyɨni. Dagok dagogɨ mɨni nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsak.
Amɨn kosit kɨlegɨkon akwaŋ, ae gulusuŋni mɨni, ae Yawe dakon gen teban guramɨkgaŋ, uŋuden amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
Amɨn Piŋkop dakon gen guramɨgek but dasi nandaŋek yolgaŋ uŋuden amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
Uŋuden amɨn gulusuŋ kɨnda dɨma aŋ. Yawe dakon aŋpak baŋgɨn yolgaŋ.
Gak da gen morapgo nimɨŋek nin da kɨlani tagɨsi aŋek guramɨtneŋ dosi gen teban yɨpgul.
Gak dakon gen si teban taŋek guramɨk kɨmokgeŋ dosi nandɨsat.
Nak yaŋ abeŋ kaŋ, gak dakon gen teban do nandaŋ egɨpbeŋ bɨsapmon mayagɨ dɨma pakeŋ.
Gen tebango kɨlegɨ do pini aŋek nandabo pɨsosak bɨsapmon butno kɨlegɨsi taŋakwan mango aŋenokgeŋ.
Nak gen tebango kɨsi morap guramɨkgeŋ. Wagɨl dɨma nepmaŋ dekgi.
Niaŋ aŋek monjɨ gɨmoŋɨ da aŋpak kɨlegɨ gɨn aŋek egɨpni? Gak dakon gen guramɨgek kaŋdo kɨlegɨsi egɨpni.
Nak but dasi nandaŋek gak wɨsɨŋ gandak do pi asat. Aŋpulugaŋaki gak dakon gen teban dɨma yɨpmaŋ dekgeŋ.
Nak yokwi kɨnda dɨma aŋgabeŋ do aŋek gengo butnokon yopgum.
Yawe mango aŋkɨsisat. Gen tebango nayɨŋ dekgi.
Gen teban morap niyɨgɨl uŋun mɨŋat amɨn morapyo yoyɨŋ teŋteŋosot.
Nak amɨn da moneŋ ae yo galagɨsi do galak toŋ, nak uŋun da tɨlak gak dakon gen guramɨt do galagɨsi nandɨsat.
Nak gengo do pakyaŋsi nandaŋ egɨsat. Ae aŋpakgo do nandaŋ egɨsat.
Nak gen tebango do galagɨsi nandɨsat. Uŋun dɨma ɨŋtokeŋ.
Oman amɨngo nak do yo tagɨsi aŋ nabi. Yaŋ aŋaki nak kalugɨ egek gengo guramɨkgeŋ.
Nandak nandakno dakon yoma wɨtdalaki nawa gengokon gen wagɨl tagɨsi morap toŋ uŋun arɨpmɨ tagɨ nandaŋ pɨsokeŋ.
Nak on mɨktɨmon mɨktɨm ŋwakŋwarɨkon amɨn kɨnda da egɨsat. Do gen tebango dɨma aŋkɨsɨbɨŋ nabi.
Butnokon da gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ gak dakon gen teban yol do tek kɨndap pasat.
Gak da iyɨ do nandaba wɨkwaŋ amɨn gen tebai yoyɨsal. Uŋun amɨn jobɨrɨ toŋ, ae gen tebango manji yomɨŋek iyɨ da galak togon akwaŋ.
Uŋun da jɨgɨlak yaŋ namɨŋek nabɨpmaŋgaŋ. Mani gak dakon gen teban yoldat, do yum pɨndagaki gen uŋuden dɨma nayɨni.
Kɨla amɨn muwugek nak dakon man abɨŋ yɨpmaŋgaŋ. Mani oman amɨngo nak toktogɨ gak dakon gen do nandakeŋ.
Gak dakon gen do but dasi galak tosot. Gengo da kosit kɨlegɨ agɨpbeŋ do nayɨŋ dekdak.
Nak kɨmbabaŋon yokwisi pokdot. Yaŋ teban tok agɨl uŋun da arɨpmon abɨ pɨdaŋapbo aŋteban aki.
Aŋpak morapno do gayɨko kobogɨ paŋtobɨl namgul. Gengo nayɨŋ dekgi.
Nayɨŋ dekbɨ gengo dakon mibɨlɨ nandaŋ pɨsokeŋ. Ae wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ morapgo uŋun do nandaŋ egɨpbeŋ.
Butno jɨgɨsi asak. Yaŋ teban tok agɨl uŋun da arɨpmon nak aŋteban aki.
Aŋpak toptopmɨ yolbɨ nak da dubagɨkon kɨŋ mudoni. Aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ namɨŋek nawa gengo do nayɨŋ dekgi.
Nak gak gol do gen yaŋ aŋteban agɨm. Toktogɨsi nawa gengo dogɨn nandaŋ egɨsat.
Yawe, gengo uŋun guramɨk kɨmokdot. Aŋkutnaŋaki mayaktok dɨma pakeŋ.
Gen tebango tepmɨsi guramɨtdɨsat. Nido, gak da nandak nandak dɨ gat saŋbeŋek namdɨsal.
Yawe, gengo nayɨŋ dekbɨ guramɨk egapbo bɨsapno mudosak.
Nawa gengo dakon mibɨlɨ nolɨŋbɨ but dasi nandaŋek guramɨkgeŋ.
Gak dakon gen teban do galagɨsi nandɨsat, do uŋun dakon kosit nolɨŋbɨ uŋun naŋ kɨkeŋ.
Butno aŋtagap abɨ gak dakon gen do galagɨ nandaŋek yo do pɨndak galaktok dɨma abeŋ.
Aŋpulugaŋaki yo ɨsalɨ do pɨndak galak tok dɨma abeŋ. Yaŋ teban tok agɨl uŋun da arɨpmon egɨp egɨpno aŋkutnoki.
Oman amɨngo nak do yo ak do yaŋ teban tok agɨl uŋun da arɨpmon aŋaki amɨn da pasal gamni.
Nawa gengo uŋun tagɨsi. Aŋpulugaŋbɨ mayaktok dɨma pakeŋ. Mayagɨ pak do si pasoldot.
Gengo guramɨt do galagɨsi nandɨsat. Aŋpakgo kɨlegɨsi, do egɨp egɨpno aŋkutnoki.
Yawe, bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ nak do but dasi galak taŋ nabi, aŋek nak yokwikon naŋ abɨdoki dosi nandɨsat. Gak yaŋ ak do kɨlɨ yaŋ teban tagɨl.
Nawa gengo do nandaŋ dagosot. Do aŋpulugaŋaki nabɨpmaŋgaŋ amɨn do gen kobogɨ arɨpmɨ tagɨ paŋtobɨl yobeŋ.
Nawa gengo da nak tagɨ aŋpulugosak yaŋ nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom asat. Do aŋteban aŋaki bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ gengo bamɨ yaŋ teŋteŋokeŋ.
Bɨsap dagok dagogɨ mɨni nawa gengo guramɨk kɨmokgeŋ.
Gengo guramɨt do pini asat, do yo yokwi kɨnda da kosit dɨma sopmaŋ namjak.
Nak da kɨla amɨn madep gengo do yoyɨkeŋ. Uŋun da mayagɨ dɨma namni.
Gen tebango do but galaksi nandɨsat. Gen teban morapgo uŋun do but dasi galak tosot.
Gen tebango uŋun tagɨsi yaŋ nandaŋek, uŋun do but dasi galak taŋ kɨmokdot. Gengo uŋun do nandaŋ egɨpbeŋ.
Gak oman amɨngo nak do kalɨp yaŋ teban tok agɨl uŋun do nandaki. Uŋun da nak aŋtagap aban tagɨsi egɨpbeŋ yaŋsi nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom asat.
Yaŋ teban tokgo da egɨp egɨp namɨsak. Jɨgɨ pasat bɨsapmon uŋun da butno aŋteban asak.
Iyɨ do nandaba wɨkwaŋ amɨn da yaŋsul yokwisi aŋ namaŋ. Mani nawa gengo do manji dɨma yomɨsat.
Yawe, gak dakon nawa gen kalɨpmɨsi uŋun do nandaŋ egɨsat. Uŋun da butno aŋteban asak.
Amɨn yokwi da nawa gengo manji yomɨŋakwa japmɨsi nandaŋ yomɨsat.
Nak kokupno da dubagɨkon egek gengo do kap yosot.
Yawe, nak kalbi mango do nandak nandak aŋek nawa gengo yoldat.
Gak dakon gen guramɨkdat. Uŋun da but galak namɨsak.
Yawe, gak nak gat egɨsal, do yo do wadak wadak dɨma asat. Gengo yol do yaŋ teban tok asat.
Gak da nandaŋ yawot aŋ nabi do yaŋ teban tok agɨl, do yaŋsi abi do bɨsit gayɨsat.
Aŋpak morapno do kɨlɨ nandagɨm, aŋek tobɨlek gengo guramɨt do agɨm.
Jomjom dɨma abeŋ. Gen tebango tepmɨsi guramɨkgeŋ.
Amɨn yokwi da nap naŋ nak aŋteban aŋek aŋpak yokwinikon ɨlɨk aŋaŋ kɨk do aŋ, mani nawa gengo do dɨma ɨŋtosot.
Kalbi binap nawa gengo kɨlegɨsi do ya yaŋ gayɨk do pɨdosot.
Amɨn morap gak do pasalek gengo guramɨkgaŋ amɨn not aŋ yomɨsat.
Yawe, gak da mɨktɨmon mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsal. Gengo do nayɨŋdet abi.
Yawe, yaŋ teban tok agɨl uŋun da arɨpmon oman amɨngo nak do aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ namgul.
Gen tebango do nandaŋ gadasat. Do nandak nandak gat ae gen kokwin tagɨsi agak dakon nandak nandak do nayɨŋ dekgi.
Nak aŋkɨlek akdo pi dɨma agɨl bɨsapmon kositgo yapgum. Mani abɨsok gengo guramɨkdat.
Gak tagɨsi, do yo asal uŋun tagɨsi baŋ asal. Gengo do nayɨŋ dekgi.
Iyɨ do nandaba wɨkwaŋ amɨn da top morapmɨ yaŋ namgwit. Mani but dasi nandaŋek gengo guramɨkdat.
Uŋun amɨn nandak nandakni kɨlegɨ mɨni. Mani nawa gengo do but dasi galak tosot.
Gak da jɨgɨ namgul uŋun tagɨsi agɨl. Uŋun da gengo do nayɨŋdet tagɨsi agɨt.
Nawa gengo do nandako yo madepsi asak. Uŋun da gol ae silva moneŋ morapmɨsi yapmaŋdak.
Kɨsitgo da nak wasagɨl. Nandak nandak namɨŋaki gen teban morapgo nandaŋ pɨsokeŋ do pi tagɨsi abeŋ.
Gengo da nak tagɨ aŋpulugosak yaŋ nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom asat. Do mɨŋat amɨn morap gak do pasolgoŋ amɨn nak nandani bɨsapmon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani dosi nandɨsat.
Yawe, nak nandɨsat, gak dakon gen teban morap uŋun kɨlegɨsi gɨn. Gak gengo yolek aŋpakno aŋmɨlɨp ak do aŋek jɨgɨ namgul.
Gak nak do toktogɨsi but dasi galak taŋ nam do yaŋ teban tok kɨlɨ agɨl. Do gen yagɨl da arɨpmon nak oman amɨngo dakon but aŋteban abi dosi nandɨsat.
Nawa gengo do but dasi galak tosot. Do nak do bupmɨ nandaŋaki tagɨsi egɨpbeŋ dosi nandɨsat.
Iyɨ do nandaba wɨkwaŋ amɨn da top yaŋek ɨsal dogɨn abɨŋ nepgwit. Aŋpakni uŋun do gak da paŋmayak abɨ mayak toni dosi nandɨsat. Mani, nak toktogɨsi gengo do nandaŋ egɨpbeŋ.
Namɨn amɨn da gak do pasolgoŋ ae gak dakon gen teban nandaŋ uŋun da nagon apni dosi nandɨsat.
Aŋpulugaŋaki gen teban morapgo guramɨgek aŋpakno do mayaktok dɨma pakeŋ dosi nandɨsat.
Gak da nak yokwikon naŋ abɨdoki do jomjom aŋek butjɨksi nandɨsat, aŋek tapmɨmno mɨnisi ayɨŋ. Mani gengo da nak tagɨ aŋpulugosak yaŋ nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom asat.
Gak da yaŋ teban tok agɨl uŋun arɨpmɨ akdɨsal yaŋ do jomjom aŋek sɨŋtaŋ egɨt da dabɨlno tep namaŋ. Aŋek yaŋ yosot, “Ni bɨsapmon butno aŋteban abi?”
Nak wain tɨbɨt meme gɨp baŋ wasaŋbi kalɨpmɨ kɨnda amɨn da mukwakon yɨpba teban taŋbi yombem. Mani gen tebango do dɨma ɨŋtosot.
Bɨsap niaŋ da oman amɨngo nak jomjom sigɨn abeŋ? Yo yokwi aŋ namaŋ amɨn do ni bɨsapmon kobogɨ yokwi aŋ yobi?
Iyɨ do nandaba wɨkwaŋ amɨn, nawa gengo dɨma guramɨkgaŋ. Nak da mokeŋ do gapma wayɨkgaŋ.
Mɨŋat amɨnyo nin da gen teban morapgo tagɨ nandaŋ gadaneŋ. Amɨn da ɨsal dogɨn yokwi aŋ namaŋ, do aŋpulugoki do nandɨsat.
Palɨsok nɨkba kɨmakgɨm, mani gengo dɨma yɨpmaŋ dekgɨm.
Nak do toktogɨsi but dasi galak taŋ namɨsal, do aŋpulugaŋaki dɨma kɨmokgeŋ. Yaŋ aŋaki gen teban morapgo guramɨkgeŋ.
Yawe, gak dakon gengo toktogɨsi taŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsak. Uŋun Kwen Kokup tebaisi tosok.
Aŋpakgo tagɨsi uŋun amɨn don altaŋek egɨpdaŋ kabɨkon toktogɨsi taŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsak. Mɨktɨm yɨpgul da tamonikon taŋek dɨma dɨwalɨk kɨsak.
Gaga yagɨl uŋun da arɨpmon yo morap tawit da abɨsokyo kɨsi toŋ gɨn. Nido yo morap kɨsi da gak dakon pi aŋ.
Nawa gengo do but dasi dɨma galak tagɨm tam, nak jɨgɨ paŋek kɨlɨ kɨmakgɨm.
Gengo dɨmasi ɨŋtokeŋ. Nido uŋun yolapbo gak da egɨp egɨpno aŋkutnal.
Nak gak dakonsi, do yokwikon naŋ abɨdoki. Nak gengo guramɨt do pini asat.
Amɨn yokwi nɨkba kɨmokgeŋ do jomjom aŋ. Mani, gen tebango do nandaŋ egɨpbeŋ.
Abɨsok nak nandɨsat, yo wagɨl tagɨsi kɨnda mɨnisi. Mani gengo uŋun yo tagɨsisi, ae tɨlakni mɨni.
Nak gen tebango do but dasi galak tosot. Gɨldat kɨnda kaloŋ uŋun dogɨn nandaŋ egɨsat.
Gen tebango nagon toktogɨsi tosok, do nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi amɨn kɨnda dagaŋek uwalno dakon nandak nandak yapmaŋdat.
Nak toktogɨ gak dakon gen bamɨ dogɨn nandaŋ egɨsat, do nandak nandak tagɨsi tɨmɨgek yoyɨŋdet morapno kɨsi yapmaŋdat.
Gengo kɨlegɨsi uŋun guramɨkdat, do nandaŋ kokwino tagɨsi da amɨn pelaŋ dakon nandak nandak yapmaŋdak.
Aŋpak yokwi ak do dɨmasi nandɨsat, nido gengo baŋgɨn guramɨt do nandɨsat.
Gak da gaga dakon gen do nayɨŋ dekgɨl, do gen uŋun dɨma yɨpmaŋ dekgɨm.
Kabaŋ kok uŋun gen kaganokon galagɨsi, mani gengo da uŋun yapmaŋek wagɨl galagɨsisi asak.
Gengo da nandak nandak tagɨsi namɨsak, do aŋpak yokwi morap do dɨmasi galak tosot.
Gengo da nak aŋpulugaŋban kosit kɨlegɨ agɨpbeŋ dakon lamno asak. Ae kosit agɨpbeŋ dakon teŋteŋno asak.
Gen tebango kɨlegɨsi guramɨt do yaŋ teban tok kɨlɨ agɨm, do yaŋ gɨn akdɨsat.
Yawe, jɨgɨ madepsi da wutjɨŋ namɨsak. Yaŋ teban tok agɨl da arɨpmon aŋpulugaŋbɨ kalugɨ egɨpbeŋ.
Yawe, nak ya yaŋ gayɨsat uŋun da paretno asak, uŋun tɨmɨkgi. Gen tebango do nayɨŋ dekgi.
Nak toktogɨsi kɨmot da kapmatjok kɨŋ kɨŋ asat. Mani nawa gengo dɨma ɨŋtokeŋ.
Amɨn yokwi da nak abɨdok do pat yɨpmaŋ, mani gengo dɨma yɨpmaŋ dekdat.
Toktogɨsi gengo abɨdaŋ kɨmokdot. Aŋapbo uŋun gen da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk namɨsak.
Gengo guramɨk kɨmokgeŋsi, aŋapbo wɨgɨ kɨmokgeŋ da bɨsapmon wɨgɨsak.
Amɨn gak gol do but bamot aŋ uŋun do dɨma galak taŋ yomɨsat. Mani nawa gengo do but dasi galak tosot.
Gak kaloŋgɨn pasɨlɨ tamono ae pasɨkno. Gengo da nak tagɨ aŋpulugosak yaŋ nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom asat.
Yokwi pakpak mɨŋat amɨnyo ji nepmaŋ dekgɨt. Piŋkopno dakon gen teban guramɨt do nandɨsat.
Yaŋ teban tok agɨl da arɨpmon aŋteban aŋaki egɨpbeŋ. Aŋaki yo abɨdok do nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom asat uŋun dɨma suŋ tosak.
Kɨsitnokon abɨdaŋaki tagɨsi egɨpbeŋ. Aŋaki toktogɨsi gengo do nandaŋ egɨpbeŋ.
Mɨŋat amɨn morapyo gen tebango yɨpmaŋ dekgaŋ uŋun manji yomɨsal. Top geni uŋun suŋ tokdaŋ.
Gak da amɨn yokwi morap sɨbɨt sɨbɨt gɨn yaŋ nandaŋ yomɨŋek mabɨ kwaŋ, do gengo do but dasi galak tosot.
Nak gak do pasalek gɨptɨmno madepsi nɨmnɨmɨkdak. Gen kokwin tamokon gak da amɨn gen yaŋ yomdɨsal uŋun do nandaŋek madepsi pasoldot.
Nak aŋpak kɨlegɨ tagɨsi baŋ agɨm. Yum nandaŋaki uwalno da yokwi dɨma aŋ namni do nandɨsat.
Pi amɨngo nak aŋpulugok do yaŋ teban tok abi do nandɨsat. Yum pɨndagaki kwen wɨgɨk amɨn da jɨgɨ dɨma namni.
Yokwikon naŋ abɨdoki do yaŋ teban tok agɨl uŋun arɨpmɨ akdɨsal yaŋ do jomjom aŋek sɨŋtaŋ egɨt da dabɨlno tep namaŋ.
Oman amɨngo nak butdasi galak taŋ namɨŋek gen bamɨ do nayɨŋ dekgi.
Nak oman amɨngo, do nandak nandak namɨŋaki gengo do tagɨ nandabo pɨsosak.
Abɨsok mɨŋat amɨnyo nawa gengo kɨrɨŋɨkgaŋ uŋun Yawe gak da kobogɨ yobi dakon bɨsap.
Gol uŋun yo tagɨsi, mani uŋun yapmaŋek gen tebango do but dasi galak tosot.
Gen morapgo kɨsi guramɨkdat. Aŋpak yokwi morap do dɨma galak tosot.
Gen tebango uŋun wagɨl tagɨsisi do aŋek guramɨkdat.
Amɨn kɨnda da notni kɨnda aŋpulugaŋban gengo dakon mibɨlɨ nandɨsak kaŋ, teŋteŋɨkon egɨpdɨsak. Gengo uŋun da nandak nandakni mɨni amɨn nandak nandak yomɨsak.
Nak amɨn da pakbi do tep toŋ uŋun da tɨlak gen tebango do galagɨsi nandɨsat. Uŋun nandak do but dasi galak tosot.
Amɨn morap mango do but dasi galak toŋ uŋun bupmɨ nandaŋ yomɨsal, uŋudeŋ gɨn abɨŋ bupmɨ nandaŋ nabi.
Yaŋ teban tok agɨl uŋun da arɨpmon kosit nolayɨki. Aŋkutnaŋaki yokwi kɨnda da nak abɨŋ nep do pi dɨma asak.
Pulugaŋ nepmaŋaki nak abɨŋ nep do yoŋ amɨn da dɨma aŋupbal ani. Yaŋ aŋaki gengo guramɨkgeŋ.
Butgo oman amɨngo nagon yɨpmaŋek yo tagɨsi aŋ nabi. Gen teban morapgo do nayɨŋ dekgi.
Amɨn da nawa gengo dɨma guramɨkgaŋ do aŋek kunam tagapbo dabɨl pakbino pakbi madep da yaŋ pokgoŋ.
Yawe gak kɨlegɨsisi. Ae gen teban morapgo kɨsi kɨlegɨ gɨn.
Gen teban morap nimgul uŋun kɨlegɨ ae nin da tagɨ nandaŋ gadaneŋ.
Uwalno gengo do nandak nandak dɨma aŋ, do butjap madepsi nandaŋek tapmɨmno moŋ.
Yaŋ teban tokgo uŋun paŋkɨlɨgek uŋun bamɨsi yaŋ kɨlɨ pɨndakgɨm. Do oman amɨngo nak yaŋ teban tok gengo uŋun do but dasi galak tosot.
Nak amɨn ɨsalɨ naŋ amɨn da abɨŋ nepmaŋgaŋ. Mani gengo do dɨma ɨŋtosot.
Aŋpakgo kɨlegɨ uŋun toktogɨsi taŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdaŋ. Ae nawa gengo uŋun bamɨsi.
Jɨgɨ morapmɨ nagon noman toŋ, mani gengo do but galaksi nandɨsat.
Gengo uŋun toktogɨsi kɨlegɨsi. Aŋpulugaŋbɨ gen uŋun do nandaŋ pɨsaŋek tagɨsi egɨpbeŋ.
Yawe, nak gak do bɨsit tebai asat. Bɨsitno nandaŋaki gen morapgo guramɨkgeŋ.
Nak gak do yaŋ tɨdosot. Yokwikon naŋ abɨdaŋaki gen tebango tagɨ guramɨkgeŋ.
Wɨsa dɨma dagaŋakwan pɨdaŋek aŋpulugoki do yaŋ tɨdosot. Gen tebango da nak tagɨ aŋpulugosak yaŋ nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom asat.
Kalbi dɨpmɨn dɨma pokdot. Toktogɨsi yaŋ teban tok gengo dogɨn nandaŋ egɨsat.
Yawe, toktogɨsi but dasi galak taŋ namɨsal, do bɨsitno nandaki. Gak kɨlegɨsi, do kɨlano aŋaki egɨpbeŋ.
Amɨn nandak nandakni yokwi da nak aŋupbal ak do nak da kapmatjok abaŋ. Uŋun amɨn nawa gengo dɨma guramɨkgaŋ.
Mani Yawe, gak nak da kapmatjok egɨsal. Ae gen teban morapgo uŋun bamɨsi gɨn.
Gengo uŋun aŋteban aŋaki dagok dagogɨ mɨni toktogɨsi tosok uŋun kalɨpsigwan kɨlɨ nandagɨm.
Nak nawa gengo do dɨma ɨŋtosot, do jɨgɨno madepsi uŋun kaŋek aŋpulugoki.
Uwal da gen yaŋ namaŋ, do aŋpulugaŋek yokwikon naŋ abɨdoki. Kalɨp yaŋ teban tok agɨl uŋun yolek egɨp egɨp nabi.
Amɨn yokwi gen tebango uŋun dɨma guramɨkgaŋ, do yokwikon baŋ dɨmasi tɨmɨtdɨsal.
Yawe, bupmɨgo uŋun madepsi. Gak kɨlegɨsi, do kɨlano aŋaki egɨpbeŋ.
Amɨn morapmɨ da yokwi aŋ namɨŋek uwal aŋ namaŋ. Mani gengo bamɨ dɨma yɨpmaŋ dekdat.
Manji gamaŋ amɨn pɨndakdat bɨsapmon nandaba yokwitok aŋ yomɨsat, nido uŋun gengo dɨma guramɨkgaŋ.
Gengo do but dasi galak tosot uŋun nandɨsal. Yawe, gak da but dasi galak taŋ namɨŋ kɨmokdol, do yokwikon naŋ abɨdaŋaki tagɨsi egɨpbeŋ.
Gen morapgo uŋun bamɨsi gɨn. Nawa gen morapgo kɨlegɨsi uŋun toktogɨsi taŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdaŋ.
Kɨla amɨn da mibɨlɨ mɨni nak yokwi aŋ namaŋ. Mani nak gengo do nandaŋek nɨmnɨmɨkdat.
Amɨn kɨnda da yo tagɨsi morapmɨ tɨmɨkdak, uŋun da tɨlak yaŋ teban tok gengo do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi asat.
Nak aŋpak toptopmɨ do nandabo tagɨ dɨma aŋ. Mani gen tebango do but dasi galak tosot.
Nawa gengo uŋun kɨlegɨsi, do gɨldat morap kɨsi nak gak do ya yaŋ kosirɨ 7 kabɨ yaŋ yaŋ asat.
Mɨŋat amɨnyo nawa gengo do but dasi galak toŋ, uŋun butni yaworɨsi toŋ, ae yo kɨnda da kesalban dɨma maŋ dapni.
Yawe, yokwikon naŋ abɨdoki do jomjom asat. Nak gen tebango guramɨkdat.
Nak gengo do but dasi galak tosot, do gengo guramɨkdat.
Aŋpak morapno uŋun pɨndakdal, do gen teban morapgo uŋun guramɨkdat.
Yawe, aŋpulugoki do yaŋ tɨdosot, do nandaŋ nabi dosi nandɨsat. Yaŋ teban tok agɨl uŋun da arɨpmon nandak nandak tagɨsi nabi.
Kalɨp yagɨl uŋun da arɨpmon bɨsitno do mɨrak yopmaŋek yokwikon naŋ abɨdoki dosi nandɨsat.
Gengo do tagɨsi nayɨŋ dekdal, do toktogɨsi mango aŋkɨsikeŋ dosi nandɨsat.
Gen teban morapgo uŋun kɨlegɨ gɨn, do gengo do kap yokeŋ dosi nandɨsat.
Nak gengo yoldosi nandagɨm, do toktogɨsi nak aŋpulugok do tagap toki dosi nandɨsat.
Yawe, gak da nak yokwikon naŋ abɨdoki do madepsi nandaŋ egɨsat. Nawa gengo da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk namɨsak.
Egɨp egɨp namɨŋaki mango aŋkɨsikeŋ. Gengo da aŋpulugosak do nandɨsat.
Sipsip da kɨŋ pasɨlgaŋ uŋun da tɨlak kosit tagɨsi kɨlɨ yɨpmaŋ dekgɨm. Do abɨŋ oman amɨngo nak do wusɨki. Nak gen tebango do dɨma ɨŋtosot.
Jɨgɨ noman taŋ namgwit bɨsapmon Yawe do yaŋ tɨdoko bɨsitno nandaŋ namgut.
Bɨsit yaŋ agɨm, “Yawe, top amɨn da nak aŋkewalni yaŋ do nak pulugaŋ nepbi.”
Top amɨn ji, Piŋkop da ji do yo ni baŋ aŋ damjak?
Uŋun da emat amɨn dakon gobɨŋ baŋ yamaŋ damdɨsak. Aŋek kɨndapni tedepmɨ jikon tagaldɨsak.
Nak ji da binapmon yokwisi egɨsat. Amɨn da Mesek mɨktɨmon bo Kade amɨn da binapmon yokwisi ekwaŋ uŋun da tɨlak jikon yokwisi egɨsat.
Nak mɨŋat amɨnyo yaworɨ egɨp egɨp do ɨkwayɨt aŋ amɨn gat kɨsi bɨsap dubagɨsi ekwamaŋ, do kuragɨsi nandɨsat.
Nak da tagɨsi yɨtni do yosot bɨsapmon uŋun emat gɨn ak do nandaŋ.
Nak sɨŋtoko ɨleŋon wɨgɨsak. Paŋpulugokno dukwan da apban kokeŋ?
Yawe kundu gat ae mɨktɨm gat wasagɨt uŋun dagɨn paŋpulugokno egɨsak.
Kɨlago asak, do arɨpmɨ dɨma maŋ pokgi. Kɨlago aŋek dɨpmɨn dɨma pokdok.
Pakyaŋsi nandani, Israel amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn uŋun pak nandat kɨnda dɨmasi asak.
Yawe uŋun gak da ɨleŋonjok egek kɨlago aŋek gak aŋyoŋgam asak.
Gɨldat da gɨldat kalba ae kanek da kalbi arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋupbal anjil.
Yawe da kɨlago aŋakwan yo yokwi morap toŋ kɨndasok da gak dɨma aŋupbal asak. Egɨp egɨpgo kɨsi kɨla asak.
Yawe da abɨsok ae don kɨŋ apyo akdɨsal uŋun kɨlago aŋaŋ wɨgɨkdɨsak.
“Kɨlɨ apba Yawe da yutnon kɨno” yaŋ nayɨŋba nandabo tagɨsi agɨt.
Nin kɨlɨ abɨŋ Jerusalem dakon wigat yapmaŋek nagalgwan pɨgɨmaŋ da akgamaŋ.
Jerusalem kokup pap uŋun wagɨl tagɨsi wasaŋbi.
Israel amɨn ɨdon abɨŋ Yawe ya yaŋ iyɨni do kalɨp kɨlɨ yoyɨgɨt uŋun gen yolek abɨŋ abɨŋ aŋ.
Uŋudon gen kokwin agak tamo tosok. Dewit dakon dɨwatni kɨla amɨn madep egɨ egɨ awit uŋun dakon gen kokwin tamo toŋ.
Jerusalem yaworɨsi tosak do bɨsit ani. Bɨsit yaŋ ani, “Yawe, Jerusalem do galagɨ nandaŋ amɨn paŋpulugaŋbɨ tagɨsi egɨpni.
Paŋpulugaŋbɨ Jerusalem da nagalgwan ekwaŋ amɨn emarɨ mɨni tagɨsi egɨpni, ae kɨla amɨni gat kɨsi tagɨsi egɨpni dosi nandamaŋ.”
Gwakno gat ae notno gat do nandaŋek Jerusalem amɨn do bɨsit yaŋ abeŋ, “Ji emarɨ mɨni tagɨsi egɨpni.”
Nak Yawe Piŋkopnin dakon telagɨ yut do nandaŋek bɨsit yaŋ abeŋ, “Yo kɨnda do wadak wadagɨ mɨni tagɨsi egɨpni.”
Yawe, nak Kwen Kokup sɨŋtoko wɨgakwan gandako kɨla amɨn madep yɨyɨt tamogokon yɨkdal.
Oman amɨn amɨn tagɨni do nandaŋ gadasak, aŋakwan pi amɨn mɨŋat uŋun amɨn tagɨ mɨŋat do nandaŋ gadasak, yaŋ gɨn nin Yawe gak do nandaŋ gadamaŋ. Gak Piŋkopnin, gak dagɨn bupmɨ nandaŋ nibi do jomjom amaŋ.
Yawe, amɨn da yokwi aŋ nimɨŋakwa jɨgɨsi nandamaŋ, do bupmɨ nandaŋ nibi.
Bɨsap dubagɨsi iyɨ do nandaba wɨkwaŋ amɨn da pabɨŋ nipgwit, do jɨgɨsi nandamaŋ.
“Yawe da nin dɨma paŋpulugagɨt tam, niaŋɨ?” Israel amɨn da uŋun gen dakon kobogɨ yoni.
“Amɨn da butjap nandaŋ nimɨŋek ninon emat awit bɨsapmon Yawe da nin dɨma paŋpulugagɨt tam, uwal da japmɨsi nandaŋek obɨsi tagɨ paŋupbal abam.
<range>
Butjapni pakbi da yaŋ ɨgek tɨmɨkban tagɨ pasɨlnom.
Pakbi madep uŋun ɨgek tɨmɨkban tagɨ kɨmak mudonom. Mani dɨma.”
Nin Yawe do ya yaŋsi iyɨneŋ. Yum nindaŋakwan uwal da nin dɨma nindapba pasɨlgɨmaŋ.
Nin mɨnam da yaŋ amɨn kɨnda da pat yɨpguron yokwalgɨmaŋ da pulugaŋ kɨgɨmaŋ. Pat uŋun tuwɨl kɨgɨt, do nin pulugaŋ kɨgɨmaŋ.
Yawe Kwen Kokup ae mɨktɨmyo wasagɨt, uŋun da iyɨ nin tagɨsi paŋpulugosok.
Mɨŋat amɨnyo egɨp egɨpni Yawekon tosok yaŋsi nandaŋ amɨn uŋun Saion Kabap yombem. Kabap uŋun dɨma nɨmnɨmɨgek tebaisi tokdɨsak.
Ɨleŋ da Jerusalem aŋgwasɨŋek toŋ uŋun da tɨlak Yawe da abɨsok ae don paŋgwasɨŋek mɨŋat amɨni kɨlani akdɨsak.
Amɨn yokwi da amɨn kɨlegɨ dakon mɨktɨm toktogɨ kɨlani dɨma ani. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, amɨn kɨlegɨ yokwi akdaŋ.
Yawe, amɨn tagɨsi butni kɨlegɨ uŋun amɨnon aŋpak tagɨsi aŋyobi.
Mani mɨŋat amɨnyo iyɨ dakon aŋpak yokwini yolek aŋ, uŋun yo yokwisi aŋ yobi. Yokwi pakpak amɨn do yo yokwisi aŋ yobi. Israel amɨn yaworɨ tagɨ egɨpni.
Yawe da nin uwal da kɨsiron baŋ tɨmɨk aeni Saion kokup papmon paŋapgut bɨsapmon dɨpmɨn yombem pɨndakgɨmaŋ.
Nin jɨkgo madepsi yanjagɨmaŋ. Aŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk kap yagɨmaŋ. Yaŋ aŋapno mɨktɨm dɨwarɨ dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo da yaŋ yawit, “Yawe da Israel amɨn paŋpulugok do pi madepsi agɨt.”
Asisi, Piŋkop da nin paŋpulugok do pi madepsi agɨt, do nin wagol tagɨsisi nandamaŋ.
Yawe, mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨkon sɨkak maŋakwa joŋ yo morap ae kwoŋ uŋun da tɨlak paŋpulugaŋaki kalɨp tagɨsi egɨpgumaŋ yaŋ gɨn aenin tagɨsi egɨpneŋ.
Amɨn kunam tagek jap kwaokgaŋ, uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk nandaŋek bamɨ pakdaŋ.
Asisi, amɨn kunam tagek jap yet kwaot do jap yet pigaga paŋgwaŋ, uŋun don jap bamɨ pektaŋba paŋ paŋobɨŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk kap yokdaŋ.
Yawe da paŋpulugaŋban kɨsit kɨlda yut dɨma aŋ tam, pi ɨsal dogɨn abam. Yawe da paŋpulugaŋban kɨla amɨn kokup pap kɨnda kɨlani dɨma aŋ tam, kɨla ɨsal dogɨn abam.
Nin jap tɨmɨt do nandaba kɨk aŋek wɨsa dɨma dagaŋakwan pɨdaŋ pi gɨn aŋegapno wɨgɨ pɨlɨn toni kaŋ, pi uŋun ɨsal dogɨn amaŋ. Nido, Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨnyo but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak uŋun yɨk yawot yomɨsak.
Piŋkop da nin do yo tagɨsi aŋ nimɨŋek monjɨ gwayo but galak do nimɨsak. Uŋun gɨsam tagɨsi Piŋkopmon tɨmɨkgamaŋ.
Yawi kaluk dakon monjɨ gwayo uŋun gobɨŋ da yaŋ emat amɨn kɨnda da kɨsiron toŋ.
Amɨn monjɨ gwayo morapmɨ amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ ani. Uŋun da gen pi tamokon uwal gat gen pi aŋakwa aŋpulugokdaŋ. Aŋakwa mayagɨ dɨma pakdɨsak.
Amɨn morap Yawe do pasalek geni guramɨkgaŋ uŋun amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ ani.
Ji pi aŋek uŋun dakon bamɨ paŋ noni. Ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek tagɨsi egɨpdaŋ.
Mɨŋatgo da yutgokon wain nap da yaŋ bamɨ madepsi toni. Ae mɨŋat monjɨyogo da olip kɨndap monɨŋ yombem da yutgokon tamokon aŋgwasɨŋek yɨtni.
Asi, Yawe do pasalek ekwaŋ amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ ani.
Yawe Saion kokup papmon egɨsak uŋun da gɨsam tagɨ damjak. Ji mɨktɨmon egɨpni bɨsap morapmon Jerusalem kaŋakwa tagɨsi tosak dosi nandɨsat.
Ji bɨsap dubagɨsi egek babɨkji pɨndatni do nandɨsat. Israel amɨn yaworɨ tagɨ egɨpni.
Israel amɨn, gak monɨŋɨsogon da wɨŋ abɨsok ekwamaŋon gak uwal da yokwi aŋ gamgwit dakon gen niyɨki.
Gak yaŋ yoki, “Monɨŋɨsogon da wɨŋ abɨsok ekwamaŋ bɨsapmon uwal da nak yo yokwisi aŋ namaŋ. Mani nak arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨŋ nepni.
Nak obɨsi baljaŋakwa nap kɨrɨŋ da manjinokon gɨptɨmno dapba kɨrɨŋɨkwaŋ. Pi kaga daŋgap pɨndakgamaŋ uŋun da tɨlak baljaŋba wuda dubagɨsi dɨ noman toŋ.
Mani Yawe uŋun kɨlegɨsi. Nak amɨn yokwi da nap teban wamgwit uŋun mandaŋ dagaŋakwan oman monjɨ saŋbeŋek dɨma egɨsat.”
Nak Yawe da mɨŋat amɨnyo Saion kokup pap do uwal aŋ, uŋun mayaktok yomɨŋek pabɨŋ yopmaŋek yolban tobɨlek kokupnikon kɨni dosi nandɨsat.
Uŋun joŋ yut kwenon kwaŋek don dubak tokdo aŋakwa gɨldat da pɨndakban tepmɨ kɨbɨdoŋ uŋun yombem ani dosi nandɨsat.
Amɨn kɨnda da joŋ uŋun baljaŋ paŋmuwuk wamaŋek dɨma paŋkɨsak.
Ae mɨŋat amɨnyo uwalnin da kapmatjok kɨŋek “Yawe da yo tagɨsi aŋ damɨŋek gɨsam damjak” yaŋ dɨmasi yoyɨni dosi nandɨsat.
Yawe, butno jɨgɨsi taŋakwan aŋpulugoki do yaŋ tɨdosot.
Amɨn Tagɨ, bɨsitno nandaki. Aŋpulugoki do gayɨsat, do nandaŋ nabi.
Yawe, gak da dɨwarɨnin manjɨŋek gen pikon nipbim tam, Amɨn Tagɨ namɨn da gengo yapban?
Mani gagon dɨwarɨ wɨrɨrɨt tosok, do nin gak do pasal gamneŋsi.
Nak Yawe da aŋpulugosak do nandaŋek jomjom asat. Aŋek geni do tebaisi nandaŋ gadasat.
Nak Amɨn Tagɨ da aŋpulugosak dosi nandaŋek but kɨndap asat. Kalbi kɨla amɨn da uwal apni do kɨla aŋek wɨsa tepmɨ dagosak do aŋtep aŋ uŋun yapmaŋek but kɨndap madepsi asat.
Israel amɨn, Yawe da nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsak, ae dɨma yokwi toneŋ yaŋ do bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ nin paŋpulugosok, do Yawe da nin paŋpulugokdɨsak yaŋsi nandaŋ teban taŋek uŋun do jomjom aneŋ.
Uŋun da Israel amɨn nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨgek dɨwarɨnin kɨsisi wɨrɨrɨk nimɨsak.
Yawe, nak naga do nandako dɨma wɨgɨsak. Mano dɨma awɨgɨsat. Nak yo kɨnda ni da wɨkwisi asak ae yo uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma nandako pɨsosak uŋun do nandaba kɨk dɨma asat.
Nak butno tagɨsi tosak do pi at da butno yaworɨ tosok. Nak egɨsat uŋun monjɨ ŋakŋak da yaŋ meŋi da kɨsiron nandaba kɨgɨ mɨni pagegɨsak nak uŋun yombem.
Israel amɨn, ji abɨsok ae bɨsap morap don kɨsi Yawe da paŋpulugosak do nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom ani.
Yawe, gak Dewit do dɨma ɨŋtoki. Ae jɨgɨ morap pagɨt kɨsi do dɨma ɨŋtoki.
Dewit da Israel amɨn dakon Yawe, Piŋkop tapmɨmɨ toŋ, uŋun do yaŋ teban tok kɨnda yaŋ yagɨt,
“Nak yutnon dɨma kɨkeŋ, ae dɨpmɨn potpot tamokon dɨma pokgeŋ.
Nak dɨpmɨn dɨma pokgeŋ.
Mibɨltok Yawe do yut kɨnda abeŋ, uŋun Israel amɨn dakon Piŋkop Tapmɨmɨ Toŋ uŋun da egɨpjakdo. Aŋek don yɨk yawot abeŋ.”
Nin Betlehem kokupmon egek Saŋbek Saŋbek Kɨnam dukwan tosok uŋun dakon geni nandagɨmaŋ. Aŋek uŋun Kiriat Jearim da mɨktɨmon taŋban kagɨmaŋ.
Kaŋek yaŋ yagɨmaŋ, “Nin kɨlɨ Yawe da yutnon wɨgɨno. Ae uŋun da kapmatjok kɨŋek gawak ɨmneŋ.”
Yawe, gak Saŋbek Saŋbek Kɨnamgo gat kɨsi abɨŋek yɨk yawot yutgokon yɨkgi. Saŋbek Saŋbek Kɨnam uŋun gak dakon tapmɨm madepgo dakon tɨlak asak.
Mukwa sogok amɨngo paŋpulugaŋaki toktogɨsi aŋpak kɨlegɨ ani. Aŋaki uŋun aŋpakni kɨlegɨ da ɨmalni tagɨsi da yaŋ asak. Ae mɨŋat amɨnyogo paŋpulugaŋaki kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek kap yoni dosi nandɨsat.
Yawe, oman amɨngo Dewit do nandaŋ ɨbi. Kɨla amɨn madep gaga manjɨgɨl uŋun manji dɨma ɨbi.
Gak da kalɨp Dewit do yaŋ teban tok tebaisi aŋ ɨmgul, ae gengo kulabɨk arɨpmɨ dɨma akdɨsal. Yaŋ iyɨgɨl, “Nak da monjɨ kabɨgokon kɨnda yɨpbo kɨla amɨn madep egɨpjak.
Monjɨgoni nak dakon saŋbek saŋbekno guramɨtni, ae gen morapno yobeŋ uŋun guramɨtni kaŋ, don bɨsap dagok dagogɨ mɨni babɨgoni dakon monjini kɨla amɨn madep dagokdaŋ.”
Yawe da Saion kokup pap iyɨ do tɨlak agɨt da uŋudon toktogɨsi egɨp do nandɨsak.
Yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak uŋun kokup papmon toktogɨsi egɨpdɨsat. Nak uŋun kokup papmon kɨla amɨn madep egɨpbeŋ do tɨlak kɨlɨ agɨm.
Nak Saion kokup pap dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo do yo morapmɨ ɨmdɨsat. Aŋapbo yo do wadak wadak dɨma akdaŋ. Aŋek yoni mɨni amɨn do jap morapmɨ yobo naŋ tugokdaŋ.
Nak da Saion kokup pap dakon mukwa sogok amɨn kabɨni yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgo uŋun da ɨmalni yombem asak. Aŋapbo Saion dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk kap yokdaŋ.
Nak da Dewit da kabɨkon amɨn kɨnda abɨdaŋek yɨpbo uŋun kokup papmon kɨla amɨn madep dagosak. Aŋek mɨŋat amɨn kabɨno do lam kɨnda da yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ yomjak.
Nak da uwalni paŋmayak akdɨsat. Mani kɨla amɨn madepno tɨlɨm madepni gat yɨtdɨsak.”
Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo but kaloŋ aŋek egɨpni kaŋ uŋun tagɨsi, ae burɨ tagɨsi akdaŋ.
Uŋun aŋpak uŋun wagɨl tagɨsisi. Uŋun olip dakon nelagɨ yombem. Olip dakon nelagɨ Aron do tagal ɨmɨŋakwa mogɨm daŋgwanikon pɨgek ɨmal dubakni da dɨwarɨkon pɨgɨgɨt.
But kaloŋ aŋpak uŋun kalbi gɨk sɨtnaŋ Emon Kabap ae Saion Kabapmon moŋ uŋun yombem tagɨsi. Yawe da but kaloŋ ekwaŋ amɨn gɨsamni yomɨsak. Egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni uŋun yomɨsak.
Yawe dakon oman amɨn morap, ji kalbi yutnikon pi aŋ amɨn, ji mani aŋkɨsini.
Telagɨ yutnikon kɨsitji paŋenagek Yawe dakon man aŋkɨsini.
Yawe kundu ae mɨktɨm wasagɨt uŋun Saion egɨsak, uŋun da yo tagɨsi aŋdamjak dosi nandɨsat.
Yawe aŋkɨsini! Yawe dakon oman amɨn, ji mani aŋkɨsini.
Ji Yawe da nagalgwan Piŋkop da yutnon omani aŋ, ji Yawe aŋkɨsini.
Yawe uŋun tagɨsi, do Yawe aŋkɨsineŋ. Mani uŋun tagɨsisi, do kap yaŋek aŋkɨsini.
Yawe da Jekop iyɨ do aŋawakgɨt. Israel uŋun Piŋkop iyɨ dakon amɨn kabɨ.
Yawe uŋun mani wukwisi yaŋ nandɨsat. Amɨn Tagɨ da piŋkop toptopmɨ morap kɨsisi yapmaŋ mudosok.
Yawe kwen kundukon, ae mɨktɨmon, ae tap kwenon, ae tap kagagwan, galaktokni yolek yo morap ak do nandɨsak uŋun asak.
Uŋun da yaŋban gɨkwem noman toŋ, ae mal aŋek sɨkak mosok, ae yo morap yopyop yutnikon da mɨrɨm yopban kwaŋ.
Isip mɨktɨmon Isip amɨn dakon monjɨ mibɨltogɨ gat ae bɨt kɨlapyo dakon monjɨ mibɨltogɨ uŋun dapban kɨmakgwit.
Isip mɨktɨmon kɨla amɨn madep gat ae kɨla amɨni gat paŋupbal ak do wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ agɨt.
Yawe da mɨktɨm morapmɨ paŋupbal aŋek kɨla amɨn madep tapmɨmɨ toŋ morapmɨ dapban kɨmakgwit.
Amo amɨn kabɨ dakon kɨla amɨn madep Sion aŋakban kɨmakgɨt, ae Basan dakon kɨla amɨn madep Ok, ae Kenan mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn madep morap gat kɨsi dapban kɨmakgwit.
Yaŋ aŋek uŋun kɨla amɨn madep dakon mɨktɨmni amɨn kabɨni Israel do yomgut.
Yawe, mango bɨsap mudok mudogɨ mɨni taŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsak. Babɨkon da babɨkon man bingo do nandaŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdaŋ.
Yawe dakon amɨn kabɨ uwalni da yo yokwi aŋyoba iyɨ paŋkutnokdɨsak. Oman amɨni do bupmɨ nandaŋ yomɨsak.
Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ kokup kɨdatni uŋun silwa ae gol baŋ wasoŋ. Amɨn kɨsit da wup uŋun wasoŋ.
Kokup kɨdat dakon wupmɨ uŋun gen kagani toŋ, mani gen arɨpmɨ dɨma yoni. Ae dabɨlni toŋ, mani yo arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨndatni.
Ae mɨrakni toŋ, mani gen arɨpmɨ dɨma nandani. Ae mɨrɨm dɨma paŋ.
Kokup kɨdat dakon wupmɨ wasoŋ amɨn, ae egɨp egɨpni kokup kɨdaron tosok yaŋsi nandaŋ amɨn morap, uŋun kokup kɨdat dakon wupmɨ yombem akdaŋ.
Israel mɨŋat amɨnyo, ji Yawe aŋkɨsini. Yawe dakon mukwa sogok amɨn, ji mani aŋkɨsini.
Liwai da kabɨkon nani, ji Yawe aŋkɨsini. Mɨŋat amɨnyo Yawe do pasolgoŋ amɨn, ji mani aŋkɨsini.
Yawe Jerusalem kokup papmon egɨsak, do mɨŋat amɨnyo ji Saion wɨgek mani aŋkɨsini. Yawe aŋkɨsini!
Yawe aŋpakni uŋun tagɨsisi, do ya yaŋ iyɨneŋsi. Dagok dagogɨ mɨni nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsak.
Nin Yawe ya yaŋ iyɨneŋ. Uŋun da piŋkop toptopmɨ morap yapmaŋ mudosok. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Nin Amɨn Tagɨ ya yaŋ iyɨneŋ. Uŋun da amɨn tagɨ morap yapmaŋ mudosok. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Uŋun kaloŋ da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ madep asak. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Iyɨ da nandak nandagon da kundu ae yo morap kwen toŋ uŋun wasagɨt. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Mɨktɨm yɨpban kwen tagɨt, ae pakbi yɨpban mibɨlɨkon tagɨt. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Gɨldat gat kanek gat wasagɨt. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Gɨldat yɨpban gɨldat kɨnda kɨla asak. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Kanek gat gɨk morap gat yopban pɨlɨn kɨla aŋ. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Nin Yawe ya yaŋ iyɨneŋ. Uŋun Isip amɨn dakon monjɨ mibɨltogɨ dapban kɨmakgwit. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Israel amɨn tɨmɨk paŋobɨŋakwan Isip yɨpmaŋ dekgwit. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Iyɨ da tapmɨm madepmon da tɨmɨk paŋopgut. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Tap Gami pudaŋban tɨmɨ bamorɨ agɨt. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Iyɨ mibɨltok kɨŋek mɨŋat amɨni tɨmɨk paŋabɨŋakwan tap ɨdap pudawit. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Mani Isip dakon kɨla amɨn madep gat ae emat amɨni gat yopban pakbi naŋ kɨmakgwit. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon mɨŋat amɨni mibɨltaŋ yomɨŋek kɨgɨt. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Kɨla amɨn madep tapmɨmɨ toŋ dapban kɨmakgwit. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Ae kɨla amɨn madep man bini toŋ dapban kɨmakgwit. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Amo amɨn kabɨ dakon kɨla amɨn madep Sion aŋakban kɨmakgɨt. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Ae Basan dakon kɨla amɨn madep Ok aŋakban kɨmakgɨt. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Aŋek uŋun kɨla amɨn madep dakon mɨktɨmni mɨŋat amɨni do yomgut. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Mɨktɨm uŋun oman amɨni Israel do yomgut. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Uwal da pabɨŋ nipgwit bɨsapmon nin do sigɨn nandaŋ nimgut. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Aŋek uwal da kɨsiron baŋ tɨmɨkgɨt. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Mɨŋat amɨnyo gat ae bɨt kɨlap morap gat jap yomɨsak. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Do Kwen Kokup Piŋkop ya yaŋsi iyɨneŋ. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Nin Babilon amɨn dakon pakbini da ɨleŋɨkon yɨgek Saion kokup pap do nandak nandak aŋek kunam takgɨmaŋ.
Kɨndap kapmatjok tawit uŋun da kɨlɨŋɨkon gitanin mɨndano taŋakwa saŋbeŋek dɨma tɨdagɨmaŋ.
Nido nin tɨmɨk mɨktɨmnikon paŋkɨwit amɨn da kap yoneŋ do niyɨwit. Yokwi aŋnimgwit amɨn da tebai yaŋ niyɨwit, “Nin da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk paneŋ do ji da kap yoni do nandamaŋ. Saion dakon kap kɨnda yoni.”
Mani mɨktɨm dubagɨkon egek Yawe dakon kap niaŋon da tagɨ yoneŋ?
Jerusalem, nak gak do ɨŋtokeŋ kaŋ, Piŋkop da nak aŋɨŋtok aban saŋbeŋek gita dɨma tɨdokeŋ.
Jerusalem, nak gak do ɨŋtaŋek yo ɨsalɨ yaŋ gandaŋek yo dɨwarɨ do nandako wɨgɨni kaŋ, Piŋkop da nak melno aŋkadɨm aban kap dɨma yokeŋ dosi nandɨsat.
Yawe, gak Idom amɨn da kalɨp Babilon dakon emat amɨn joŋɨkgwit uŋun do aego nandaki. Babilon amɨn da emat wamaŋek Jerusalem abɨdawit bɨsapmon Idom amɨn da gen yaŋ yawit, “Yut morapni kɨsi tuwɨl mudaŋek paŋupbal aŋ mudoni.”
Babilon, nandaki. Gak tasɨk tokdɨsal. Nin do aŋpak yokwi niaŋ aŋ nimgul uŋudeŋ gɨn kobogɨ yokwisi tɨmɨtdɨsal. Kobogɨ yokwi gamjak amɨn uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ asak.
Uŋun da gak dakon monjɨ monɨŋ monɨŋ tɨmɨk maban tɨpmon maŋek obɨsi tasɨk taŋek kɨmotdaŋ.
Yawe, nak but dasi nandaŋek ya yaŋ gayɨsat. Piŋkop toptopmɨ da dabɨlon kap yaŋek mango yaŋ aŋkɨsisat.
Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ but dasi galak taŋ namɨŋek kɨlano tagɨsi asal, ae mango gat gengo gat da yo morap yapmaŋ mudaŋek uŋun da wukwisi amal. Yaŋdo, nak Telagɨ Yut Madepgokon gawak gamɨŋek mango yaŋ aŋkɨsikeŋ.
Gak do bɨsit asat bɨsapmon nandaŋ namɨsal. Aŋek tapmɨm namɨŋek butno aŋteban asal.
Yawe, mɨktɨmon kɨla amɨn madep morap da gengo kɨlɨ nandayɨŋ, do uŋun da mango yaŋ aŋkɨsini dosi nandɨsat.
Tɨlɨmni uŋun madepsi, do uŋun da Yawe dakon wasokni do nandaŋek kap yoni dosi nandɨsat.
Yawe uŋun wukwisi egek amɨn iyɨ do nandaba paŋ amɨn uŋun nandaŋ yomɨŋek kɨlani asak. Mani iyɨ do nandaba wɨgɨsak amɨn uŋun yum dabɨl dagɨn pɨndakdak.
Jɨgɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ altaŋ naba kɨlano aŋaki dɨma kɨmokdot. Uwalno da nak do japmɨ nandaŋ, mani gak tapmɨmgo madep, do si pabɨŋ yopmaŋek nak aŋpulugosol.
Yawe da nak niaŋsi egɨpbeŋ ae pi ni baŋ abeŋ do nandagɨt uŋun kɨlano aŋakwan aŋ mudokeŋ. Mudok mudogɨ mɨni nak do but dasi galak taŋ namɨsal. Gak da nak wasagɨl, do dɨma ɨŋtaŋ nabi.
Yawe, gak butnokon yo ni da toŋ uŋun kokwin aŋek bamɨsi nandaŋ namɨsal.
Gak nak da yɨk pɨdotyo asat uŋun nandaŋ mudosol. Dubagɨkon da nandak nandakno nandaŋ mudosol.
Nak kosit agɨsat bo ae dɨpmɨn pokdoron niaŋ egɨsat uŋun gak da nandɨsal. Gak aŋpakno kɨsisi nandaŋ mudosol.
Yawe, nak gen kɨnda yok do asat uŋun gak da kɨlɨ nandagɨl.
Gak mibɨltok ae buŋonyo agaki kɨsitgo da nak abɨdosok.
Nandak nandakgo da nandak nandakno yapmaŋek wukwisi asak. Uŋun nak da arɨpmɨ dɨma nandakeŋ.
Nak dukwan kɨŋek Wupgo yɨpmaŋ dekgeŋ? Nak pasal dukwan kɨŋapbo gak kapmatjok dɨma egɨpdɨsal?
Kwen Kokupmon wɨgɨkeŋ kaŋ, gak uŋudon egɨpdɨsal. Ae kɨmakbi tamogwan pɨgɨkeŋ kaŋ, uŋudon kɨsi egɨpdɨsal gɨn.
Pɨdaŋ pɨrɨropmaŋ gɨldat wɨsak tetgɨn do dubagɨsi kɨkeŋ bo tap dɨwarɨsikon kɨkeŋ kaŋ,
gak uŋudon egɨpdɨsal gɨn. Aŋek kɨsitgo da nak abɨdaŋek kosit nolɨkdɨsal. Tapmɨmgo madep, do nak aŋpulugokdɨsal.
Nak “Pɨlɨn tuk da nak aŋkɨsɨbɨsak, ae gɨldat dakon teŋteŋ nak aŋgwasisak uŋun da pɨlɨn tuk asak” yaŋ yokeŋ kaŋ
pɨlɨn tuk da nak arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋkɨsɨbɨsak. Kalbi uŋun gɨldat kalba yombem akdɨsak. Pɨlɨn gat ae teŋteŋɨ gat kɨsi pɨndakbɨ arɨpsi amal.
Gak da gɨptɨm dɨwat morapno kɨsi wasagɨl. Meŋ da butgwan nak uŋungwan wasaŋ mudagɨl.
Nak da gak aŋkɨsisat, nido gak da pi ŋwakŋwarɨsi aŋek nak wasaŋ nepgul. Nak pakyaŋsi nandɨsat, gak da yo morap wasagɨl uŋun ŋwakŋwarɨsi.
Meŋ da butgwan pasɨlɨ tamogwan tagok tagok agɨm bɨsapmon gak da pɨndagaki kɨdat morapno tagaŋek notnikon saŋbewit.
Meŋ da dɨma aŋalaŋakwan kɨlɨ nandagɨl. Nak mɨktɨmon dɨma altagɨm, mani gak da gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ mɨktɨmon egɨpbeŋ do nandagɨl uŋun papiagokon kɨlɨ mandagɨl.
Piŋkop, nandak nandak morapgo uŋun wagɨl tagɨsisi. Nandak nandakgo uŋun madepsi, amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma manjɨrɨ.
Gak da nandɨsal yo morap manjɨkeŋ kaŋ, tap ɨleŋon nɨman morap yapjak. Dɨpmɨnon da pɨdosot bɨsapmon nak gak gat sigɨn egɨsat.
Piŋkop, amɨn yokwi dapbɨ kɨmotni do nandɨsat. Amɨn dapdap amɨn ji nepmaŋ dek kɨt!
Uŋun amɨn da gak do gen yokwi yoŋ, ae gak dakon man do gen gɨreŋ yoŋ.
Yawe, nak amɨn gak do kuragɨ nandaŋ amɨn do kuragɨ nandaŋ yomɨsat. Ae amɨn kwen wɨgɨk aŋgamaŋ amɨn do nandaba yokwi tok aŋ yomɨsat.
Asisi, nak uŋun amɨn do kuragɨsi nandɨsat. Uŋun pɨndakgo nak dakon uwalno aŋ.
Piŋkop, kokwin tagɨsi aŋek nak dakon nandak nandak morap butnokon toŋ uŋun do nandaki. Aŋkewalek nandak nandak morapno do pakyaŋsi nandaki.
Egɨp egɨpno kokwin tagɨsi abi. Aŋpak yokwi dɨ nandak nandaknokon dɨ taŋbam. Egɨp egɨp teban dakon kosit naŋ aŋaŋ kɨki.

Yawe, amɨn yokwi da kɨsiron baŋ pulugaŋ nepbi. Kɨlano tagɨsi aŋaki emat amɨn da dɨma aŋupbal ani.
Toktogɨsi aŋpak yokwi ak do nandak nandak aŋ, aŋek toktogɨsi mɨŋat amɨnyo da binapmon pɨdok pɨdok paŋalon aŋ.
Gen yogokni uŋun tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ dakon geni yombem, geni tepmɨsi. Ae gen yogokni uŋun tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ dakon pakbi yokwini yombem da gen kagakon tugawit da mɨŋat amɨnyo paŋupbal aŋ.
Yawe, kɨlano tagɨsi aŋaki amɨn yokwi da dɨma abɨŋ nepni. Dam aŋaki emat amɨn nak aŋupbal ak do gen yoŋ, uŋun yo kɨnda dɨma ani.
Kwen wɨgɨk amɨn da nak do pat yɨpmaŋ. Nak do kɨlap naŋ yaŋ abɨdok do nap teban baŋ nak da kosiron pat yɨpmaŋ.
Yawe yaŋ iyɨsat, “Gak Piŋkopno.” Yawe, nak aŋpulugoki. Yaŋ tɨdosot, do nandaŋ nabi.
Amɨn Tagɨ Yawe, gak yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨno tapmɨmɨ toŋsi. Kalɨp uwal gat emat wamgumaŋ bɨsapmon aŋkutnagɨl.
Yawe, amɨn yokwi da yo tɨmɨt do galak toŋ uŋun dɨma yobi. Yum pɨndagaki aŋpak yokwi ak do gen yaŋ paŋteban awit uŋun dɨma ani.
Yum pɨndagaki uwalno da emaron dɨma abɨŋ nepni. Yo uŋun ak do nandaŋ uŋun paŋtobɨlbɨ iyɨkon noman toni.
Kɨndap yɨpbɨ kwenikon moni. Mabɨ gapma madepgwan pɨgek ae dɨma wɨni.
Ɨsal dogɨn amɨn dɨwarɨ gen yaŋ yomaŋ amɨn yum pɨndagaki nin da mɨktɨmon tagɨ dɨma egɨpni. Ae emat amɨnon yo yokwisi noman taŋ yoba pasɨlni do nandɨsat.
Yawe, gak da jɨgɨ paŋ amɨn gat ae yo do wadak wadak aŋ amɨn gat paŋpulugosol.
Mɨŋat amɨnyo kɨlegɨ da mango aŋkɨsikdaŋ. Uŋun gak gat kɨsi egɨpdaŋ.
Yawe, nak gak do yaŋ tɨdosot. Tepmɨsi aŋpulugoki do nandɨsat. Gak do yaŋ tɨdosot, do bɨsitno nandaki.
Bɨsitno da mukwa kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi da yaŋ gagon opjak dosi nandɨsat. Ae gak do kɨsitno paŋenokdot uŋun da pɨlɨndo dakon paretno yaŋ asak.
Yawe, gen kagano do kɨla tagɨsi aŋaki gen yokwi kɨnda dɨma yokeŋ.
Yum nandaŋaki butnokon da aŋpak yokwi ak do dɨma nandakeŋ. Ae yum nandaŋaki amɨn yokwi gat muwuk agek yokwi dɨma aneŋ. Yum nandaŋaki uŋun dakon jap noknok bɨsap madepmon uŋun gat dɨma yɨtneŋ.
Yum nandaŋaki amɨn kɨlegɨ kɨnda da nak aŋmɨlɨp ak do jɨgɨ tagɨ namjak. Mani nak amɨn yokwi not dɨma aŋ yobeŋ. Piŋkop da amɨn yokwi uŋun aŋpak yokwini dakon kobogɨ paŋtobɨl yomjak do bɨsit asat.
Amɨn da amɨn yokwi dakon kɨla amɨni uŋun tɨmɨgek maba tɨp domon pɨgɨni bɨsapmon Yawe dakon gen uŋun bamɨsi yaŋ nandaba pɨsokdaŋ.
Aŋek amɨn da jap pi do mɨktɨm pɨdaŋek paŋdamɨt aŋ, uŋun da tɨlak uŋun amɨn dakon kɨdarɨ paŋdamɨt aŋek maba kɨmakbi tamogwan pɨgɨkdaŋ.
Mani Amɨn Tagɨ Yawe, nak gak do nandaŋ gadasat. Gak da nak tagɨsi aŋkutnosol. Yum nandaŋaki dɨma kɨmokgeŋ.
Aŋpulugaŋaki amɨn yokwi da pat yɨpgwit uŋudon dɨma yokwalgeŋ.
Yopbɨ iyɨ pat yɨpgwiron iyɨ yokwalni. Mani nak kosit tagɨsi agek yo kɨnda da dɨma aŋupbal asak.

Nak Yawe da aŋpulugosak do tebaisi yaŋ tɨdosot. Bupmɨ nandaŋ namɨŋek aŋpulugosak do bɨsit asat.
Nandaba kɨkno gat ae jɨgɨ morap noman taŋ namaŋ uŋun kɨsi iyɨŋ mudosot.
Jɨgɨsi nandaŋek wagɨlsi yokwi tokdɨsat yaŋ nandɨsat bɨsapmon, Yawe niaŋsi abeŋ uŋun gak da nandɨsal. Kosiron yokwalgeŋ do amɨn da pat pɨwit.
Nak aŋpulugosak amɨn kɨnda kapmat dɨma akban kosot. Amɨn kɨnda da kɨlano dɨma asak, ae amɨn kɨnda da nak do bup taŋek dɨma aŋkutnosok.
Yaŋdo, Yawe nak aŋpulugoki do bɨsit gayɨsat. Gak kaloŋgɨn pasɨlɨ tamono. Mɨktɨmon egɨsat bɨsapmon gak gat gɨn egɨp do nandɨsat.
Butno obɨsi jɨk tosok, do aŋpulugoki do bɨsit asat uŋun nandaki. Nak aŋsopmaŋgaŋ amɨn uŋun tapmɨmni madepsi. Arɨpmɨ dɨma pabɨŋ yopbeŋ, do uŋun da kɨsiron baŋ pulugaŋ nepbi.
Jɨgɨkon yɨkdat, do pulugaŋ nepbɨ tagɨsi egɨpbeŋ. Yaŋ aŋaki yo tagɨsi aŋnamɨsal uŋun do nandaŋek mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyogo muwutnikon mango aŋkɨsikeŋ.
Yawe bɨsitno nandaki. Mɨrakgo yopmaŋek aŋpulugoki do yaŋ tɨdosot uŋun nandaki. Gak amɨn kɨlegɨsi, ae bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ dɨma nepmaŋ dekdal, do bɨsitno nandaki.
Gak da dabɨlon amɨn kɨlegɨ kɨnda dɨma egɨsak, do oman amɨngo nak gen pikon dɨma nepbi.
Uwalno da nol aŋkɨ nɨkban maŋ mɨktɨmon pokdot. Aŋakwan amɨn kɨlɨ kɨmakgwit da arɨpmon pɨlɨn tukgwan egɨsat.
Nandak nandakno upbal taŋakwan but pasol madepsi nandɨsat.
Kalɨpsi egɨpgum uŋun do nandɨsat. Yo morap agɨl ae pi tagɨsi agɨl uŋun do nandak nandak tebaisi asat.
Aŋpulugoki do didasat. Mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨsi da sɨkak do nandɨsak, uŋun da arɨpmon nak gak do madepsi galak taŋ gamɨsat.
Yawe, butno tapmɨmɨ mɨni aban nandɨsat, do bɨsitno nandaŋek tepmɨsi aŋpulugoki. Dɨma pasɨl nabi. Yaŋ abi kaŋ, amɨn kɨlɨ kɨmakgwit uŋun da tamokon kɨkeŋ.
Egɨp egɨpno gagon tosok yaŋsi nandɨsat, do aŋpulugaŋbɨ wɨsa dagokdo gak da amɨn nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsal uŋun do nandakeŋ. Nak bɨsit gayɨsat, do kosit nolɨŋbɨ uŋun naŋ kɨkeŋ.
Yawe, kɨlano abi do gagon obɨsat, do uwalno da kɨsiron baŋ pulugaŋ nepbi.
Gak Piŋkopno, do nayɨŋ dekbɨ gak dakon galaktok yolek egɨpbeŋ. Wupgo tagɨsi uŋun da mibɨltaŋ namɨŋakwan kosit kɨlegɨkon agɨpbeŋ.
Yawe, man bingo tagɨsi tosak do yokwikon naŋ pulugaŋ nepbi. Gak amɨn kɨlegɨsi, do jɨgɨ morap pasat uŋun wɨrɨrɨk nabi.
Nak do but dasi galak taŋ namɨsal, do uwalno dapbɨ kɨmotni. Nak oman amɨngo, do uwalno obɨsi dapbɨ kɨmotni.
Nak Yawe dakon man aŋkɨsisat. Uŋun tɨp madepno. Emat dakon mibɨlɨ tagɨsi nayɨŋ dekdak. Aŋek aŋtagap aban emat do tagap tosot.
Uŋun but dasi galak taŋ namɨsak, ae dam tebano arɨpmɨ dɨma tuwɨlɨ egɨsak. Uŋun pasɨlɨ tamono, ae yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨno. Uŋun pasɨkno tebaisi, do aŋkutnaŋakwan tagɨsi egɨsat. Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ pabɨŋ yopmaŋakwan nak da yoŋgamgwan ekwaŋ.
Yawe, mɨŋat amɨnyo nin niaŋen amɨn dɨ baŋ nin do nandak nandak madep asal? Nin yo ɨsalɨsi. Gak nido kɨlanin kakgɨmansi asal?
Mɨrɨm bɨsap kaloŋ pɨsono kwaŋ uŋun da tɨlak bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsi ekwamaŋ. Wupnin gɨldaron tepmɨsi altaŋ pasɨlgaŋ uŋun da tɨlak bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok gɨn ekwamaŋ.
Yawe, kundu wɨtdalek pɨki. Kɨsitgo kabapmon yopmaŋaki mukwa madepsi pɨdoni.
Mal yɨpbɨ noman taŋek uwal yolban kɨŋ mudoni. Gobɨŋgo yamaŋaki pasal kɨŋ mudoni.
Kɨsitgo yɨpbɨ pɨŋakwan nak ɨlɨkbɨ wɨkeŋ. Aŋaki pakbi ɨlarɨsi yɨpmaŋ dekgeŋ. Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da kɨsiron baŋ abɨdoki.
Uŋun amɨn gen bamɨ dɨma yoŋ. Top baŋ gɨn yaŋek gen uŋun bamɨsi yaŋ yoŋ.
Piŋkop, nak abɨsok gak do kap kalugɨ yokeŋ. Gita tɨdaŋek gak do kap yokdɨsat.
Kɨla amɨn madep paŋpulugaŋaki emaron teban toŋ. Oman amɨngo Dewit nak yokwikon naŋ abɨdagɨl.
Uwal yo yokwi aŋ namaŋ da kɨsiron baŋ abɨdoki. Aŋek Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da kɨsiron baŋ abɨdoki. Uŋun gen bamɨ dɨma yoŋ. Top baŋgɨn yaŋek gen uŋun bamɨ yaŋ yoŋ.
Nin monjinin wɨli kɨndap da yaŋ tebaisi tagoni do nandamaŋ. Ae gwanin da kɨla amɨn madep dakon yut dakon tɨlɨmni tagɨsi da egɨpni do nandamaŋ.
Pigaganin da jap bamɨ morapmɨ taŋakwa jap paŋ yopyop yut madepsi tugaŋ toni do nandamaŋ. Aŋakwa sipsipnin da monjɨ morapmɨ sigɨn paŋalani.
Ae bulmakau da monjɨ morapmɨ paŋalani. Aŋakwa yokwi dɨ dɨma altoni ae kɨnda dɨma kɨmotjak. Nin dakon kosiron mɨŋat bo wɨli kɨnda da jɨgɨ bo ae tepmɨ paŋek kunam dɨma tatjak do nandamaŋ.
Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ yo uŋuden tɨmɨkgaŋ uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ ani. Mɨŋat amɨnyo Yawe yɨpba Piŋkopni egɨsak uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ ani.
Piŋkopno ae Kɨla Amɨn Madepno, bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ mango aŋkɨsikeŋ.
Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ mango aŋkɨsikeŋ. Dagok dagogɨ mɨni gak aŋkɨsiŋ wɨgɨkeŋ.
Yawe uŋun mani wukwisi, do mani aŋkɨsiŋ kɨmotneŋ. Mani wukwisi, do uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ kɨsi amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma nandaba pɨsogɨ.
Babɨkon da babɨkon pi madep aŋ aŋ agɨl uŋun do yaŋ yaŋ akdaŋ.
Amɨn da tapmɨm madepgo gat ae Kɨla Amɨn Madep Wɨkwisi egɨsal uŋun do yokdaŋ. Aŋakwa nak do pi madep madep asal uŋun do nandaŋek egɨpbeŋ.
Amɨn da pi masɨ masɨmɨ asal uŋun dakon geni yokdaŋ. Aŋakwa nak da man madepgo do yokeŋ.
Aŋpakgo tagɨsi uŋun dakon geni yaŋek kapmon da aŋpakgo kɨlegɨsi uŋun do yoni.
Yawe da nin do nandaŋ yawok nimɨŋek bupmɨ nandaŋ nimɨsak. Butjap tepmɨ dɨma nandaŋek but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsak.
Amɨn morap kɨsi do aŋpak tagɨsi aŋyomɨsak. Aŋek yo morap wasagɨt uŋun do bupmɨkon da kɨlani asak.
Yawe, yo morap wasagɨl uŋun da mango aŋkɨsini. Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨgo da mango aŋkɨsini.
Amɨn kɨla agakgokon tɨlɨmgo tosok uŋun do yokdaŋ. Aŋek tapmɨm madepgo dakon geni yokdaŋ.
Yaŋ aŋakwa amɨn morap da pi madep asal uŋun do nandani. Aŋek gak kɨla amɨn madep tapmɨmɨ toŋ egɨsal ae mango wukwisi tosok yaŋ nandaŋ gamni.
Gak kɨla amɨn madep dagok dagogɨ mɨni egek amɨn morap kɨlani akdɨsal. Yawe yaŋ teban tok gen yagɨt uŋun kɨnda dɨma yapmaŋek guramɨk kɨmokdok. Nin paŋpulugok do yo tagɨsi gɨn asak.
Jɨgɨni toŋ amɨn paŋpulugaŋek amɨn da pabɨŋ yopmaŋgaŋ amɨn uŋun paŋenakban tagɨsi ekwaŋ.
Yo morap egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ jap do aŋ bɨsapmon gagon sɨŋtaŋba wɨkwan jap upmokdol.
Jap gat ae yo morap gat arɨpnikon yomaŋaki tagɨsi ekwaŋ.
Yawe uŋun aŋpak kɨlegɨ gɨn asak. Yo morap wasaŋ yopguron aŋpak tagɨsi baŋ aŋyomɨsak.
Butdasi nandaŋek bɨsit iyaŋ amɨn Yawe uŋun amɨn da kapmatjok egɨsak.
Iyɨ do pasolgoŋ amɨn yo nido galak toŋ uŋun yoban tɨmɨkgaŋ. Bɨsitni nandaŋek yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkdak.
Iyɨ do but dasi galak taŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn Yawe da kɨlani asak. Mani yokwi aŋ amɨn paŋupbal akdɨsak.
Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ Yawe dakon mani aŋkɨsikeŋ. Yo morap egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ ji dagok dagogɨ mɨni mani telagɨ aŋkɨsini.
Yawe dakon man aŋkɨsini. Nak naga mani aŋkɨsikeŋ.
Mɨktɨmon egɨpbeŋ bɨsapmon Yawe dakon mani aŋkɨsikeŋ. Piŋkopno do kap yaŋek aŋkɨsiŋ wɨgek kɨmokgeŋ.
On mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn madep da gak arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋpulugokdaŋ, do egɨp egɨpji uŋun amɨnon tosok yaŋ dɨma nandani.
Uŋun kɨmagek mɨktɨm dagokdaŋ. Yo ak do yawit uŋun bamɨ dɨma noman tokdaŋ.
Mani amɨn kɨnda Jekop dakon Piŋkop da aŋpulugosak do nandaŋ gadaŋek jomjom asak uŋun amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ asak.
Piŋkop da kundu ae mɨktɨm ae tap ae yo morap uŋungwan toŋ wasagɨt. Toktogɨsi yo morap ak do yosok uŋun akdɨsak.
Jɨgɨkon ekwaŋ amɨn paŋpulugosok. Ae jap do aŋ amɨn jap yomɨsak. Yawe da dam tebanon ekwaŋ amɨn wɨtdal yopban kwaŋ.
Dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn dabɨlni paban pɨsaŋban sɨŋtoŋ. Ae jɨgɨ da tebai pabɨŋ yopmaŋgaŋ amɨn uŋun jɨgɨni kukwaŋ yomɨsak. Yawe uŋun amɨn kɨlegɨ do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak.
Dubagɨkon amɨn nin da mɨktɨmon ekwaŋ uŋun kɨlani asak. Ae sakwabat gat ae monjɨ meŋi datniyo kɨmakbi uŋun kɨsi kɨlani asak. Mani amɨn yokwi aŋ uŋun da yo ak do nandaŋ uŋun kosit sopmaŋ yoban dɨma aŋ.
Yawe uŋun dagok dagogɨ mɨni kɨla amɨn madep egɨpdɨsak. Saion kokup pap amɨn ji dakon Piŋkop dagok dagogɨ mɨni Kɨla Amɨn Madep egɨpdɨsak. Yawe dakon man aŋkɨsini!
Yawe aŋkɨsini! Piŋkopnin kap yaŋek aŋkɨsamaŋ kaŋ, aŋpak kɨlegɨsi amaŋ. Yaŋ aŋapno butnin tagɨsisi tosok, ae aŋkɨsamaŋ uŋun agagɨsi naŋ amaŋ.
Yawe da Jerusalem kokup pap aeni aŋkaluk aŋek Israel amɨn kalɨp uwal da tɨmɨk mɨktɨm dubagɨkon paŋkɨwit uŋun aeni paŋmuwukdak.
Burɨ yokwi tawit uŋun paŋmɨlɨp aŋek wudani wamaŋ yomɨsak.
Uŋun da gɨk manjɨŋek gɨk kaloŋ kaloŋ do man yomɨsak.
Amɨn Tagɨnin uŋun wukwisi madep, ae tapmɨmni madepsi. Nandak nandakni uŋun tɨlakni mɨni.
Yawe da amɨn iyɨ do nandaba paŋ uŋun paŋpulugosok. Mani yokwi pakpak amɨn pabɨŋ yopban mɨktɨmon maŋ pokgoŋ.
Yawe ya yaŋ iyɨŋek kap yaŋ ɨmno. Gita tɨdaŋek Piŋkopnin aŋkɨsino.
Uŋun da gɨkwem kwen yopban sɨkak maŋakwa ɨleŋon joŋ kwoŋ.
Uŋun da joŋ kɨlap do jap yomɨsak, ae mɨnam pɨdɨkyo kɨsi yaŋ tɨdaŋba jap yomɨsak.
Yawe uŋun os dakon tapmɨm gat ae amɨn dakon tapmɨm gat do nandaban yo madep dɨma asak.
Mani, amɨn iyɨ do pasal ɨmaŋ ae Yawe da nin do but dasi bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ galak taŋ nimɨsak yaŋsi nandaŋ gadaŋ amɨn uŋun do galak taŋ yomɨsak.
Jerusalem amɨn ji Yawe aŋkɨsini. Saion amɨn ji Piŋkopji aŋkɨsini.
Uŋun da kokup papji dakon wigat paŋteban aŋek amɨn kabɨgo gɨsam yomɨsak.
Uŋun da paŋpulugaŋban emarɨ mɨni tagɨsi ekwaŋ. Ae wit tagɨsi dakon baŋ paŋɨreŋ aban naŋek butji tugoŋ.
Gen kɨnda yɨpmaŋdak uŋun tepmɨsi mɨktɨmon pɨsak.
Uŋun da ais yopban sipsip dakon daŋgwi da yaŋ maŋ mɨktɨm yalɨsak. Aŋek gɨk sɨtnaŋ yopban abɨlak da yaŋ maŋ tayɨŋɨkwaŋ.
Ais madep yopban tɨp da yaŋ mɨktɨmon moŋ. Aŋek uŋun da aba kokup mɨrɨmɨsi aŋakwan amɨn kɨnda da mɨrɨm abɨŋ yɨpmɨ mɨni.
Ae don gen yɨpban mɨrɨm aŋakwan ais pakbi dagaŋek pokgoŋ.
Geni Jekop do ɨmgut. Nawa geni Israel amɨn do yomgut.
Mɨktɨm dɨwarɨ taŋ aŋ aŋ kwaŋ dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo do yaŋ dɨma agɨt. Nawa geni dɨma nandaŋ. Yawe dakon man aŋkɨsini!
Yawe aŋkɨsini! Ji ason Kwen Kokup ekwaŋ, Yawe aŋkɨsini.
Aŋelo morapni aŋkɨsini. Kwen Kokup emat amɨn kabɨ morapni aŋkɨsini.
Gɨldat gat kanek gat jil aŋkɨsinjil. Gɨk morap teŋteŋoŋ ji aŋkɨsini.
Kundu kwen ason aŋkɨsiki. Pakbi kundu yapmaŋek kwensi toŋ, ji aŋkɨsini.
Iyɨ yaŋakwan uŋun yo morap noman tawit, do uŋun yo morap Yawe dakon man aŋkɨsini.
Uŋun yo morap wasaŋakwan tamonikon toktogɨsi tebai toŋ. Gen yagɨt uŋun dɨma pasɨljak.
Mɨktɨmon yo morap toŋ, ji Yawe aŋkɨsini. Ji tap kɨlap madep madep gat, ae tap ɨdap morap ɨlarɨsi,
ae mal, ae ais madep monɨŋɨyo, ae gɨkwem, ae mɨrɨm madep Yawe dakon galaktok yolgaŋ, ji kɨsi da aŋkɨsini.
Ji kabap madep ae monɨŋɨ gat ae kɨndap sopmɨ toŋ ae sida kɨndap madep,
ae joŋ kɨlap gat ae bulmakau ae yo monɨŋ morap egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ gat ae mɨnam gat, ji kɨsisi Yawe aŋkɨsini.
Ji kɨla amɨn madep gat ae amɨn gat ae gapman gat ae kɨla amɨn morap gat,
ae wɨlisok ae mɨŋatjok ae amɨn pelaŋ ae mɨŋat monjɨyo, ji kɨsisi Yawe aŋkɨsini.
Uŋun kɨsi morap Yawe aŋkɨsiŋ kɨmotni. Uŋun kaloŋ gɨn mani wukwisi. Tɨlɨmni da mɨktɨm gat kundu gat yapmaŋ mudosok.
Uŋun da iyɨ dakon amɨn kabɨ Israel uŋun do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek paŋteban asak do aŋek aŋkɨsaŋ. Yawe aŋkɨsini!
Yawe aŋkɨsini! Kap kalugɨ yaŋ ɨmni. Piŋkop yol kɨmokgoŋ mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni ji muwugek aŋkɨsini.
Israel amɨn ji Piŋkop da wasagɨt, do but galak nandaŋ ɨmni. Saion kokup pap amɨn ji Kɨla Amɨn Madepji do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani.
Kap aŋek mani yaŋ aŋkɨsini. Tambarin gat ae gita gat tɨdaŋek mani aŋkɨsini.
Yawe da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni do galak taŋ yomɨsak. Aŋek amɨn iyɨ do nandaba pɨŋbi aŋ uŋun yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkdak.
Yaŋ asak, do mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni but dasi yolgaŋ uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani dosi nandɨsat. Dɨpmɨn potpot tamokon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk kap yoni.
Piŋkop yaŋ aŋkɨsiŋek emat agak sɨba geni tepmɨsi baŋ tɨmɨgek
Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ gat emat wamaŋek yo yokwisi aŋ yomɨŋek pabɨŋ yopni dosi nandɨsat.
Aŋek ain nap baŋ kɨla amɨn madepni gat ae kɨla amɨni gat dakon kandap paŋteban ani.
Aŋakwa Piŋkop da yagɨt uŋun da arɨpmon kobogɨ yokwisi tɨmɨtni. Aŋakwa amɨn kabɨni iyɨ yol kɨmokgoŋ uŋun dakon man madep tokdɨsak. Yawe aŋkɨsini!
Yawe aŋkɨsini! Piŋkop telagɨ yutnikon egɨsak, uŋun aŋkɨsini. Kwen Kokup tapmɨmɨ toŋsi uŋudon egɨsak, uŋun aŋkɨsini.
Pi masɨ masɨmɨsi asak do aŋkɨsini. Mani uŋun wagɨl wukwisi do aŋkɨsini.
Kweŋ pɨsoŋek aŋkɨsini. Gita mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ tɨdaŋek aŋkɨsini.
Tambarin tɨdaŋek kap aŋek aŋkɨsini. Gita tɨdaŋek kasɨsɨŋ pɨsoŋek aŋkɨsini.
Ain ɨdap notnikon tɨdaŋ tɨdaŋ aŋek aŋkɨsini. Uŋun tɨdaŋba gen madepsi yaŋakwa aŋkɨsini.
Yo morap mɨrɨm paŋ uŋun Yawe aŋkɨsini! Yawe aŋkɨsini!























































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































On man sɨlɨp uŋun Yesu Kristo dakon babɨkni dakon man sɨlɨp. Yesu uŋun Dewit da kabɨkon nani. Aŋakwan Dewit uŋun Abraham da kabɨkon nani.
Abraham uŋun Aisak dakon datni. Aisak uŋun Jekop dakon datni Jekop uŋun Juda gat ae peni padɨk padɨkni gat dakon datni.
Juda uŋun Peres gat Sera gat dakon datni. (Meŋi uŋun Tamar.) Peres uŋun Esron dakon datni. Esron uŋun Ram dakon datni.
Ram uŋun Aminadap dakon datni. Aminadap uŋun Nason dakon datni. Nason uŋun Salmon dakon datni.
Salmon uŋun Boas dakon datni. (Meŋi uŋun Reap.) Boas uŋun Obet dakon datni. (Meŋi uŋun Rut.) Obet uŋun Jesi dakon datni.
Jesi uŋun kɨla amɨn madep Dewit dakon datni. Aŋakwan Dewit uŋun Solomon dakon datni. (Solomon dakon meŋi kalɨp Uria dakon mɨŋatni egɨpgut.)
Solomon uŋun Reoboam dakon datni. Reoboam uŋun Abiya dakon datni. Abiya uŋun Asa dakon datni.
Asa uŋun Jeosapat dakon datni. Jeosapat uŋun Jeoram dakon datni. Jeoram uŋun Usia dakon datni.
Usia uŋun Jotam dakon datni. Jotam uŋun As dakon datni. As uŋun Esekia dakon datni.
Esekia uŋun Manase dakon datni. Manase uŋun Emon dakon datni. Emon uŋun Josaia dakon datni.
Josaia uŋun Joiakin gat ae notni kabɨ gat dakon datni. (Uŋun amɨn kabɨ da bɨsapmon Israel amɨn uwalni da tɨmɨk Babilon mɨktɨmon paŋkɨ yopba egɨpgwit.)
Babilon paŋkɨ egɨpgwit bɨsapmon, Joiakin uŋun Sealtiel dakon datni. Sealtiel uŋun Serubabel dakon datni.
Serubabel uŋun Abiut dakon datni. Abiut uŋun Eliakim dakon datni. Eliakim uŋun Aso dakon datni.
Aso uŋun Sadok dakon datni. Sadok uŋun Akim dakon datni. Akim uŋun Eliut dakon datni.
Eliut uŋun Eleasa dakon datni. Eleasa uŋun Matan dakon datni. Matan uŋun Jekop dakon datni.
Jekop uŋun Josep dakon datni. Josep uŋun Maria dakon eni. Aŋakwan Maria da Yesu aŋalagɨt. Yesu uŋun Kristo yaŋ iyaŋ.
Abrahamon da wɨŋ Dewiron dagagɨt uŋun babɨkni 14 kabɨ. Aŋakwan Dewiron da wɨŋ uwalni da tɨmɨk Babilon mɨktɨmon paŋkɨwit bɨsap uŋun babɨkni 14 kabɨ. Aŋakwan Babilon egɨpgwiron da wɨŋ Kristo altagɨt uŋun kɨsi babɨkni 14 kabɨ.
Yesu Kristo altagɨt uŋun dakon gen yaŋ. Meŋi Maria uŋun Josep da pasak do kɨlɨ manjɨwit. Mani dɨma paŋakwan Maria uŋun monjɨ kwap kɨlɨ awɨlgɨt. Monjɨ kwap awɨlgɨt uŋun Telagɨ Wup da tapmɨmon da awɨlgɨt.
Aŋakwan Josep uŋun Maria monjɨ kwapni kɨnda awɨlak yaŋ nandaŋek yɨpmaŋ det do nandagɨt. Mani eni amɨn kɨlegɨ do amɨn morap da ɨŋamon Maria mayagɨ ɨm do dɨma nandagɨt. Yaŋ do aŋek pasɨlɨkon da kɨrɨŋɨk ɨm do nandagɨt.
Josep yaŋ nandaŋek egakwan Amɨn Tagɨ dakon aŋelo kɨnda da dɨpmɨnon altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Josep, Dewit da kabɨkon nani, Maria da monjɨ kwap uŋun Telagɨ Wup da tapmɨmon awɨlak, do Maria pak do dɨma pasolgi.
Uŋun monjɨ wɨli aŋalaŋban mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni dɨwarɨni wɨrɨrɨgek iyɨ do tɨmɨtdɨsak, do mani Yesu yaŋ iyɨki.”
Uŋun yo morap altaŋakwa Amɨn Tagɨ da kombɨ amɨn aŋtagap aban gen yagɨt uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ tosok.
“Nandaki. Mɨŋat kɨnda amɨn gat dɨma pakbi kɨnda da monjɨ kwap awɨlek monjɨ wɨli kɨnda aŋalasak. Aŋalaŋban mani Emanuel yaŋ yoni.” (Emanuel dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ: “Piŋkop nin gat egɨsak.”)
Josep dɨpmɨnon da pɨdaŋek Amɨn Tagɨ dakon aŋelo da gen iyɨgɨt uŋun guramɨgek mɨŋatni Maria pagɨt.
Mani kaloŋɨ dɨma pagek egɨ wɨgɨ Maria da monjɨ wɨli kɨnda aŋalagɨt. Aŋalaŋban Josep da mani Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt.
Judia mɨktɨmon kokup kɨnda mani Betlehem uŋudon Maria da Yesu aŋalagɨt. Uŋun bɨsapmon Erot da kɨla amɨn madep yɨkgɨt. Yesu altaŋakwan nandak nandak amɨn gɨldat wɨsak tetgɨn da Jerusalem kokup papmon apgwit.
Abɨŋ Jerusalem amɨn yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep altagɨt uŋun dukwan yɨkdak? Nin gɨkni gɨldat wɨsak tetgɨn da kaŋek gawak ɨm do abamaŋ.”
Kɨla amɨn madep Erot gen yawit uŋun nandaŋek wɨrɨpdakgɨt. Ae amɨn morap Jerusalem egɨpgwit uŋunyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn nandaŋek wɨrɨpdakgwit.
Erot da gen uŋun nandaŋek Israel amɨn dakon mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat yaŋ yoban abɨŋ muwukgwit. Muwukba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kristo ni kokupmon altosak do yaŋbi?”
Yaŋban kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Judia mɨktɨmon Betlehem kokupmon altosak. Kombɨ amɨn kɨnda da kalɨpsigwan yaŋ mandagɨt,
‘Betlehem, Judia mɨktɨmon tosok, gagon kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda altokdɨsak, do gak Judia mɨktɨm dakon kokup morap yapmaŋdal. Uŋun amɨn da amɨn kabɨno Israel uŋun dakon kɨla amɨn madep egɨpdɨsak.’ ”
Yaŋ yaŋba nandaŋek yoyɨŋban kɨwit. Kɨŋakwa pasɨlɨkon da gɨk dakon mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn Erot da yoyɨŋban apgwit. Apba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gɨk uŋun ni bɨsapmonsi altagɨt?”
Yoyɨŋban gɨk noman tagɨt dakon bɨsap iyɨŋba nandaŋek Betlehem kokupmon yabegek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kɨŋ monjɨ uŋun kɨlegɨsi wusɨŋ koni. Kaŋek abɨŋ nayɨŋba nakyo kɨsi kɨŋ gawak ɨbeŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek kɨŋakwa gɨk gɨldat wɨsak tetgɨn da kalɨp kawit aeni altaŋ yomgut. Gɨk uŋun kɨŋakwan yol aŋkɨ Monjɨ si pakgɨt yut da tɨlagon yɨkban kawit.
Gɨk uŋun kaŋek but galak madepsi
nandaŋek yutnon wɨgek Monjɨ gat meŋi Maria gat pɨndakgwit. Pɨndagek ŋwakbeŋ aŋek Monjɨ gawak ɨmgwit. Yaŋ aŋek yɨkni wɨtdalek gol ae yo dɨwarɨ kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi yumaŋ nogɨ wukwi but galak do ɨmgwit.
Piŋkop da dɨpmɨnon Erot do dɨma tobɨl kɨni do yoyɨŋban nandaŋek kosit ŋwakŋwarɨ naŋ mɨktɨmnikon si kɨwit.
Nandak nandak amɨn uŋun kɨŋ mudaŋakwa, Amɨn Tagɨ dakon aŋelo da Josep dɨpmɨnon altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Erot da Monjɨ aŋakban kɨmotjak do wɨsɨkdɨsak, do gak pɨdaŋ monjɨ ŋakŋak gat meŋi gat tɨmɨkbɨ Isip mɨktɨmon pasal kɨni. Isip sigɨn egakwa nak da aesi apni do don gayɨkeŋ.”
Yaŋban uŋudon gɨn Josep uŋun kalbi monjɨ ŋakŋak gat meŋi gat tɨmɨkban Isip kɨk do kosit wasawit.
Yaŋ aŋakwa kombɨ amɨn kɨnda da kalɨpsigwan gen yagɨt uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Amɨn Tagɨ da aŋtagap aban yaŋ yagɨt: “Monjɨno Isip egɨsak uŋun opjak do yaŋ ɨmɨsat.” Josep gat mɨŋatni Monjiyo gat Isip mɨktɨmon paŋkɨ egakwa Erot don kɨmakgɨt.
Erot da nandak nandak amɨn nak aŋkewalaŋ yaŋ nandaŋek butjap madepsi nandagɨt. Yaŋ nandaŋek Betlehem kokupmon ae kokup monɨŋ monɨŋ Betlehem da kapmatjok tawit uŋudon monjɨ wɨli morap bɨlakni bamorɨ dɨma yapbi uŋun emat amɨni da kɨsisi dapmaŋ mudoni do gen teban yɨpgut. Nandak nandak amɨn da gɨk ni bɨsapmon noman tagɨt uŋun kɨlɨ iyɨwit, do monjɨ morap uŋun bɨsapmon altawit uŋun kɨsi kɨmotni do gen teban yɨpgut.
Yaŋ aban kombɨ amɨn Jeremaia da kalɨpsigwan gen yagɨt uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ:
“Rama kokupmon kunam ae bupmɨ kapyo madepsi altosok. Resel uŋun monji kɨmakgwit uŋun do nandaŋek kunam madepsi takdak. Monjɨni kɨsi kɨmakgwit, do amɨn da burɨ aŋteban ak do aŋtɨdok aŋ. Kunamni kɨrɨŋɨk ɨmni do dɨma nandagɨt.”
Erot kɨmagakwan Amɨn Tagɨ dakon aŋelo da Isip mɨktɨmon Josep dɨpmɨnon altaŋ ɨmgut.
Altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Monjɨ aŋat do yawit amɨn uŋun kɨlɨ kɨmakgwit. Do gak pɨdaŋ Monjɨ gat meŋi gat tɨmɨkbɨ aesi tobɨl Israel mɨktɨmon kɨni.”
Yaŋban Monjɨ gat meŋi gat tɨmɨkban Israel kɨwit.
Mani Erot kɨmagakwan monji Akelas da kɨla amɨn madep tamoni abɨdaŋek Judia mɨktɨm kɨla agɨt, do Judia mɨktɨmon kɨk do pasalgɨt. Josep dɨpmɨnon gen kɨnda yaŋ nandagɨt, “Ji Judia mɨktɨmon dɨma kɨni. Galili tetgɨn do kɨni.”
Uŋun nandaŋek kokup kɨnda mani Nasaret, Galili mɨktɨmon tosok, uŋudon paŋkɨ egɨpgwit. Yaŋ aba kombɨ amɨn dakon gen bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Nasaret amɨn yaŋ iyɨni.”
Uŋun bɨsapmon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn Jon uŋun abɨŋ altagɨt. Abɨŋ altaŋek Judia mɨktɨmon amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon mɨŋat amɨnyo uŋudon kwa Piŋkop gen yoyɨgɨt.
Yoyɨŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon bɨsap kwaŋ tosok, do ji but tobɨl ani.”
Kalɨpsigwan kombɨ amɨn Aisaia da Jon do gen yaŋ mandagɨt: “Mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yosok, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ dakon kosit aŋdɨmdɨm ani, kositni pasɨŋ aŋmɨlɨp ani.’ ”
Jon da ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk paŋ egɨpgut uŋun bɨt madep kɨnda mani kamel uŋun dakon daŋgwani baŋ wasaŋbi. Aŋek bɨt gɨp kɨnda naŋ bobaŋ napmɨ do wamgut. Japni uŋun pɨlak pɨlak ae kabaŋ kok.
Amɨn morapmɨ Jerusalem kokup papmon egɨpgwit, ae Judia mɨktɨmon egɨpgwit, ae Jodan Pakbi terɨ terɨ egɨpgwit uŋun kɨsi Jonon kɨwit.
Kɨŋ yokwini yaŋkwok aŋakwa Jodan Pakbikon telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomgut.
Aŋakwan Parisi amɨn morapmɨ gat Sadyusi amɨn morapmɨ gat telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomjak do Jonon apgwit. Apba pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ dakon gwakni kabɨ, Piŋkop da butjap nandaŋek yokwi pakpak do yo yokwisi aŋ yomdɨsak. Piŋkop dakon butjap apdɨsak namɨn da uŋun dakon but pɨso dayɨk da uŋun yap do pasal kwaŋ?
Ji but tobɨl bamɨsi aŋek aŋpakjikon but tobɨl dakon bamɨ aŋalon ani.
Ji dɨsi do ‘Nin Abraham dakon babɨkni’ yaŋ dɨma yoni. Yaŋsi dayɨsat, Piŋkop da yaŋban on tɨp kabɨ da Abraham dakon babɨkni tagɨ dagoni. Ji uŋun Abrahamon da altawit uŋun da yo madep dɨma asak.
Pareŋka uŋun kɨndap mibɨlon yɨpbi da tosok. Kɨndap morap bamɨ tagɨ dɨma toni uŋun mandaŋ kɨndapmon maba pɨgɨ sokdaŋ.
“Nak amɨn pakbisi baŋ telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomɨsat uŋun amɨn but tobɨl bamɨ aŋ dakon tɨlak asak. Mani nak da manjikon abɨsak amɨn uŋun dakon tapmɨm da nak dakon tapmɨm yapmaŋdak. Nak yombem yokwi da kandap gwɨlni tagɨ dɨma abɨdaŋ awɨlɨ. Uŋun amɨn da Telagɨ Wup gat ae kɨndap gat soŋ damdɨsak.
Uŋun wit dakon sɨbɨt sɨbɨt wɨrɨrɨt kɨndap kɨrɨŋni kɨsitnikon taŋakwan apdɨsak. Abɨŋek bamɨ kokwinɨk tamonikon yopmaŋek sɨbɨt sɨbɨt wɨrɨrɨk maban kɨndap kɨmot kɨmorɨ mɨni uŋudon sokdaŋ.”
Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu Galili Provins yɨpmaŋek Jodan Pakbikon, Jon da telagɨ pakbi soŋ ɨmjak do opgut.
Mani Jon da kɨrɨŋɨk ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak da telagɨ pakbi soŋ gabeŋ do abɨl, uŋun tagɨ dɨma. Gak da telagɨ pakbi soŋ nabi kaŋ, uŋun da tagɨ asak.”
Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Dɨma, gak telagɨ pakbi soŋ nabi. Yaŋ aŋaki Piŋkop da yo morap aneŋ do nandɨsak uŋun kɨndasok dɨma yapmaŋek kɨsisi aŋ mudoneŋ.” Yaŋban Jon da geni guramɨkgɨt.
Pakbi soŋek Yesu pakbikon da wɨgɨt. Wɨŋek uŋudon gɨn kundu wɨtdal kɨŋakwan Yesu yaŋ kagɨt, Piŋkop dakon Wup kɨnarɨm da mɨktɨmon paŋ uŋun da tɨlak pɨŋ kwenikon yɨkgɨt.
Aŋakwan Kwen Kokupgwan da gen kɨnda yaŋ altagɨt: “Uŋun Monjɨno. Butno uŋun do tagɨsi aŋakwan but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsat.”
Uŋun bɨsapmon Telagɨ Wup da Yesu Sunduk da aŋkewaljak do mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon aŋkɨgɨt.
Aŋkɨ yɨpban Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek egakwan gɨldat 40 ae pɨlɨn 40 mudagɨt, do jap do agɨt.
Aŋakwan Paŋkewal Amɨn da abɨŋ altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak asi Piŋkop dakon Monji egɨsalon yoyɨŋbɨ tɨp on da bret dagabɨt.”
Mani Yesu da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: ‘Bret dagɨn amɨn egɨp egɨp tagɨ dɨma yomjak. Piŋkop dakon gen kɨsi morap paŋek egɨp egɨp paŋ.’ ”
Yaŋ yaŋban Sunduk da Yesu aŋaŋ Piŋkop dakon telagɨ kokup papmon Jerusalem aŋaŋ kɨgɨt. Aŋkɨ Telagɨ Yut Madep da kwenon kwensi yɨpgut.
Yɨpmaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: ‘Uŋun da aŋeloni yoyɨŋban kɨlago tagɨsi ani. Ae kandapgo tɨpmon dɨma gɨtni yaŋ do aŋelo da gak kɨsit da kendak abɨŋ gepni.’ Gen yaŋ tosok, do gak asi Piŋkop dakon Monji kaŋ, gak amon mibɨlɨkon paŋ ma.”
Mani Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop dakon papia da gen kɨnda gat yaŋ yosok, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkopji dakon tapmɨm kok do aŋek dɨmasi aŋkewaldo.’ ”
Sunduk da aeni Yesu iyɨŋ aŋaŋ ɨleŋ dubagɨsi kɨndakon awɨgɨgɨt. Awɨgɨ on mɨktɨmon mɨktɨm madep madep morap kɨsi ae uŋudon yo tɨlɨmni toŋ gat kɨsi yolɨgɨt.
Yolɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ŋwakbeŋ aŋek gawak nabi kaŋ, on yo morap kɨsi gabeŋ.”
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Sunduk gak nepmaŋdet! Piŋkop dakon papia da yaŋ yosok: ‘Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkopji uŋun naŋ gɨn gawak ɨmɨŋek oman aŋɨmni.’ ”
Yaŋ iyɨŋban Sunduk Yesu yɨpmaŋ dek kɨŋakwan aŋelo da abɨŋ Yesu aŋpulugawit.
Yesu Jon dam tebanon yɨpgwit yaŋ nandaŋek tobɨl Galili mɨktɨmon kɨgɨt.
Nasaret kokup yɨpmaŋek Kapaneam kokupmon kɨŋ uŋudon egɨpgut. Kapaneam uŋun Galili Pakbi Ɨdap ɨleŋɨkon, Sebulan ae Naptali mɨktɨmon uŋudon tosok.
Kapaneam kokupmon ekwan kombɨ amɨn Aisaia da gen kɨnda yagɨt uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ:
“Sebulan mɨktɨm, ae Naptali mɨktɨm, Jodan Pakbi usugap tet do Galili mɨktɨmon tomal. Uŋun mɨktɨm bamot kosit tapmon pɨkwaŋ mɨktɨmon tomal. Galili mɨktɨmon Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon nani morapmɨ ekwaŋ.
Uŋun amɨn pɨlɨn tukgwan egek kɨmot do pasolgoŋ, mani uŋun da teŋteŋɨ madep altaŋ yoban kɨlɨ kaŋ.”
Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu wasaŋek Piŋkop dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon bɨsap kwaŋ tosok, do ji but tobɨl ani.”
Yesu da Galili Pakbi Ɨdap kɨdɨpmɨŋ agek tap kɨlap do pi agak amɨn bamorɨ pɨndakgɨt. Kɨnda uŋun mani Saimon (ae mani kɨnda Pita), uŋun gat ae padɨge Andru gat pɨndakgɨt. Uŋun amɨn bamot tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni pakbi ɨdapgwan mabal pɨgakwan egɨpgumal.
Uŋun amɨn bamot pɨndagek Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Abɨŋ nak nolgɨl, aŋakwal amɨn tɨmɨt tɨmɨt dakon kosit dolɨko.”
Yaŋban uŋudon gɨn tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni yopmaŋek yolgɨmal.
Yesu tɨmɨsok dɨ kɨŋek ae amɨn bamorɨ gat pɨndakgɨt, kɨnda uŋun Jems, Sebedi dakon monji, ae padɨge Jon. Uŋun bamot gat datni gat boron yɨgek tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni bɨsawɨk paŋmɨlɨp aŋyo aŋakwal pɨndakgɨt. Pɨndagek yaŋ yoban
nandaŋek uŋudon gɨn botni gat datni Sebedi gat yopmaŋek yolgɨmal.
Yesu Galili mɨktɨm morap kɨsi agek muwut muwut yutnikon amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt. Aŋek Piŋkop da amɨn kɨla akdɨsak dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Yaŋ aŋek sotni toŋ ae gɨptɨmni yokwisi awit amɨn kɨsi morap paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Yaŋ aŋakwan gen bini da kɨŋ ɨreŋtaŋ Siria mɨktɨm kɨsi arɨpmɨ agɨt. Do amɨn da sot amɨn mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ gat, ae amɨn gɨptɨmɨkon tepmɨ madepsi pawit amɨn gat, ae koŋni toŋ gat, ae sot kɨnda uŋun amɨn mɨktɨmon maŋ pagek gɨptɨmni nɨmnɨmɨkgaŋ uŋun gat, ae kɨdarɨ alek taŋbi uŋun kɨsi paŋapba Yesu da paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Aŋakwan Galili mɨŋat amɨn morapmɨ gat, ae Dekapolis amɨn gat, ae Jerusalem, ae Judia, ae Jodan Pakbi usugap tet amɨn gat kɨsi da Yesu yolgwit.
Yesu mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep pɨndagek ɨleŋon pawɨgɨ yɨgakwan paŋdet kabɨni iyɨ yɨkgɨron apgwit.
Apba yoyɨŋ degek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
“Amɨn morap iyɨ do nak butnokon yo tagɨ mɨnisi yaŋ nandaŋ amɨn, uŋun amɨn da Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan ekwaŋ, do uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
Amɨn morap burɨkon da bupmɨ kunamyo madep aŋ, uŋun Piŋkop da butni paŋteban akdɨsak, do uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
Amɨn morap iyɨ do nandaba paŋ, uŋun Piŋkop da yo morap yom do yagɨt uŋun yoban tɨmɨtdaŋ, do uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
Amɨn morap aŋpak kɨlegɨ do amɨn da jap pakbiyo do nandaŋ uŋudeŋsi nandaŋ amɨn, uŋun Piŋkop da arɨpnikon yoban tugokdaŋ, do uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
Amɨn morap notni do bupmɨ nandaŋ, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop da bupmɨ nandaŋ yomdɨsak, do uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
Amɨn morap burɨ kɨlegɨsi toŋ, uŋun amɨn da Piŋkop kokdaŋ, do uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
Amɨn morap emat pɨdokyo aŋakwa nawa gen yoŋ amɨn do, amɨn da Piŋkop dakon monjɨni yaŋ yoyɨkdaŋ, do uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
Amɨn morap aŋpak kɨlegɨ aŋakwa aŋpakni kɨlegɨ do aŋek amɨn da yokwi aŋyomaŋ, uŋuden amɨn da Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan egɨpdaŋ, do uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
“Amɨn da ji do Yesu dakon amɨn kabɨ yaŋ yaŋek yaŋba yokwi tok, ae top gen mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yaŋ damni, ae yokwiyo kɨsi aŋdamni kaŋ, ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani.
Kalɨp kombɨ amɨn yaŋ gɨn dapmaŋ yolyo awit. Do jiyo kɨsi aŋpakji kɨlegɨ dakon tomni wukwisi Kwen Kokupmon tɨmɨtdaŋ, do but galak nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji amɨn dakon tap ekwaŋ. Mani tap galagɨni pasɨlni kaŋ, niaŋsi aŋek galagɨni aŋkaluk aneŋ? Galagɨni yɨpmaŋ detjak kaŋ, pini mɨni. Ɨsal maba kwa amɨn da bamoŋ.
“Ji amɨn dakon teŋteŋɨ yombem da ekwaŋ. Kokup madep kɨnda ɨleŋon taŋban yo kɨnda da arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋyoŋgam asak.
Amɨn da lam koleŋ kwoba baŋ dɨma wɨtjɨŋba toŋ. Kwen tamonikon yopba yut kagagwan amɨn ekwaŋ uŋun kɨsi teŋteŋaŋ yomaŋ.
Yaŋgɨn, teŋteŋɨsi da amɨn da dabɨlon teŋteŋosak. Yaŋ aŋakwa amɨn da aŋpakji tagɨsi kaŋek Kwen Kokup Datji aŋkɨsini.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak gen teban ae kombɨ amɨn dakon gen abo kɨŋ ɨsalɨ asak do dɨma pɨgɨm. Gen teban ae kombɨ amɨn dakon gen bamɨ toŋ aŋmudoni do pɨgɨm.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, kundu gat mɨktɨm gat tonjil da arɨpmon gen teban dakon gen jɨmjɨmjok kɨnda dɨma pasɨldɨsak. Gen kɨsi morap taŋ bamɨ toŋ akdaŋ.
Amɨn kɨnda da gen teban monɨŋɨsok kɨnda yapmaŋek amɨn dɨwarɨ yaŋ gɨn ani do yoyɨŋdetjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Kwen Kokup Piŋkop da Kɨla Asak kokupmon mani pɨŋbisi. Mani amɨn kɨnda da gen teban guramɨgek amɨn dɨwarɨ yaŋ gɨn ani do yoyɨŋdetjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Kwen Kokup Piŋkop da Kɨla Asak kokupmon mani wukwisi.
Asisi dayɨsat, ji dakon aŋpak kɨlegɨ uŋun da gen teban yoyɨŋdet ae Parisi amɨn dakon aŋpak dɨma yapni kaŋ, ji Piŋkop da Kwen Kokup Kɨla Asagon dɨma wɨgɨkdaŋ.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Gen kɨnda babɨk da abɨdawit uŋun ji kɨlɨ nandawit. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn dɨma dapba kɨmotni. Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn kɨnda aŋakban kɨmotjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn gen pikon kɨsak.’
Mani nak yaŋ dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda notni do butjap nandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn gen pikon kɨsak. Ae amɨn kɨnda notni do yaŋba yokwi tok asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn gen kokwin amɨn kabɨ madepmon kɨsak. Ae amɨn kɨnda da amɨn kɨnda ‘Gak nandaŋ kokwingo tagɨ mɨni!’ yaŋ iyɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Tɨpdom dakon kɨndap tebanon pɨgɨsak.
“Do paretgo altakon paŋobɨŋek notgo kɨnda da nandaba yokwi tok aŋgamɨsak yaŋ nandɨsal kaŋ,
paretgo alta da kapmatjok yopbɨ toni. Yopbɨ taŋakwa mibɨltok gak kwi notgo uŋun gat but kaloŋ anjil. But kaloŋ aŋek don kɨŋ Piŋkop do paret aki.
“Amɨn kɨnda da gen pikon gep do gen yaŋ gaban kaŋ, jil gen pi tamokon kɨk do aŋek kosiron kɨŋek gen uŋun tepmɨsi aŋmɨlɨp ak do pi anjil. Yaŋ dɨma anjil kaŋ, uŋun amɨn da gen kokwin kɨla agak amɨn da kɨsiron gepban uŋun da obip amɨn da kɨsiron gepban dam teban yutnon gepdɨsak.
Asisi gayɨsat, gak dam tebanon sigɨn egaki wɨgɨ moneŋ niaŋ yopbi do gayɨni uŋun kɨsisi yopmaŋek don waŋga kɨkdɨsal.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ae gen kɨnda babɨk da abɨdawit uŋun ji kɨlɨ nandawit. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Mɨŋat eyo kɨlɨ abi amɨn ji yumabi aŋpak dɨma ani.’
Mani abɨsok nak da yaŋ dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda mɨŋat kɨnda kaŋek uŋun do galak taŋ ɨmjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn butnikon da yumabi kɨlɨ ak.
Dabɨlgo amɨn tet da yokwikon gepban kaŋ, pɨlɨk mabɨ kɨsak. Gɨptɨm dɨwatgo kɨnda pasɨljak kaŋ, uŋun da yo madep dɨma asak. Mani gɨptɨmgo kɨsi kaloŋ maba Tɨpdomon pɨgɨsak kaŋ, uŋun da jɨgɨsi.
Ae kɨsitgo amɨn tet da yokwikon gepban kaŋ, mandaŋ dagaŋ mabɨ kɨsak. Gɨptɨm dɨwatgo kɨnda pasɨljak kaŋ, uŋun da yo madep dɨma asak. Mani gɨptɨmgo kɨsi kaloŋ maba Tɨpdomon pɨgɨsak kaŋ, uŋun da jɨgɨsi.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Kalɨp gen yaŋ yawit: ‘Amɨn kɨnda mɨŋatni kwɨnɨt do kaŋ, mɨŋat paŋkwɨnɨt dakon but pɨso papia kɨnda mɨŋatni do mandaŋ ɨmjak.’
Mani abɨsok nak da yaŋ dayɨsat, mɨŋatgo kwɨnɨk yɨpbɨ kwan wɨli kaluk pasak kaŋ, eni gak da gulusuŋ al, do mɨŋatgo da yumabi asak. Aŋakwan wɨli uŋun kaluk pasak uŋun kɨsi yumabi asak. Do mɨŋatgo yumabi dɨma aŋakwan ɨsal dogɨn dɨma kwɨnɨkgi.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ae gen kɨnda babɨk da abɨdawit uŋun ji kɨlɨ nandawit. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn Tagɨ da dabɨlon gen yaŋ paŋteban asal uŋun dɨma yapmaŋek kɨsi guramɨgek abi.’
Mani nak abɨsok yaŋ dayɨsat, gen yaŋ paŋteban ak dɨmasi ani. Kwen Kokup uŋun Piŋkop dakon kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamoni, do Kwen Kokup manon da genji dɨma paŋteban ani.
Ae mɨktɨm uŋun Piŋkop dakon kandap yɨpyɨp tamoni, do mɨktɨm da manon genji dɨma yaŋ paŋteban ani. Ae Jerusalem uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ Madep Wɨkwisi dakon kokup papni, do Jerusalem da manon genji dɨma yaŋ paŋteban ani.
Ae ji da busuŋ daŋgwanji kɨnda kulabɨk aba kwakwagɨ bo pɨli uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma asak, do busuŋji da manon genji dɨma yaŋ paŋteban ani.
Ji ‘asi’ bo ‘dɨma’ yaŋ gɨn yoni kaŋ, uŋun da tagɨ. Gen uŋun da kwenon saŋbeŋek yoŋ uŋun Yokwi Ami da paŋalon asak.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ae gen kɨnda babɨk da abɨdawit uŋun ji kɨlɨ nandawit. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn kɨnda dakon dabɨl aŋupbal asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn dakon dabɨlniyo kɨsi aŋupbal ani. Ae amɨn kɨnda da amɨn kɨnda dakon geni aŋak bɨrɨpmɨtjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn dakon geni kɨsi aŋak bɨrɨpmɨtni.’
Mani nak da abɨsok yaŋ dayɨsat, amɨn da yokwi aŋdaba kobogɨ do yokwi dɨma aŋyomni. Amɨn kɨnda da mogɨm kulbak gɨkban kaŋ, mogɨmgo terɨ kɨnda kɨsi aŋtobɨl ɨbi.
Amɨn kɨnda da gen pikon gepmaŋek kobogɨ do paba pɨgɨkgo abɨdok do yosak kaŋ, mɨrɨm ɨmalgo gat kɨsi ɨbi.
Ae amɨn kɨnda da yɨkni ɨmegek kosit 1 kilomita kɨki do tebaisi gayɨsak kaŋ, yɨk uŋun ɨmegek 2 kilomita kɨki.
Ae amɨn kɨnda da yo kɨnda ɨbi do gayɨsak kaŋ, ɨbi. Ae amɨn kɨnda da gagon goman ak do gayɨŋban kaŋ, manji dɨma ɨbi.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ae gen kɨnda babɨk da abɨdawit uŋun ji kɨlɨ nandawit. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Notgo do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek uwalgo do nandabɨ yokwi toni.’
Mani nak da yaŋ dayɨsat, ji uwalji do but dasi galak taŋ yomni. Aŋek yokwi aŋdamaŋ amɨn do bɨsit ani.
Yaŋ aŋek Piŋkop Datji Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun dakon monjinisi egɨpni. Uŋun da gɨldatni yɨpban amɨn yokwi ae kɨlegɨ kɨsikon mosok. Ae sɨkak yɨpban amɨn aŋpak kɨlegɨ aŋ ae yokwi aŋ kɨsikon mosok.
Amɨn yokwi takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn da notni baŋgɨn but dasi galak taŋ yomaŋ. Jiyo yaŋ gɨn ani kaŋ, Piŋkop da kobogɨ do yo tagɨ kɨnda dɨma damdɨsak.
Ji notji baŋgɨn gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ yoyɨni kaŋ, uŋun da tagɨ dɨma asak. Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn kabɨ kɨsi yaŋ gɨn aŋ.
Kwen Kokup Datji gwaljɨgɨ mɨni kɨlegɨsi egɨsak, do jiyo yaŋ gɨn gwaljɨgɨ mɨni kɨlegɨsi egɨpni.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji kaŋ kɨmotni. Amɨn da dandani yaŋ do uŋun da dabɨlon aŋpak tagɨ ani kaŋ, Datji Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun da uŋun dakon kobogɨ do yo tagɨ kɨnda dɨma daban abɨdokdaŋ.
“Wadak wadak amɨn do yo yom do aki bɨsapmon jamba but amɨn dɨwarɨ da muwut muwut yutnon ae kosit madepmon aŋ, uŋudeŋ amɨn kɨnda yabekbɨ mibɨltaŋ gamɨŋek kweŋ dɨma pɨsosak. Yaŋ aŋ amɨn uŋun amɨn da nandaba wukwan yomni yaŋ do aŋ. Nak asisi dayɨsat, uŋun kobogɨ kɨsisi wagɨlni tɨmɨkgaŋ.
Mani yo do wadak wadak aŋ amɨn do yo yobi bɨsapmon noman amɨn da gandani do dɨma yobi.
Yaŋ aŋaki Datgo yo pasɨlɨ pɨndakdak uŋun da kobogɨ do yo tagɨ gamdɨsak.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji bɨsit ani bɨsapmon jamba but amɨn da aŋ uŋudeŋ dɨma ani. Jamba but amɨn uŋun muwut muwut yut madepmon ae kokup papmon kosit amal amalon uŋudon agek bɨsit ak do galagɨsi nandaŋ. Uŋun amɨn amɨn da pɨndatni do yaŋ aŋ. Nak asisi dayɨsat, kobogɨni kɨsi wagɨlni tɨmɨkgaŋ.
Mani gak bɨsit ak do nandɨsal kaŋ, yutgokon wɨgɨ yoma sopmaŋek Datgo pasɨlɨ egɨsak uŋun bɨsit iyɨki. Yaŋ aŋaki Datgo yo pasɨlɨ pɨndakdak uŋun da kobogɨ tagɨsi gamdɨsak.
Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ gen ɨsalɨ morapmɨ yaŋapno piŋkopnin da genin nandɨsak yaŋ nandaŋ. Mani ji bɨsit ani bɨsapmon yaŋ dɨma ani.
