Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak tɨlak gen kɨnda gat yoko nandabɨt. Amɨn kɨnda da wain pini aŋek nagal aŋ uŋun nagalon wain sop bamaŋ tɨl do gapma kɨnda wayɨkgɨt. Wayɨk mudaŋek kabo noknok pɨndat do yut dubak kɨnda aban wɨgɨgɨt. Yut aŋ mudaŋek amɨn da moneŋ pini dɨ aŋek pi ami do bamɨ dɨ paŋ ɨmni yaŋ nandaŋek pi uŋun da kɨsiron yɨpmaŋek mɨktɨm dubagɨkon kɨgɨt.
Kɨŋ egɨ don wain sop pakpak bɨsap kwaŋ taŋakwan pi monjɨni yabekban wain bamɨ tɨmɨk paŋopni do kɨwit.
“Kɨŋ altaŋba wain pi dakon kɨla amɨn da uŋun pi monjɨ tɨmɨgek, kɨnda aŋak ukwayɨtyo awit, aŋek kɨnda aŋakba kɨmagakwan, kɨnda tɨp baŋ aŋakgwit.
Yaŋ aba pi ami da aeni pi monjɨni mibɨltok yabekgɨt uŋun dakon tɨlak yapmaŋek morapmɨ yabekgɨt. Yabekban kwa pi kɨla amɨn da mibɨltok awit uŋudeŋ gɨn yokwi aŋyomgwit.
Buŋonsi iyɨ dakon monji naŋ yabegek yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Monjɨno kwan kɨla amɨn da uŋun do nandaba wukwan ɨmdaŋ.’
“Mani kɨla amɨn da monji kaŋek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, ‘Amɨn on da egɨ don datni dakon yo morap tɨmɨtdɨsak, do aŋatno kɨmagakwan wain pini nin do aŋawatneŋ.’
Yaŋ yaŋek monjɨ uŋun abɨdaŋ ɨlɨk pigaga da waŋga aŋaŋ abɨgɨ aŋakba kɨmakgɨt.
“Ji niaŋ nandaŋ? Don pi ami da abɨŋ pi kɨla amɨn niaŋ aŋyomjak?”
Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Pi ami da abɨŋ uŋun amɨn yokwi kobogɨ yo yokwisi aŋyomdɨsak. Aŋek wain pi uŋun amɨn ŋwakŋwarɨ da kɨsiron yɨpban uŋun da wain sop pakpak bɨsapmon bamɨ tagɨ paŋ ɨmni.”
Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Piŋkop da papiakon gen tosok uŋun dɨma manjɨŋ nandawit? Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Yut agak amɨn da gwak yokwi yaŋ yaŋek maba kɨgɨt. Mani Amɨn Tagɨ da uŋun gwak yut kodɨgɨkon tɨp kɨnda naŋ tɨdagɨt da gwak teban akdak. Yo uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ da iyɨ aban nin da kono yo masɨ masɨmɨsi asak.’
Uŋun do nak yaŋ dayɨsat, Piŋkop da iyɨ Amɨn Kɨla Asak jikon tosok uŋun ji da kɨsiron naŋ gwayeŋ amɨn kabi kɨnda bamɨ tagɨ paŋalon agagɨ uŋun da kɨsiron yɨpdɨsak.
Amɨn morap gwak kwenon da maŋ dapba bɨsal kɨkdaŋ, ae gwak da amɨn morap da kwenon mosak uŋun wagɨl bɨsal kɨ mudokdaŋ.”
Yesu da tɨlak gen bamot uŋun yaŋban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae Parisi amɨn gat da nin do yosok yaŋ nandawit.
Yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu abɨdokdosi nandawit, mani mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi uŋun da Yesu do kombɨ amɨn kɨnda yaŋ nandawit, do abɨdok do si pasalgwit.
Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda gat yaŋek amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
“Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni uŋun dakon tɨlak kɨnda uŋun yaŋ. Kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda monji do mɨŋat paŋek soŋnok madepsi agɨt.
Kɨlɨ jap noknok bɨsap kwaŋ taŋakwan kalɨp yaŋ yomgut amɨn yoyɨŋba opni do pi monjɨni yabekban kɨwit. Mani kɨŋ yoyɨŋba op do dɨma galak tawit.
“Yaŋ aba pi monjɨ dɨ gat aeni yabekgɨt. Yabegek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Ji kɨŋ mibɨltok but pɨso yoyɨŋbi amɨn uŋun yaŋ yoyɨni: Nandani, nak bapalo gat ae bulmakau binap amɨn nelagɨ toŋsi kɨlɨ dapmaŋ mandaŋ soŋ yopmat. Jap morap kɨlɨ soŋ paŋnoman aŋ yopmat. Do ji opba monjino do mɨŋat pagɨm uŋun dakon soŋnok aneŋ.’
“Pi monjɨni uŋun gen aŋaŋ uŋun amɨn kabɨkon aŋkɨwit, mani geni nandak do kuragɨ nandaŋek iyɨ da galak togon kɨŋ kɨŋ awit. Kɨnda uŋun pigagani kɨgɨt, ae kɨnda moneŋ ɨlɨt pinikon kɨgɨt.
Yaŋ aŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ da pi monjɨ tɨmɨgek yo yokwi aŋ yomɨŋek dapba kɨmakgwit.
Yaŋ aba kɨla amɨn madep uŋun japmɨsi nandaŋek emat amɨni yabekban kɨŋ pi monjɨni dapgwit amɨn uŋun kɨsisi dapba mɨni awit. Aŋek kokupni sowit.
“Aŋakwa kɨla amɨn madep da pi monjɨni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Mɨŋat pakpak dakon jap kɨlɨ paŋ noman abi, mani si yaŋ yomgum amɨn uŋun amɨn yokwi, do nak dakon jap dɨma noni.
Yaŋdo, ji kɨŋ kosit papmon agek amɨn pɨndak yoyɨŋba apba jap pakbiyo aneŋ.’
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban pi monjɨni kosit papmon kɨŋ amɨn aŋpakni tagɨ ae aŋpakni yokwi kɨsi pɨndak yoyɨŋba opba jap noknok yut madep uŋun yɨkba tugagɨt.
“Yɨgakwa kɨla amɨn madep da amɨn obeŋ uŋun pɨndat do yutnon wɨgɨgɨt. Wɨgɨ kaŋban amɨn kɨnda mɨŋat paŋek jap noknok aŋ bɨsapmon ɨmal tagɨsi paŋ uŋuden kɨnda dɨma pagɨt kagɨt.
Kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Not, gak nidosi mɨŋat pakpak bɨsap madep dakon ɨmal tagɨsi dɨma paŋek ɨdon wɨl?’ Yaŋ iyɨŋban amɨn uŋun geni mɨni yɨkgɨt.
Geni mɨni yɨgakwan amɨn madep da pi monjɨni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Ji on amɨn abɨdaŋek kɨsit kandapmɨyo wamaŋ waŋga abɨgɨ maba pɨlɨn tukgwan pɨgɨsak. Uŋudon kunam tagek iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋ tɨdaŋek egɨpdɨsak.’ ”
Yesu uŋun tɨlak gen yoyɨŋ mudaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn yaŋ yobi uŋun da morapmɨsi asak, mani yutnon amɨn tagɨ gat yɨtni do kokwinɨkbi uŋun da tagapmɨ.”
Parisi amɨn dɨwarɨ da kɨŋ Yesu suŋ kɨnda yaŋban nandaŋek gen pikon yɨpneŋ yaŋ do gen paŋkosit awit.
Aŋek iyɨ dakon paŋdetni gat ae Erot da kabɨkon amɨn dɨwarɨ gat yabekba kɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, gak gen bamɨ yogok amɨn kɨnda yaŋ nandamaŋ. Gak amɨn do dɨma pasoldol. Amɨn mani toŋ ae mani mɨni uŋun kɨsi Piŋkop dakon aŋpak yoyɨŋ dek mudosol.
Gak niaŋ nandɨsal? Sisa do takis ɨmno tagɨ asak?”
Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da niaŋon da nak abɨŋ nep do nandaŋ kokwin aŋ uŋun pɨndak mudaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jamba but amɨn ji nak nido aŋkewalgaŋ?
Moneŋ tabɨlɨ kɨnda takis do yɨpmaŋgaŋ kɨnda aŋobɨŋ naba koko.” Yaŋ yaŋban moneŋ tabɨlɨ kɨnda aŋobɨŋ ɨba
yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On wup gat ae man mandabi gat uŋun namɨn dakon?”
Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Sisa dakon.” Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yo Sisa dakon uŋun Sisa iyɨ do ɨmdo, ae yo Piŋkop dakon uŋun Piŋkop iyɨ do ɨmdo.”
Yesu da gen uŋun yaŋban nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi aban yɨpmaŋ kɨwit.
Uŋun gɨldaron gɨn Sadyusi amɨn dɨwarɨ da Yesukon apgwit. (Sadyusi amɨn kabɨ amɨn kɨmakbi dɨma pɨdoŋ yaŋ nandaŋ.) Abɨŋek yaŋ iyɨwit,
“Yoyɨŋdet, Moses da gen kɨnda yaŋ mandagɨt, ‘Amɨn kɨnda monji mɨni da kɨmagakwan mɨŋatni ɨsal egɨpjak kaŋ, padɨge da paŋakwan yawi dɨwatni dɨma pasɨlni yaŋ do monjɨ paŋalasak.’
Nin da bɨkbɨgon peni padɨgeyo 7 kabɨ egɨpgwit. Mibɨltok nani uŋun mɨŋat paŋek monjɨ mɨni egek kɨmakban padɨge da kwabatni pagɨt.
Paŋek uŋunyo kɨsi monjɨ mɨni egek kɨmakgɨt. Ae uŋun da buŋon nani kɨsi yaŋ gɨn agɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwa amɨn 7 kabɨ uŋun kɨsi kɨmak mudawit.
Kɨmak mudaŋakwa mɨŋat uŋun don kɨmakgɨt.
Wɨli 7 kabɨ kɨsi da pawit, do amɨn da kɨmoron da pɨdoni bɨsap madepmon namɨn dakon mɨŋatni asak?”
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Piŋkop da papiakon gen tosok uŋun dɨma nandaŋ. Ae Piŋkop dakon tapmɨmni uŋun kɨsi dɨma kaŋ nandaŋ yo aŋek ji gen gulusuŋ yoŋ.
Pɨdot pɨdot bɨsap madepmon mɨŋat wɨliyo agak dɨma tokdɨsak. Aŋelo Kwen Kokup ɨsal ekwaŋ uŋun da tɨlagon egɨpdaŋ.
Ji kɨmoron da pɨdot pɨdot dakon mibɨlɨ pakyaŋsi dɨma nandaba pɨsosok. Piŋkop da uŋun do kɨlɨ dayɨgɨt. Ji dɨma manjɨŋ nandaŋ, ma? Yaŋ yagɨt:
‘Nak Abraham, Aisak, ae Jekop dakon Piŋkopni.’ Piŋkop uŋun amɨn kɨmakbi dakon Piŋkop dɨma, amɨn egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ uŋun dakon Piŋkop.”
Yesu da gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi da yoyɨŋdet uŋun agɨt do tamtam yawit.
Sadyusi amɨn da Yesu aŋkewal do iyɨŋba gen tagɨsi yaŋakwan kobogɨ iyɨk do dɨma nandawit. Parisi amɨn da uŋun nandaŋek Yesukon opgwit.
Obɨŋ gen teban dakon mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨni kɨnda da Yesu aŋkewalek yaŋ iyɨgɨt,
“Yoyɨŋdet, ni gen teban da gen teban morap kɨsi yapmaŋ mudosok?”
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ji Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkopji uŋun but gat ae nandak nandak gat kɨsisi paregek but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨŋek egɨpni.
Gen teban on da gen teban dɨwarɨ yapmaŋ mudosok.
Ae uŋun da buŋon nani mibɨltok yosok uŋun yombem gɨn. Uŋun yaŋ yosok: Gaga do but dasi niaŋ galak tosol, uŋudeŋ gɨn amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yobi.
On gen teban bamot da gen teban dɨwarɨ gat ae kombɨ amɨn dakon gen morap kɨsi tɨmɨkgamal.”
Parisi amɨn sigɨn egakwa Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
“Ji Kristo do namɨn dakon monjɨ yaŋ nandaŋ?” Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Dewit dakon monji.”
Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Yaŋ kaŋ nido Telagɨ Wup da Dewit aŋpulugaŋakwan Kristo do ‘Amɨn Tagɨ’ yaŋ iyɨgɨt? Dewit uŋun yaŋ yagɨt:
‘Piŋkop da nak dakon Amɨn Tagɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak abɨŋ nak da amɨnsi tet do yɨkbɨ don uwalgo kandap gɨbaŋgogwan yopbo gengo guramɨtni.” ’
Dewit da Kristo Amɨn Tagɨno yaŋ iyɨgɨt. Uŋun do niaŋon da Kristo uŋun Dewit dakon Amɨn Tagɨni ae monji kɨsi egɨsak?”
Yaŋ yaŋakwan amɨn kɨnda da gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma iyɨwit. Ae uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn wasaŋek Yesu gen iyɨk do pasalgwit.
Yesu da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi gat iyɨ dakon paŋdet kabɨni gat yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
“Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat ae Parisi amɨn gat da kalɨp Moses da man madepni gat yɨgek gen teban yoyɨŋ dekgɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn dayɨŋ dekgaŋ.
Yaŋdo, gen morap dayɨŋ dekgaŋ uŋun kɨsi guramɨk mudoni. Mani gen dayaŋ uŋun iyɨ dɨma guramɨkgaŋ, do aŋpak aŋ uŋun dɨma yolni.
Uŋun da gen teban mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ jɨgɨsi guramɨtni do dayaŋ, mani iyɨ paŋpulugaŋba guramɨtni do kɨsitjok kɨnda dɨmasi yɨpmaŋgaŋ.
“Yo morap aŋ uŋun amɨn da pɨndatni yaŋ do aŋ. Piŋkop dakon gen sop sɨmɨl sɨmɨl kɨnam madepsi ɨŋamɨkon wamaŋgaŋ, ae ɨmalnikon nap tɨlɨmɨ toŋ dubagɨsi uŋun baŋ paŋ.
Jap noknok tamokon ae muwut muwut yutnikon amɨn mani toŋ da yɨkgaŋ tamokon yɨt do galak toŋ.
Aŋek amɨn da maket tamokon ‘Yoyɨŋdet, gɨldat tagɨ’ yaŋ yoyɨni yaŋ do galak toŋ.
“Ji dakon Yoyɨŋdetji kaloŋɨ kɨnda dagɨn egɨsak, do amɨn da ji gawak damɨŋek ‘Yoyɨŋdet’ yaŋ dɨma dayɨni. Ji kɨsi morap not dagɨn ekwaŋ.
Datji kaloŋɨ uŋun Kwen Kokup egɨsak, do mɨktɨm amɨn kɨnda do dat yaŋ dɨma iyɨni.
Ae ji dakon Madepji kaloŋɨ uŋun Kristo, do amɨn kɨnda do gawak ɨmɨŋek madepno yaŋ dɨma iyɨni.
Ji da binapmon mibɨltok amɨnji ekwaŋ uŋun oman amɨnji egɨ damni.
Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ do nandaban wɨgɨsak amɨn uŋun mani mɨni da egɨpdɨsak, aŋakwan amɨn kɨnda iyɨ do nandaban pɨsak amɨn uŋun mani toŋ da egɨpdɨsak.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae Parisi amɨn, ji jamba but amɨnsi. Awa! Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan pɨgɨk do aŋ amɨn ji da kosit sopmaŋ yomaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek dɨsiyo kɨsi uŋungwan dɨma pɨkwaŋ.
<range>
“Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae Parisi amɨn ji jamba but amɨnsi. Awa! Ji amɨn kaloŋɨ kɨnda da paŋdetji dagosak do pi teban aŋek tap kwenon da mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ akwaŋ. Ji Tɨpdom do amɨn aŋ, do amɨn kɨnda abɨdoni kaŋ, iyɨŋ dekba uŋun amɨn yaŋ gɨn Tɨpdom do amɨn akdɨsak. Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, ji da aŋpak yokwi aŋ uŋun si yapmaŋek uŋun amɨn aŋpak yokwisi asak.
“Kosit yolɨk amɨn, ji dabɨlji mɨni da ekwaŋ. Awa! Ji yaŋ yoŋ: ‘Amɨn kɨnda da Piŋkop dakon Telagɨ Yut Madep do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban aŋek ae don tagɨ kɨrɨŋɨtjak. Mani amɨn kɨnda da telagɨ yut dakon gol do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban asak kaŋ, tagɨ dɨma kɨrɨŋɨtjak.’
Ji nandaŋ kokwinji mɨni, dabɨlji mɨni. Yo ni da Piŋkop da dabɨlon yo madep asak? Gol yutgwan toŋ uŋun bo ae Telagɨ Yut Madep? Nandani, gol telagɨ yutgwan toŋ do telagɨ yut da aban telagɨ asak.
“Ae kɨnda yoŋ uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn kɨnda da alta do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban asak kaŋ, tagɨ kɨrɨŋɨtjak. Mani amɨn kɨnda da altakon paret toŋ do geni yaŋ aŋteban asak kaŋ, tagɨ dɨma kɨrɨŋɨtjak.’
Ji dabɨlji mɨni. Yo ni da Piŋkop da dabɨlon yo madep asak? Paret altakon toŋ uŋun bo ae alta? Nandani, paret altakon toŋ do alta da aban telagɨ asak.
Yaŋdo, amɨn kɨnda alta do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban asak kaŋ, alta gat ae yo morap altakon toŋ uŋun kɨsi do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban asak.
Ae amɨn kɨnda Piŋkop dakon telagɨ yut do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban asak kaŋ, telagɨ yut gat ae Piŋkop yutnikon egɨsak uŋun gat kɨsi do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban asak.
Ae amɨn kɨnda Kwen Kokup do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban asak kaŋ, Piŋkop dakon kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamo gat ae Piŋkop iyɨ tamonikon yɨkdak uŋun gat kɨsi do geni yaŋ aŋteban asak.
“Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae Parisi amɨn ji jamba but amɨnsi. Awa! Ji jap tam galagɨsi pi kagasi toŋ uŋun paŋ kabi 10 kabɨ kokwinɨgek uŋudon baŋ kabi kɨndanaŋ Piŋkop do paret tagɨ aŋ. Mani gen tebanon gen madep madep toŋ uŋun yapmaŋ mudoŋ. Amɨnon gen kokwin kɨlegɨ ani do yosok, ae amɨn bupmɨ nandaŋ yomni do yosok, ae nandaŋ gadat dakon bamɨ aŋpak jikon noman tosak do yosok. Ji uŋun dɨma aŋ. Gen tebanon gen madep madep toŋ uŋun guramɨk mudaŋek paret do yosok uŋun kɨsi guramɨtni kaŋ uŋun tagɨsi.
Kosit yolɨk amɨn, ji dabɨlji mɨni da ekwaŋ. Ji dakon tɨlak uŋun yaŋ. Amɨn da pakbi nok do aŋek yo monɨŋ pakbikon toŋ uŋun pɨndak maba kɨŋakwa pakbi noŋ, mani kamel madep dɨma noknogɨ uŋun dɨma kaŋek kaloŋ galaukba pɨgɨsak.
“Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae Parisi amɨn ji jamba but amɨnsi. Awa! Ji kap ɨdapyo dakon manji sugoŋ, mani burɨgwan da kabo ae sukwap nandak nandakyo tugawit da toŋ.
Parisi dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn, ji mibɨltok kap dakon burɨ ɨkdɨgoni kaŋ, manji iyɨ tagɨ kɨlek tosak.
“Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae Parisi amɨn ji jamba but amɨnsi. Awa! Ji amɨn kɨmakba yopmaŋgaŋ tɨp kɨnam yombem. Kwen da kwak soŋbi do kwakwagɨ tagɨsi asak. Mani mɨkgwan amɨn kɨdat gat ae yo garagɨ tɨgɨ morapmɨ toŋ.
Jiyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn ekwaŋ. Amɨn da dandaba ji amɨn kɨlegɨsi ekwaŋ yaŋ nandaŋ, mani butjikon ji jamba but amɨnsi ae gen teban yapyap amɨnsi ekwaŋ.
“Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae Parisi amɨn ji jamba but amɨnsi. Awa! Ji kombɨ amɨn ae amɨn kɨlegɨ kalɨpsi egɨ kɨmakba yopgwit tamo paŋtɨlɨm aŋ.
Aŋek yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Nin kalɨpsi babɨknin da bɨsapmon egɨpgumaŋ tam, nin paŋpulugaŋek kombɨ amɨn dɨma dapnom.’
Gen yaŋ yaŋakwa ji kombɨ amɨn dapdap dakon babɨkni yaŋsi nandaŋ damamaŋ.
Do ji kɨŋ babɨkji da wasaŋek aŋpak yokwi awit uŋun aŋ mudoni.
Ji tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ dakon gwakni kabɨ. Piŋkop da ji yaŋ dagaŋ depban Tɨpdom do amɨn aŋakwa namɨn da pulugaŋ depjak?
“Do yaŋ dayɨsat, nak da kombɨ amɨn ae nandak nandak amɨn ae yoyɨŋdet amɨn yabekgo jikon apdaŋ. Apba ji da uŋun amɨn dɨwarɨ yolba pasal kokupmɨ kokupmɨ kɨkdaŋ. Aŋakwa dɨwarɨ tɨmɨgek dapba kɨmotdaŋ, ae dɨwarɨ tɨlak kɨndapmon dapdaŋ, ae dɨwarɨ muwut muwut yutjikon nap kɨrɨŋbaŋ baljokdaŋ.
Yaŋ do aŋek on mɨktɨmon amɨn kɨlegɨ morap dapba kɨmakgwit uŋun dakon kobogɨ ji da tɨmɨtdaŋ. Wasok wasok do amɨn kɨlegɨ Abel aŋagek ae amɨn kɨlegɨ morapmɨ kɨsi dapgwit. Egɨ wɨgɨ wasɨp do ji da Berekia dakon monji Sekaraia Telagɨ Yut Madep ae altayo da binapmon aŋakba kɨmakgɨt. Uŋun dakon kobogɨ yo jɨgɨsi ji da tɨmɨtdaŋ.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, abɨsok amɨn ekwaŋ ji da uŋun dakon kobogɨ yo jɨgɨsi tɨmɨtdaŋ.
“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem amɨn, ji kombɨ amɨn dapba kɨmokgoŋ. Amɨn Piŋkop da yabekban jikon abaŋ uŋun ji da tɨpbaŋ dapba kɨmokgoŋ. Pup meŋi da monjini paŋmuwuk pɨrɨgwan yopmaŋdak, uŋun da tɨlak nak da bɨsap morapmɨ ji paŋmuwut do nandagɨm, mani ji da kurak taŋ namgwit.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, kokup yomasiyo yokwi taŋek yumsi tokdɨsak.
Ji nak dɨma nandaŋek egɨ wɨgɨ ni bɨsapmon nak do ‘Amɨn on Amɨn Tagɨ da manon abɨsak, uŋun Piŋkop da gɨsamɨgakwan abɨsak’ yaŋ nak do yoni uŋun bɨsapmon nandakdaŋ.”
Yesu Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon nagal yɨpmaŋek waŋga kɨŋakwan paŋdetni da Yesukon kɨŋek Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon yut madep madep pɨndatjak do yolɨwit.
Yolɨŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On yut madep madep pɨndakgaŋ uŋun dakon tɨp notni da kwenon dɨma taŋ taŋ akdaŋ. Tuwɨlba kɨsisi maŋ mudokdaŋ.”
Yesu Ɨleŋ Olipmon yɨgakwan paŋdetni da iyɨ gɨn kɨŋ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gen uŋun niyɨl uŋun ni bɨsapmon altokdaŋ? Ninaŋ kaŋek gak aego tobɨl abɨŋaki on mɨktɨm dakon bɨsap mudokdɨsak yaŋ nandaneŋ?”
Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn da paŋkewalni do kaŋ kɨmotni.
Amɨn morapmɨ da abɨŋ nak dakon man yaŋek yaŋ yokdaŋ, ‘Nak naga Kristo.’ Yaŋ yaŋek amɨn morapmɨ paŋkewaldaŋ.
Uŋun bɨsapmon emat wuwɨk gat ae dubagɨkon emat aŋ uŋun dakon gen bin apba nandaŋek butji dɨma pasolni. Uŋun yo morap altokdaŋ, mani mɨktɨm da mudosak bɨsap madep kɨlɨ uŋun noman tosok yaŋ dɨma nandani.
Mɨktɨm kɨnda dakon amɨn da pɨdaŋba mɨktɨm kɨnda dakon amɨn gat emat wamdaŋ. Ae kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda dakon amɨn da pɨdaŋba kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda dakon amɨn gat emat wamdaŋ. Aŋakwa mɨktɨm dɨwarɨkon wudɨp akdaŋ. Ae amɨn da jap do madepsi aŋek dɨwarɨ da kɨmotdaŋ.
Mɨŋat monjɨ kwapmɨ toŋ da monjɨ altok do aŋakwa wasaŋek tepmɨ paŋ, yaŋ gɨn uŋun yo morap altaŋakwa bɨsap madep kwaŋ tosok yaŋ nandani.
“Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da ji tɨmɨgek tepmɨ damɨŋek dɨkba kɨmotdaŋ. Ae ji nak nolgaŋ do aŋek amɨn kɨsi morap da ji do butjap nandaŋ damdaŋ.
Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn morapmɨ nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namaŋ uŋun nandaŋ gadatni yopba wɨtdal kɨŋakwa notni do nandaba yokwi tok aŋek uwal da kɨsiron yopmaŋ yopmaŋ akdaŋ.
Aŋakwa kombɨ amɨn toptopmɨ morapmɨ da altaŋek amɨn morapmɨ paŋkewalba nandaŋ yomɨŋek yoldaŋ.
Aŋakwa aŋpak yokwi da madepsi ɨreŋ taŋ aŋ aŋ kɨkdɨsak. Yaŋ aŋakwa amɨn morapmɨ da not do but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak yɨpba wɨtdal kɨkdɨsak.
Mani amɨn morap tebaisi sigɨn agakwa wɨgɨ mibɨ bɨsapmon wɨgɨsak uŋun Piŋkop da pulugaŋ yopdɨsak.
Amɨn da mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨŋat amɨnyo ekwaŋ uŋun Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ mudaŋakwa bɨsap madep uŋun apdɨsak.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yo wagɨl yokwisi kɨnda don Telagɨ Yut Madepmon akban kokdaŋ. Kombɨ amɨn Daniel da uŋun do kɨlɨ yagɨt.” (On gen manjɨsak amɨn uŋun da pakyaŋsi nandɨsak.)
“Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn Judia mɨktɨmon egɨpni uŋun pasal kabapgwan tepmɨsi wɨgɨni.
Amɨn kɨnda yut kwenon egɨpjak kaŋ, yo kabɨni tɨmɨt do yutgwan pɨgɨk do nandak nandak dɨmasi asak.
Ae amɨn kɨnda pigaga egɨpjak kaŋ, yutnon ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkni kɨŋ abɨdok do nandak nandak dɨmasi asak.
Uŋun bɨsapmon mɨŋat monjɨ kwapni toŋ, ae mɨŋat monjɨ mum noŋ uŋun bupmɨsi.
Ji da Piŋkop bɨsit iyɨŋba nandaŋakwan yo uŋun ais bɨsapmon bo Sabat bɨsapmon dɨma noman toni.
Uŋun bɨsapmon yo jɨgɨsi altokdaŋ. Piŋkop da mibɨlɨkon yo morap wasagɨron da egɨ abɨsok ekwamaŋon yo jɨgɨsi uŋuden kɨnda dɨma altagɨt, ae buŋon dɨma altokdɨsak.
Amɨn Tagɨ da uŋun bɨsap dɨma aŋpɨsɨp asak tam mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi kɨmak mudonom. Mani mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ iyɨ do kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt uŋun do bupmɨ nandaŋek bɨsap aŋpɨsɨp asak.
“Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda da ‘Kristo oni!’ bo ‘Asoni!’ yaŋ yaŋban kaŋ, top yosok yaŋ nandani.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ da abɨŋ ‘Nak Kristo’ yaŋ top yokdaŋ. Ae dɨwarɨ da ‘Nak kombɨ amɨn kɨnda’ yaŋ top yokdaŋ. Yaŋ yaŋek wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ akdaŋ. Aŋek mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ Piŋkop da iyɨ do kɨlɨ manjɨkbi uŋun paŋkewal do pini madep akdaŋ. Mani arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋkewaldaŋ.
“Nandani, yo jɨgɨsi morap uŋun dɨma altaŋakwa mibɨltok dayɨsat.
Mal da gɨldat wɨsak tetgɨn da teŋteŋaŋ kɨŋ gɨldat pɨgɨsak tetgɨn noman taŋban komaŋ, uŋun da tɨlak Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun apban amɨn kɨsi da kokdaŋ. Do amɨn kɨnda da ‘Kristo uŋun mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon egɨsak!’ yaŋ dayɨŋban kaŋ, uŋudon dɨma kɨni. Bo amɨn kɨnda da ‘Kristo yut uŋudon pasɨlek egɨsak!’ yaŋ dayɨŋban kaŋ, top yosok yaŋ nandani.
<range>
Yo kɨmakbi da toŋ sɨŋgɨŋ uŋudon abɨŋ muwukgaŋ.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yo jɨgɨ dakon bɨsap mudaŋakwan, ‘Gɨldat dabɨl pɨlɨn tuk akdɨsak, ae kanek dɨma teŋteŋokdɨsak. Ae gɨk kundu yɨpmaŋek mokdaŋ. Aŋakwa kwen kundukon yo tebai toŋ uŋun da kwakwalɨtdaŋ.’
Uŋun bɨsapmon Amɨn Dakon Monji dakon tɨlak kundukon altaŋban kaŋek mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn kɨsi morap da kunam tatdaŋ. Kaŋakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji tapmɨmni gat ae tɨlɨm madepni gat gɨkwemon da apban kokdaŋ.
Kweŋ madepsi da yaŋakwan aŋelo kabɨni yabekban kɨŋ amɨn iyɨ do manjɨkbi kabɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun paŋmuwutdaŋ.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji pik kɨndap kaŋek butji pɨsosak. Kɨlɨŋɨ pakbini toŋ ae tamɨ kaluk yopmaŋdak, uŋun bɨsapmon gɨldat bɨsap kwaŋ tosok yaŋ nandaŋ.
Uŋudeŋ gɨn yo morap dayɨt uŋun da altaŋakwa mɨktɨm da mudosak bɨsap madep kɨlɨ uŋunjok kwaŋ tosok yaŋ nandani.
“Nak asisi dayɨsat, uŋun bɨsapmon egɨpni amɨn dɨma kɨmagakwa yo morap uŋun kɨsi altaŋ mudokdaŋ.
Kundu gat mɨktɨm gat pasɨldamal, mani nak dakon gen uŋun dɨmasi pasɨldɨsak.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yo morap altosak uŋun dakon bɨsap uŋun amɨn kɨnda da dɨma nandɨsak. Kwen Kokup aŋeloyo dɨma nandaŋ, ae Monjɨyo kɨsi dɨma nandɨsak. Dat da iyɨ gɨn nandɨsak.
Noa da bɨsapmon amɨn egɨpgwit uŋudeŋ gɨn Amɨn Dakon Monji apjak bɨsapmon yaŋ gɨn egɨpdaŋ.
Kulup madep dɨma altaŋakwan jap pakbiyo aŋek mɨŋat pakpak awit. Yaŋ aŋek egakwa Noa tap wakgakon wɨgɨgɨt.
Wɨgakwan yo jɨgɨ altaŋ nimdaŋ uŋun dɨma nandawit. Butni dɨma pɨsaŋakwa kulup madep da altaŋek wutjɨŋban pasɨlgwit. Amɨn yaŋ gɨn egakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji apdɨsak.
Amɨn bamorɨ pigaga egakwal Piŋkop da kɨnda yapmaŋek kɨnda abɨdokdɨsak.
Mɨŋat bamorɨ da plaua wasaŋek yɨgakwal kɨnda yapmaŋek kɨnda abɨdokdɨsak.
“Yaŋdo, kaŋ kɨmotni. Amɨn Tagɨsi ni gɨldaron apdɨsak uŋun ji dɨma nandaŋ.
Nandaŋ pɨsoni. Yut kɨnda dakon ami kalbi kabo noknok ni bɨsapmon apdɨsak yaŋ nandagɨt tam, kɨla aŋakwan yutni arɨpmɨ dɨma tuwɨlban.
Dɨma apdɨsak yaŋ nandaŋek egakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋudon apdɨsak. Yaŋdo, ji tagap taŋek egɨpni.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Oman monjɨ kɨnda nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi ae pi agakni tagɨsi, uŋuden oman monjɨ amɨn tagɨni da oman monjɨni dɨwarɨ kɨlani asak do manjɨsak. Yaŋ aban jap yomyom bɨsapmon japni yomɨŋ yomɨŋ asak.
Oman monjɨ uŋun amɨn tagɨni da tobɨl abɨŋ kaŋban pini tagɨsi asak kaŋ tagɨsi.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn tagɨni da uŋun oman monjɨ iyɨŋban yo morapni kɨla akdɨsak.
Mani oman monjɨ kɨnda pi yokwi asak uŋun burɨkon da yaŋ nandɨsak, ‘Amɨn tagɨno uŋun tepmɨ dɨma apdɨsak.’
Yaŋ nandaŋek oman monjɨ notni dapmaŋek pakbi teban naŋek but upbal aŋ amɨn gat muwugek jap pakbiyo aŋ.
Yaŋ aŋek dɨma apdɨsak yaŋ nandaŋakwan amɨn tagɨni da but pɨsogɨ mɨni apdɨsak.
Abɨŋek uŋun oman monjɨ tepmɨ pi ɨmɨŋek yɨpban jamba but amɨn gat kunam tagek iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋ tɨdaŋek egɨpdaŋ.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Uŋun bɨsap madepmon Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni dakon tɨlak kɨnda uŋun yaŋ. Amɨn kɨnda mɨŋat pak do agɨt. Aŋakwan mɨŋat uŋun pakdɨsak dakon notni mɨŋatjok 10 kabɨ da lamni tɨmɨgek kosiron kɨŋ wɨli uŋun kaŋ abɨdaŋ aŋop do kɨwit.
Mɨŋatjok 5 kabɨ uŋun nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma, ae 5 kabɨ uŋun nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi.
Mɨŋatjok nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma uŋun lamni tɨmɨgek lam kolek do pakbi dɨ gat dɨma paŋkɨwit.
Mani mɨŋatjok nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi uŋun lamni tɨmɨgek lam kolek do pakbi dɨ gat kɨsi tɨmɨgek kɨwit.
Kɨŋ jomjom aŋ egakwa amɨn uŋun tepmɨ dɨma abɨŋakwan dɨpmɨni wɨŋba dɨpmɨn pak mudawit.
“Pak mudaŋakwa kalbi binap aban amɨn kɨnda yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Amɨn mɨŋat pak do asak kɨlɨ uŋun abɨsak! Opba kɨŋ abɨdono!’
“Yaŋ yaŋban mɨŋatjok kɨsi pɨdaŋ lamni paŋkosit
aŋakwa mɨŋatjok nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma uŋun da mɨŋatjok nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi yaŋ yoyɨwit, ‘Nin do pakbi dɨwatji nimgut, lamnin kɨmotdaŋ.’
“Yaŋba nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi da yaŋ yoyɨwit, ‘Pakbi on nin kɨsi da arɨpmon dɨma toŋ. Ji kɨŋ yumaŋ nok yutnon pakbi yumni.’
“Kɨŋakwa amɨn mɨŋat pak do agɨt uŋun apgut. Apban mɨŋat tagap taŋek egɨpgwit uŋun gat soŋnok ak do yutnon wɨgakwa yoma sopgwit.
“Buŋon don mɨŋat kabɨ pakbi do kɨwit uŋun abɨŋ yawit, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, amɨn tagɨ, abɨŋ yoma wɨtdal nim!’
“Mani amɨn tagɨ da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Nak asisi dayɨsat, nak dɨmasi nandaŋ damɨsat.’ ”
Yesu da tɨlak gen uŋun yaŋ mudaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨsi altaŋ damjak uŋun dakon bɨsap ji dɨma nandaŋ, do tagap taŋek egɨpni.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun do tɨlak kɨnda ako mibɨlɨ nandani. Amɨn kɨnda kokup dubagɨ kɨndakon kɨk do aŋek pi monjɨni yaŋ yoban opba yo kabɨni kɨla ani do yoyɨgɨt.
Pi monjɨ kaloŋ kaloŋ dakon pi agakni da arɨpmon moneŋni kɨla ani do yomgut. Kɨnda do moneŋ 25 tausen danari, ae kɨnda do 10 tausen danari, ae kɨnda do 5 tausen danari yaŋ yomɨŋ mudaŋek kɨgɨt.
Kɨŋakwan uŋudon gɨn 25 tausen danari tɨmɨkgɨt amɨn uŋun yomɨŋ gwayek aŋakwan 25 tausen danari kɨnda gat noman tagɨt.
Ae 10 tausen danari tɨmɨkgɨt amɨn uŋunyo yaŋ gɨn aŋakwan 10 tausen danari kɨnda gat noman tagɨt.
Mani 5 tausen danari tɨmɨkgɨt amɨn uŋun kɨŋ gapma wayɨgek amɨn tagɨni dakon moneŋni gapmakon yopban ɨsal tawit.
“Amɨn tagɨni bɨsap dubagɨ egek aeni tobɨl apgut. Abɨŋ moneŋni yomgut uŋun dakon pini niaŋ awit uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do yoyɨgɨt.
Yoyɨŋban 25 tausen danari tɨmɨkgɨt amɨn uŋun da yomɨŋ gwayek aŋakwan 25 tausen danari kɨnda gat noman tagɨt uŋun yolɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, gak da 25 tausen danari kɨla akeŋ do namgul uŋun pini ako 25 tausen danari kɨnda gat oni noman tak.’
“Yaŋ iyɨŋban amɨn tagɨ da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Gak pi monjɨno gen guramɨt tagɨsi agɨl. Aŋek pigo dakon kɨla tagɨsi agɨl. Yo monɨŋɨsok gabo kɨla tagɨsi agɨl do yo madep gabo kɨla tagɨ aki. Gak apbɨ kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ando.’
“Ae 10 tausen danari tɨmɨkgɨt amɨn uŋun da abɨŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, gak da 10 tausen danari kɨla akeŋ do namgul uŋun pini ako 10 tausen danari kɨnda gat oni noman tak.’
“Yaŋ iyɨŋban amɨn tagɨ da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Gak pi monjɨno gen guramɨt tagɨsi agɨl. Aŋek pigo dakon kɨla tagɨsi agɨl. Yo monɨŋɨsok gabo kɨla tagɨsi agɨl, do yo madep gabo kɨla tagɨ aki. Gak apbɨ kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ando.’
“Ae 5 tausen danari tɨmɨkgɨt amɨn uŋun da abɨŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, gak dakon mibɨlgo nandɨsat, gak bupmɨgo mɨni. Amɨn ŋwakŋwarɨ da pi aŋakwa jap bamɨ gak da pasal, ae mɨktɨmon jap yet tɨŋtɨŋoŋ dakon bamɨ gaga do pasal.
Yaŋ asal, do pasalek moneŋgo 5 tausen danari namgul uŋun aŋkɨ mɨktɨm kagagwan yɨpbo tagɨt. Moneŋgo uŋun oni.’
“Yaŋban amɨn tagɨni da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak oman monjɨ yokwi, pi ak do kurak tosol. Nak dakon mibɨlno kɨlɨ nandagɨl. Nak amɨn da pigaga jap bamɨ pasat, ae amɨn da jap yet tɨŋtɨŋoŋ dakon bamɨ naga do pasat.
Yaŋ nandagɨl, do moneŋno beŋon yopgul tam uŋun tagɨ. Yaŋ agɨl tam abɨŋ nak da moneŋno gat ae beŋ da dɨwarɨ saŋbesak uŋun gat tagɨ tɨmɨkgom.’
“Amɨn yoni taŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn uŋun nak da saŋbeŋek yo ɨbo morapmɨsi taŋ ɨmdaŋ. Ae amɨn yoni kaloŋɨsok taŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn uŋun nak da uŋunjok gwayeŋ mudokeŋ. Yaŋdo, on amɨn moneŋni uŋun gwayeŋ moneŋ 50 tausen danari taŋ ɨmaŋ uŋun amɨn do ɨmni.
<range>
Aŋek on oman monjɨ kurak tok amɨn waŋga abɨgɨ maba pɨlɨn tukgwan pɨgɨsak. Uŋudon kunam tagek iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋ tɨdaŋek egɨpdɨsak.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn Dakon Monji apjak bɨsapmon Kwen Kokup dakon tɨlɨmni gat ae aŋelo kabɨni gat abɨŋek kɨla amɨn madep yɨyɨt tamokon uŋudon yɨtdɨsak.
Yɨgakwan amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun abɨŋ burɨkon muwuk mudoni. Abɨŋ muwukba kɨla amɨn da sipsip ae meme kokwinɨkgaŋ uŋun da tɨlagon amɨn kokwinɨtdɨsak.
Kokwinɨgek sipsip amɨnsi tet do yopmaŋek meme gwandeŋ tet do yopdɨsak.
“Kɨla Amɨn Madep uŋun da amɨnsi tet do amɨn yaŋ yoyɨsak, ‘Datno da gɨsam dabi amɨn, abɨŋek Datno dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni ji do aŋnoman abi uŋun abɨŋek abɨdoni. Uŋun mɨktɨm wasok wasogɨkon ji do kɨlɨ aŋnoman agɨt da tosok.
Nak kalɨp jap do abo jap naba nagɨm, ae pakbi do abo pakbi naba nagɨm, ae kokup ŋwakŋwarɨkon da apbo but dasi abɨdaŋba yutjikon paŋkɨ egɨpgum.
Ɨmalno mɨni egapbo ɨmal namgwit. Sot abo aŋpulugawit. Dam teban yutnon yɨgapbo abɨŋ nandawit.’
“Yaŋ yaŋban kɨlegɨ kabɨ da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨni, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ, ni bɨsapmon jap do abɨ gandaŋek jap gamgumaŋ, ae ni bɨsapmon pakbi do asal yaŋ gandaŋek pakbi gamgumaŋ?
Ae ni bɨsapmon kokup ŋwakŋwarɨkon da abɨsal yaŋ gandaŋek aŋkɨ yutninon gepgumaŋ, ae ni bɨsapmon ɨmalgo mɨni yaŋ gandaŋek ɨmal gamgumaŋ?
Ae ni bɨsapmon sot asal yaŋ gandaŋek kɨlago agɨmaŋ, ae ni bɨsapmon dam teban yutnon yɨkdal yaŋ gandaŋek abɨŋ gandagɨmaŋ?’
“Yaŋba Amɨn Madep da yaŋ yoyɨsak, ‘Asisi dayɨsat, yo morap notno kɨnda mani mɨni do awit uŋun yo morap nak do awit.’
“Yaŋ yoyɨŋek Amɨn Madep uŋun da tobɨl gwandeŋ tet do amɨn yaŋ yoyɨsak, ‘Jobɨt pabi kabɨ ji aŋgwikon kɨŋek kɨndapmon pɨgɨt. Uŋun kɨndap uŋun Sunduk gat aŋelo kabɨni gat uŋun do aŋnoman abi, uŋun kɨmot kɨmorɨ mɨni.
Kalɨp jap do abo jap dɨma namgwit, ae pakbi do abo pakbi dɨma namgwit.
Kokup ŋwakŋwarɨkon da apbo yutjikon dɨma aŋkɨ nepgwit, ae ɨmalno mɨni egapbo ɨmal dɨma namgwit, ae sot agɨm ae dam teban yutnon yɨkgɨm bɨsapmon kɨlano dɨma awit.’
“Yaŋ yaŋban gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨni, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ ni bɨsapmon gandano jap do agɨl, bo pakbi do agɨl, bo kokup ŋwakŋwarɨkon da apgul, bo ɨmalgo mɨni, bo sot agɨl, bo dam teban yutnon yɨkgɨl, abɨ dɨma aŋpulugagɨmaŋ?’
“Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨsak, ‘Nak asisi dayɨsat, yo morap amɨn mani mɨni do dɨma awit uŋun nak do awit.’
“Yaŋ yoyɨŋban uŋun amɨn kabɨ kobogɨ yokwisi dagok dagogɨ mɨni pakdaŋ. Mani kɨlegɨ amɨn kabɨ uŋun da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni uŋudon kɨkdaŋ.”
Yesu uŋun gen morap yaŋ mudaŋek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
“Dɨsi nandaŋ, gɨldat bamorɨ gɨn egek Yapyap Bɨlak egɨpmɨ. Uŋun bɨsapmon Amɨn Dakon Monji amɨn da abɨdaŋ uwal da kɨsiron yɨpba tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋatdaŋ.”
Uŋun bɨsapmon mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae Israel dakon kɨla amɨn uŋun mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn Kaiapas uŋun da yutnon muwukgwit.
Muwugek Yesu ni kosiron da pasɨlek abɨdaŋ aŋatno kɨmotjak uŋun dakon gen yawit.
Yaŋ yaŋek yawit, “Telagɨ bɨsap madepmon dɨma abɨdoneŋ. Yaŋ aneŋ kaŋ, mɨŋat amɨnyokon pɨdok pɨdok noman tokdɨsak.”
Yesu Betani kokupmon amɨn kɨnda mani Saimon uŋun da yutnon yɨkgɨt. (Saimon uŋun kalɨp wuda tebani toŋ egɨpgut.)
Yesu jap noknok tamokon yɨgakwan mɨŋat kɨnda pakbi kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi abɨdaŋ awɨŋ Yesu da busuŋon tagalgɨt. (Uŋun pakbi yumaŋ nogɨ wukwisi ae tɨbɨrɨ uŋun tɨpnaŋ wasaŋbi.)
Yaŋ aban paŋdet kabɨni da kaŋek burɨ yokwi taŋba yaŋ yawit, “Nidosi aŋek pakbi kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi uŋun yumsi tagaldak?
Amɨn da yubam tam, moneŋ madepsi tɨmɨk yoni mɨni amɨn do yomnom.”
Yaŋ yaŋba nandaŋek Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Mɨŋat on nido jɨgɨ ɨmaŋ? Mɨŋat on nak do yo tagɨsi asak.
Yoni mɨni amɨn ji gat bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ egɨpdaŋ, mani nak ji gat bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ dɨma egɨpdamaŋ.
On mɨŋat da mibɨltok gɨptɨmnokon pakbi kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi naŋ soŋ namɨŋek kɨmakbi tamokon nepni do aŋtagap asak.
Asisi dayɨsat, mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn da Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋek mɨŋat on da yo ak uŋun dakon gen bin kɨsi yoyɨŋakwa nandakdaŋ. Aŋakwa uŋun mɨŋat dakon man bini dɨma pasɨldɨsak.”
Uŋun bɨsapmon paŋdetni 12 kabɨkon da kɨnda mani Judas Iskariot uŋun da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨkon kɨgɨt.
Kɨŋ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yesu kɨsitjikon yɨpbo ninaŋ namni?” Yaŋban silwa moneŋ tabɨlɨ 30 yaŋ manjɨŋ ɨmgwit.
Ɨba wasaŋek Yesu kɨsitnikon yɨpjak do kosit wɨsɨgɨt.
Bret Yisni Mɨni Bɨlak wasok wasogɨkon paŋdetni da Yesukon kɨŋ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin kɨŋ dukwan Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap paŋkosit aneŋ do nandɨsal?”
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kokup papmon kɨŋ amɨn kɨnda kokdaŋ. Kaŋek yaŋ iyɨni: Yoyɨŋdet da yaŋ yosok, Nak dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ uŋun kwaŋ tosok. Nak gat paŋdet kabɨno gat gak da yutnon apno Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap noneŋ.”
Yaŋban paŋdetni da Yesu dakon gen guramɨgek kɨŋ Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap paŋkosit awit.
Yaŋ aŋek pɨlɨn taŋakwan Yesu gat paŋdetni 12 kabɨ gat yɨgek jap nawit.
Jap naŋ yɨgek Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Asisi dayɨsat, jikon da kɨnda da uwal da kɨsiron nepdɨsak.”
Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdetni burɨ yokwi taŋba kaloŋ kaloŋ yaŋ yawit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nak do dɨma yosol, ma?”
Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Kɨnda nak gat jap ɨdapmon kɨsitnit kaloŋɨ yɨpmaŋgamak, uŋun amɨn da nak uwalno da kɨsiron nepdɨsak.
Asi Piŋkop da papiakon gen mandabi uŋun da tɨlagon Amɨn Dakon Monji kɨmoron kɨkdɨsak. Mani Amɨn Dakon Monji uwal da kɨsiron yɨpjak amɨn, awa! Uŋun amɨn meŋi da dɨma aŋalagɨt tam tagɨ.”
Yaŋ yaŋban uwal da kɨsiron yɨpyɨp amɨn Judas da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, nak do dɨma yosol, ma?” Yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Uŋun gak mani.”
Jap naŋ yɨgakwa Yesu da bret kɨnda abɨdaŋ, Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek, pudaŋ paŋdetni do yomgut. Yomɨŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Pabɨdaŋek noni, on nak dakon gɨptɨm tɨmno.”
Yaŋ yaŋek wain kɨnam abɨdaŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek yomɨŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji kɨsi da noni.
On yawino. Piŋkop gat amɨn gat saŋbek saŋbek abi uŋun aŋteban asak. Amɨn morapmɨ dakon dɨwarɨni yopmaŋ yom do parekdat.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, nak wain ae dɨma naŋek egɨ wɨgɨ Datno da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan don ji gat wain kalugɨ noneŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋban kap kɨnda yaŋek yomakon pɨgek Ɨleŋ Olipmon wɨgɨwit.
Ɨleŋ Olipmon wɨgek Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: ‘Sipsip dakon kɨla amɨn aŋakgo kɨmagakwan sipsip bɨrapmɨgɨ iyɨ iyɨ kɨkdaŋ.’ Gen uŋun da arɨpmon abɨsok kalbi yo morap nagon noman taŋakwa pɨndagek ji manji namdaŋ.
Mani kɨmoron da pɨdaŋek nak da kalɨp Galili mɨktɨmon mibɨltaŋ damɨŋek kɨkeŋ.”
Yaŋban Pita da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn dɨwarɨ da manji gamɨŋakwa nak yaŋ dɨmasi abeŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Asisi gayɨsat, abɨsok kalbi pup gen dɨma yaŋakwan gak da nak do ‘Uŋun amɨn dɨma nandaŋ ɨmɨsat’ yaŋ kosit kapbɨ yokdɨsal.”
Yaŋban Pita da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Uwal da gɨkba kɨmagaki nakyo kɨsi nɨkba kɨmokgeŋ do ani kaŋ, gak do wasɨp dɨma yokeŋ.” Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdet kabɨ dɨwarɨ kɨsi yaŋ gɨn yawit.
Yesu gat paŋdetni gat mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda mani Getsemani uŋudon kɨwit. Kɨŋ altaŋek Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji ɨdon yɨgakwa nak asɨdon kɨŋ bɨsit akeŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋek Pita gat ae Sebedi dakon monjɨ yat tɨmɨkban kɨwit. Kɨŋ burɨkon jɨgɨ madepsi nandaŋek
yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Butno jɨk taŋakwan kɨmot kɨmotno noman taŋ naban nandɨsat. Do ji nak gat kɨsi ɨdon Piŋkop do nandaŋek egɨpneŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋek tɨmɨsok dɨ kɨŋek mɨktɨmon maŋ pagek bɨsit yaŋ agɨt, “O Dat, yo morap tagɨ aki. Do nak da kwenon jɨgɨ apdɨsak uŋun kukwoki do nandɨsat. Mani nak dakon nandak nandak dɨma yolgi. Gak dakon galak tok niaŋsi tosok uŋun dagɨn noman toni.”
Yaŋ yaŋek tobɨl paŋdetni kapbɨ egɨpgwiron kɨŋ pɨndakban dɨpmɨn pakgwit pɨndagek Pita yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ji nak gat awa kaloŋɨ da arɨpmon gɨn Piŋkop do nandaŋek dɨma egɨpneŋ?
Ji teban taŋek bɨsit aŋek egɨpni. Yaŋ aŋek egɨpni kaŋ, paŋkewalon arɨpmɨ dɨma mokdaŋ. But da nak nol do galak tosok mani gɨp dakon tapmɨmni mɨni.”
Yaŋ yaŋek aeni tobɨl kɨŋ bɨsit yaŋ agɨt, “Datno, jɨgɨ pakeŋdosi nandɨsal kaŋ, tagɨ pakeŋ.”
Bɨsit aban dagaŋban abɨŋ pɨndakban paŋdetni dɨpmɨn do yokwisi aŋek aeni dɨpmɨn sigɨn pakgwit.
Yaŋ pɨndagek aeni tobɨl kɨŋ bɨsit mibɨltok agɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn agɨt.
Yaŋ aŋek tobɨl abɨŋ paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dɨpmɨn sigɨn pagek tapmɨm paŋ, ma? Bɨsap kɨlɨ abɨk. Amɨn Dakon Monji yokwi pakpak da kɨsiron kɨlɨ uŋun yɨpmaŋgaŋ.
Pɨdaŋba kɨno! Kabɨt, uwal da kɨsiron nepjak amɨn kɨlɨ abɨk.”
Yesu gen yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn paŋdetni 12 kabɨkon da kɨnda mani Judas altaŋ yomgut. Amɨn kabɨ madep emat agak sɨbani ae kɨndap kɨrɨŋni tɨmɨgek buŋon yolgwit. Mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn gat da yabekba opgwit.
Uwal da kɨsiron yɨpyɨp amɨn da gen kɨnda kɨlɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda nak da mandaŋ noko kaŋ, uŋun amɨn naŋ tebai abɨdoni.”
Judas tepmɨ Yesukon kɨŋ altaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, kalbi tagɨsi!” Yaŋ iyɨŋek mandaŋ nagɨt.
Yaŋ aban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Not, yo ak do nandaŋek abɨl uŋun abi.” Yaŋ iyɨŋban emat amɨn da Yesu tebai abɨdawit.
Aba Yesu da kabɨkon nani kɨnda da emat agak sɨbani ɨlɨkban wɨŋban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn dakon oman monjɨni mɨragɨ mandaŋ dagagɨt.
Aban Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Gak emat agak sɨbago yɨgɨkon sɨmɨl. Emat agak sɨba pawɨlgaŋ amɨn uŋun emat agak sɨba da mandaŋ yoba kɨmokgoŋ.
Nak Datno arɨpmɨ tagɨ iyɨko uŋun da aŋelo 72 tausen yabekban abɨŋ nak tagɨ aŋpulugoni. Gak uŋun dɨma nandɨsal, ma?
Mani yaŋ abeŋ kaŋ, Piŋkop da papiakon gen tosok uŋun niaŋon da bamɨ toŋ asak? Uwalno da yo yaŋsi aŋnamni do yosok.”
Yaŋ yaŋek uŋudon gɨn Yesu da amɨn kabɨ madep yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nak do kabo noknok kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋek emat agak sɨba ae kɨndap kɨrɨŋyo tɨmɨgek nak abɨdok do abeŋ, ma? Nak gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan ji gat egek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨm. Uŋun bɨsapmon nak abɨdok do dɨma nandawit.
Mani Piŋkop da papiakon kombɨ amɨn da gen mandawit yaŋ gɨn bamɨ noman tosok.” Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdet morapni Yesu yɨpmaŋek pasal kɨŋ mudawit.
Yesu abɨdawit amɨn uŋun Yesu abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn Kaiapas da yutnon aŋkɨwit. Uŋudon gen teban dakon yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat ae kɨla amɨn gat kɨsi muwukgwit.
Pita kagɨ kagɨsok da Yesu yol aŋkɨŋek, mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn dakon yoma nagalgwan pɨgɨgɨt. Pɨkwan obip amɨn gat yɨgek Yesu yo niaŋsi aŋɨba kokeŋ yaŋ do pɨndak egɨpgut.
Aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae gen kokwin amɨn kɨsi morap gat da yaŋ nandawit, amɨn dɨ yaŋ yomno abɨŋ Yesu top gen yaŋ ɨmɨŋek gulusuŋ agɨt yaŋ yaŋakwa aŋatno kɨmotjak yaŋ nandawit.
Mani amɨn morapmɨ yaŋ yoba abɨŋek top gen morapmɨ yawit, mani asi gulusuŋ kɨnda agɨt yaŋ dɨma kawit. Don amɨn bamorɨ da abɨŋ yaŋ yagɨmal,
“Nin da nandaŋapno Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Nak da Piŋkop dakon Telagɨ Yut Madep uŋun tuwɨlek gɨldat kapbɨ da butgwan ae wɨtjɨkeŋ.’ ”
Yaŋ yaŋakwal mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn da pɨdaŋ agek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma yoyɨki? On amɨn morap gen yaŋ gaba niaŋ nandaŋ yomɨsal?”
Mani Yesu da gen kɨnda dɨma yagɨt. Yaŋ aban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn da aeni iyɨgɨt, “Gak Piŋkop egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ uŋun da manon yaŋ teban tok aŋek gen bamɨsi yoki. Gak asi Kristo, Piŋkop dakon Monji bo dɨma? Kɨlɨ bamɨ ya!”
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Gen yosol uŋun bamɨ. Ji don kaŋakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji Tapmɨm Ami da amɨnsi tet do yɨkban kokdaŋ. Aŋek kaŋakwa kundukon gɨkwemon da apban kokdaŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn burɨ wagɨl yokwi taŋban iyɨ dakon paba pɨgɨkni pudaŋek yagɨt, “Mibɨlni nandak do amɨn nido saŋbeŋek yoyɨno apni? Iyɨ Piŋkop kulabɨŋek ‘nak Piŋkop dakon Monji’ yaŋ yosok,
do ji da niaŋ aŋ ɨmneŋ do nandaŋ?” Yaŋban kɨsi morap da yawit, “Gulusuŋ asak, do si kɨmotjak.”
Yaŋ yaŋek dɨwarɨ da ɨlɨp sul ɨmɨŋek kɨsit da aŋakgwit. Ae dɨwarɨ da mogɨm kulbak aŋagek
yaŋ iyɨwit, “Kristo gak namɨn da gɨkdak? Kombɨ gen ya!”
Aŋakwa Pita uŋun yut da nagalgwan yɨgakwan mukwa sogok mibɨltok amɨn dakon oman mɨŋatjok kɨnda da abɨŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Yesu Galili amɨn gat kɨsi egɨpgwit.”
Yaŋban Pita da wasɨp yaŋek yagɨt, “Gak da gen uŋun yosol nak dɨma nandɨsat.”
Yaŋ yaŋek wigaron pɨgakwan oman mɨŋat kɨnda Pita kaŋek amɨn uŋudon akgwit yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On amɨn uŋun Yesu Nasaret amɨn gat kɨsi egɨpgwit.”
Yaŋ yaŋban Pita aeni geni aŋteban aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Asisi, nak uŋun amɨn dɨmasi nandaŋ ɨmɨsat!”
Tɨmɨsok dɨ egek amɨn kapmatjok akgwit uŋun da kɨŋ Pita yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak dakon tek nandano asi gak uŋun amɨn kabɨ dakon kokup ɨsalni kɨnda yaŋ asak, do gak uŋun da kabɨkon nani yaŋ nandamaŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋba Pita da tebaisi yaŋek yagɨt, “Asisi dayɨsat, amɨn uŋun yoŋ nak dɨmasi nandaŋ ɨmɨsat. Top yosot kaŋ, Piŋkop da nak tagɨ aŋupbal asak!” Yaŋ yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn pup gen yagɨt.
Yaŋban nandaŋek Pita Yesu da gen yagɨt uŋun do burɨ pɨsagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ yagɨt: “Pup da gen dɨma yaŋakwan gak da nak do wasɨp yaŋbɨ kosit kapbɨ akdɨsak.” Pita da gen uŋun do burɨ pɨsaŋban waŋga pɨgɨ kunam madepsi takgɨt.
Wɨsawɨsa do mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae kɨla amɨn gat da muwugek Yesu aŋakba kɨmotjak do yaŋ dagok awit.
Aŋek Yesu kɨsirɨ wamaŋ aŋkɨ gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn Pailat da kɨsiron yɨpgwit.
Judas Yesu uwal da kɨsiron yɨpgut amɨn kaŋban Yesu kɨmotjak do yaŋ dagok aŋakwa mabisi at yaŋ nandagɨt. Aŋek nandak nandakni kulabɨk aŋek silwa moneŋ 30 yaŋ tɨmɨkgɨt uŋun mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae kɨla amɨn gat do aeni paŋtobɨl yomgut.
Yomɨŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak suŋsi aŋek amɨn kɨlegɨ kɨnda uwal da kɨsiron yɨpmat. Uŋun ji da aŋakba kɨmotdɨsak.” Yoyɨŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Uŋun nin dakon yo dɨma. Uŋun gak dakon yo gɨn.”
Yaŋ yaŋba Judas silwa moneŋ uŋun telagɨ yut da nagalgwan dapban pɨgakwa kɨŋ iyɨ tɨpgut.
Aban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ da silwa moneŋ uŋun tɨmɨgek yaŋ yawit, “Moneŋ on yawi dakon tomni. Do telagɨ yut dakon moneŋ gat kɨsi yopneŋ kaŋ, gen tebanin yapdamaŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋek uŋun moneŋ baŋ mɨktɨm kwoba wasawit mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda yumaŋ nawit. Yumaŋ naŋek amɨn dubagɨkon da abɨŋ kɨmokgoŋ uŋun dakon amɨn kɨmakba yopyop tamo kɨnda wasawit.
Yaŋ awit do uŋun mɨktɨm tɨm uŋun do Yawi Mɨktɨm yaŋ yawit da yoŋ.
Yaŋ aŋakwa kombɨ amɨn Jeremaia da gen mandagɨt uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ, “Israel amɨn da uŋun amɨn yumaŋ noni do silwa moneŋ 30 baŋ tomni yomgwit.
Yaŋ aŋek Amɨn Tagɨ da nayɨgɨt, uŋun da tɨlagon uŋun moneŋ baŋ mɨktɨm kwoba wasawit mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda yumaŋ nawit.”
Yesu gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn Pailat da ɨŋamon agakwan Pailat da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep, ma?” Yaŋban Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yagɨt, “Yosol uŋun mani.”
Yaŋ yaŋban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae kɨla amɨn dɨwarɨ gat da gen yaŋ ɨmɨŋba gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma yoyɨgɨt.
Yaŋ aban Pailat da aeni iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn on da gak wasok yokwi agɨl do gen morapmɨ yaŋ gamaŋ. Uŋun dɨma nandɨsal, ma?”
Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da gen kobogɨsok kɨnda dɨmasi yaŋakwan Pailat da Yesu do nandaban ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
Bɨlagɨ bɨlagɨ Yapyap Bɨlak bɨsapmon gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn da wasok kɨnda yaŋ agɨt. Mɨŋat amɨnyo da amɨn kɨnda dam tebanon yɨkdak uŋun mani yaŋakwa, Pailat da pulugaŋ yopban kɨŋ kɨŋ awit.
Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn yokwisi kɨnda dam tebanon yɨkgɨt, mani Barabas.
Amɨn abɨŋ muwugakwa Pailat da amɨn da Yesu do nandaba yokwi taŋban top yaŋek gen pikon yɨpgwit yaŋ nandagɨt. Yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu aŋkutnaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dakon galaktok namɨn naŋ pulugaŋ yɨpbo jikon opjak, Barabas do nandaŋ bo Yesu mani kɨnda Kristo yaŋ yoŋ uŋun naŋ?”
<range>
Yaŋ yaŋek Pailat gen kokwin tamokon yɨgakwan mɨŋatni da gen kɨnda yaŋ yɨpban apgut, “Nak uŋun amɨn kalbi dɨpmɨnon kat, do jɨgɨsi nandɨsat. Uŋun amɨn kɨlegɨsi, do gak yo kɨnda dɨmasi aŋ ɨbi.”
Mani mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae kɨla amɨn gat da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep burɨ sugaŋek yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Ji Pailat da Barabas naŋ pulugaŋek Yesu naŋ aŋakban kɨmotjak do iyɨni.”
Yaŋba Pailat da aeni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dakon galaktok on amɨn bamoron baŋ namɨn naŋ pulugaŋ yɨpbo kɨsak do nandaŋ?” Yoyɨŋban “Barabas naŋ” yaŋ yawit.
Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yesu, mani kɨnda Kristo yaŋ yoŋ, uŋun do ninaŋ aŋ ɨbeŋ?” Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn kɨsi da yaŋ yawit, “Tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmotjak!”
Yaŋba Pailat da yoyɨgɨt, “Mibɨlɨ nido? Ni gulusuŋ naŋ agɨt?” Yaŋban mibɨltok yawit si yapmaŋek madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmotjak!”
Yaŋba Pailat da iyɨ yaŋ nandagɨt, “Gen yoko dɨma nandaŋek emat madepsi akdaŋ.” Yaŋ nandaŋek mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep da dabɨlon kɨsitni pakbikon sugaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On amɨn kɨmakban nak da dɨwarɨ dɨma pakeŋ, ji da pani.”
Yaŋban amɨn kɨsi da geni yaŋ aŋtobɨl ɨmgwit, “Nin gat ae mɨŋat monjɨyonin gat da kɨmotjak dakon kobogɨ tagɨ paneŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋba Pailat da Barabas pulugaŋ yɨpban mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyokon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwan emat amɨn yoyɨŋban Yesu baljawit. Aba don tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmotjak do yoyɨgɨt.
Gapman dakon emat amɨn da Yesu abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ gapman dakon yut madepmon wɨgakwa emat amɨn dɨwarɨ kɨsi abɨŋ Yesu aŋgwasɨŋek akgwit.
Aŋek Yesu iyɨ dakon ɨmalni ɨlɨgek kɨla amɨn madep da ɨmal gami dubak paŋ uŋuden kɨnda paŋ ɨmgwit.
Yaŋ aŋek nap kelɨ toŋ naŋ kɨla amɨn madep dakon pelɨt yombem kɨnda wasaŋ busuŋɨkon aba pɨgɨgɨt. Aba pɨgakwan kɨndap kɨrɨŋ kɨnda kɨsirɨ amɨnsi tet do yɨpmaŋ ɨmgwit. Yɨpmaŋ ɨmɨŋek gawak ɨmɨŋek topmon da man madep ɨmɨŋek gen yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gɨldat tagɨ, Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep!”
Aŋek ɨlɨp sul ɨmɨŋek kɨndap kɨrɨŋ kɨsirɨkon yɨpgwit uŋun gwayeŋ busuŋɨkon kosirɨ morapmɨ baljawit.
Aŋek topmon da man madep ɨmɨŋ mudaŋek ɨmal gami ɨlɨgek iyɨ dakon pabɨ pɨgɨk paŋ ɨmgwit. Paŋ ɨmɨŋek tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmotjak do ɨlɨk aŋaŋ kɨwit.
Kosiron kɨŋek emat amɨn da Sairini kokupmon amɨn kɨnda kawit, mani Saimon. Uŋun tebai iyɨŋba Yesu dakon tɨlak kɨndapni guramɨkban kɨwit.
Kɨŋ mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda mani Golgata uŋudon altawit. (Golgata dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun Busuŋ Kɨdat Ɨleŋ.)
Kɨŋ altaŋek wain gat ae pakbi ɨsɨpmɨ kɨnda gat ɨktagɨlek ɨmɨŋba naŋ nandat aŋek nok do kurak tagɨt.
Aŋakwan tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋagek emat amɨn da satu wasok aŋek ɨmalni kokwinɨk tɨmɨkgwit.
Satu wasok aba mudaŋban mɨktɨmon pabɨŋ yɨgek kɨla aŋek kaŋ egɨpgwit.
Kwen busuŋɨkon mibɨlɨ nido aŋakgwit uŋun dakon but pɨso yaŋ mandawit, ON YESU, JUDA AMƗN DAKON KƗLA AMƗN MADEPNI
Kabo noknok bamorɨ Yesu gat kɨsi dapgwit. Kɨnda amɨnsi tetdo, ae kɨnda gwandeŋ tet do tɨlak kɨndapmon dapmaŋ dapmaŋ awit.
Amɨn kɨŋ ap awit uŋun da yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨŋek wunda kwalkwal aŋek yaŋ iyɨwit,
“Gak Telagɨ Yut Madep tuwɨlek gɨldat kapbɨ da butgwan ae wɨtjɨk do yagɨl, do gɨptɨmgo aŋkutnoki! Gak asi Piŋkop dakon Monji egɨsalon tɨlak kɨndapmon da pɨ!”
Yaŋ yaŋba mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat ae kɨla amɨn gat uŋun kɨsi yaŋ gɨn jɨgɨlak iyɨŋek yawit,
“Amɨn dɨwarɨ paŋpulugagɨt da nido iyɨ aŋpulugok do aŋtɨdok asak? On Israel amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madepni ma! Kaŋ tɨlak kɨndapmon da pɨŋban kaŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmneŋ.
Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ yosok, ‘Nak Piŋkop dakon Monji egɨsat.’ Piŋkop da Monji aŋpulugok do nandɨsak kaŋ, tagɨ aŋpulugosak.”
Uŋudeŋ gɨn kabo noknok bamot terɨ terɨ dapbi uŋunyo kɨsi yaŋba yokwi tok yaŋ gɨn agɨmal.
Gɨldat binap 12 kilok mɨktɨm kɨsi pɨlɨn tuk aŋakwan kɨŋ pɨlɨndo 3 kilok agɨt.
kilok aŋakwan Yesu da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?” Gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ yaŋ: “Piŋkopno, Piŋkopno, nido nepmaŋ dekdal?”
Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn dɨwarɨ kapmatjok akgwit uŋun nandaŋek yawit, “Nandaŋ, uŋun Elaija do yaŋ ɨmɨsak.”
Yaŋba uŋudon gɨn amɨn kɨnda tɨmtɨm yaŋek kɨŋ yo kɨnda gugɨdan yombem jol dɨwaron wamaŋ wain gat ae pakbi ɨsɨpmɨ gat uŋungwan sɨbɨŋek Yesu da nosak do aŋenak ɨmgut.
Aŋakwan dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Yum kaŋba koneŋ. Elaija da abɨŋ aŋpulugaŋban koneŋ bo dɨma?”
Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu aeni yaŋ tɨdaŋek wupni yɨpban kɨŋakwan kɨmakgɨt.
Kɨmagakwan uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon yoma ɨmal uŋun kwen da sulugɨ pɨŋ mibɨlɨkon dagaŋek tɨmɨ bamorɨ agɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan mɨktɨm wudɨp aŋakwan tɨp madep morapmɨ da sulugɨwit.
Uŋun yo morap altaŋakwa amɨn kɨmakba yopmaŋgaŋ tamo wɨtdal kɨŋakwa Piŋkop dakon amɨn morapmɨ kalɨp kɨmakba yopbi uŋun pɨdawit.
Pɨdaŋ don Yesu da kɨmoron da pɨdaŋakwan telagɨ kokup papmon pukwa amɨn morapmɨ da pɨndakgwit.
Aŋakwa emat amɨn 100 dakon kɨla amɨn gat ae emat amɨn Yesu do kaŋ egɨpgwit amɨn uŋun wudɨp ae yo morap altawit uŋun pɨndagek si pasalgwit. Pasalek yaŋsi yawit, “On amɨn asisi Piŋkop dakon Monji egɨpgut.”
Aŋakwa mɨŋat dɨwarɨ dubagɨsogon da agek yo uŋun pɨndakgwit. Yesu Galili mɨktɨm yɨpmaŋ abɨŋakwan uŋun mɨŋat kabɨ da yol awɨlek oman aŋ ɨmɨŋek agɨpgwit.
Uŋun kabɨkon kɨnda mani Maria, kokupni Makdala. Ae Maria ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda Jems gat Josep gat dakon meŋi. Ae Sebedi dakon monjɨ bamot uŋun dakon meŋi kɨsi akgwit.
Pɨlɨndo yoni morapmɨ amɨn kɨnda Arimatea kokupmon da apgut. Uŋun mani Josep. Uŋun Yesu dakon paŋdetni kɨnda.
Josep uŋun Pailaron kɨŋ Yesu dakon bumjotni abɨdok do iyɨgɨt. Iyɨŋban emat amɨni yoyɨŋban bumjotni Josep do ɨmgwit.
Ɨmɨŋba abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ ɨmal garagɨ mɨni kɨnda naŋ wamaŋek
aŋkɨ iyɨ dakon tɨp kɨnam amɨn kɨmakbi do kaluk pasɨŋbi uŋungwan aŋkɨ yɨpgut. Yɨpmaŋek tɨp madepsi kɨnda aŋtobɨlban abɨŋ yoma sopmaŋakwan yɨpmaŋ kɨgɨt.
Maria Makdala kokupmon nani gat ae Maria kɨnda gat tɨp kɨnam da kapmatjok yɨgek yo agɨt uŋun nomansi kagɨmal.
Sabat bɨsap do tagap tok aŋ mudaŋek wɨsa dagokdo mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae Parisi amɨn gat Pailaron kɨwit.
Kɨŋ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Top amɨn si egɨpgut bɨsapmon gen kɨnda yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Gɨldat kapbɨ mudaŋakwa kɨmoron da pɨdokeŋ’ yaŋ yagɨt.
Yaŋ yagɨt, do gak obip amɨngo tebaisi yoyɨŋbɨ tɨp kɨnam dakon kɨla tebaisi aŋakwa wɨgɨ gɨldat kapbɨ mudoni. Yaŋ dɨma ani kaŋ, paŋdetni da abɨŋ bumjotni kabo aŋkɨsɨbɨŋ aŋkɨŋek Yesu kɨlɨ pɨdak yaŋ amɨn yoyɨkdaŋ. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, mibɨltok iyɨ do top gen yagɨt uŋun yapmaŋek top gen yokdaŋ uŋun da yo yokwisi kɨnda akdɨsak.”
Yaŋba Pailat da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji obip amɨn tɨmɨkba kɨŋ tɨp kɨnam uŋun niaŋsi aŋek kɨlani ak do nandaŋ uŋun da tɨlagon yoyɨŋba ani.”
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban tɨp kɨnamon kɨŋ tɨp madep yoma kaga sopguron tɨlak kɨnda dɨma abɨdoni do yɨpgwit. Yɨpmaŋek obip amɨn da kɨlani tebaisi ani do yopba akgwit.
Sabat bɨsap mudaŋakwan pakgwit da Sonda wɨsa dagokdo Maria Makdala kokupmon nani gat ae Maria kɨnda gat tɨp kɨnam kok do kɨgɨmal.
Kɨŋakwal uŋudon gɨn wudɨp madep agɨt. Aŋakwan Amɨn Tagɨ dakon aŋelo kɨnda Kwen Kokupmon da pɨŋ tɨp madep uŋun aŋtobɨlban kɨŋakwan kwenikon yɨkgɨt.
Aŋelo uŋun mal da yaŋ teŋteŋaŋakwan ɨmalni uŋun gɨk sitnaŋ yombem kwakwagɨsi agɨt.
Obip amɨn uŋun kaŋ pasal nɨmnɨmɨk maŋ pagek kɨmakbi yombem awit.
Yaŋ aŋakwa aŋelo da mɨŋat bamot yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil dɨma pasoljil. Yesu tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakbi naŋ wusɨk do abamal yaŋ nandɨsat.
Yesu yagɨt da arɨpmon Piŋkop da kɨlɨ aban pɨdak. Ɨdon dɨma egɨsak. Abɨŋ tamoni do konjil.
Jil tepmɨsi kɨŋ paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨnjil, ‘Uŋun Piŋkop da kɨmoron naŋ kɨlɨ aban pɨdak. Mibɨltaŋ damɨŋek Galili mɨktɨmon kɨk, do uŋudon kɨŋ koni.’ Nak gen on dayɨk do pɨt.”
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban mɨŋat bamot uŋun pasalgɨmal, mani kɨsɨk kɨsɨk nandaŋek tɨmtɨm yaŋek paŋdet kabɨni gen uŋun yoyɨk do kɨgɨmal.
Kɨŋakwal Yesu gat domdom aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Wɨsa dagokdo tagɨsi.” Yaŋ yoyɨŋban kandapmɨ abɨdaŋek gawak ɨmgumal.
Aŋakwal Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Dɨma pasoljil. Jil kɨŋ notnoni kabɨ yoyɨŋbal Galili kɨŋ uŋudon nandani.”
Mɨŋat bamot kɨŋakwal obip amɨn dɨwarɨ tɨp kɨnam dakon kɨla awit uŋun da kokup papmon kɨŋ mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ yo morap altawit uŋun dakon gen morap yoyɨŋ mudawit.
Yoyɨŋba mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn gat ae kɨla amɨn gat muwugek niaŋ ano kɨlek tosak yaŋ do gen paŋkosit awit. Aŋek obip amɨn do moneŋ madepsi yomɨŋek
yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Ji yaŋsi yoni, ‘Nin kalbi pak ɨŋtaŋapno paŋdetni da abɨŋ bumjotni kabo aŋkɨsɨbeŋ.’
Gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn da uŋun dakon geni nandɨsak kaŋ, nin da iyɨno burɨ maŋakwan jikon jɨgɨ kɨnda dɨma tosak.”
Yaŋ yoyɨŋba obip amɨn moneŋ tɨmɨgek geni guramɨkgwit. Gen uŋun Juda amɨn da yaŋ aŋ ɨreŋ aba abɨsokyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn yoŋ.
Paŋdetni 11 kabɨ Galili mɨktɨmon kɨŋ, Yesu da kabap kɨnda uŋudon wɨgɨni do kɨlɨ yoyɨgɨt uŋudon wɨgɨwit.
Wɨgɨ Yesu kaŋek gawak ɨmgwit, mani dɨwarɨ da but bamot awit.
Aŋakwa Yesu da paŋdet kabɨnikon kɨŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da yo morap Kwen Kokupmon ae mɨktɨmon kɨla abeŋ dakon pi nak do yaŋ mudaŋ namgut.
Uŋun do ji mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ kɨŋ mɨŋat amɨn morapyo paŋpulugaŋba nak dakon paŋdet kabɨno dagoni. Aŋek Dat ae Monji ae Telagɨ Wup uŋun da manon telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomni.
Nak da gen dayɨŋ dolɨgɨm uŋun kɨsisi guramɨtni do yoyɨŋdetni. Nandani, nak ji gat gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ egapno mɨktɨm dakon bɨsap mudosak.”
Yesu Kristo, Piŋkop dakon Monji, uŋun dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi ɨdon da wasosok.
Kombɨ amɨn Aisaia da gen yaŋ mandagɨt: “Nandani, geno yaŋ teŋteŋosak do amɨn kɨnda yabekgo uŋun da mibɨltaŋ gamjak. Aŋek kositgo aŋnoman asak.
Mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yosok, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ dakon kosit aŋdɨmdɨm ani, kositni pasɨŋ aŋmɨlɨp ani.’ ”
Gen uŋun da tɨlagon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn Jon da mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon kɨŋ altagɨt. Altaŋek but tobɨl aŋek telagɨ pakbi soŋakwa Piŋkop da dɨwarɨni yopmaŋ yomjak do yoyɨgɨt.
Aŋakwan Judia mɨktɨmon ae Jerusalem kokup papmon egɨpgwit amɨn Jonon kɨwit. Yokwini yaŋkwok aŋakwa Jodan Pakbikon telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomgut.
Jon da ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk paŋ egɨpgut uŋun bɨt madep kɨnda mani kamel uŋun dakon daŋgwani baŋ wasaŋbi. Aŋek bɨt gɨp kɨnda bobaŋ napmɨ do wamgut. Japni uŋun pɨlak pɨlak ae kabaŋ kok.
Gen yaŋ yagɨt: “Amɨn kɨnda nak da manjikon apdɨsak. Uŋun dakon tapmɨm da nak dakon tapmɨm yapmaŋdak. Nak oman monjɨni dakon pɨŋbinisi egɨsat, do kandap gwɨlni dakon nap pabɨŋ yɨgek tagɨ dɨma wɨtdalgeŋ.
Nak pakbisi baŋ telagɨ pakbi soŋ damɨsat, mani uŋun da Telagɨ Wup soŋ damdɨsak.”
Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu Nasaret kokup Galili Provins yɨpmaŋek apgut. Apban Jon da Jodan Pakbikon telagɨ pakbi soŋ ɨmgut.
Aban pakbikon da wɨŋek wɨŋek Yesu yaŋ kagɨt: Kundu wɨtdal kɨŋakwan Telagɨ Wup kɨnarɨm da mɨktɨmon paŋ uŋun da tɨlak iyɨkon pɨgɨt.
Aŋakwan Kwen Kokupgwan da gen kɨnda yaŋ altagɨt: “Gak Monjɨno. Butdasi galak taŋ gamɨsat. Butno gak do tagɨsi asak.”
Uŋudon gɨn Wup da Yesu yabekban mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon kɨgɨt.
Kɨŋ uŋudon gɨldat 40 egakwan Sunduk da aŋkewalgɨt. Bɨt kɨlapyo da bɨkbɨgon egakwan aŋelo da aŋpulugawit.
Jon dam teban yutnon yɨpba yɨgakwan Yesu Galili Provinskon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋ Piŋkop dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek yaŋ yagɨt,
“Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Akdɨsak uŋun dakon bɨsap kwaŋ tosok. Uŋun do ji but tobɨl aŋek Gen Bin Tagɨsi uŋun do nandaŋ gadani.”
Yesu da Galili Pakbi Ɨdap kɨdɨpmɨŋ kɨŋek Saimon gat padɨge Andru gat pɨndakgɨt. Uŋun amɨn bamot tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni pakbi ɨdapmon mabal pɨgakwan egɨpgumal. Pini uŋun tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl do pi agak amɨn bamot.
Uŋun amɨn bamot pɨndagek Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Abɨŋ nak nolgɨl, aŋakwal amɨn tɨmɨt tɨmɨt dakon kosit dolɨko.”
Yaŋban uŋudon gɨn tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni yopmaŋek Yesu yolgɨmal.
Yesu da tɨmɨsok dɨ kɨŋek Jems, Sebedi dakon monji gat padɨge Jon gat pɨndakgɨt. Uŋun bamot boron yɨgek tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni bɨsawɨk paŋmɨlɨp aŋyo aŋakwal pɨndakgɨt.
Pɨndagek uŋudon gɨn yaŋ yoban nandaŋek datni Sebedi gat pi amɨni gat boron si yɨgakwa Yesu yolgɨmal.
Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Kapaneam kokupmon kɨwit. Kɨŋ altaŋek Sabat bɨsapmon Yesu da Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon wɨgek Piŋkop gen yoyɨgɨt.
Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn da tɨlagon dɨma yagɨt, amɨn mani toŋ da tɨlagon yagɨt, do amɨn da Piŋkop gen yogokni do nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
Aŋakwan uŋudon gɨn koŋni toŋ amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt,
“Yesu, Nasaret amɨn, gak nibaŋ aŋnim do nandɨsal? Nin paŋupbal ak do abɨl? Nak nandaŋ gamɨsat, gak Piŋkop Dakon Telagɨ Amɨni.”
Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da gen tebaisi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak gen dɨma yaŋek amɨn on yɨpmaŋ det!”
Yaŋban koŋ da amɨn uŋun ukwayɨgek madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yɨpmaŋ degek wɨŋ kɨgɨt.
Wɨŋ kɨŋakwan amɨn da uŋun kaŋek wurɨpdagek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Mao, uŋun ni yo kɨnda da altosok? On amɨn gen ŋwakŋwarɨsi yosok. Amɨn mani toŋ da tɨlagon yosok. Koŋ gen yoyɨŋban geni guramɨkgaŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋakwa man bini da tepmɨsi ɨreŋ taŋek Galili Provins arɨpmɨsi agɨt.
Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon da pɨŋek uŋudon gɨn Jems gat Jon gat tɨmɨkban, Saimon gat Andru gat uŋun da yutnon wɨgɨwit.
Uŋun yutnon Saimon yopmi gɨptɨmɨ kɨndapmɨ soŋakwan sot aŋek pakgɨt. Uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ
iyɨŋba Yesu kɨŋ kɨsitnikon abɨdaŋek ɨlɨkban pɨdagɨt. Yaŋ aban sotni yɨpmaŋakwan jap noni do oman agɨt.
Gɨldat pɨgakwan pɨlɨndo sot amɨn gat koŋni toŋ amɨn gat kɨsisi Yesukon paŋpaŋ apgwit.
Aŋek kokup amɨn kɨsi morap yut uŋun da yomakon muwukgwit.
Muwugakwa Yesu da amɨn morapmɨsi sot mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ awit uŋun paŋmɨlɨp agɨt. Aŋek koŋni toŋ amɨn morapmɨ koŋni yol yomgut. Aŋek koŋ uŋun nandaŋ ɨmgwit, do yaŋsop aŋyomgut.
Wɨsa dɨma dagaŋakwan Yesu pɨlisisok pɨdaŋ yut yɨpmaŋek mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon paŋkɨ egek bɨsit pi agɨt.
Aŋakwan Saimon gat notni kabɨ gat Yesu wɨsɨŋek apgwit.
Abɨŋ aŋalon aŋek iyɨwit, “Amɨn morapmɨsi da gak wɨsaŋ.”
Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak uŋun amɨn kabɨ dogɨn dɨma pɨgɨm. Do nin kokup taŋ aŋaŋ kwaŋ uŋudon kɨŋek Piŋkop gen yoyɨkeŋ. Nak pi uŋun ak do pɨgɨm.”
Yaŋ yaŋek Galili Provinskon dukwan dukwan kɨsi agek Juda amɨn dakon muwut muwut yut morapmon Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋek koŋ yol yomɨŋek agɨpgut.
Amɨn wuda tebani toŋ kɨnda da uŋudon kɨŋek ŋwakbeŋ aŋ ɨmɨŋek bɨsit tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlek tokeŋ do nandɨsal kaŋ, tagɨ aŋmɨlɨp abɨ kɨlek tokeŋ.”
Yaŋban Yesu da uŋun do bupmɨ nandaŋek kɨsitni amɨn uŋun da kwenon wɨtjɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Kɨlek toki do nandɨsat, do pasɨl gamni!”
Yaŋ iyɨŋban uŋudon gɨn wudani kɨbɨdaŋakwa gɨptɨmni kɨlek tagɨt.
Kɨlek taŋban uŋudon gɨn Yesu da amɨn uŋun yabegek gen tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt,
“Gak uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ amɨn dɨma yoyɨki. Aŋek mukwa sogok amɨnon kɨŋek gɨptɨmgo yolɨki. Aŋek Moses da yagɨt uŋun da tɨlagon paret aŋaki amɨn da asi kɨlek tal yaŋ gandani.”
Yaŋ yaŋban yum kaŋek kɨŋ gen bin yaŋ aŋɨreŋ agɨt. Uŋun do aŋek Yesu kokup papmon noman kɨsak do nandaban tɨdok tagɨt. Kokup ɨleŋɨ ɨleŋɨkon gɨn agakwan amɨn morap dukwan dukwan egɨpgwit Yesukon apgwit.
Yesu gɨldat dɨ egɨ aeni Kapaneam kokupmon kɨŋek yutnikon wɨgakwan kokup amɨn da abapni dakon gen nandawit.
Nandaŋek morapmɨsi da yutnon muwuk tugaŋek dɨwarɨ yomakon yɨk tugaŋba Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨgɨt.
Yoyɨŋakwan amɨn kabɨ kɨnda apgwiron da amɨn 4 kabɨ da amɨn kɨsirɨ kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi kɨnda wamaŋ uŋudon aŋapgwit.
Aŋek yutnon awɨgɨ Yesu da buron yɨpdo aŋek amɨnon kwa tɨdaŋba yut kwenon awɨgɨwit. Awɨgek Yesu da si yɨkgɨt da kwenon yut tuwɨlba kosit pɨsaŋakwan uŋudon da amɨn uŋun wayɨgon pagakwan nap aŋyawot aŋakwa pɨgɨgɨt.
Yaŋ aŋakwa Yesu da nandaŋ gadatni kaŋek amɨn kɨsirɨ kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Monjɨ, dɨwarɨgo yopmaŋ gamɨsat.”
Yaŋ yaŋban gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn dɨwarɨ uŋudon yɨkgwit uŋun da burɨ da yaŋ nandawit,
“Ma, amɨn on ni gen naŋ yosok? On Piŋkop kulabɨsak on! Namɨn amɨn da dɨwarɨ wɨrɨrɨt pi asak? Uŋun pi Piŋkop dagɨn agagɨ!”
Yaŋ nandaŋakwa Yesu uŋun burɨkon da pɨndak nandaŋ yomɨŋ mudaŋek yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nido butjikon da nandak nandak uŋun nandaŋ namaŋ?
Jit da tagapmɨ, amɨn kɨsirɨ kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi yaŋ iyɨkdo, ‘Dɨwarɨgo wɨrɨrɨk gamɨsat’, bo uŋudeŋ iyɨkdo, ‘Pɨdaŋ yalɨŋ potgo tɨmɨgek pɨlɨk bamok aki’?
Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun mɨktɨmon dɨwarɨ wɨrɨrɨt dakon pi asak do yaŋ mudaŋ ɨbi yaŋ nandaba pɨsosak do on amɨn aŋmɨlɨp abeŋ.” Yaŋ yaŋek amɨn kɨsirɨ kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi yaŋ iyɨgɨt,
“Nak gayɨsat, pɨdaŋ yalɨŋ potgo tɨmɨgek yutgokon kɨ.”
Yaŋban uŋudon gɨn amɨn morapmɨ da dabɨlon yalɨŋ potni tɨmɨgek abɨgɨgɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan amɨn kawit uŋun da tamtam yaŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yawit, “Yo kalugɨsi altaŋban komaŋ!”
Yesu yaŋ aŋek aeni pakbi ɨdap ɨleŋɨkon pɨgɨgɨt. Pɨgakwan amɨn morapmɨ yol aŋaŋ uŋudon kwa Piŋkop gen yoyɨgɨt.
Aŋek uŋudon da kɨŋek Liwai, Alpius dakon monji, takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt yutnikon yɨgakwan kagɨt. Kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Abɨŋ nak nol.” Yaŋban Liwai pɨdaŋek Yesu yolgɨt.
Aŋakwan Yesu Liwai da yutnon kwan yɨgek jap nawit. Moneŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn ae yokwi pakpak amɨn morapmɨ Yesu gat paŋdetni gat jap nawit. (Uŋuden amɨn morapmɨsi da Yesu yolgwit.)
Uŋudon Parisi amɨn dɨwarɨ yɨkgwit uŋun gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn. Uŋun da Yesu moneŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn gat ae yokwi pakpak amɨn gat kɨsi yɨgek jap naŋba kaŋek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Ma, uŋun nido takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn gat ae yokwi pakpak amɨn gat kɨsi yɨgek jap noŋ? Uŋun tagɨ dɨma.”
Yaŋba Yesu da nandaŋek yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn sotni mɨni uŋun wuda wamagon dɨma kwaŋ. Amɨn sotni toŋ uŋun dagɨn wuda wamagon kwaŋ. Nak amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ ɨlɨt do dɨma opgum, yokwi pakpak yaŋ ɨlɨt do opgum.”
Jon dakon paŋdetni gat ae Parisi amɨn gat uŋun bɨsapmon Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek egɨpgwit. Aŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ uŋun Yesukon kɨŋek yaŋ iyɨwit: “Jon dakon paŋdetni gat ae Parisi amɨn dakon paŋdetni gat uŋun Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek egakwa gak dakon paŋdetgoni nido jap naŋek ekwaŋ?”
Iyɨŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Monjɨsok mɨŋat pak do aŋ uŋun bɨsapmon notni gat jap kelek tagɨ egɨpni? Dɨma. Monjɨsok egakwan jap kelek arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ.
Mani don monjɨ uŋun abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ kɨŋakwa notni uŋun bɨsapmon jap kelek ekwaŋ.
“Nin ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk garaŋɨ pudaŋkwikon ɨmal dɨwat kalugɨ pakbikon dɨma sugaŋbi kɨnda naŋ bupnom kaŋ, pakbikon sugono ɨmal dɨwat uŋun da garaŋɨ ɨlɨkban pudaŋ kɨ madepsi akdɨsak.
Ae amɨn kɨnda da wain kalugɨ tɨbɨrɨ meme gɨp baŋ wasaŋbi tɨbɨrɨ kalɨpmɨkon kolesak kaŋ uŋun tagɨ dɨma. Yaŋ asak kaŋ, wain da pukwa paptaŋ meme gɨp kɨrɨŋɨgakwa wain maŋ mudokdaŋ. Amɨn da wain kalugɨ meme gɨp kalugɨkon koleŋba wain gat meme gɨp gat kɨsi tagɨ tomal.”
Sabat kɨndakon Yesu gat paŋdetni gat uŋun wit pi kaga kɨndakon kɨwit. Kɨŋek paŋdetni da wit bamɨ dɨwarɨ jɨmɨk dagawit.
Aŋakwa Parisi amɨn da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Pɨndat, amɨn Sabat bɨsapmon nido gen teban yapmaŋek pi aŋ?”
Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Dewit ae amɨn kabɨni jap do aŋek yo awit uŋun ji manjɨŋ nandaŋyo awit bo dɨma?
Uŋun Abiata da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn egɨpgut bɨsapmon yaŋ awit. Piŋkop da yutnon wɨgek bret Piŋkop do parekbi uŋun tɨmɨk naŋek amɨn kabɨni kɨsi do yoban nawit. Bret uŋun amɨn ɨsalɨ da dɨma nok nogɨ, mukwa sogok amɨn dagɨn tagɨ nawit.”
Yaŋ yaŋek yagɨt, “Sabat bɨsap uŋun do nandaba yo madep aŋakwan amɨn kɨrɨŋɨk yomaŋ uŋun da tagɨ dɨma asak. Sabat bɨsap uŋun amɨn paŋpulugok do aŋek yɨpbi.
Yaŋdo, Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun Sabat bɨsap uŋun dakon Amɨn Tagɨni egɨsak.”
Yesu aeni bɨsap kɨnda gat Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon wɨgek amɨn kɨnda kɨsirɨ gɨreŋɨkbi kɨnda yɨkban kagɨt.
Uŋun da Sabat bɨsapmon amɨn paŋmɨlɨp aban kaŋek gen pikon yɨpneŋ yaŋon da amɨn dɨwarɨ Yesu tebai kaŋek yɨkgwit.
Aŋakwa Yesu da amɨn kɨsirɨ gɨreŋɨkbi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn da ɨŋamon pɨdaŋ at.”
Pɨdaŋ agakwan mɨŋat amɨnyo yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Sabat bɨsap dakon gen teban da yokwi aneŋ do yosok? Bo tagɨ aneŋ do yosok? Amɨn paŋmɨlɨp aneŋ do yosok, bo dapba kɨmotni do yosok?” Yaŋban gen tamoni dɨma iyɨwit.
Yaŋ aŋakwa but tebani do butjap nandagɨt. Aŋek butni yokwi taŋban kobok tobɨl tobɨl aŋek pɨndagek amɨn kɨsirɨ gɨreŋɨkbi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Kɨsitgo aŋnɨŋnɨŋ a.” Yaŋban amɨn uŋun kɨsirɨ aŋnɨŋnɨŋ aban kɨlek tagɨt.
Aŋakwan uŋudon gɨn Parisi amɨn kɨŋek Erot dakon amɨn kabɨ uŋun gat muwugek “Niaŋ aŋek aŋatneŋ?” yaŋ do gen paŋkosit awit.
Yaŋ aŋakwa Yesu da paŋdetni tɨmɨkban pakbi ɨdapmon kɨwit. Kɨŋakwa Galili amɨn morapmɨsi da yolgwit. Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, Judia mɨktɨmon da,
ae Jerusalem kokup papmon da, ae Idumea mɨktɨmon da, ae Jodan Pakbi usugap tet amɨn, ae Tair ae Saidon kokup tetgɨn do amɨn morapmɨ da Yesu dakon wasok agakni dakon gen bin nandaŋek apgwit.
Amɨn madepsi apgwit do Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn morapmɨsi do gɨtni gɨtni aba kaŋ bot kɨnda aŋnoman aba nak uŋudon mɨlkaŋ wɨgɨkeŋ.”
Yesu da sot wudani toŋ morapmɨ paŋmɨlɨp agɨt, uŋun do aŋek sot wudani toŋ amɨn Yesu ɨgayɨk do aŋek ukwayɨt ukwayɨt aŋek Yesu da buron kɨwit.
Kɨŋakwa koŋ uŋun Yesu kaŋek mɨktɨmon gawagek madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Gak Piŋkop dakon Monji.”
Mani Yesu da mibɨlni dɨma yaŋ teŋteŋoni do yaŋsop tebaisi aŋyomgut.
Kɨlɨ Yesu pakbi ɨdap yɨpmaŋek ɨleŋ kɨndakon wɨgɨgɨt. Wɨgek yabekbini dagoni do nandagɨt amɨn yoyɨŋban iyɨkon abɨŋ muwukgwit.
Amɨn 12 uŋun gat egɨpni do yabekbi kabɨni tɨmɨkgɨt. Aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji yabekgo kɨŋ Piŋkop gen amɨn yoyɨni, ae koŋ yolni do yaŋ mudaŋ dabo koŋ yolni.”
<range>
Yabekbini 12 uŋun dakon mani yaŋ: Saimon (mani kalugɨ Pita yaŋ iyɨgɨt),
ae Jems, Sebedi dakon monji, ae Jems dakon padɨge Jon (uŋun bamot mani Boanages yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ Kɨrɨrɨŋ Amɨn),
ae Andru, Pilip, Batolomiu, Matyu, Tomas, Jems Alpius dakon monji, Tadius, Saimon Selot,
ae Judas Iskariot (uŋun egɨ don Yesu uwalni da kɨsiron yɨpgut).
Aŋek Yesu yutnon wɨgakwan amɨn kabɨ madepsi aeni uŋudon muwukgwit. Muwugakwa Yesu gat paŋdetni gat jap noni dakon bɨkbɨk dɨma pɨsaŋ yomgut.
Aŋek dabɨni uŋun bini nandaŋek “Burɨ upbal tak” yaŋ yaŋek yutnikon iyɨŋ aŋaŋ kɨk do apgwit.
Aŋakwa gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn Jerusalem kokup papmon da apgwit uŋun da Yesu do yaŋ yawit, “Koŋ dakon amɨn tagɨni Belsebul uŋun da burɨgwan egakwan uŋun dakon tapmɨmon da koŋ yoldak.”
Yaŋba Yesu da paŋmuwugek tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt: “Sunduk da Sunduk notni arɨpmɨ dɨma yolyolɨ.
Mɨktɨm kɨnda dakon amɨn da pudaŋ kabɨ bamorɨ aŋek emat wamjil kaŋ, uŋun mɨktɨm tebai dɨma tokdɨsak.
Ae amɨn yurɨ kɨnda dakon amɨn da pudaŋ kɨ kabɨ bamot aŋek emat wamjil kaŋ, uŋun amɨn yut tebai dɨma egɨpdaŋ.
Uŋudeŋ gɨn Sunduk da pudaŋ kɨ kabi bamot aŋek iyɨ emat wamjil kaŋ, amɨn kabɨni tebai dɨma egɨpdaŋ. Yaŋ ani kaŋ pasɨl mudokdaŋ.
“Bo namɨn dasi amɨn tebai kɨnda yɨgakwan yutnikon wɨgɨ yo kabɨni gwayeŋ tɨmɨtjak? Uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma. Mibɨltok tebai kendagek kɨsit kandapmɨyo wamaŋek yo kabɨni tagɨ gwayeni.
“Nak asisi dayɨsat, Piŋkop da yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ gat ae Piŋkop abɨŋ yɨp do manji gen yogok gat dakon dɨwarɨ tagɨ wɨrɨrɨtjak.
Mani amɨn kɨnda da Telagɨ Wup abɨŋ yɨp do manji gen kɨnda yosak kaŋ, Piŋkop da dɨwarɨni dɨma wɨrɨrɨtjak. Uŋun dɨmasisi, uŋun dɨwarɨni mudok mudogɨ mɨni taŋ wɨgɨkdɨsak.”
Amɨn da Yesu burɨkon koŋ kɨnda egɨsak yaŋ yawit uŋun do aŋek gen uŋun yagɨt.
Gen yaŋ yoyɨŋakwan meŋi padɨk padɨkni da abɨŋ yomakon agek Yesu yomakon pɨsak do gen yɨpba wɨgɨgɨt.
Wɨkwan amɨn Yesu gat yɨkgwit uŋun da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Meŋgo padɨk padɨkgo yomakon da gak do yoŋ.”
Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Meŋno padɨk padɨkno uŋun namɨn?”
Yaŋ yaŋek amɨn aŋgwasɨŋek yɨkgwit kabɨkon dabɨl sɨŋtaŋek yagɨt, “Nak dakon meŋno ae padɨk padɨkno oni.
Piŋkop dakon gen guramɨkgaŋ amɨn uŋun nak dakon meŋno ae padɨk padɨkno ae samɨno kabɨ.”
Bɨsap kɨndakon pakbi ɨdap ɨleŋɨkon mɨŋat amɨnyo aeni yoyɨŋ dekgɨt. Amɨn madepsi da abɨŋ uŋudon muwugakwa Yesu boron wɨgɨgɨt. Boron yɨgakwan amɨn morap ɨleŋɨkon yɨkgwit.
Yɨgakwa Yesu da tɨlak gen morapmɨ yoyɨŋek kɨnda yaŋ yagɨt,
“Nandani! Amɨn kɨnda da jap yet tɨŋtɨŋok do pigaga kɨgɨt.
Jap yet tɨŋtɨŋaŋakwan dɨwarɨ da kosiron maŋba mɨnam da abɨŋ nawit.
Yerɨ dɨwarɨ da mɨktɨm tɨpmɨ toŋ tɨmon mawit. Uŋun kwenjok tawit, do tepmɨ kwawit, mani tɨp kwenon mɨktɨm morapmɨ dɨma, do gelɨ tagɨ dɨma yopba kɨwit. Do gɨldat da wɨŋ pɨndakban alek tawit.
<range>
Ae jap yet dɨwarɨ da joŋ kelɨ toŋ tɨmgwan mawit. Uŋun joŋ kelɨ toŋ gat kɨsi kwaŋek wutjɨŋba kɨmak mudawit.
Ae jap yet dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm nelagɨ toŋ uŋudon maŋ kwawit. Dɨwarɨ bamɨ 100, ae dɨwarɨ bamɨ 60, ae dɨwarɨ bamɨ 30 tawit.”
Gen uŋun yaŋek aeni saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Gen on nandak do galak toŋ amɨn ji pakyaŋsi nandaŋek mibɨlɨ nandaŋ pɨsoni.”
Amɨn kabɨ madep kɨŋakwa iyɨ dakon paŋdetni 12 kabɨ gat ae amɨn dɨwarɨ gat da tɨlak gen dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do iyɨwit.
Iyɨŋba yagɨt, “Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni dakon gen pasɨlɨ uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ ji baŋ dayɨŋ teŋteŋosot. Mani Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek waŋga ekwaŋ amɨn tɨlak gen gɨn nandaŋ.
‘Uŋun dabɨl da yo asat uŋun pɨndakgaŋ mani mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaŋ, ae geno nandaŋ, mani mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaŋ pɨsoŋ. Do Piŋkop da dɨwarɨni wɨrɨrɨk yomjak do but tobɨl ak do dɨma nandaŋ.’ ”
Yaŋ yaŋek yagɨt, “Tɨlak gen yat dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaŋ kaŋ, tɨlak gen dɨwarɨ yoko niaŋ aŋek nandaŋ pɨsoni?
Amɨn jap yet tɨŋtɨŋosok uŋun Piŋkop gen tɨŋtɨŋosok.
Amɨn Piŋkop gen nandaŋek butni dɨma pɨsoŋ uŋun jap yet kosiron mawit uŋuden. Sunduk da abɨŋ gen tagɨ butnikon toŋ uŋun gwayeŋ paŋkɨsak.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm tɨpmɨ toŋ tɨm yombem, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop gen nandaŋek but galagon da abɨdoŋ.
Mani butnikon gelɨ tagɨ dɨma yɨpban kɨgɨt do bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok akgaŋ. Jɨgɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ ae Piŋkop dakon gen dakon uwal apni bɨsapmon nandaŋ gadatni yopba wɨtdal kɨkdaŋ.
Ae amɨn dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm nap kelɨ toŋ tɨm yombem. Uŋun Piŋkop gen nandaŋ,
mani nandak nandakni mɨktɨm dakon yo morap do nandaŋ, ae moneŋ paŋmuwut dakon galaktok da Piŋkop gen wɨtjɨŋba bamɨ dɨma tosok.
Ae amɨn dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm nelagɨ toŋ tɨm yombem, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop gen nandaŋek abɨdoŋ. Uŋun amɨn bamɨ 100, ae kɨnda bamɨ 60, ae kɨnda bamɨ 30, yaŋ taŋ taŋ aŋ.”
Gen kɨnda saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Namɨn da lam koleŋek kwoba naŋ gap asak, bo pɨgat kagagwan yɨpjak? Dɨmasi, tamonikon yɨpno teŋteŋosok.
Yo pasɨlɨ toŋ ae yo wɨtjɨŋbi da toŋ uŋun kɨsi teŋteŋɨkon tokdaŋ.
Gen on nandak do galak toŋ amɨn ji pakyaŋsi nandaŋek mibɨlɨ nandaŋ pɨsoni.”
Yaŋ yaŋek yagɨt, “Ji gen uŋun nandaŋ uŋun pakyaŋsi nandani. Ji Piŋkop dakon gen nandaŋek guramɨtni kaŋ, Piŋkop da saŋbeŋek damdɨsak. Mani geni dɨma nandani kaŋ, saŋbeŋek dɨma damdɨsak.
Nak dakon gen nandaŋek burɨkon yɨpmaŋdak uŋun amɨn Piŋkop da saŋbeŋek nandak nandak ɨmdɨsak. Mani geno nandaŋek burɨkon dɨma yɨpmaŋdak uŋun amɨn geno dɨwarɨ nandagɨt uŋun pasɨl ɨmdaŋ.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandani do tɨlak gen kɨnda gat dayɨko nandani. Amɨn kɨnda jap yet pigaga tɨŋtɨŋosok.
Kalbi dɨpmɨn pokdok ae gɨldat kalba waŋga waŋga agakwan jap yet kwoŋ. Mani niaŋsi aŋek kwoŋ uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandɨsak.
Mɨktɨm da iyɨ upmagakwan gɨgɨ wɨŋ tamɨ yopmaŋek bamɨ toŋ.
Bamɨ taŋakwa pi ami da bamɨ pasak.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ yo nikon tɨlak ako nandani?
Uŋun mastat yet yombem. Mastat dakon yerɨ uŋun jap yet kɨsi morap dakon pɨŋbi, monɨŋɨsisok.
Mani mɨktɨmon kwaotno madepsi kwosok. Jap dɨwarɨ dakon tagok tagokni uŋun yapmaŋ mudosok. Kɨlɨŋɨ madep yopban kɨŋakwa mɨnam morapmɨ da paŋabɨŋ uŋun da yoŋgamgwan yɨkgaŋ.”
Yesu da nandak nandakni da arɨpmon Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋek tɨlak gen uŋuden morapmɨ yoyɨgɨt.
Amɨn madep kabɨkon Piŋkop gen tɨlak genon dagɨn yoyɨgɨt. Mani paŋdetni gat egek tɨlak gen dakon mibɨlɨ yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨt.
Uŋun gɨldat da pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo Yesu boron yɨgek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda do kɨno.”
Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdetni amɨn kabɨ madep yopmaŋ degek boron wɨkwa paŋdetni gat kɨsi kɨwit. Ae bot dɨwarɨ gat kɨsi kɨwit.
Kɨŋakwa mɨrɨm madep aŋek pakbi tamalɨgakwan boron pɨgɨwit. Pɨgɨ tugaŋban bot pakbigwan pɨgɨk do agɨt.
Aŋakwan Yesu bot buŋɨkon busuŋ kɨdɨŋ kɨndakon wɨtjɨŋek dɨpmɨn pagakwan paŋdetni da aŋyolek iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, nin pakbi naŋ kɨmotneŋ do nandabɨ yo ɨsalɨ asak?”
Yaŋ iyɨŋba Yesu da pɨdaŋ agek mɨrɨm gat ae pakbi gat tebai yoyɨŋek yagɨt, “Yawokgɨl!” Yaŋban mɨrɨm yawogakwan pakbi wayɨŋ dɨmasi agɨt.
Aŋek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nido pasolgoŋ? Sigɨn dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ namaŋ, ma?”
Yaŋban paŋdetni si pasalek iyɨ gɨn yawit, “On niaŋen amɨn kɨnda da mɨrɨm ae pakbiyo yoyɨŋban geni guramɨkgamal?”
Yesu gat paŋdetni gat pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda Gerasa amɨn da mɨktɨmon kɨwit.
Boron da pɨŋakwan, amɨn kɨnda koŋni toŋ uŋun da amɨn kɨmakba paŋkɨ tɨp kɨnamgwan yopmaŋgaŋ mɨktɨmon da abɨŋ altaŋ ɨmgut.
Amɨn uŋun amɨn da kɨsitni ae kandapmɨyo nap teban naŋ wamwamɨ dakon arɨp dɨma agɨt.
Amɨn da bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ kɨsit kandapyoni wamgwit, mani uŋun amɨn tebai do nap teban si paŋdagagɨt. Amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨdogɨ.
Uŋun pɨlɨn kaga ae gɨldat kalba amɨn kɨmakba yopmaŋgaŋ mɨktɨmon ae kabapmon egek madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek gɨptɨmɨ tɨpbaŋ mandagɨt.
Yesu dubagɨkon akban kaŋek tɨmtɨm yaŋek Yesu da buron kɨŋ gawak ɨmgut.
Aŋek yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yesu, Piŋkop Wɨkwisi dakon Monji, gak niaŋsi aŋnam do abɨsal? Piŋkop da manon tepmɨ pi dɨma nabi do yaŋ teban ta.”
Uŋun da yaŋ yagɨt, nido Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Koŋ gak on amɨn yɨpmaŋ degek wɨŋ kɨ!”
Yaŋban Yesu da aŋtobɨlek iyɨgɨt, “Mango namɨn?” Yaŋ iyɨŋban yagɨt, “Nak mano Amɨn Kabɨ Madep. Nin morapmɨ da ekwamaŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋek bɨsit tebai saŋbek saŋbek iyɨwit, “Nin nolbɨ on mɨktɨm tɨm dɨma yɨpmaŋ detneŋ.”
Mɨktɨm uŋun da ɨleŋon bɨt kabɨ madep jap naŋek egɨpgwit.
Koŋ uŋun Yesu da nandaŋ yoban bɨt da butgwan pɨgɨni do bɨsit tebai iyɨwit.
Yaŋba Yesu da nandaŋ yoban koŋ da amɨnon da wɨŋek bɨt da butgwan pɨgɨwit. Pɨgakwa bɨt uŋun pasal abɨgɨŋek pakbi ɨdap tagɨt uŋungwan pɨgek kɨmakgwit. Bɨt kaloŋɨsok dɨma, 2 tausen da kɨmakgwit.
Kɨmagakwa bɨt dakon kɨla amɨn da kokup kapmat tagɨt ae mɨktɨm dɨwarɨkon kɨŋ yo uŋun noman tawit dakon gen bin yoyɨwit. Yoyɨŋba amɨn da yo noman tagɨt uŋun kok do aŋek abɨŋ mudawit.
Yesukon abɨŋek amɨn koŋni morapmɨ gat egɨpgut uŋun burɨ pɨsagɨt ae ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkni toŋ da yɨkban kawit. Yaŋ yɨkban kaŋ pasalgwit.
Yo dabɨl da kaŋ nandaŋyo awit amɨn uŋun da koŋ gat egɨpgut amɨn gat ae bɨt kabɨ dakon gen bin gat kɨsi amɨn yoyɨŋ mudawit.
Gen uŋun nandaŋ mudaŋek Yesu mɨktɨm uŋun yɨpmaŋ kɨsak do tebai iyɨwit.
Iyɨŋba nandaŋek Yesu uŋun boron wɨgakwan amɨn koŋ gat egɨpgut uŋun da Yesu yol do bɨsit tebai iyɨgɨt.
Tebaisi iyɨŋban kɨrɨŋɨk ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak yutgokon kɨŋ Amɨn Tagɨ da gak do bupmɨ nandaŋek wasok madep ak uŋun dakon gen bin yawi dɨwat kabɨgo yoyɨŋ mudoki.”
Yaŋban amɨn uŋun kɨŋ Yesu da yo agɨt uŋun dakon gen bin Dekapolis mɨktɨm uŋudon amɨn yoyɨŋban nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
Yesu uŋun boron wɨgek pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda do wɨgakwan amɨn morapmɨsi abɨŋ muwukgwit.
Muwugakwa Juda amɨn dakon muwut muwut yut dakon kɨla amɨn kɨnda mani Jairus, uŋun da abɨŋ Yesu kaŋek burɨkon kɨŋek gawak ɨmgut.
Aŋek si aŋpulugosak do madepsi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gwano kɨmotdɨsak, do abɨŋek kɨsitgo da wɨtjɨŋbɨ kɨlek taŋek egɨpjak.”
Iyɨŋban nandaŋek Yesu gat kɨgɨmal. Kɨŋakwal amɨn morapmɨ da yolek gadat gadat tebaisi awit.
Aŋakwa binapnikon mɨŋat kɨnda akgɨt, uŋun dagaŋ mok aŋek yawini maŋakwa egakwan bɨlak 12 agɨt.
Aŋakwan wuda wamak morapmɨ da aŋpulugok do pi aŋtɨdok aŋakwa tepmɨ madepsi nandaŋek egɨpgut. Wuda wamak yumaŋ nok do aŋek moneŋni kɨsi yomɨŋ mudagɨt. Aban sotni dɨma tagap tagɨt, si madep tagɨt.
Aban mɨŋat uŋun da Yesu dakon bin nandaŋek, mɨŋat amɨn dɨwarɨ uŋun da bɨkbɨgon egek manjikon kɨŋek ɨlɨkba pɨgɨknikon ɨgayɨgɨt.
Ɨgayɨŋek yaŋ nandagɨt, “Ɨlɨkba pɨgɨknikon ɨgayɨkeŋ kaŋ, kɨlek tokeŋ.”
Yaŋ nandaŋek ɨgayɨŋban uŋudon gɨn yawini jɨptaŋban gɨptɨmɨ kɨlek taŋban nandagɨt.
Aban Yesu uŋun tapmɨmni abɨkwa nandaŋek tobɨlek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkno namɨn da ɨgayɨsak?”
Yaŋban paŋdetni da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Amɨn da gadat gadat tebaisi aŋakwa namɨn da ɨgayɨŋ namɨsak yaŋ nido yosol?”
Mani Yesu uŋun amɨn ɨgayɨŋ ɨmgut uŋun kok do sigɨn wɨsɨgɨt.
Mɨŋat uŋun gɨptɨmɨkon wasok noman tagɨt uŋun nandaŋek burɨ sugaŋban nɨmnɨmɨgek Yesu da buron gawak ɨmɨŋek mibɨlni yaŋ teŋteŋagɨt.
Mibɨlni yaŋ teŋteŋaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gwano, nandaŋ gadatgo da gak aŋkɨlek ak. Uŋun do butgo yaworɨ taŋakwan kɨki. Sotgo kɨlɨ pasɨlak.”
Yesu gen yaŋ iyɨŋakwan, muwut muwut yutni dakon kɨla amɨn Jairus da yutnon da amɨn dɨwarɨ da abɨŋ Jairus yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gwago kɨlɨ kuŋwak, uŋun do nido yoyɨŋdet ɨsal dogɨn jɨgɨ ɨmɨsal?”
Yaŋba Yesu da gen uŋun nandagɨt, mani dɨma nandabi wup agɨt. Aŋek kɨla amɨn yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Dɨma pasolgi. Ɨsal nandaŋ gadat aki.”
Yaŋ yaŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo dɨwarɨ yopmaŋek, Pita, Jems ae padɨge Jon uŋun baŋgɨn tɨmɨkban kɨwit.
Kɨŋ kɨla amɨn da yomakon altaŋek amɨn da upbalap madep ae gen kunamyo aŋakwa pɨndak nandaŋyo agɨt.
Aŋek yutnon wɨgek amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nido kunam kugɨyo madepsi aŋ? Mɨŋatjok uŋun dɨma kuŋwak, uŋun ɨsal dɨpmɨn pokdok.”
Yesu da yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek jɨkgo yanjaŋ ɨmgwit. Yaŋ aba yoyɨŋban yomakon pɨgɨ mudaŋakwa, mɨŋatjok dakon meŋi datniyo ae paŋdetni tɨmɨkban mɨŋatjok pakgɨron wɨgɨwit.
Wɨgɨ mɨŋatjok kɨsirɨkon abɨdaŋek iyɨgɨt, “Talita kum!” (Uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ, “Mɨŋatjok pɨdoki do gayɨsat!”)
Yaŋban uŋudon gɨn mɨŋatjok pɨdaŋek kɨŋ ap aban kaŋek yaŋ kɨmakgwit. (Mɨŋatjok bɨlakni 12 kabɨ.)
Aŋakwa Yesu da amɨn dɨma yoyɨni do yaŋsop tebaisi aŋyomgut. Aŋek mɨŋatjok jap ɨmɨŋba nosak do yoyɨgɨt.
Aŋakwa Yesu uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋek, kokupnikon kɨŋakwan paŋdetni yolgwit.
Paŋkɨ egek Sabat bɨsapmon Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon wɨgɨ Piŋkop gen yoyɨgɨt. Aŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ Piŋkop dakon gen nandaŋek yɨkgwit amɨn uŋun tamtam yaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Yo uŋun dukon tɨmɨkgɨt? Nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi gat ae wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ agak uŋun namɨnon tɨmɨkgɨt?
Uŋun kɨsit kɨlda kɨnda, Maria dakon monji. Padɨk padɨkni uŋun Jems, Josep, Judas ae Saimon. Ae samɨni binapninon ekwaŋ.” Yaŋ yaŋek ɨŋtaŋ ɨmɨŋek nandaba pɨŋban ɨmgwit.
Yaŋ nandaŋek egakwa Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kombɨ amɨn kɨnda man bini mɨktɨm dɨwarɨkon toŋ, mani iyɨ da kokupmon yawi dɨwatni gat ae yutnikon amɨn gat da mani dɨma aŋenokgoŋ.”
Uŋudon wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ ak do aŋtɨdok agɨt. Uŋun yum amɨn sotni toŋ kaloŋɨsok dɨ baŋ kɨsitni kwenikon wɨtjɨŋek paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Aŋek nandaŋ gadatni mɨni do, uŋun do nandaban ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt. Yaŋ nandaŋek kokup taŋ aŋaŋ kɨwit uŋudon kɨŋ Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
Yesu paŋdetni 12 kabɨ yaŋ yoban opba, bamot bamot Piŋkop dakon gen yoni do yabekgɨt. Yabegek koŋ yolni do yaŋ mudaŋ yomɨŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
“Ji yo dɨwarɨ dɨ dɨma paŋek kɨni, wɨn kɨrɨŋ baŋgɨn pabɨdaŋek kɨni. Jap bo yɨk bo moneŋyo dɨma paŋek kɨni.
Kandap gwɨl paŋek agɨpni, aŋek paba pɨgɨk kaloŋɨ gɨn ɨlɨkba pɨgɨsak.
Kokup kɨndakon kɨŋ yut kɨndakon gɨn yɨgek pɨŋ kɨni.
Kokup kɨndakon kɨŋ altaŋba not dɨma aŋdamɨŋek genji dɨma nandaŋek manji damni kaŋ, kandapjikon kɨmbabaŋ toŋ uŋun kokup yɨp do aŋek tɨdaŋba kɨni. Yaŋ aŋakwa uŋun kokup amɨn da ‘Geni dɨma nandamaŋ, uŋun do aŋ’ yaŋ nandani.”
Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdetni da kɨŋek amɨn but tobɨl ani do yoyɨwit.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋek koŋ morapmɨ yol yomɨŋek sot amɨn morapmɨ bɨt nelak soŋ yoba kɨlek tawit.
Yesu dakon man bin ɨreŋ taŋban kɨla amɨn madep Erot uŋun kɨsi da nandagɨt. Amɨn dɨwarɨ da Yesu do yaŋ yawit, “Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn uŋun kɨmoron da pɨdagɨt, aŋek wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ agak dakon tapmɨm taŋ ɨmɨsak” yaŋ yawit.
Yaŋ yaŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Uŋun Elaija.” Ae dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Uŋun kombɨ amɨn kɨnda, kombɨ amɨn kalɨp egɨpgwit uŋuden amɨn kɨnda.”
Mani Erot uŋun nandaŋek yagɨt, “Kalɨp nak da Jon dakon tegɨ mandaŋ dagagɨm, uŋun amɨn dasi kɨmoron da pɨdagɨt.”
Kalɨp Erot da padɨge Pilip dakon mɨŋatni Erodias tuwɨl pagɨt. Aban Jon da Erot yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak gen teban yapmaŋek padɨgɨgo dakon mɨŋatni tuwɨl pal. Uŋun tagɨ dɨma.” Gen uŋun nandaŋek Erot da obip amɨni yabekban kɨŋ Jon abɨdaŋek nap teban naŋ wamaŋ dam tebanon yɨpgwit.
<range>
Jon da gen yaŋ yaŋban Erodias da Jon do nandaban yokwi taŋban aŋakba kɨmotjak do si nandagɨt. Mani arɨpmɨ dɨma,
nido Erot da Jon do pasalek yaŋ nandagɨt, “Jon uŋun amɨn kɨlegɨ ae telagɨsi.” Yaŋ nandaŋek si aŋkutnagɨt. Erot da Jon dakon gen nandaŋek but morap agɨt, mani geni nandak do galak tagɨt.
Buŋon Erodias da Jon aŋakba kɨmotjak uŋun dakon kosit kagɨt. Altok altok bɨsapnikon Erot da jap noknok ak do amɨn madep paŋmuwukgɨt. Gapman dakon pi amɨn madep ae emat amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨni ae Galili mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn kɨsi paŋmuwukgɨt.
Jap naŋ yɨgakwa Erodias dakon gwi da paŋabɨŋ ɨŋamnikon kap agɨt. Aban Erot ae amɨn jap nawit uŋun kɨsi da kaŋ galak tawit. Kaŋ galak taŋ Erot da mɨŋat gɨmoŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ni yo do galak tosol uŋun nayɨŋbɨ tagɨ gabeŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋek yaŋ teban tok gen kɨnda yaŋ yagɨt, “Yo nido nayɨki, tagɨ gabeŋ. Mɨktɨmno terɨ kɨnda pɨdaŋ gak do tagɨ gabeŋ.”
Yaŋban mɨŋat gɨmoŋ uŋun da waŋga kɨŋ meŋi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ni yo naŋ namjak do iyɨkeŋ?” Yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Kɨŋ Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn uŋun dakon busuŋɨ uŋun do iyɨki.”
Meŋi yaŋ yaŋban mɨŋat gɨmoŋ uŋun tepmɨ wɨgek Erot yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn dakon busuŋɨ abɨsok gɨn ɨdapmon yɨpmaŋ nabi.”
Gen yaŋ yaŋban Erot burɨ wagɨl yokwi tagɨt. Mani amɨn jap nawit uŋun da ɨŋamon yaŋ teban tok gen yagɨt uŋun kɨrɨŋɨt do mayak taŋek gen yagɨt uŋun dɨma kɨrɨŋɨkgɨt.
Uŋudon gɨn emat amɨn kɨnda Jon dakon busuŋɨ aŋopjak do yabekgɨt. Yabekban uŋun da kɨŋ dam teban yutnon wɨgɨ Jon dakon tegɨ mandaŋ dagagɨt.
Mandaŋ dagaŋ ɨdapmon yɨpmaŋ aŋabɨŋ mɨŋatjok uŋun do ɨban aŋkɨ meŋi do ɨmgut.
Aŋakwan Jon dakon paŋdetni gen bini nandaŋek kɨŋ bumjotni abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ tɨp kɨnamon yɨpgwit.
Don yabekbi kabɨ da abɨŋ Yesu aŋgwasɨŋek yo awit ae Piŋkop gen yawit uŋun dakon geni iyɨwit.
Iyɨŋ mudaŋba amɨn morapmɨsi kɨŋ abɨŋ abɨŋ aŋakwa Yesu gat yabekbi kabɨni gat jap noknok dakon bɨkbɨk dɨma pɨsaŋ yomgut. Aban Yesu da yabekbi kabɨni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Opba mɨktɨm amɨn dɨma ekwaŋ tɨmon kɨno. Uŋudon egek tapmɨm pani.”
Yaŋ yaŋek boron wɨgek mɨktɨm amɨn da dɨma ekwaŋ tɨmon kɨwit.
Mani amɨn morapmɨ da uŋudon kwaŋ yaŋ pɨndak nandaŋyo awit. Yaŋ nandaŋek kokup morapni yopmaŋ yopmaŋ aŋek amɨn morapmɨ mɨktɨm kosit tɨmtɨm yaŋek uŋun da kalɨp kɨŋ altawit.
Kɨŋ altaŋakwa Yesu boron da ɨleŋɨkon obɨŋek amɨn morapmɨsi pɨndagek sipsip kɨla amɨni mɨni yombem da egɨpgwit, do bupmɨsi nandaŋ yomgut. Yaŋ nandaŋek uŋudon gɨn wasaŋek Piŋkop gen morapmɨ yoyɨgɨt.
Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋakwan pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo paŋdetni da abɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Mɨktɨm amɨn dɨma ekwaŋon ekwamaŋ, ae gɨldat kɨlɨ pɨgɨkdɨsak,
do yoyɨŋbɨ amɨn kabɨ madep kokup monɨŋ monɨŋ ae kokup terɨ dɨŋgwan kɨŋek jap yumaŋ noni.”
Iyɨŋba yagɨt, “Disi jap yoba noni.” Yaŋban paŋdetni da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Amɨn morapmɨsi ekwaŋ, do moneŋ 200 danari baŋ jap yumneŋ kaŋ arɨpmɨ asak. Yaŋ aneŋ do yosol, ma?”
Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Disikon bret niaŋ da toŋ. Kɨŋ pɨndakgɨt.” Kɨŋ pɨndak abɨŋ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Bret kɨsit kɨnda, ae tap kɨlap bamorɨ yaŋ gɨn taŋ nimaŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨŋban paŋdetni da amɨn kɨsisi kosirɨ kosirɨ joŋ tɨmon yɨtni do yoyɨwit.
Kosirɨ kɨnda 50 ae kosirɨ kɨnda 100 yaŋ yɨk aŋaŋ kɨwit.
Yɨk mudaŋba bret kɨsit kɨnda ae tap kɨlap bamot uŋun gat tɨmɨgek Kwen Kokup sɨŋtaŋek gɨsamɨkgɨt. Gɨsamɨgek bret jokgal paŋdetni do yoban uŋun da amɨn do kokwinɨk yomgwit. Ae tap kɨlap yaŋ gɨn kokwinɨk paŋdetni do yoban uŋun da amɨn do yomgwit.
Yoba tɨmɨgek amɨn kɨsisi jap arɨpmɨsi nawit.
Naŋba arɨpmɨ aŋakwan bret dɨwat ae tap kɨlap dɨwat tawit uŋun paŋdetni da yɨk madepsi 12 kabɨ sɨmɨlba tugawit.
Amɨn jap nawit uŋun 5 tausen yaŋ da nawit.
Uŋudon gɨn Yesu da paŋdetni yoyɨŋban boron wɨgek Betsaida kokupmon mibɨl taŋ kɨŋakwa Yesu da amɨn kabɨ madep uŋun yoyɨŋban waseŋ kɨwit.
Yoyɨŋban kɨŋakwa iyɨ bɨsit pi ak do kabapmon wɨgɨgɨt.
Pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo bot pakbi ɨdap binapmon taŋakwan Yesu iyɨ gɨn tap kɨdɨpmɨŋon egɨpgut.
Egakwan mɨrɨm madep aŋakwan paŋdetni pakbi wayɨt do aŋtɨdok aŋakwa pɨndakgɨt. Yaŋ pɨndagek wɨsa wɨsa do pakbi ɨdapmon bamaŋ bamaŋ kɨŋek kɨŋ paŋdetni yap do agɨt.
Pakbi ɨdap kwenon kɨŋakwan kaŋek paŋdetni kɨsi da yaŋ nandawit, “Koŋ kɨnda da abɨsak!”
Yaŋ nandaŋek madepsi pasalek yaŋ tɨdawit. Mani uŋudon gɨn Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji teban taŋek atni. Nak naga obɨsat. Dɨma pasolni.”
Yaŋ yaŋek boron wɨgakwan mɨrɨm yawokgɨt. Yawogakwan paŋdetni da tamtamsi yawit.
Nido Yesu da mɨŋat amɨnyo do bret kokwinɨk yomgut uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandawit. But nandak nandakni dɨma pɨsaŋakwan egɨpgwit.
Pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda Genesaret mɨktɨmon wɨgek bot ɨleŋɨkon aŋteban awit.
Aŋteban aŋek bot yɨpmaŋek pɨgakwa uŋudon gɨn mɨŋat amɨnyo da Yesu kaŋ nandaŋyo awit.
Yaŋ kaŋ nandaŋyo aŋek tɨmtɨm yaŋek kokupmɨ kokupmɨ kɨŋ yoyɨŋba sotni toŋ amɨn wayɨk wamaŋek Yesu dukwan dukwan egɨpgut uŋudon paŋkɨwit.
Aŋek kokup pap bo kokup monɨŋ ae dukwan dukwan kɨgɨt amɨn da sot amɨn muwut muwut tamokon uŋudon paŋabɨŋ yopgwit. Aŋek paba pɨgɨk dɨwatnikon ɨgayɨni do bɨsit tebai iyɨwit. Yaŋ ɨgayɨwit amɨn uŋun kɨlek taŋ mudawit.
Parisi amɨn gat gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat Jerusalem kokup papmon da obɨŋ Yesu aŋgwasɨŋek muwukgwit.
Muwugek paŋdet kabɨnikon da dɨwarɨ kɨsitni dɨma sugaŋek jap ɨsal tɨmɨk naŋyo aba pɨndakgwit.
Parisi amɨn ae Juda amɨn kɨsisi babɨkni dakon gen teban yolek kɨsirɨ sugaŋek gɨn jap naŋ naŋ aŋ.
Ae maket tamokon da tobɨlek obɨŋ yaŋ gɨn kɨsirɨ sugaŋek jap noŋ. Uŋun gɨn dɨma, gen teban morapmɨ yolek kap, kwoba, ɨdapyo kɨsi sugoŋ.
Yaŋdo, Parisi amɨn ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nido paŋdetgoni uŋun babɨk dakon gen teban yapmaŋek kɨsirɨ dɨma sugaŋek jap noŋ?”
