Nason uŋun Aminadap dakon monji. Aminadap uŋun Atmin dakon monji. Atmin uŋun Ani dakon monji. Ani uŋun Esron dakon monji. Esron uŋun Peres dakon monji. Peres uŋun Juda dakon monji.
Juda uŋun Jekop dakon monji. Jekop uŋun Aisak dakon monji. Aisak uŋun Abraham dakon monji. Abraham uŋun Tera dakon monji. Tera uŋun Nao dakon monji.
Nao uŋun Seruk dakon monji. Seruk uŋun Reu dakon monji. Reu uŋun Pelek dakon monji. Pelek uŋun Ebe dakon monji. Ebe uŋun Sela dakon monji.
Sela uŋun Kainan dakon monji. Kainan uŋun Apaksat dakon monji. Apaksat uŋun Siem dakon monji. Siem uŋun Noa dakon monji. Noa uŋun Lamek dakon monji.
Lamek uŋun Metusela dakon monji. Metusela uŋun Enok dakon monji. Enok uŋun Jaret dakon monji. Jaret uŋun Malalel dakon monji. Malalel uŋun Kenan dakon monji.
Kenan uŋun Enos dakon monji. Enos uŋun Set dakon monji. Set uŋun Adam dakon monji. Adam uŋun Piŋkop dakon monji.
Yesu Telagɨ Wup da burɨkon tugaŋban Jodan Pakbikon da tobɨl apgut. Abɨŋakwan Telagɨ Wup da iyɨŋ aŋaŋ mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon aŋkɨgɨt.
Kɨŋ uŋudon gɨldat 40 japmɨ mɨni egek jap do madepsi agɨt. Aŋakwan Sunduk da aŋkewalgɨt.
Aŋkewalek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak asi Piŋkop dakon Monji egɨsalon yaŋbɨ tɨp on da bret dagaŋban.”
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: ‘Bret dagɨn amɨn egɨp egɨp tagɨ dɨma yomjak.’ ”
Yaŋ yaŋban Sunduk da Yesu iyɨŋ aŋaŋ ɨleŋ dubagɨsi kɨndakon wɨgek uŋudon gɨn on mɨktɨmon mɨktɨm madep madep morap kɨsi yolɨŋban pɨndakgɨt.
Aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “On mɨktɨm madep kɨsi kɨlani aki do yaŋ mudaŋ gabo man madep paki. On mɨktɨm madep kɨsi nak dakon, do amɨn kɨnda do ɨm do nandakeŋ kaŋ tagɨ ɨbeŋ.
Gawak nabi kaŋ, on yo morap gak do gamɨŋ mudokeŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: ‘Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkopji uŋun naŋ gɨn gawak ɨmɨŋek oman aŋɨmni.’ ”
Yaŋ yaŋban Sunduk da Yesu iyɨŋ aŋaŋ Jerusalem kokup papmon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋ Telagɨ Yut Madep da kwenon awɨgɨ yɨpmaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda yaŋ tosok: ‘Uŋun da aŋeloni yoyɨŋban kɨlago tagɨsi ani. Ae kandapgo tɨpmon dɨma gɨtni yaŋ do aŋelo da gak kɨsit da kendak abɨŋ gepni.’ Gen yaŋ tosok, do gak asi Piŋkop dakon Monji kaŋ, gak amon mibɨlɨkon paŋ ma.”
<range>
<range>
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda yaŋ yosok: ‘Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkopji dakon tapmɨm kok do aŋek dɨmasi aŋkewaldo.’ ”
Sunduk da paŋkewal morap uŋun aŋ mudaŋek ae bɨsap kɨndakon don aŋkewalgeŋ yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu yɨpmaŋ kɨgɨt.
Yesu uŋun Wup da teban togon aeni tobɨl Galili mɨktɨmon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwan mɨŋat amɨn morapyo kokup terɨ terɨ egɨpgwit uŋun da gen bini nandawit.
Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon wɨgek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan amɨn kɨsi da aŋkɨsiwit.
Yesu uŋun Nasaret kokupmon kɨgɨt. Kalɨp uŋun kokupmon egek tagaŋ teban taŋek amɨn tagɨ agɨt. Sabat bɨsapmon Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon wɨgɨ wɨgɨ agɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn Sabat kɨndakon wɨgɨgɨt. Aŋek Piŋkop dakon gen manjɨk do pɨdaŋ akgɨt.
Pɨdaŋ agakwan kombɨ amɨn Aisaia dakon papia ɨba abɨdaŋ wɨtdalek gen yaŋ naŋ manjɨgɨt:
“Amɨn Tagɨ dakon Wupni nagon tosok, nido amɨn yoni mɨnikon kɨŋek Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨkeŋ do nak manjɨŋek but nelak tagɨl namgut. Ae dam tebanon ekwaŋ amɨn pulugaŋ kɨ abɨgɨni yaŋ yoyɨkeŋ do yabekgɨt. Ae dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn tagɨ sɨŋtoni, ae amɨn da pabɨŋ yopmaŋgaŋ amɨn uŋun pulugaŋ yopbeŋ do yabekgɨt.
Amɨn Tagɨ da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni yo tagɨsi aŋyomdɨsak dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ abɨsak uŋun dakon yaŋ teŋteŋok akeŋ do yabekgɨt.”
Yesu uŋun gen manjɨŋ mudaŋek papia gɨroŋɨgek kɨla amɨn do ɨmɨŋek yɨkgɨt. Yɨgakwan uŋun muwut muwut yutnon amɨn kɨsi dabɨlni Yesukon gɨn taŋakwan yɨkgwit.
Aŋakwa Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop dakon gen manjɨko nandayɨŋ uŋun abɨsok dabɨljikon bamɨ toŋ asak.”
Yaŋban amɨn gen yagɨt do nandaba tagɨsi aŋakwan yawit, “Mao! On Josep dakon monji da niaŋonsi da gen galagɨsi on yosok?”
Yaŋba Yesu yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn da gen kɨnda yoŋ uŋun yaŋ: ‘Wuda wamak gaga dakon gɨptɨm aŋmɨlɨp a.’ Uŋun gen nak nayɨkdaŋ, ma? Ae ‘Kapaneam kokupmon wasok agɨl do amɨn da yaŋba nandagɨmaŋ uŋun yomaninon yaŋ gɨn abi do nandamaŋ’ yaŋ nayɨkdaŋ, ma?
Nak asisi dayɨsat, kombɨ amɨn morap kokup kaloŋni da geni dɨma nandaŋ yomaŋ.
Asisi, kombɨ amɨn Elaija da bɨsapmon sɨkak dɨma maŋakwan bɨlak kapbɨ ae kanek 6 yaŋ egek jap do madepsi awit. Uŋun bɨsapmon Israel mɨktɨmon sakwabat morapmɨ egɨpgwit.
Mani Piŋkop da Elaija Israel sakwabat kɨnda do dɨma yabekgɨt. Sakwabat kɨnda Sarepat kokupmon egɨpgut uŋun do yabekban kɨgɨt. Sarepat uŋun Saidon kokup da tetgɨn do tosok.
Ae kombɨ amɨn Elisa da bɨsapmon Israel mɨktɨmon wuda tebani toŋ amɨn morapmɨ egɨpgwit, mani kɨnda dɨma kɨlek tagɨt. Siria mɨktɨmon nani amɨn kɨnda mani Neman uŋun dagɨn kɨlek tagɨt.”
Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn muwut muwut yutnon egɨpgwit kɨsi da japmɨsi nandaŋek
pɨdaŋ Yesu yolba kokup da waŋga pɨgɨgɨt. Kokup uŋun ɨleŋon tagɨt, do tɨpdomon maba pɨgɨsak do aŋkɨwit.
Mani amɨn da bɨkbɨgon da si kɨgɨt.
Yesu Nasaret kokup yɨpmaŋek Galili mɨktɨmon kokup kɨnda mani Kapaneam uŋudon pɨgɨgɨt. Pabɨgɨ egek Sabat bɨsap morapmon amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
Yoyɨŋ degakwan amɨn kɨnda man madepni toŋ da gen ŋwakŋwarɨsi niyɨsak yaŋ nandawit.
Koŋni toŋ amɨn kɨnda Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon yɨkgɨt. Uŋun da madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt,
“Yesu, Nasaret amɨn, gak nibaŋ aŋnim do nandɨsal? Nin paŋupbal ak do abɨl? Nak nandaŋ gamɨsat, gak Piŋkop Dakon Telagɨ Amɨni.”
Mani Yesu da koŋ tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak gen dɨma yaŋek amɨn on yɨpmaŋ det!” Yaŋ iyɨŋakwan koŋ uŋun da amɨn ukwayɨkban maŋ amɨn da binapmon pakgɨt. Pagakwan amɨn uŋun dɨma aŋupbal aŋek yɨpmaŋ kɨgɨt.
Amɨn da uŋun kaŋ wurɨpdagek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yawit, “Mao, niaŋ gen kɨnda yosok? Amɨn man madepni toŋ ae tapmɨmni toŋ da tɨlagon koŋ gen tebai yoyɨŋban geni nandaŋek pasal kwaŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu da pi agɨt dakon gen uŋun provins dakon amɨn kɨsi da nandawit.
Yesu Juda amɨn dakon muwut muwut yut yɨpmaŋek Saimon da yutnon kɨgɨt. Saimon dakon yopmi sot aŋek gɨptɨmni kɨndapmɨ sogɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan Yesu da aŋpulugosak do iyɨwit.
Aba Yesu uŋun mɨŋat da kapmatjok paŋkɨ agek gɨptɨmni kɨndapmɨ sogɨt uŋun pasɨl ɨmjak do tebai yagɨt. Yaŋban sotni pasɨl ɨmɨŋakwan uŋudon gɨn pɨdaŋek japni paŋkosit agɨt.
Gɨldat si pɨgɨk do aŋakwan amɨn da notni sot mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ awit uŋun Yesukon paŋopgwit. Paŋopba Yesu da kɨsitni kwenikon kaloŋ kaloŋ wutjɨŋek paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Ae amɨn morapmɨ koŋni toŋ uŋun yol yomgut. Yolakwan koŋ da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Gak Piŋkop dakon Monji.” Yesu uŋun Kristo yaŋ nandaŋ ɨmgwit, do Yesu da koŋ gen dɨmasi yoni do kɨrɨŋɨk yomgut.
Wɨsa dagokdosi Yesu amɨn dɨma egɨpgwit tɨm kɨndakon kɨgɨt. Aŋakwan amɨn da wusɨŋ aŋalon aŋek dɨma yopmaŋ kɨsak do nandaŋek abɨdok do awit.
Mani yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Akdɨsak uŋun dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi kokup pap dɨwarɨkon kɨsi agek yoyɨŋ teŋteŋokeŋ. Nak Piŋkop da uŋun pi abeŋ dosi yabekgɨt.”
Yaŋ yaŋek Judia mɨktɨmon muwut muwut yut taŋ aŋaŋ kɨwit uŋudon agek Piŋkop gen yoyɨgɨt.
Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu Genesaret Pakbi Ɨdap ɨleŋɨkon agek Piŋkop dakon gen yaŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ da abɨŋ uŋun da kapmatsisok aŋgwasɨŋek nandawit.
Yesu bot bamorɨ ɨleŋɨkon taŋbal pɨndakgɨt. Uŋun tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl amɨn da yopba taŋakwal tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni pakbikon sugawit.
Yesu uŋun bot kɨndakon mɨlkaŋ wɨgɨgɨt. Bot uŋun Saimon dakon. Uŋun boron wɨgek Saimon yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Bot ɨmɨŋdɨlbɨ tɨmɨsok dɨ pakbikon kwan.” Yaŋ iyɨŋek Yesu boron yɨgek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
Yoyɨŋ dek mudaŋek Saimon yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Tɨmɨsok dɨ gat kɨŋek pakbi ɨlarɨkon kɨŋek tap kɨlap sɨmɨl do yɨk yopba pɨgɨni.”
Yaŋban Saimon da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, nin kalbi tap kɨlap sɨmɨl do pi madep aŋek tap kɨlap kɨnda dɨma ɨlɨgapdo wɨsa dagak. Mani gak dakon gen guramɨgek yɨk yum yopno pɨgɨni.”
Yoyɨgɨt uŋudeŋ aŋakwa tap kɨlap morapmɨsi yɨgon pɨgɨ tugaŋek yɨk dagok do awit.
Aŋakwa notni bot kɨndakon agɨpgwit amɨn da abɨŋ paŋpulugoni do kɨsit da tɨlak aŋ yomgwit. Tɨlak aŋ yoba apba tap kɨlap bot bamot kɨsikon yopba tugaŋ jɨk taŋek pakbi kagagwan pɨgɨk do agɨmal.
Saimon gat notni kabɨ gat tap kɨlap ɨlɨkgwit uŋun pɨndagek tamtam yawit. Ae Saimon dakon pi ɨsal bamotni Jems gat Jon gat Sebedi dakon monji yat uŋun kɨsi tamtam yagɨmal. Aŋek Saimon Pita da Yesu ŋwakbeŋ aŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nepmaŋ dek kɨ. Nak yokwi pakpak!” Yaŋban Yesu da Saimon yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak dɨma pasolbi. Abɨsok onda wasaŋek gak amɨn tɨmɨtdɨsal.”
<range>
<range>
Yaŋ yaŋban bot bamotni ɨlɨkba ɨleŋɨkon wɨgakwal yo morapni kɨsi yopmaŋek Yesu yolgwit.
Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu kokup pap kɨndakon egakwan amɨn wuda tebani toŋ kɨnda egɨpgut. Uŋun da Yesu kaŋek ŋwakbeŋ aŋ ɨmɨŋek mɨktɨmon gawagek Yesu bɨsit tebai iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlek tokeŋ do nandɨsal kaŋ, tagɨ aŋmɨlɨp abɨ kɨlek tokeŋ.”
Yaŋban Yesu da kɨsitni amɨn uŋun kwenikon wɨtjɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Kɨlek toki do nandɨsat, do pasɨl gamni!” Yaŋ yaŋban uŋudon gɨn wuda tebani pasɨl ɨmɨŋakwa kɨlek tagɨt.
Aban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak amɨn dɨmasi yoyɨŋek kɨŋ mukwa sogok amɨnon gɨptɨmgo yolɨki. Aŋek Moses da yagɨt uŋun da tɨlagon paret aŋaki amɨn da asi kɨlek tal yaŋ gandani.”
Mani Yesu da yo agɨt dakon geni sigɨn kɨŋ ɨreŋ tagɨt. Aŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ da geni nandak do opgwit. Ae sotni paŋmɨlɨp aŋyomjak do opgwit.
Mani Yesu bɨsap morapmɨ mɨktɨm amɨn dɨma ekwaŋ tɨmon paŋkɨ egek bɨsit pi agɨt.
Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu amɨn yoyɨŋ degakwan Parisi amɨn ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨnyo kɨsi paŋobɨŋ yɨkgwit. Uŋun amɨn Jerusalem, ae Galili dakon kokup morap toŋ, ae Judia mɨktɨmon da opgwit. Yesu Amɨn Tagɨ dakon tapmɨm taŋ ɨmgut, do sot amɨn paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Aŋakwan amɨn kabi kɨnda da amɨn kɨsirɨ kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi kɨnda wamaŋ aŋaŋ opgwit. Uŋun wayɨgon yɨpba pagakwan aŋaŋ Yesu da akgɨron awɨgɨk do awit.
Mani amɨn morapmɨ, do yutnon awɨgɨk do aŋtɨdok awit. Do yut kwenon wɨgɨ yut tuwɨlek amɨn uŋun wayɨgon pagakwan napmon da abɨdaŋakwa amɨn morap da binapmon pɨgek Yesu da buronsi pɨgɨgɨt.
Yesu da nandaŋ gadatni pɨndagek yagɨt, “Not, dɨwarɨgo yopmaŋ gamɨsat.”
Yaŋban Parisi amɨn gat ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat da iyɨ yaŋ nandawit, “On namɨn amɨn kɨnda da Piŋkop kulabɨŋek gen uŋun yosok? Dɨwarɨ yopyop uŋun amɨn kɨnda da arɨpmɨ dɨmasi agagɨ. Uŋun Piŋkop kaloŋ dagɨn asak.”
Yesu da nandak nandakni uŋun pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nido butjikon da nandak nandak uŋun nandaŋ namaŋ?
Dɨwarɨ yopyop ae amɨn kɨsit kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi paŋmɨlɨp agak uŋun kɨsi amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma agagɨ.
Mani Amɨn Dakon Monji on mɨktɨmon dɨwarɨ wɨrɨrɨt dakon pi asak do yaŋ mudaŋ ɨbi yaŋ nandaba pɨsosak do on amɨn aŋmɨlɨp abeŋ.” Yesu yaŋ yaŋek kɨsirɨ kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi amɨn kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak gayɨsat, gak pɨdaŋ yalɨŋ potgo tɨmɨgek yutgokon kɨ.”
Yaŋban uŋudon gɨn amɨn uŋun pɨdaŋek yalɨŋ potni tɨmɨgek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yutnikon kɨgɨt.
Aŋakwan mɨŋat amɨn morapyo uŋun kaŋ wurɨpdagek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yawit, “Abɨsok yo ŋwakŋwarɨsi altaŋban komaŋ.”
Uŋun da kwenon Yesu yomakon pɨgek kɨŋ kaŋban takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt yut kabeŋon takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn kɨnda yɨkban kagɨt. Uŋun mani Liwai. Yesu da Liwai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Abɨŋ nak nol.”
Yaŋ iyɨŋban Liwai pɨdaŋ yo morapni kɨsi yopmaŋek Yesu yolgɨt.
Aŋek Liwai da yutnikon Yesu do jap madepsi paŋkosit agɨt. Yaŋ aban takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn morapmɨ gat ae amɨn dɨwarɨ gat kɨsi yɨgek jap nawit.
Aŋakwa Parisi amɨn gat ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn Parisi da kabɨkon nani uŋun da Yesu dakon paŋdetni do yaŋba yokwi tok aŋek yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Ji jap pakbiyo takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn ae yokwi pakpak amɨn gat nido aŋ?”
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn sotni mɨni uŋun wuda wamagon dɨma kwaŋ. Amɨn sotni toŋ uŋun dagɨn wuda wamagon kwaŋ.
Nak amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ ɨlɨt do dɨma pɨgɨm. Yokwi pakpak yaŋ ɨlɨkgo but tobɨl ani do pɨgɨm.”
Parisi amɨn da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Jon dakon paŋdetni bɨsap morapmɨ Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek egek bɨsit pi aŋ. Ae Parisi amɨn nin dakon paŋdetnin kɨsi yaŋ gɨn aŋ. Mani gak dakon paŋdetgoni jap pakbiyo aŋek ekwaŋ.”
Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Monjɨ kɨnda mɨŋat pasak bɨsapmon uŋun jap noknok bɨsap madep kɨnda, ae monjɨ notni gat ekwaŋ, do jap kelek tagɨ dɨma egɨpni.
Mani don monjɨ uŋun abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ kɨŋakwa notni uŋun bɨsapmon jap kelek ekwaŋ.”
Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda gat yoyɨŋek yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da ɨmal kalugɨ kɨnda pudaŋ ɨmal garaŋɨ dagaŋ kwi kɨndakon bupjak kaŋ uŋun tagɨ dɨma. Yaŋ asak kaŋ, ɨmal kalugɨ aŋupbal asak. Ae ɨmal kalugɨ uŋun kalɨpmɨ gat arɨp dɨma.
Ae amɨn kɨnda da wain kalugɨ tɨbɨrɨ meme gɨp baŋ wasaŋbi kalɨpmɨ kɨndakon kolesak kaŋ uŋun tagɨ dɨma. Yaŋ asak kaŋ, wain da pukwa paptaŋ meme gɨp kɨrɨŋɨgakwa wain maŋ mudokdaŋ. Ae meme gɨpyo kɨsi yokwi tokdɨsak.
Do wain kalugɨ meme gɨp kalugɨkon kolaŋ.
Ae wain kalɨpmɨ nosok amɨn wain kalugɨ nok do kuragɨ nandaŋek yaŋ yosok, ‘Wain kalɨpmɨ uŋun tagɨsi.’ ”
Sabat bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu wit pi binap kɨnda naŋ kɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwan paŋdetni da wit bamɨ dɨ jɨmɨk kɨsit da mɨsɨŋɨkba gɨpmɨ maŋakwa bamɨ si nawit.
Aŋakwa Parisi amɨn dɨ da pɨndagek yawit, “Ji Sabat bɨsap dakon gen teban yapmaŋek nido yaŋ aŋ?”
Yaŋba Yesu da kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Dewit gat amɨn kabɨni gat da jap do awit bɨsapmon yo awit uŋun dɨ manjɨŋ nandaŋ bo dɨma?
Dewit uŋun Piŋkop da yutnon wɨgɨ bret Piŋkop do parekbi uŋun tɨmɨkgɨt. Bret uŋun mukwa sogok amɨn dagɨn tagɨ noknogɨ. Mani Dewit da naŋek amɨn kabɨni kɨsi do yomgut.”
Yesu da sigɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun Sabat bɨsap dakon Amɨn Tagɨ.”
Sabat bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon wɨgek yoyɨŋdet agɨt. Uŋudon amɨn kɨsirɨ amɨnsi tetni gɨreŋɨkbi kɨnda egɨpgut.
Parisi amɨn gat ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat da Yesu Sabat bɨsapmon amɨn paŋmɨlɨp aban kaŋek gen yaŋ ɨmneŋ yaŋ do kaŋ egɨpgwit.
Mani Yesu da nandak nandakni pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋek amɨn kɨsirɨ gɨreŋɨkbi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak pɨdaŋ amɨn da ɨŋamon at.” Iyɨŋban amɨn uŋun pɨdaŋ akgɨt.
Pɨdaŋ agakwan Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji niaŋ nandaŋ? Sabat bɨsap dakon gen teban uŋun aŋpak tagɨ bo yokwi aneŋ do yosok? Amɨn kutnok do yosok, bo ae amɨn si paŋupbal ano kɨmotni do yosok?”
Yesu da amɨn morap kɨsi pɨndak aŋaŋ kɨ mudaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Kɨsitgo aŋnɨŋnɨŋ a.” Iyɨŋban yaŋ gɨn aŋakwan kɨsirɨ kɨlek tagɨt.
Mani Parisi amɨn gat ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat da japmɨsi nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek iyɨ gɨn yaŋ nandat aŋek Yesu niaŋsi aŋ ɨmno yaŋ yawit.
Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu kalbi bɨsit pi ak do kabap kɨndakon wɨgɨ Piŋkop bɨsit iyɨgɨt. Bɨsit pi aŋ egakwan wɨsa dagaŋban
paŋdetni yaŋ yoban apba 12 kabɨ manjɨgɨt. Manjɨŋek yabekbi man yomgut.
Kɨnda uŋun mani Saimon (uŋun Yesu da Pita yaŋ iyɨgɨt). Ae Saimon dakon padɨge Andru, ae Jems, Jon, Pilip, Batolomiu,
Matyu, Tomas, Alpius dakon monji Jems, ae Saimon (uŋun Selot da kabɨkon nani),
ae Jems dakon monji Judas, ae Judas Iskariot (uŋun da don Yesu uwal da kɨsiron yɨpgut).
Yesu uŋun amɨn kabɨ tɨmɨkban ɨleŋon da mɨktɨm kuldukgɨbaŋ kɨndakon pukwa paŋdetni morapmɨ gat kɨsi akgwit. Aŋakwa Judia mɨktɨm dakon amɨn morapmɨ gat, ae Jerusalem kokup papmon amɨn gat, ae tap amɨn Tair ae Saidon kokup da kapmatjok egɨpgwit amɨn uŋun gat kɨsi egɨpgwit.
Uŋun geni nandakdo, ae sotni paŋmɨlɨp asak do nandaŋek apgwit. Koŋ da paŋupbal abi amɨn uŋun Yesu da paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Sot amɨn paŋmɨlɨp agak dakon tapmɨm Yesukon da apgut, do amɨn morap kɨsitni kwenikon ɨgayɨk do awit. Yaŋ aŋek kɨlek tawit.
Yesu da paŋdetni pɨndagek yagɨt, “Yoni mɨni amɨn ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ, nido ji Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun da kagagwan ekwaŋ.
Abɨsok jap do aŋ amɨn ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ. Don jap naŋ tugokdaŋ. Abɨsok kunam takgaŋ amɨn ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ. Don jɨkgo yanjakdaŋ.
Amɨn da dandaba ji Amɨn Dakon Monji yolyol amɨn yaŋ dandaŋek nandaba yokwi tok aŋdamdaŋ. Ji uŋun gat gadaŋek dɨma egɨpni do dayɨŋek yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ damɨŋek man yokwisi damdaŋ. Yo morap uŋun altaŋ damdaŋ, mani ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani.
Uŋun bɨsapmon ji butji tagɨsi taŋakwan kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek wɨgɨ mok ani. Nandani. Kobogɨ do tomni wukwisi Kwen Kokupmon taŋ damɨsak. Kalɨp babɨni da kombɨ amɨn do yo yokwi yaŋ gɨn aŋyomgwit.
“Mani yoni morapmɨ amɨn, awa! Ji yo tagɨsi wagɨl tɨmɨkgaŋ. Don butji paŋteban ak do yo dɨ dɨma tɨmɨtdaŋ.
“Abɨsok jap naŋek butji paptoŋ amɨn, awa! Don jap do akdaŋ. “Abɨsok jɨkgo yanjaŋ amɨn, awa! Don kunam tagakwa dabɨl pakbisi mokdaŋ.
“Amɨn da man madep damaŋ amɨn, awa! Kalɨp babɨkji da kombɨ amɨn toptopmɨ do yaŋ gɨn aŋ yomgwit.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Geno nandaŋ amɨn yaŋ dayɨsat, ji uwalji do but dasi galak taŋ yomni. Ae nandaba yokwi tok aŋ damaŋ amɨn do aŋpak tagɨ aŋyomni.
Ae jobɨt tɨmɨtni do dayaŋ amɨn, uŋun Piŋkop da paŋpulugosak do bɨsit iyɨni. Ae yokwi aŋ damaŋ amɨn do bɨsit ani.
Amɨn kɨnda da mogɨm kulbak gɨkban kaŋ, terɨ kɨnda kɨsi aŋtobɨl ɨbi. Ae amɨn kɨnda da mɨrɨm ɨmalgo gwayeŋban kaŋ, yum kaŋaki paba pɨgɨkgo kɨsi abɨdosak.
Ae amɨn morap da yo kabɨgo yobi do gayɨŋba kaŋ yobi. Ae amɨn kɨnda da yogo kɨnda abɨdaŋ aŋkɨsak kaŋ, aŋtobɨl gamjak do tebai dɨma iyɨki.
Amɨn da aŋpak niaŋsi aŋdamni do nandaŋ, uŋun aŋpak amɨn do aŋyomni.
“Amɨn butdasi galak taŋ damaŋ baŋgɨn butdasi galak taŋ yomni kaŋ, ji amɨn tagɨ dɨma. Yokwi pakpak amɨn uŋun kɨsi amɨn butdasi galak taŋ yomaŋ baŋ butdasi galak taŋ yomaŋ.
Ae aŋpak tagɨ aŋdamaŋ amɨn baŋgɨn aŋpak tagɨ aŋyomni kaŋ, ji amɨn tagɨ dɨma. Yokwi pakpak da aŋpak uŋun kɨsi aŋ.
Ae uŋun amɨn goman tagɨ sopjak yaŋ nandaŋ teban taŋek amɨn kɨnda do yo ɨmni kaŋ, ji amɨn tagɨ dɨma. Yokwi pakpak amɨn notni da goman uŋun kɨsisi sopdaŋ yaŋ nandaŋek notni do yo yomaŋ.
Mani ji uwalji do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ yomni. Aŋek amɨn do yo yomɨŋek sopni do dɨma yoyɨni. Piŋkop da yokwi pakpak ya yaŋ dɨma iyaŋ amɨn uŋun do yo tagɨ yumsi yomɨsak, do ji aŋpak tagɨsi ani kaŋ, Piŋkop Wɨkwisi da kobogɨ do yo tagɨsi damɨŋakwan monjinisi egɨpdaŋ.
Datgo da amɨn do bupmɨ nandɨsak, do jiyo yaŋ gɨn amɨn do bupmɨ nandani.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji amɨn dakon aŋpak dɨma kokwinɨtni kaŋ, Piŋkop da jiyo kɨsi dɨma kokwinɨtjak. Ji amɨn yokwi aba uŋun do kobogɨ tɨmɨtni do dɨma yoyɨni kaŋ, Piŋkop da jiyo kɨsi yokwisi do tebai dɨma dayɨkdɨsak. Ji amɨn dakon dɨwarɨni yopmaŋ yomni kaŋ, Piŋkop da ji dakon dɨwarɨsi yaŋ gɨn yopmaŋ damdɨsak.
Ji amɨn do yo yomni kaŋ, Piŋkop da ji do yo damdɨsak. Uŋun da yo morapmɨsi damɨŋakwan tugok tugogɨsi egɨpdaŋ. Tɨlak niaŋsi yomni uŋun da tɨlak yaŋ gɨn tɨmɨtdaŋ.”
Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Dabɨlɨ mɨni kɨnda dabɨlni mɨni notni kɨnda kosit tagɨ yolɨsak? Kaŋ kɨsi bamot gapmagwan mokdamal.
Papia yut mɨŋat monjɨyo yoyɨŋdetni dɨma yapmaŋgaŋ. Mani papia yut tagɨsi wɨgɨ mudaŋek don yoyɨŋdetni yombem aŋ.
Gaga da dabɨlon kɨndap kwɨk tosok uŋun do dɨma nandaŋek notgo da dabɨlon jɨmjɨm nido kosol?
Gaga da dabɨlon kɨndap kwɨk tosok uŋun dɨma kaŋek niaŋon da notgo ‘Dabɨlgokon jɨmjɨm tosok uŋun paŋ gamdɨsat’ yaŋ iyɨki? Gak jamba but amɨn. Mibɨltok gaga da dabɨlon kɨndap kwɨk tosok uŋun abɨ kɨŋakwan notgo da dabɨlon jɨmjɨmjok tosok uŋun kaŋbɨ pɨsaŋakwan tagɨ paki.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yagɨt, “Kɨndap tagɨ da bamɨ yokwi arɨpmɨ dɨma potni. Ae kɨndap yokwi da bamɨ tagɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma potni.
Amɨn da kɨndap sop bamɨ baŋ pɨndagek kɨndap yokwi bo tagɨ yaŋ pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋ. Amɨn da pik kɨndap dakon bamɨ pak do nap kelɨ toŋon kɨŋ dɨma dekgaŋ. Ae wain sop kɨndap yokwi kelɨ toŋon kɨŋ dɨma paŋ.
Amɨn kɨlegɨ uŋun nandak nandakni kɨlegɨ morapmɨ butnikon toŋ, do aŋpak kɨlegɨsi asak. Aŋakwan amɨn yokwi uŋun nandak nandak yokwi butnikon toŋ, do aŋpak yokwi asak. Nandak nandak niaŋ amɨn butgwan toŋ, uŋun gen kagakon da yoŋ.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji nido nak Amɨn Tagɨ yaŋ nayɨŋek geno dɨma guramɨkgaŋ?
Nagon obɨŋek geno nandaŋek guramɨkgaŋ amɨn uŋun dakon tɨlak kɨnda dolɨkeŋ.
Amɨn kɨnda yutni ak do aŋek gapma wayɨkban mibɨlɨsigwan pɨgakwan mɨktɨmgwan tɨp madep da kwenon gwak magɨt. Aŋek don yut uŋun da kwenon agɨt. Aban pakbi madepsi ɨgek yutni tɨdaŋ tuwɨl do agɨt mani yutni tebaisi agɨt, do tebaisi akgɨt.
Mani amɨn kɨnda nak dakon gen nandaŋek dɨma guramɨkdak amɨn uŋun amɨn kɨnda yombem. Uŋun yutni teban tokni mɨni ɨsal mɨktɨm kwenon gɨn agɨt. Don pakbi ɨgek yut uŋun tɨdaŋban uŋudon gɨn tuwɨl kɨ madepsi tasɨk tagɨt.”
Yesu gen uŋun amɨn yoyɨŋ mudaŋek Kapaneam kokupmon pɨgɨgɨt.
Uŋun kokupmon Rom dakon emat amɨn 100 dakon mibɨltok amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut. Uŋun dakon oman amɨni si galak taŋ ɨmgut uŋun sot madep aŋek kɨmotdosi agɨt.
Aŋakwan uŋun mibɨltok amɨn da Yesu dakon gen bini nandagɨt, do Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn dɨ yabekban Yesukon kɨwit. Kɨŋ Yesu da abɨŋ oman amɨni aŋmɨlɨp asak do iyɨwit.
Aŋek Yesu da aŋpulugosak do madepsi yaŋ iyɨwit, “Uŋun amɨn tagɨsi, do geni nandaŋek kɨŋ oman monjɨni aŋpulugoki.
Uŋun amɨn da Juda amɨn nin do galak taŋ nimɨsak, ae muwut muwut yutnin wɨtjɨŋ nimgut.”
Yaŋ iyɨŋba Yesu gat kɨsi kɨwit. Kɨŋ yutni aŋkapmat aŋakwa mibɨltok amɨn da notni dɨ yabekban obɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Mibɨltok amɨn da gak do yaŋ yosok, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ, pi madep dɨma gabeŋ. Nak amɨn pɨŋbisi, do nak da yutnon wɨki uŋun da tagɨ dɨma asak.
Yaŋdo, naga gagon dɨma abɨt. Mani gak da kɨlek tosak do yaŋaki tagɨ kɨlek tosak.
Nido nak madepno da yoŋgamgwan egɨsat, do nak da uŋun dakon pɨŋbini egɨsat. Ae emat amɨno nak da yoŋgamgwan ekwaŋ, do kɨnda “Kɨ!” yaŋ iyɨko kɨsak. Ae kɨnda “Ap!” yaŋ iyɨko abɨsak. Ae oman amɨno kɨnda “Pi on aki!” yaŋ iyɨko pi asak.’ ”
Yesu gen uŋun nandaŋek nandaban yo madepsi aban tobɨlek amɨn madepsi buŋon yolgwit yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak yaŋ dayɨsat, Israel amɨnon nandaŋ gadatni madep on amɨn dakon yombem kɨnda dɨma kagɨm.”
Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn yabekgɨt uŋun tobɨl yutnon wɨgɨ oman monjɨ uŋun kɨlɨ kɨlek tagɨt kawit.
Yesu bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok egek kokup kɨnda mani Nain uŋudon kɨŋakwan paŋdetni gat ae amɨn morapmɨsi gat kɨsi kɨwit.
Kɨŋ uŋun kokup dakon tɨp dam dakon wigat aŋkapmat agɨt. Aŋek amɨn da amɨn kɨmakbi kɨnda wamaŋ aŋaŋ waŋga pɨŋba pɨndakgɨt. Amɨn kɨmakgɨt uŋun dakon meŋi uŋun sakwabat egakwan monjɨ kaloŋɨsi da kɨmakgɨt. Uŋun kokup madep dakon amɨn morapmɨsi uŋun sakwabat gat kɨsi pɨŋba pɨndakgɨt.
Amɨn Tagɨ da sakwabat uŋun kaŋek bupmɨsi nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak kunam dɨma takgi.”
Yaŋ yaŋek kɨŋ bumjot abɨwit tamo wɨtjɨŋakwan bumjot guramɨkgwit amɨn uŋun akgwit. Agakwa Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Monjɨ gɨmoŋɨ pɨdoki do gayɨsat!”
Yaŋ iyɨŋban amɨn kɨmakbi uŋun pɨdaŋ yɨgek wasaŋek gen yagɨt. Yaŋban Yesu da meŋi do ɨmgut.
Aban amɨn morap kɨsi pasalek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yaŋ yawit, “Kombɨ amɨn madepsi kɨnda nin da bɨkbɨgon altaŋban komaŋ. Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyoni Israel paŋpulugok do abɨk.”
Ae Yesu da yo agɨt uŋun dakon gen bin da madepsi ɨreŋ taŋek Judia mɨktɨm kɨsi arɨpmɨ agɨt, ae mɨktɨm dɨwarɨkon kɨsi kɨgɨt.
Jon dakon paŋdetni da Yesu da yo morap agɨt dakon geni Jon iyɨwit.
Iyɨŋba paŋdetni bamorɨ yaŋ yoban opbal Amɨn Tagɨ yaŋ iyɨnjil do yabekgɨt, “Gak Piŋkop da amɨn yabet do yagɨt uŋun, bo nin amɨn kɨnda don apdɨsak do jomjom aneŋ?”
Amɨn bamot uŋun kɨŋ Yesu altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn da yaŋ gayɨk do aŋek nit yabekban abamak, ‘Gak Piŋkop da amɨn yabet do yagɨt uŋun, bo nin amɨn kɨnda don apdɨsak do jomjom aneŋ?’ ”
Uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn Yesu amɨn sotni mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ taŋ yomgwit uŋun paŋmɨlɨp aŋek koŋni taŋ yomgwit uŋun yol yomgut. Ae dabɨlni mɨni morapmɨ paban pɨsawit.
Do gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil kɨŋ abɨsok yo pɨndak nandaŋyo amal uŋun do Jon iyɨnjil. Dabɨlni mɨni amɨn sɨŋtoŋ, ae kandapmɨ alek taŋbi amɨn kosit akwaŋ, ae wuda tebani toŋ amɨn uŋun kɨlek toŋ, ae mɨragɨ mɨni amɨn da gen nandaŋ, ae amɨn kɨmakbi pɨdoŋ, ae yoni mɨni amɨn da Gen Bin Tagɨsi nandaŋ.
Amɨn kɨnda nak nandaŋek nandaŋ gadatni dɨma wɨtdal kɨsak uŋun amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨgɨ toŋ egɨsak.”
Amɨn bamot Jon da yabekgɨt uŋun tobɨl kɨŋakwal, Yesu da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep Jon do yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji mɨktɨm amɨni mɨnikon ninaŋ kok do kɨwit? Mɨrɨm da nagal kɨnda aŋwayɨŋ aban kok do kɨwit?
Dɨma kaŋ, ninaŋ kok do kɨwit? Amɨn kɨnda yɨk ɨmalyo tagɨsi baŋgɨn pagɨt uŋun kok do kɨwit? Dɨma, yɨk ɨmalyo tagɨsi paŋek gɨptɨm dakon yoni tagɨ tagɨ dagɨn taŋ yomaŋ amɨn uŋun kɨla amɨn madep da yutnon gɨn ekwaŋ.
Mani ji ninaŋ kok do kɨwit? Kombɨ amɨn kɨnda kok do kɨwit? Uŋun bamɨ, nak asisi dayɨsat, Jon da kombɨ amɨn dɨwarɨ yapmaŋ mudosok.
Uŋun amɨn do Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ mandabi: ‘Nandani, geno yaŋ teŋteŋosak do amɨn kɨnda yabekgo uŋun da mibɨltaŋ gamjak. Aŋek kositgo aŋnoman asak.’
Nak yaŋsi dayɨsat, amɨn morap mɨktɨmon altoŋ uŋun Jon da yapmaŋ mudosok. Mani amɨn morap Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan pɨŋbisi ekwaŋ uŋun da Jon yapmaŋgaŋ.”
(Jon da amɨn gat ae takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn gat telagɨ pakbi kɨlɨ soŋ yomgut, do gen uŋun nandaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Piŋkop dakon aŋpak uŋun kɨlegɨsi.”
Mani Parisi amɨn gat ae gen teban mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn gat uŋun Jonon telagɨ pakbi dɨma sowit. Yaŋ aŋek Piŋkop da kosit kɨlegɨ yolɨk do agɨt uŋun manji ɨmgwit.)
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ni tɨlak gen kɨnda naŋ dayɨko amɨn abɨsok ekwaŋ uŋun dakon aŋpak do nandaba pɨsosak? Uŋun niaŋen amɨn dɨ da ekwaŋ?
Uŋun mɨŋat monjɨyo da yaŋ, yumaŋ gwayek tamokon yɨgek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yoŋ: ‘Nin kasɨsɨŋ kɨlɨ pɨsomaŋ, mani ji kap ak do dɨma nandayɨŋ. Nin bupmɨ kap yamaŋ, mani ji bupmɨ nandaŋek kunam tat do dɨma nandayɨŋ.’ ”
Yesu da sigɨn yaŋ yagɨt, “Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn abɨŋek bret dɨma nagɨt, ae wain dɨma nagɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan, ‘Koŋni kɨnda taŋ ɨmɨsak’ ji da gen uŋun yawit.
Ae Amɨn Dakon Monji da abɨŋ jap pakbiyo agɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan kaŋek ji da yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Kabɨt, jap morapmɨ noknok amɨn ae wain morapmɨsi noknok amɨn. Takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt ae yokwi pakpak amɨn dakon notni.’
Ji da gen uŋun yoŋ, mani Piŋkop da pi morap agɨt uŋun pɨndagek nandano nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi gɨn asak.”
Parisi amɨn kɨnda da Yesu yutnikon obɨŋ jap nosak do yaŋ ɨban yutnikon obɨŋ jap tamokon yɨkgɨt.
Uŋun kokupmon yokwi pakpak mɨŋat kɨnda egɨpgut. Uŋun mɨŋat Yesu Parisi da yutnon yɨgek jap nosok yaŋ amɨn da yaŋba nandaŋek pakbi kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi kɨnamɨ kɨnda abɨdaŋek yutnon wɨgɨgɨt. Tɨbɨrɨ uŋun tɨpnaŋ wasaŋbi.
Wɨgɨ Yesu da manjikon kandapnikon paŋkɨ agek kunam tagakwan dabɨl pakbini da kandapnikon maŋ guktaŋba busuŋ daŋgwani baŋ ɨkdɨgagɨt. Yaŋ aŋek kandapmɨkon mandaŋ naŋek pakbi kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi naŋ soŋ ɨmgut.
Yaŋ aŋakwan Parisi amɨn uŋun Yesu yaŋ ɨmgut iyɨ burɨkon da yaŋ nandagɨt, “On amɨn asi kombɨ amɨn kɨnda tam, on mɨŋat kɨsirɨ kwenikon wɨtjɨsak uŋun yokwi pakpak mɨŋat kɨnda yaŋ nandaban.”
Yaŋ nandaŋakwan Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Saimon, nak gen kɨnda gayɨko.” Yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, kɨlɨ nayɨ.”
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn bamorɨ uŋun amɨn kɨndakon gomani toŋ. Kɨnda dakon gomani uŋun moneŋ 500 danari, ae kɨnda dakon gomani uŋun moneŋ 50 danari.
Uŋun amɨn bamot gomani sopjil dakon moneŋni arɨpmɨ dɨma, do gomani dɨma sopjil do yoyɨgɨt. Gak niaŋ nandɨsal? Yaŋ aban jit amɨn da uŋun amɨn do madepsi galak taŋ ɨmgut?”
Yaŋban Saimon da iyɨgɨt, “Goman madepni dɨma sopjak do iyɨgɨt amɨn uŋun da, yaŋ nandɨsat.” Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak kokwin kɨlegɨsi aŋek yosol.”
Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu da tobɨl mɨŋat uŋun kaŋek Saimon yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “On mɨŋat do koki? Nak yutgokon wɨko kandapno sugokeŋ do pakbi dɨma namɨl. Mani on mɨŋat da dabɨl pakbini naŋ kandapno sugaŋek busuŋ daŋgwani baŋ ɨkdɨgak.
Nak dɨma mandaŋ nal, mani yutgokon si wɨron da wasaŋek mɨŋat on da kandapno mandaŋ nak da sigɨn mandaŋ nosok.
Gak busuŋnokon bɨt nelak dɨma tagal namɨl. Mani mɨŋat on da pakbi kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi kandapnokon soŋ namɨk.
Do yaŋ gayɨsat, on mɨŋat dakon dɨwarɨni morapmɨ Piŋkop da yopmaŋ ɨban nak do but dasi galagɨ madepsi nandaŋ namɨsak. Mani dɨwarɨni tagapmɨsok taŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn Piŋkop da dɨwarɨni yopmaŋ ɨmjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn da nak do galagɨ madep dɨma nandaŋ namjak.”
Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu da mɨŋat uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak da dɨwarɨgo yopmaŋ gamɨsat.”
Yaŋ iyɨŋban amɨn kabɨ Yesu gat jap naŋek yɨkgwit uŋun iyɨ gɨn yaŋ yawit, “On niaŋen amɨn kɨnda da dɨwarɨ yopyop asak?”
Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu da mɨŋat uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nandaŋ gadatgo do aŋek Piŋkop da gak yokwikon naŋ abɨdosok. Butgo yaworɨ taŋakwan kɨki.”
Uŋun da kwenon Yesu kokup pap ae kokup monɨŋ monɨŋ tawit uŋudon agek Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Yabekbi 12 kabɨ kɨsi agɨpgwit.
Ae mɨŋat dɨwarɨ Yesu da koŋni yol yomgut ae sotni paŋmɨlɨp agɨt uŋun kɨsi Yesu gat agɨpgwit. Kɨnda uŋun Maria. Maria uŋun Makdala kokupmon nani yaŋ iyɨwit. Kalɨp Yesu da koŋni 7 kabɨ yol ɨmgut.
Ae Joana, Susana ae mɨŋat morapmɨ gat kɨsi Yesu gat agɨpgwit. Joana uŋun Kusa dakon mɨŋatni. Kusa uŋun Erot dakon yutni dakon kɨla amɨn kɨnda. Uŋun mɨŋat kabɨ yo kabɨni iyɨ dakon baŋ Yesu gat paŋdetni gat paŋpulugawit.
Amɨn morapmɨsi kokup morap tawiron da abɨŋ muwukgwit. Abɨŋ muwugakwa Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
“Amɨn kɨnda uŋun jap yetni pigaga paŋkɨ tɨŋtɨŋagɨt. Tɨŋtɨŋaŋakwan jap yet dɨwarɨ kosiron maŋba amɨn da bamaŋakwa mɨnam da abɨŋ si nawit.
Aŋakwa jap yet dɨwarɨ tɨpmɨ toŋ tɨmon mawit. Maŋ kwawit, mani mɨktɨm pakbini mɨni, do kɨbɨdaŋ pasɨlgwit.
Aŋakwa jap yet dɨwarɨ joŋ kelɨ toŋ tɨmgwan mawit. Uŋun joŋ kelɨ toŋ gat kɨsi kwaŋek wutjɨŋba kɨmak mudawit.
Ae jap yet dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm tagɨsikon maŋ kwawit. Uŋun bamɨ 100 taŋ taŋ awit.” Yesu da tɨlak gen uŋun yaŋ mudaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Gen on nandak do galak toŋ amɨn ji pakyaŋsi nandaŋek mibɨlɨ nandaŋ pɨsoni.”
Paŋdetni da tɨlak gen uŋun yagɨt dakon mibɨlɨ do iyɨwit.
Iyɨŋba yagɨt, “Piŋkop da ji baŋgɨn iyɨ dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ pasɨlɨ toŋ uŋun damɨsak. Mani amɨn dɨwarɨ tɨlak gen gɨn nandaŋ. ‘Do dabɨl sɨŋtaŋek kokdaŋ, mani dɨma kaŋ nandaŋyo akdaŋ. Ae gen nandakdaŋ, mani mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaba pɨsokdaŋ.’ ”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek paŋdetni baŋgɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Tɨlak gen dayɨt dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ. Jap yet uŋun Piŋkop dakon gen.
Jap yet kosiron mawit, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop gen nandaŋ dakon tɨlak. Amɨn nandaŋ gadat aba Piŋkop da yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjak yaŋ do Sunduk da abɨŋ butnikon Piŋkop dakon gen gwayesak.
Ae jap yet tɨpmɨ toŋ tɨmon mawit, uŋun amɨn da Piŋkop gen nandaŋ abɨdaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋ dakon tɨlak. Mani gelɨ tagɨ dɨma yɨpban kɨgɨt. Do nandaŋ gadat bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok aŋek paŋkewal altaŋ yoba tepmɨsi Piŋkop manji ɨmɨŋ mudoŋ.
Ae jap yet joŋ kelɨ toŋ bɨkbɨkgwan mawit, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop dakon gen nandaŋek kɨŋ mɨktɨmon egɨp egɨpni do nandaba kɨk aŋ uŋun dakon tɨlak asak. Uŋun moneŋ gat ae on mɨktɨm dakon yo morap gat do galagɨ nandaŋakwa uŋun da wutjɨŋ yomɨŋakwa bamɨ dɨma toŋ.
Mani jap yet mɨktɨm tagɨsikon mawit, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop dakon gen nandaŋek tebaisi abɨdoŋ uŋun dakon tɨlak. Uŋun burɨ kɨlegɨsi taŋakwan tebai agek bamɨ tagɨsi paŋalon aŋ.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn da lam koleŋ kwoba naŋ dɨma wutjɨŋba toŋ, bo ae dɨpmɨn potpot tamo da mibɨlgwan dɨma yopmaŋgaŋ. Noman tamokon yopmaŋakwa amɨn da yutnon wɨŋek teŋteŋɨ uŋun koŋ.
Yo morap pasɨlɨ toŋ uŋun don nomansi altaŋ mudokdaŋ. Ae yo morap wutjɨŋbi da toŋ uŋun noman taŋ mudaŋakwa amɨn da pɨndak nandaŋyo akdaŋ.
“Ji kaŋ kɨmagek gen pakyaŋsi nandani. Taŋ yomaŋ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da dɨ gat saŋbeŋ daban tɨmɨtdaŋ. Mani mɨnini amɨn uŋun taŋ namaŋ yaŋ nandɨsak uŋun Piŋkop da gwayekdɨsak.”
Uŋun bɨsapmon meŋi padɨk padɨkyo Yesu kok do opgwit. Mani amɨn morapmɨ, do Yesu da kapmatjok kɨk do aŋtɨdok awit.
Aŋakwa amɨn dɨ da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Meŋgo padɨk padɨkgoyo yomakon agek gak gandak do yoŋ.”
Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Piŋkop dakon gen nandaŋek guramɨkgaŋ uŋun meŋno ae padɨk padɨknoni.”
Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu paŋdetni gat bot kɨndakon wɨgek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda do kɨno.” Yaŋ yaŋban kɨwit.
Boron yɨgek kɨŋakwa Yesu dɨpmɨn pakgɨt. Aŋakwan mɨrɨm madepsi kɨnda pakbi ɨdapmon obɨŋakwan boron pakbi pɨgɨ tugaŋakwa pasɨl do awit.
Aŋakwa paŋdetni da kɨŋ Yesu aŋyolek iyɨwit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nin pasɨldamaŋ!” Iyɨŋba pɨdaŋ pakbi gat mɨrɨm gat tebai yoyɨŋban mɨrɨm dɨma aŋakwan pakbi yaworɨsi tagɨt.
Aŋakwan Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nandaŋ gadatji dukon yɨpmaŋ?” Yaŋban paŋdetni si pasalgwit. Aŋek wurɨpdagek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yawit, “On niaŋen amɨn kɨnda da pakbi mɨrɨmyo gen tebai yoyɨŋban geni guramɨkgamal?”
Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Gerasa mɨktɨm tetgɨn kɨŋ altawit. (Gerasa mɨktɨm uŋun terɨ kɨnda taŋakwan Galili mɨktɨm uŋun pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda tosok.)
Yesu bot yɨpmaŋek ɨleŋon wɨŋakwan uŋun kokup papmon amɨn kɨnda da abɨŋ altaŋ ɨmgut. Uŋun amɨn koŋni taŋ ɨmgwit. Bɨsap dubagɨsi molaŋ egɨpgut, ae yut kɨndakon dɨma egɨpgut. Amɨn kɨmakba paŋkɨ tɨp kɨnamgwan yopmaŋgaŋ mɨktɨmon gɨn egɨpgut.
Uŋun amɨn da Yesu kaŋek madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek Yesu da kandapmon maŋ pagek gen papmon da yaŋ yagɨt, “Yesu, gak Piŋkop Wɨkwisi dakon Monji, gak ninaŋ aŋnamdɨsal? Bupmɨ nandaŋ nabi. Yo yokwi dɨmasi aŋ nabi!”
Koŋ da amɨn uŋun yɨpmaŋ detjak do Yesu da kɨlɨ iyɨgɨt, uŋun do madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek gen uŋun yagɨt. Uŋun amɨn koŋ da bɨsap morapmɨ aŋupbal awit, do amɨn da bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ kɨlani tebaisi aŋek nap teban tebaisi baŋ kɨsit kandapyoni paŋteban awit. Mani nap teban uŋun paŋdagaŋek koŋ da ɨmɨŋ sugaŋakwan mɨktɨm amɨn dɨma ekwaŋ tɨmon kɨŋ kɨŋ agɨt.
Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mango namɨn?” Iyɨŋban koŋni morapmɨ taŋ ɨmgwit, do “Amɨn Kabɨ Madep” yaŋ iyɨgɨt.
Yesu da bupmɨ nandaŋ yomjak do koŋ da bɨsit tebai yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin gapma kɨdagɨ mɨni uŋungwan pɨgɨneŋ do dɨma niyɨki.”
Bɨt kabi madep kɨnda kapmatjok ɨleŋon egek jap naŋek egɨpgwit. Koŋ uŋun bɨt da butgwan pɨgɨk do Yesu bɨsit tebai iyɨŋba nandaŋ yomgut.
Aŋakwan koŋ amɨn uŋun yɨpmaŋ degek wɨŋ abɨgɨ bɨt da butgwan pɨgɨwit. Pɨgakwa bɨt uŋun tɨmtɨm yaŋek obandom naŋ pɨgɨ pakbi ɨdapgwan pɨgek pakbi naŋ kɨmakgwit.
Aŋakwa bɨt kɨla amɨn yo uŋun pɨndagek tɨmtɨm yaŋek kɨŋ kokup papmon amɨn gat ae kokup terɨ terɨ egɨ aŋaŋ kɨwit uŋun amɨn gat kɨsi yoyɨwit.
Aŋakwa amɨn da yo niaŋensi kɨnda da altagɨt, uŋun kok do apgwit. Abɨŋ Yesu altaŋ ɨmɨŋek amɨn uŋun koŋni kɨlɨ yɨpmaŋ dekgwit kawit. Kaŋba amɨn uŋun Yesu da buron burɨ kɨlɨ pɨsagɨt ae ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkni toŋ da yɨkgɨt. Yaŋ yɨkban kaŋ pasalgwit.
Aŋakwa yo dabɨl da kaŋ nandaŋyo awit amɨn uŋun da koŋ da aŋupbal abi amɨn niaŋon da kɨlek tagɨt uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ yoyɨwit.
Yoyɨŋba Gerasa mɨktɨm dakon mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi pasol pasol madepsi nandaŋek Yesu uŋun yopmaŋ dek kɨsak do iyɨwit. Iyɨŋba boron wɨgek yopmaŋ kɨgɨt.
Mani amɨn uŋun koŋ da yɨpmaŋ dek kɨwit amɨn da Yesu yol do bɨsit tebai iyɨgɨt. Iyɨŋban Yesu da tobɨl kɨsak do yabegek yaŋ iyɨgɨt,
“Gak tobɨl yutgokon kɨŋek Piŋkop da gak aŋpulugaŋek yo madepsi ak uŋun do amɨn yoyɨki.” Yaŋ iyɨŋban amɨn uŋun tobɨl kɨŋ kokupni dakon amɨn morap Yesu da aŋpulugaŋek yo morap agɨt uŋun do yoyɨgɨt.
Yesu pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda do kɨŋ altaŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ da but dasi abɨdawit, nido uŋun do jomjom aŋek egɨpgwit.
Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda apgut, mani Jairus. Uŋun Juda amɨn dakon muwut muwut yut dakon kɨla amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut. Uŋun da Yesu da kandap mibɨlon maŋ pagek yutnikon kɨsakdosi madepsi iyɨgɨt.
Uŋun monjɨ mɨni, gwi kaloŋɨ kɨnda gɨn bɨlakni uŋun 12 da tɨlak, uŋun da si kɨmot do agɨt. Yesu yutnikon kɨk do kosiron kɨŋakwan amɨn madepsi, do gɨtni gɨtni aŋakwa kɨgɨt.
Kɨŋakwan mɨŋat kɨnda uŋungwan agɨpgɨt. Uŋun dagaŋ mok aŋek yawini maŋakwa bɨlak 12 yaŋ agɨt, mani amɨn kɨnda da arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋkɨlek agagɨ.
Uŋun mɨŋat Yesu da manjikon kapmatjok abɨŋek Yesu dakon ɨmal dubakni da ɨleŋɨkon ɨgayɨgɨt. Aŋakwan uŋudon gɨn yawini pasɨl ɨmgwit.
Aŋakwan Yesu da yagɨt, “Namɨn da ɨgayɨŋ namɨk?” Yaŋban amɨn morap nin dɨma dɨma yaŋakwa Pita da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, amɨn morapmɨsi da gak gat gadat gadatsi akwaŋ.”
Mani Yesu da yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da ɨgayɨŋ namɨŋakwan tapmɨmno dɨwarɨ kwan nandat.”
Yaŋban mɨŋat uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma pasɨlgeŋ yaŋ nandaŋek nɨmnɨmɨk abɨŋ Yesu da kandap mibɨlon maŋ pakgɨt. Maŋ pagek amɨn morap da dabɨlon mibɨlɨ nido Yesu ɨgayɨgɨt uŋun dakon yaŋkwok aŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ɨgayɨko sotno uŋudon gɨn pasɨlak.”
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Gwano, nandaŋ gadatgo da gak aŋkɨlek ak. Butgo yaworɨ taŋakwan kɨki.”
Yesu gen uŋun yaŋakwan muwut muwut yut dakon kɨla amɨn Jairus da yutnon da amɨn kɨnda apgut. Abɨŋek Jairus yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gwago kɨlɨ kuŋwak, do yoyɨŋdet ɨsal dogɨn dɨma iyɨŋbɨ kɨsak.”
Yesu uŋun nandaŋek Jairus yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Dɨma pasolgi. Ɨsal nandaŋ gadat gɨn aŋaki gwago kɨlek tosak.”
Yaŋ yaŋek yutnikon kɨŋ altaŋek amɨn dɨwarɨ dɨma wɨgɨni do yoyɨŋek Pita, Jon, ae Jems gat, ae mɨŋatjok dakon meŋi datniyo gat tɨmɨkban yutnon wɨgɨwit.
Uŋun yutnon amɨn morapmɨ da mɨŋatjok do bupmɨ nandaŋek kunam tagek iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋek egɨpgwit. Aŋakwa Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kunam yopgut. Dɨma kuŋwak, ɨsal dɨpmɨn pokdok.”
Yaŋban mɨŋatjok wagɨl kuŋwak yaŋ nandaŋek jɨkgo yanjaŋ ɨmgwit.
Mani Yesu da mɨŋatjok kɨsirɨkon abɨdaŋek gen papmon da yagɨt, “Gwano, pɨda!”
Yaŋ yaŋban mɨŋatjok uŋun dakon wupmɨ aeni tobɨl abɨŋ pɨgakwan uŋudon gɨn pɨdagɨt. Pɨdaŋakwan Yesu da jap dɨ ɨba nosak do yoyɨgɨt.
Aban meŋi datni da uŋun kaŋek tamtam yagɨmal. Mani Yesu da tebai yoyɨgɨt, “Jil on yo noman taŋban komal uŋun do amɨn dɨmasi yoyɨnjil.”
Yesu da yabekbini 12 kabɨ yaŋ yoban obɨŋ muwukba sot amɨn paŋmɨlɨp agak, ae koŋ kɨsisi yolni dakon pi ani do yaŋ mudaŋ yomgut.
Yomɨŋek Piŋkop da Amɨnon Kɨla Asak dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋoni, ae sot amɨnyo paŋmɨlɨp ani yaŋ do yabekgɨt.
Aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kosit agɨp do yo dɨ dɨma tɨmɨtni. Wɨn kɨrɨŋ, ae yɨk, ae bret, ae moneŋ, ae paba pɨgɨk bamorɨ dɨma tɨmɨtni.
Yut kɨndakon wugɨni kaŋ, uŋudon gɨn egek kokup uŋun yɨpmaŋ kɨni.
Kwa amɨn da ji dɨma tɨmɨkba kaŋ, kokup pap uŋun yɨpmaŋ det do kandapjikon kɨmbabaŋ tegoŋ uŋun tɨdaŋba kɨni. Yaŋ aba amɨn da yokwi aŋapno uŋun do aŋek kwaŋ yaŋ nandani.”
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban kokupmɨ kokupmɨ agek Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋaŋek amɨn dakon sotni paŋmɨlɨp awit.
Gapman dakon kɨla amɨn madep mibɨltogɨ Erot da Yesu dakon gen bini nandagɨt. Dɨ da Yesu kaŋek Jon kɨmoron da aeni pɨdagɨt yaŋ yawit, do Erot but morap agɨt.
Ae dɨ da yawit, “Elaija da noman tak.” Ae dɨ da “Kombɨ amɨn kalɨpsi egɨpgwit uŋun kɨnda da kɨmoron da pɨdak” yaŋ yawit.
Mani Erot da yaŋ yagɨt, “Jon dakon tegɨ kɨlɨ mandaŋ dagagɨm. Mani abɨsok namɨn amɨn kɨnda dasi yo madepsi aŋakwan gen bini nayɨŋba nandɨsat?” Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu kok do pini agɨt.
Yabekbi kabɨ aeni tobɨl Yesukon abɨŋek yo morap awit dakon geni iyɨwit. Iyɨŋba Yesu da tɨmɨkban iyɨ gɨn kokup kɨnda mani Betsaida uŋudon kɨwit.
Aŋakwa mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi uŋun Yesu uŋudon kɨsak yaŋ kaŋ nandaŋyo aŋek buŋon yolgwit. Aŋakwa Yesu da tagɨsi nandaŋ yomɨŋek Piŋkop da Amɨnon Kɨla Asak uŋun do yoyɨŋek sot amɨn paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo yabekbini 12 kabɨ da obɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Kokup amɨni mɨnikon ekwamaŋ, do yoyɨŋbɨ mɨŋat amɨn morapyo kɨŋek kokup monɨŋ monɨŋ ae tɨmɨ dɨgwan kɨŋ jap pakbiyo gat ae dɨpmɨn potpot tamoyo gat wɨsini.”
Mani Yesu da yabekbini yoyɨgɨt, “Dɨsi jap yomgut.” Yoyɨŋban yawit, “Nin japnin morapmɨ dɨma. Bret 5 kabɨ gat ae tap kɨlap bamorɨ gat gɨn. Nin kɨŋ on mɨŋat amɨn morap do jap moneŋ baŋ si yumneŋ do nandɨsal?”
(Wɨli 5 tausen da tɨlak egɨpgwit.) Yaŋba Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn 50 50 yaŋ paŋmuwuk yopba yɨk yɨk ani.”
Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdetni da yaŋ gɨn aba amɨn kɨsi yɨk mudawit.
Yɨgakwa Yesu da bret 5 kabɨ gat ae tap kɨlap bamot gat kɨsi tɨmɨk Kwen Kokup sɨŋtaŋek gɨsamɨkgɨt. Aŋek bret gat ae tap kɨlap gat paŋdagaŋek paŋdetni do yomɨŋakwan amɨn do kokwinɨk yomgwit.
Yoba tɨmɨk amɨn morap kɨsisi arɨpmɨsi naŋakwa jap nawit dakon dɨwarɨ tawit uŋun paŋdetni da sɨmɨlba yɨgɨ 12 yaŋsi tugawit.
Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu iyɨ gɨn bɨsit pi agɨt. Uŋun bɨsapmon paŋdetni kɨsi uŋudon egɨpgwit. Egɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kabɨ madep da nak do namɨn yaŋ yoŋ?”
Yoyɨŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Dɨda Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn yaŋ yoŋ, ae dɨ da Elaija yaŋ yoŋ, ae dɨ da kombɨ amɨn kalɨpmɨ kɨnda da kɨmoron da pɨdagɨt yaŋ yoŋ.”
Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Mani ji dɨsi nak do namɨn yaŋ yoŋ?” Yaŋban Pita da aŋtobɨlek iyɨgɨt, “Gak Kristo, Piŋkop da yabekban apgul.”
Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da iyɨ Kristo egɨsak uŋun dakon geni amɨn kɨndakon dɨmasi yoni do yaŋsop aŋyomgut.
Aŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn Dakon Monji da egɨ yo yokwi morapmɨ noman taŋ ɨba tepmɨ pakdɨsak. Ae Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn, ae mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ, ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn uŋun da manji ɨmɨŋek aŋakba kɨmotdɨsak. Aŋakwa gɨldat kapbɨ aŋakwan pɨdokdɨsak.”
Yaŋ yaŋek amɨn kɨsi yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda nak nol do nandɨsak kaŋ, iyɨ dakon galaktok manji yomɨŋek tɨlak kɨndapni gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ guramɨgek nak noljak.
Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ dakon yɨyɨtni tagɨsi tosak do nandaŋek pi madep asak kaŋ, egɨp egɨpni pasɨl ɨmdɨsak. Mani amɨn kɨnda nak do nandaŋek egɨp egɨpni do nandaban yo madep dɨma asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdosak.
Amɨn kɨnda mɨktɨm dakon yo morap paŋek egɨ kɨmotjak bɨsapmon iyɨ pasɨljak kaŋ, uŋun yo morap da arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋpulugokdaŋ.
Amɨn kɨnda nak do ae nak dakon gen do mayagɨ nandɨsak kaŋ, Amɨn Dakon Monji iyɨ dakon tɨlɨmni gat ae Datni dakon tɨlɨmni gat ae Piŋkop dakon telagɨ aŋelo kabɨ dakon tɨlɨmni gat apjak bɨsapmon uŋun amɨn do mayagɨ yaŋ gɨn nandaŋ ɨmdɨsak.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, ji on akgaŋ kabɨkon da dɨ dɨma kɨmagek Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni kokdaŋ.”
Yesu uŋun gen yaŋek egɨ gɨldat 8 yaŋ da tɨlak mudaŋakwa Pita, Jon ae Jems gat tɨmɨkban ɨleŋ kɨndakon bɨsit pi ak do wɨgɨwit.
Wɨgek Yesu bɨsit pi aŋakwan tomno dabɨlni kulabɨk aŋek ɨmalni mal dakon teŋteŋɨ yombem agɨt.
Yaŋ aban kaŋakwa Moses gat Elaija gat tɨlɨmni gat noman tagɨmal. Noman taŋbal Yesu gat gen yaŋ nandat aba pɨndakgwit. Yesu Piŋkop dakon galaktok yolek Jerusalem kokup papmon on mɨktɨm yɨpmaŋ detjak uŋun dakon gen yawit.
<range>
Pita gat notni bamot gat dɨpmɨn do yokwisi awit. Mani dɨpmɨnon da pɨdaŋ Yesu tɨlɨmni gat ae amɨn bamot gat kɨsi akba pɨndakgwit.
Amɨn bamot Yesu yɨpmaŋ det do aŋakwal Pita da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nin ɨdon tagɨsi ekwamaŋ. Nin yut kabeŋ kapbɨ aneŋ. Kɨnda gak do, ae kɨnda Moses do, ae kɨnda Elaija do aneŋ.” (Pita gen uŋun naŋ yosot yaŋ uŋun dɨma nandaŋek yum yagɨt.)
Pita gen sigɨn yaŋakwan gɨkwem da pɨŋ ɨlɨmɨk yomaŋakwan pasalgwit.
Gɨkwem kagagwan da gen kɨnda yaŋ altagɨt, “On Monjɨno, pino asak do manjɨgɨm, do ji geni nandani.”
Yaŋ mudaŋakwan Yesu naŋgɨn kawit. Yo ɨleŋon altaŋba pɨndakgwit uŋun iyɨ dogɨn nandaba tawit. Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn dɨ dɨma yoyɨwit.
Wɨsa dagok do Yesu gat paŋdetni gat ɨleŋ yɨpmaŋ pɨgakwa amɨn kabɨ madepsi kosiron domdom awit.
Amɨn madep kabɨgwan da amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ tɨdaŋek aŋpulugosak do yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, monjɨno kaloŋɨ kɨndagɨn. Do kɨŋ koki do nandɨsat.
Bɨsap morapmɨ koŋ kɨnda da burɨgwan pɨgakwan uŋudon gɨn madepsi yaŋ tɨdosok. Aŋek tebai aŋupbal aŋakwan nɨmnɨmɨgakwan tarak da gen kaganikon wuŋ tugoŋ. Gɨptɨmɨ obɨsi aŋupbal aŋek bɨsap kaloŋ kaloŋ gɨn yɨpmaŋ dekdak.
Paŋdetgoni da yol ɨmni do bɨsit tebai yoyɨgɨm, mani aŋtɨdok awit.”
Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da yagɨt, “Nandaŋ gadatji mɨni amɨn, ji aŋpakji yokwisi. Nak bɨsap niaŋ da ji gat egek jɨgɨsi guramɨk dabeŋ? Monjɨgo ɨdon aŋop.”
Monjɨ uŋun Yesu da akgɨron obɨŋakwan koŋ da monjɨ uŋun ukwayɨkban mɨktɨmon maŋ pagek nɨmnɨmɨkgɨt. Mani Yesu da koŋ tebaisi iyɨŋek monjɨ uŋun aŋmɨlɨp aban kɨlek taŋban datni do aŋtobɨl ɨmgut.
Yaŋ aban amɨn da Piŋkop dakon tapmɨm madepsi kaŋek tamtam yawit. Amɨn Yesu da yo morap agɨt do nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi aŋakwa, Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
“Gen dayɨkdɨsat uŋun pakyaŋsi nandani. Amɨn Dakon Monji amɨn da kɨsiron yɨpdaŋ.”
Mani paŋdetni gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ pasɨlɨ taŋ yomgut, do dɨma nandaba pɨsagɨt. Ae gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do aŋek iyɨk do si pasalgwit.
Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu dakon paŋdetni namɨn da mibɨltok amɨnin egɨsak yaŋ do gen emat kɨnda awit.
Aŋakwa Yesu da paŋdetni dakon but pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋek amɨn monɨŋ kɨnda iyɨ akgɨron aŋobɨŋ yɨpban akgɨt.
Yɨpban agakwan paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda nak do nandaŋek on amɨn monɨŋ but dasi abɨdosok, uŋun nak naŋ but dasi abɨdosok. Ae amɨn kɨnda nak but dasi abɨdosok, uŋun Dat nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun naŋ but dasi abɨdosok. Ji kabɨkon kɨnda da pɨŋbisi egɨ damjak kaŋ, uŋun da mibɨltok amɨnji asak.”
Jon Yesu da gen yagɨt nandaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nin kaŋapno amɨn kɨnda da gak da manon koŋ yolban kamaŋ. Mani nin da kabɨkon nani kɨnda dɨma, do yaŋsop aŋɨmɨmaŋ.”
Mani Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Yaŋsop dɨma aŋɨmni. Amɨn kɨnda uwal dɨma aŋdamjak kaŋ uŋun notji.”
Piŋkop da Yesu abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ Kwen Kokup wɨgɨsak dakon bɨsap kwaŋ tagɨt. Aŋakwan Yesu uŋun Jerusalem kɨkeŋ yaŋsi nandaban teban tagɨt.
Aŋek amɨn dɨ yabekban uŋun da kalɨp mibɨltaŋ Samaria dakon kokup kɨndakon yut tamoyo paŋnoman ani do kɨwit.
Mani Yesu Jerusalem kɨkdɨsak yaŋ nandawit, do uŋun kokupmon amɨn da Yesu abɨdok do dɨma galak tawit.
Jems gat Jon gat da uŋun pɨndagek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nit da yondo Kwen Kokup kɨndap da pɨŋ soŋba mɨni ani do tagɨ nandɨsal?”
Yaŋbal Yesu da tobɨl tebaisi yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Dɨma yogogɨsi yomal!”
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban ae kokup ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨndakon kɨwit.
Kosiron kɨŋakwa amɨn kɨnda da iyɨgɨt, “Dukwan dukwan agɨpbi uŋun nak gol awɨlgeŋ gɨn.”
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Joŋ pɨŋan uŋun mɨktɨmgwan yutni toŋ. Ae mɨnam kwen akwaŋ uŋun yutni toŋ. Mani Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun dɨpmɨn potpot tamoni mɨni.”
Yaŋ iyɨŋek ae amɨn kɨnda yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Abɨŋ nak nol.” Mani amɨn uŋun da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nandaŋ namɨŋaki kɨŋ datno wayɨk yɨpmaŋek don abɨŋ golbeŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨmakbi da kɨmakbi notni iyɨ tagɨ wayɨtni. Mani gak kɨŋ Piŋkop da Amɨnon Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋoki.”
Yaŋ yaŋban ae amɨn kɨnda da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gol do nandɨsat, mani nandaŋ namɨŋaki kɨŋ gwakno galok gen yoyɨŋek don abɨŋ golgeŋ.”
Yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Sapa naŋ mɨktɨm pudaŋek dambɨ da manjigwan wusɨsak uŋuden amɨn da Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ.”
Egɨ Amɨn Tagɨ da paŋdet 72 gat manjɨgɨt. Aŋek iyɨ kokup dukwan dukwan kɨk do agɨt, uŋudon mibɨltok uŋun da kalɨp kɨni do bamot bamot yabekgɨt.
Aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Pigaga jap bamɨ madepsi taŋ pektaŋ, mani pi monjɨ bamɨ pakpak amɨn morapmɨ dɨma. Uŋun do ji bamɨ pakpak dakon Amɨn Tagɨ bɨsit iyɨŋba pi amɨn paŋalon aŋ yopban pinikon kɨni.
“Ji kɨŋek yaŋ nandani: Ji sipsip monɨŋ baŋ yaŋ joŋ pɨŋan da bɨkbɨgon yabekdat.
Moneŋ sɨmɨl kɨnam, ae yɨk, ae kandap gwɨl dɨma tɨmɨgek kɨni. Aŋek kosiron amɨn pɨndak ‘Gɨldat tagɨ!’ yaŋ dɨma yoyɨni.
Yut kɨndakon wɨgek mibɨltok yaŋ yoyɨni, ‘On yut amɨn butji yaworɨ tosak.’
Yut uŋudon but yawot amɨn kɨnda ekwan kaŋ, but yawot genji dakon bamɨ uŋudon tosak. Mɨnini da egɨpjak kaŋ, but yawotji dakon bamɨ jikon aeni tobɨljak.
Yut wɨgɨni uŋudon gɨn yɨk egɨyo aŋakwa jap daba noni. Pi agak amɨn uŋun tomni tagɨ tɨmɨkgaŋ. Ji yurɨ yurɨ dɨma agɨpni.
“Kokup kɨndakon kɨŋakwa not aŋ damɨŋek jap daba kaŋ uŋun si noni.
Aŋek amɨn sotni toŋ paŋmɨlɨp aŋek yaŋ yoyɨni, ‘Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Agakni ji da kapmatjok kɨlɨ abɨk.’
Kokup kɨndakon kɨŋakwa not dɨma aŋ daba kaŋ, uŋun kokup dakon kosit madepmon agek yaŋ yoyɨni,
‘Kokupji dakon kɨmbabaŋ kandapninon tegoŋ, uŋun tɨdono kɨŋakwa dɨwarɨsi taŋ damaŋ yaŋsi nandani. Aŋek yaŋsi nandani, Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni ji da kapmatjok kɨlɨ abɨk.’
Yaŋsi dayɨsat, gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon Sodom kokup amɨn da kobogɨ do jɨgɨ tagapmɨ pakdaŋ. Mani kokup uŋuden amɨn kobogɨ do jɨgɨ madepsi pakdaŋ.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Korasin ae Betsaida kokupmon amɨn, awa! Nak wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ abo pɨndagek ji but tobɨl dɨma awit. Tair ae Saidon kokupmon amɨn da pɨndakgwit tam, but tobɨl bamɨsi abam. Aŋek bupmɨ dakon yɨk ɨmalyo paŋek abɨlagon yɨkbam.
Mani gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon Tair gat Saidon kokupmon amɨn gat da kobogɨ do jɨgɨ tagapmɨ paŋakwa ji da kobogɨ do jɨgɨ madepsi pakdaŋ.
Aŋakwa Kapaneam kokupmon amɨn, ason Kwen Kokup nin da wɨgɨkdamaŋ yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨmasi. Ji mibɨlɨgwan Tɨpdomon pɨgɨkdaŋ.”
Yesu da paŋdetni saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dakon gen nandɨsak amɨn, uŋun da nak dakon gen nandɨsak. Ae manji damɨsak amɨn, uŋun nak naŋ manji namɨsak. Ae nak manji namɨsak amɨn, uŋun da nak yabekgɨt amɨn manji ɨmɨsak.”
Paŋdet 72 uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨgon da tobɨl abɨŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gak dakon man yaŋapno koŋ da genin guramɨkgaŋ!”
Yaŋ yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Sunduk uŋun Kwen Kokup da mal da yaŋ maŋban kagɨm.
Nandani. Nak ji da tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ gat ae skopion gat bamoni, ae uwal dakon tapmɨm kɨsisi pabɨŋ yopni do yaŋ mudaŋ damɨsat. Yo kɨnda da ji arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋupbal asak.
Mani koŋ da genji guramɨkgaŋ, uŋun do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk dɨma ani. Ji dakon man Kwen Kokupmon mandabi da toŋ, uŋun do nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani.”
Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu Telagɨ Wup da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ɨban yaŋ yagɨt, “Dat, kundu ae mɨktɨm dakon Amɨn Tagɨ, amɨn dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm dakon nandak nandakni uŋun wukwisi, mani iyɨ do nandaba wɨgɨsak, do uŋuden amɨn do gen bamɨ morap si paŋkɨsɨbɨsal. Aŋek amɨn monɨŋɨ da tɨlagon ekwaŋ amɨn, uŋun do yolɨsal. Yaŋ asal do gak aŋkɨsisat. O Dat, gaga dakon galaktok yolek yaŋ asal.
“Datno da yo morap kɨlɨ namgut. Dat uŋun dagɨn Monjɨ nandaŋ ɨmɨsak. Aŋek Monjɨ gat ae amɨn morap Monjɨ da Dat dakon mibɨlɨ yolɨsak, uŋun amɨn dagɨn Datno nandaŋ ɨmaŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu tobɨl paŋdetni baŋgɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji da yo pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋ, uŋun pɨndakgaŋ amɨn uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
Nak yaŋsi dayɨsat, kalɨpsigwan kombɨ amɨn morapmɨ gat ae kɨla amɨn madep morapmɨ gat da yo ji da pɨndakgaŋ uŋun pɨndatdosi nandawit, mani dɨma pɨndakgwit. Ae gen nandaŋ uŋun nandakdosi nandawit, mani dɨma nandawit.”
Bɨsap kɨndakon gen teban dakon mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn kɨnda da pɨdaŋ agek Yesu aŋkewal do aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, yo ninaŋ aŋek egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdokeŋ?”
Iyɨŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Gen teban papiakon gen tosok uŋun manjɨŋek niaŋ kokwinɨkdal?”
Iyɨŋban yagɨt, “Ji Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkopji uŋun but gat ae wup gat ae tapmɨmgo gat ae nandak nandakgo gat kɨsi but dasi galak taŋ ɨbi. Ae gaga do but dasi niaŋ galak tosol, uŋudeŋ gɨn amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yobi.”
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Kobogɨ bamɨsi yosol. Yaŋsi aŋek egɨp egɨp abɨdokdɨsal.”
Mani uŋun amɨn iyɨ do Yesu da amɨn kɨlegɨ kɨnda yaŋ kosak do nandaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak namɨn amɨn baŋ but dasi galak taŋ yobeŋ do yosol?”
Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda Jerusalem yɨpmaŋek Jeriko kokup papmon kɨk do aŋek kosiron pɨgɨgɨt. Pɨgakwan kabo noknok da abɨdaŋ yɨk ɨmalni gwayeŋek aŋakba palɨ kɨmakban yɨpmaŋ kɨwit.
“Kɨŋakwa mukwa sogok amɨn kɨnda uŋun kosit naŋgɨn pɨgɨgɨt. Pɨgɨ amɨn uŋun kaŋek aŋpekwolek kosit ɨleŋ naŋ yapmaŋ kɨgɨt.
Yapmaŋ kɨŋakwan Liwai amɨn kɨnda obɨŋ kaŋek yaŋ gɨn aŋpekwolek yapmaŋ kɨgɨt.
“Mani Samaria amɨn kɨnda da uŋun kositnaŋ obɨŋ amɨn uŋun kaŋek bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨmgut.
Bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek gɨptɨmɨ aŋak aŋupbal awit uŋun wain gat ae bɨt nelak gat baŋ soŋ ɨmɨŋek wamaŋ ɨmgut. Yaŋ aŋek amɨn uŋun kendak aŋenak iyɨ da donkikon yɨpgut. Yɨpmaŋek aŋkɨ amɨn da yumaŋ naŋek pokgoŋ yut kɨndakon yɨpmaŋek kɨlani agɨt.
Aŋek wɨsa dagok do silwa moneŋ tabɨlɨ bamorɨ uŋun yut pakgɨmal dakon kɨla amɨn do ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Kɨlani aŋaki on moneŋ da arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋakwan naŋ mudok dɨ abi kaŋ, tobɨl abɨŋek don gabeŋ.’ ”
Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu da gen teban dakon nandak nandak amɨn yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Niaŋ nandɨsal, uŋun amɨn kapbɨ da kabɨkon namɨn da kabo noknok da aŋakgwit amɨn uŋun do but dasi galak taŋ ɨmgut?”
Yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek aŋpulugagɨt amɨn uŋun da.” Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Gak kɨŋ aŋpak yaŋ gɨn abi.”
Yesu gat paŋdetni gat kɨŋek kokup kɨndakon altawit. Uŋun kokupmon mɨŋat kɨnda egɨpgut mani Mata. Uŋun da yaŋban Yesu uŋun yutnikon wɨgɨgɨt.
Wɨkwan Mata dakon padɨge mani Maria uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ da kandap mibɨlon yɨgek geni nandagɨt.
Mani Mata uŋun jap dakon oman do nandaba kɨk morapmɨ aŋek obɨŋ Yesu iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, padɨgɨno nepmak da naga gɨn pi madep asat. Gak uŋun do dɨma nandɨsal? Iyɨŋbɨ obɨŋ nak aŋpulugaŋban.”
Yaŋban Amɨn Tagɨ da Mata yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mata, gak yo morapmɨ do nandaba kɨk aŋek butgo yokwi tosok.
Mani gak yo kaloŋɨ kɨnda dogɨn nandaki kaŋ tagɨ. Maria uŋun dogɨn nandɨsak, do tagɨ dɨma kɨrɨŋɨk ɨbeŋ.”
Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu uŋun bɨsit pi aŋek egɨpgut. Bɨsit aban mudaŋakwan paŋdetni kɨnda da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, Jon da paŋdetni bɨsit agak do yoyɨŋ dekgɨt, yaŋ gɨn niyɨŋ dekgi.”
Yaŋban Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Bɨsit ani bɨsapmon yaŋ yoni: ‘Dat, gak dakon man telagɨ tosak. Amɨn Kɨla Agakgo yɨpbɨ ninon apjak.
Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ jap arɨpninon nibi.
Nin yokwi aŋnimaŋ amɨn dakon dɨwarɨni yopmaŋ yomamaŋ, do gak yaŋ gɨn nin dakon dɨwarɨnin yopmaŋ nibi. Paŋkewalon dɨma nipbi.’ ”
Yaŋ yaŋek yoyɨgɨt, “Jikon da kɨnda da kalbi binap notni da yutnon kɨŋ yaŋ iyɨsak, ‘Not, bret tɨmɨ kapbɨ nabɨ tamoni don gabeŋ.
Notno kɨnda kosit dubagɨkon da abɨk da yutnokon ɨsal yɨkdak. Japno mɨni.’
“Yaŋban notni yutgwan da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨsak, ‘Jɨgɨ dɨma nabi. Pɨdaŋek arɨpmɨ dɨma gabeŋ. Yoma beŋgan kɨlɨ at, ae gwakno gat kɨlɨ pak mudamaŋ.’
Nak yaŋ dayɨsat, amɨn uŋun notni da bɨsit iyɨk uŋun do dɨma ɨmɨsak. Mani saŋbek saŋbek yaŋakwan uŋun do kurak taŋek yo nido wadaŋek yosok uŋun kɨsi ɨmɨsak.
“Yaŋdo, nak yaŋ dayɨsat: Ji Piŋkop bɨsit iyɨŋba tagɨ damdɨsak, ae wɨsɨŋek bamɨ kokdaŋ, ae yoma domon tɨdaŋba wɨtdal damdɨsak.
Amɨn morap Piŋkop bɨsit iyaŋ uŋun yo tɨmɨkgaŋ, ae yo wɨsaŋ amɨn uŋun bamɨ koŋ, ae yoma domon tɨdoŋ amɨn uŋun wɨtdal yomɨsak.
“Dat kabɨ, ji kabɨkon da monjɨsi kɨnda da tap kɨlap do dayɨŋban tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ kɨnda tagɨ ɨmni?
Bo pup kwap do dayɨŋban skopion kɨnda tagɨ ɨmni?
Ji yokwi pakpak amɨn, mani monjɨsi do yo tagɨ yomaŋ. Do yaŋsi nandani. Ji bɨsit iyɨŋba Datji Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun da Telagɨ Wup tagɨ damjak.”
Yesu da amɨn kɨnda koŋ kɨnda da aŋkadɨm aban gen dɨma yagɨt, uŋun koŋni yol ɨmgut. Yol ɨban amɨn kadɨm uŋun gen yaŋakwan amɨn da kaŋba yo ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
Mani amɨn dɨ da yaŋ yawit, “Koŋ dakon mibɨltok amɨn Belsebul da tapmɨmon koŋ yoldak.”
Yaŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ da Yesu aŋkewal do aŋek iyɨŋba wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda aŋakwan, asi Piŋkop da yabekban pɨgɨt da pini asak yaŋ kok do nandawit.
Mani Yesu da nandak nandakni pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋek yoyɨgɨt, “Mɨktɨm kɨnda dakon amɨn da pudaŋ kɨ kabi bamorɨ aŋek emat wamjil kaŋ, mɨktɨm uŋun yokwi tokdɨsak. Ae amɨn yurɨ kɨnda da pudaŋ kɨŋek emat wamni kaŋ, uŋun amɨn yut tagɨ dɨma egɨpdaŋ.
Sunduk dakon amɨn kabɨni da pudaŋ kɨ kabi bamorɨ aŋek emat wamjil kaŋ, niaŋon da Sunduk gat amɨn kabɨni gat tebai atni? Nak da koŋ Belsebul da tapmɨmon yoldat yaŋ yoŋ.
Mani nak Belsebul da aŋpulugaŋban koŋ yoldat kaŋ, dɨsi dakon notji koŋ yolgaŋ uŋun amɨn kabɨ ni tapmɨmon da koŋ yolgaŋ? Uŋun amɨn kabɨ da genji kokwinɨgek gulusuŋ yoŋ yaŋ tagɨ dayɨni.
Mani Piŋkop da iyɨ tapmɨm namɨŋakwan koŋ yoldat kaŋ, Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni jikon kɨlɨ abɨk.
“Amɨn tebaisi kɨnda emat agak yo kabɨni tɨmɨgek iyɨ dakon yut kɨlani tebai aŋakwan, yo kabɨni tagɨsi toŋ.
Mani amɨn kɨnda uŋun yut ami dakon tapmɨm yapmaŋdak amɨn kɨnda da abɨsak. Abɨŋ aŋagek emat agak yo kabɨni tɨmɨgek tapmɨm pagɨt uŋun gwayesak. Yaŋ aŋek yo morapni kabo naŋek kokwinɨk notni do yomɨsak.
“Amɨn nak dakon notno dɨma, uŋun da nak uwal aŋnamaŋ. Ae amɨn nak dɨma aŋpulugaŋban amɨn paŋmuwukgamaŋ, uŋun amɨn da amɨn paŋwaseŋban waseŋ kwaŋ.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Koŋ kɨnda da amɨn kɨnda yɨpmaŋ degek kɨŋ mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon agek yɨk yawot tamo wɨsisak. Mani tamo kɨnda dɨma kosok, do yaŋ yosok, ‘Nak aeno tobɨl yut kalɨp egɨpgumon kɨkeŋ.’
Yaŋ yaŋek kɨŋ kaŋban sɨbɨt sɨbɨt wɨrɨrɨgek yo morap paŋkosit abi pɨndakdak.
Yaŋ kosok, do kɨŋ koŋ 7 kabɨ iyɨ yapmaŋek wagɨl yokwisi gat tɨmɨkban kwa uŋun yutnon egek aŋpak yokwisi aŋ. Mibɨltok uŋun amɨn yokwi egɨpgut, mani abɨsok uŋun yapmaŋek wagɨl yokwisi egɨsak.”
Yesu gen uŋun yaŋakwan mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep kabɨgwan da mɨŋat kɨnda da pɨdaŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Meŋgo si aŋalaŋek mum gaban nagɨl uŋun dasi kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ asak!”
Yaŋban Yesu da yagɨt, “Mani uŋun yapmaŋek amɨn Piŋkop dakon gen nandaŋek guramɨkgaŋ amɨn uŋun da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.”
Amɨn morapmɨsi da Yesukon sigɨn obɨŋ muwugakwa Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn on bɨsapmon ekwaŋ uŋun amɨn yokwisi gɨn. Piŋkop dakon pi naŋ asat yaŋ nandak do wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda kok do yoŋ. Mani kɨnda dɨma kokdaŋ. Jona dakon tɨlak naŋgɨn kokdaŋ.
Kalɨpsigwan Piŋkop da kombɨ amɨn Jonakon tɨlak aban Niniwe kokup pap amɨn da asi Piŋkopmon da abɨk da asak yaŋ kawit. Uŋudeŋ gɨn yo Amɨn Dakon Monjikon noman taŋ ɨba apmiap amɨn da kaŋek asi Piŋkop da yabekban abɨk yaŋ kokdaŋ.
“Mɨktɨm saut tetgɨn dakon kɨla amɨn mɨŋat madep uŋun Solomon dakon nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi iyɨŋakwan nandak do mɨktɨm dubagɨsikon da apgut. Mani amɨn kɨnda oni egɨsak, uŋun da Solomon yapmaŋdak, mani geni dɨma nandaŋ. Do gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon uŋun kɨla amɨn mɨŋat madep da pɨdaŋ agek abɨsok ekwaŋ amɨn kabɨ dakon aŋpak yokwi uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋokdɨsak.
Niniwe amɨn Jona da Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋban but tobɨl awit. Mani ji da binapmon amɨn kɨnda egɨsak uŋun da Jona yapmaŋ mudosok, mani ji but tobɨl dɨma aŋ. Do gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon Niniwe amɨn da pɨdaŋ agek abɨsok ekwaŋ amɨn kabɨ dakon aŋpak yokwi uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋokdaŋ.”
Yesu da sigɨn yagɨt, “Amɨn da lam koleŋ pasɨlɨgwan yopba dɨma toŋ. Bo ae kwoba baŋ wutjɨba dɨma toŋ. Noman tamokon yopba taŋ teŋteŋaŋakwan amɨn da wɨŋ teŋteŋɨ koŋ.
Dabɨlgo uŋun gɨptɨmgo dakon teŋteŋɨ. Dabɨlgo tagɨsi kaŋ, gɨptɨmgo kaloŋ teŋteŋɨni toŋ. Mani dabɨlgo yokwi kaŋ, gɨptɨmgo pɨlɨn tuksi tosok.
Yaŋdo, gɨptɨmgo dakon teŋteŋɨ uŋun pɨlɨn tuk asak yaŋ do kaŋ kɨmokgi.
Gɨptɨmgo kaloŋ teŋteŋɨni toŋ ae pɨlɨn tuk kɨnda dɨma tosak kaŋ, gɨptɨmgo lam dakon teŋteŋɨ dakon paŋop pɨndakdal uŋudeŋ teŋteŋokdɨsak.”
Yesu gen yaŋ mudaŋakwan Parisi amɨn kɨnda da yutnikon kwan yɨgek jap nonjil do iyɨgɨt. Iyɨŋban Yesu kɨŋ yutnikon wɨgɨ jap noknok tamokon yɨkgɨt.
Yɨgek mibɨltok kɨsirɨ dɨma sugaŋek jap naŋban Parisi amɨn uŋun da kaŋek dɨma agagɨ asak yaŋ nandagɨt.
Aban Amɨn Tagɨ da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Parisi amɨn ji kap ɨdapyo dakon manji baŋgɨn sugoŋ. Mani kabo gat ae aŋpak yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ gat uŋun butjigwan tugawit da toŋ.
Ji nandaŋ kokwinji tagɨ mɨni! Piŋkop da manji baŋ gɨn dɨma, burɨ gat kɨsi wasagɨt.
Ji bupmɨ amɨn do but dasi galak taŋek paŋpulugoni kaŋ, ji amɨn kɨlegɨsi.
“Mani Parisi amɨn, awa! Ji jap tam galagɨsi pi kagasi toŋ uŋun paŋ kabi 10 kabɨ yopmaŋek uŋun kabɨkon baŋ kabi kɨndanaŋ Piŋkop do paret aŋ. Mani gen kokwin kɨlegɨ agak gat, ae Piŋkop do but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨm uŋun ji dɨma aŋ. Aŋpak kɨlegɨ uŋun gat ae paretyo kɨsi ani kaŋ tagɨsi.
“Parisi amɨn, awa! Ji muwut muwut yut madepmon tamo mibɨltogɨ uŋudon yɨt do galagɨ nandaŋ. Ae amɨn da maket tamokon nandaba wukwan damɨŋek gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ dayɨni do galagɨ nandaŋ.
“Parisi amɨn, awa! Ji amɨn kɨmakbi yopyop tamo mɨktɨmgwan taŋakwa amɨn da dɨma pɨndagek kwenikon bamaŋ akwaŋ ji uŋun yombem.”
Gen teban mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn kɨnda da gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, Parisi amɨn do gen uŋun yaŋek, ninyo kɨsi pabɨŋ nipmaŋdal.”
Yaŋban Yesu da yagɨt, “Gen teban mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn jiyo kɨsi, awa! Ji amɨn gen teban mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ jɨgɨsi guramɨtni do yoyaŋ, mani kɨsitjok kɨnda yomɨŋek paŋpulugaŋek guramɨt do dɨmasi nandaŋ.
“Awa! Ji kombɨ amɨn dakon bumjot tamo wasoŋ. Mani babɨkji da dapba kɨmakgwit.
Babɨkji da kombɨ amɨn dapba kɨmakgwit uŋun dakon bumjot tamoni ji da paŋtɨlɨm aŋ. Yaŋ aŋ uŋun babɨknin da tagɨsi dapba kɨmakgwit yaŋ nandaŋ dakon tɨlak asak.
Uŋun do aŋek Piŋkop da nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsikon da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Nak da kombɨ amɨno gat ae yabekbi kabɨno gat uŋun amɨn kabɨkon yabetdɨsat. Yabekgo dɨwarɨ dapba kɨmotdaŋ, ae dɨwarɨ yo yokwisi aŋyomdaŋ.’
Yaŋ do aŋek Piŋkop da mɨktɨm wasagɨron da kombɨ amɨn morap dapba kɨmakgwit uŋun dakon kobogɨ amɨn abɨsok ekwaŋ uŋun da tɨmɨtdaŋ.
Wasok wasok do amɨn kɨlegɨ Abel aŋagek ae amɨn dɨwarɨ dapmaŋakwa wɨgɨ wasɨp do Sekaraia Telagɨ Yut Madep ae altayo da binapmon aŋakba kɨmakgɨt uŋun dakon kobogɨ yo jɨgɨsi amɨn abɨsok ekwaŋ uŋun da tɨmɨtdaŋ.
“Gen teban mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn, awa! Nandak nandak pakpak tamo dakon yoma wɨtdal dɨsi kɨlɨ gwayewit. Dɨsi uŋungwan dɨma wɨgɨwit. Aŋek uŋungwan wɨgɨk do awit amɨn ji da kosit sopsop aŋyomgwit.”
Yesu uŋun yut egɨpgut yɨpmaŋ degakwan gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat ae Parisi amɨn gat da Yesu do uwal aŋ ɨmɨŋek gen mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ iyɨwit.
Aŋkewalno suŋ kɨnda yaŋakwan gen pikon yɨpneŋ yaŋon da iyɨwit.
Amɨn tausen morapmɨ da abɨŋ muwugek gɨtni gɨtnisi aŋek notni bamaŋ bamaŋ aŋakwa Yesu da mibɨltok paŋdetni baŋ kalɨp yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Parisi amɨn dakon yisni do kaŋ kɨmotni. Uŋun jamba but amɨnsi ekwaŋ.
Yo morap gwɨlɨgwan toŋ uŋun altaŋ teŋteŋaŋ mudokdaŋ. Ae yo morap pasɨlɨ toŋ uŋun amɨn da nandaba pɨsokdaŋ.
Do gen morap ji da pɨlɨn tukgwan yawit uŋun amɨn da teŋteŋɨkon nandakdaŋ. Ae gen morap yut kagagwan gen pɨsɨgon da yawit uŋun yut kwenon wɨgɨ gen papmon da yoyɨŋ teŋteŋokdaŋ.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Not kabɨ, yaŋsi dayɨsat. Amɨn da gɨptɨm dapba kɨmagakwa uŋun da kwenon yo dɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma akdaŋ, do uŋun do dɨma pasolni.
Mani namɨn amɨn dosi pasolni uŋun do dayɨkdɨsat. Ji Piŋkop do pasolni. Piŋkop da gɨptɨm dapban kɨmagakwa Tɨpdomon maban pɨgɨni uŋun dakon tapmɨm taŋ ɨmɨsak. Asisi dayɨsat, ji Piŋkop dosi pasolni.
Mɨnam monɨŋ uŋun yo monɨŋɨsok, 5 kabɨ dakon yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun moneŋ gɨman tabɨlɨ bamorɨ gɨn. Mani Piŋkop da mɨnam monɨŋgok uŋun dakon kɨndasok dɨmasi ɨŋtaŋ ɨmgut.
Piŋkop da busuŋ daŋgwanji niaŋ da toŋ uŋun kɨsisi nandaŋ mudosok, do ji dɨma pasolni. Mɨnam monɨŋ monɨŋ morapmɨ dakon yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun madep dɨma, mani ji dakon yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun wukwisi.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak da yaŋsi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda da ‘Nak Yesu dakon amɨn kɨnda’ yaŋ amɨn yoyɨsak kaŋ, Amɨn Dakon Monji da Piŋkop dakon aŋelo kabɨnikon uŋun amɨn nak dakon amɨn kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨsak.
Mani amɨn kɨnda ‘Nak Yesu dakon amɨn dɨma’ yaŋ amɨn yoyɨsak kaŋ, nakyo kɨsi Piŋkop dakon aŋelo kabɨnikon uŋun amɨn nak dakon amɨn dɨma yaŋ yoyɨkeŋ.
Amɨn morap Amɨn Dakon Monji do yaŋba yokwi tok ani amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da dɨwarɨni yopmaŋ yomdɨsak, mani amɨn morap Telagɨ Wup do yaŋba yokwi tok ani amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da dɨwarɨni dɨma yopmaŋ yomdɨsak.
“Amɨn da ji Juda amɨn dakon muwut muwut yut madepmon, bo gapmanon, bo ae amɨn mani wukwi da ɨŋamon paŋkɨ depni bɨsapmon, dɨsi kutnok do aŋek ni gen baŋ yoyɨneŋ yaŋ nandaŋek nandaba kɨk dɨma ani.
Uŋun bɨsapmonsi ni gen baŋ yoyɨni uŋun Telagɨ Wup da dayɨŋ detdɨsak.”
Uŋun amɨn kabɨ madepgwan da amɨn kɨnda da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, peno iyɨŋbɨ datnit da yo morap yopgut uŋun kokwinɨk dɨwarɨ nak do namjak.”
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Not, namɨn da jilon gen kokwin pi aŋek yo kabɨsil kokwinɨk dabeŋ do manjɨŋ nepgut?”
Yaŋ yaŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kaŋ kɨmotni. Yo mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt dakon galagɨ dɨ pabam. Yo kabɨsi uŋun morapmɨsi kaŋ, uŋun da egɨp egɨp bamɨsi arɨpmɨ dɨma damdaŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋek tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yoni morapmɨ amɨn kɨnda dakon pigagani jap bamɨ tagɨsi morapmɨ tawit.
Aŋakwa amɨn uŋun iyɨ yaŋ nandagɨt, ‘Jap bamɨ yopbeŋ dakon tamo kɨlɨ tugaŋ, do ae dɨ gat yopbeŋ dakon tamo arɨpmɨ dɨma, do niaŋsi abeŋ?’
Yaŋ nandaŋek yagɨt, ‘Nak yaŋsi abeŋ: Jap yopyop yutno kɨsi tuwɨlek madepsi wutjɨŋek wit gat ae yo kabɨno gat kɨsi uŋun yutnon yopbeŋ.
Yaŋ aŋek naga do yaŋsi yokeŋ, “Nak bɨlak morapmɨ tagɨsi egɨ aŋaŋ kɨkeŋ dakon yo morapno arɨpmɨsi. Do yaworɨsi egek jap pakbiyo madepsi aŋek bɨsap morapmɨ kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek egɨpbeŋ.” ’
“Mani Piŋkop da iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak nandaŋ kokwingo tagɨ mɨni. Gak abɨsok kalbi kɨmotdɨsal. Yo morapgo gaga do paŋkosit agɨl uŋun amɨn da tɨmɨtdaŋ.’ ”
Yesu da gen uŋun yaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn yoni morapmɨ paŋmuwut do pi aŋegek Piŋkop do dɨma nandaŋek ekwaŋ amɨn, uŋun amɨnon yo yaŋsi altokdɨsak.”
Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yaŋsi dayɨsat, egɨp egɨpji do nandaba kɨk aŋek ‘Jap dukon baŋ noneŋ’ bo ae gɨptɨmji do nandaba kɨk aŋek ‘Ɨmal dukon baŋ paneŋ’ yaŋ dɨma nandani.
Egɨp egɨp da jap yapmaŋdak, ae gɨptɨm da ɨmal yapmaŋdak.
Ji mɨnam do nandani. Jap yet dɨma kwaokgaŋ, ae jap dɨma paŋ, ae jap paŋmuwut yutni mɨni. Mani Piŋkop da jap upmokdok. Mɨnam dakon yumaŋ nogɨ pɨŋbisi aŋakwa amɨn ji dakon yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun madepsi.
Ji nandaba kɨk aŋek egɨp egɨpji tɨmɨsok dɨ gat tagɨ saŋbeŋba wɨgɨsak yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨmasi.
Yo monɨŋɨsok uŋuden ji da arɨpmɨ dɨmasi agagɨ, do nido yo dɨwarɨ morap do nandaba kɨk aŋ?
“Jareŋ oni taŋ aŋaŋ kwaŋ uŋun do nandani. Pi madep aŋek ɨmal dɨma bupmaŋgaŋ. Mani yaŋ dayɨsat, jareŋ pɨndakgaŋ uŋun dakon tɨlɨmni da kalɨp kɨla amɨn madep Solomon dakon tɨlɨmni tagɨsi pagɨt uŋun yapmaŋdak.
On joŋ taŋ aŋaŋ kwaŋ uŋun aŋwa amɨn da baljaŋ kɨndapmon sokdaŋ. Mani Piŋkop da si paŋtɨlɨm asak, do nandaŋ gadatji pɨsɨpmɨsok amɨn ji yaŋsi nandani, Piŋkop da ji do nandaban yo madepsi aŋakwan ɨmal tɨlɨmɨ toŋsi baŋ paŋ damdɨsak.
Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn kabɨ da yo morap uŋuden wusɨŋ pɨndat do pini aŋ. Mani Datji da yo uŋun do wadak wadak aŋ uŋun nandɨsak, do ji jap pakbiyo dukon baŋ noneŋ yaŋ nandaŋek nandaba kɨk dɨma ani.
<range>
Nandaba kɨkji yɨpmaŋek Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni uŋun wɨsɨŋ kok do pi ani. Yaŋ aŋakwa yo dɨwarɨ do wadak wadak aŋ uŋun kɨsi damdɨsak.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Sipsip kabɨsok, ji dɨma pasolni. Datji da iyɨ Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan egɨpni do tagɨsi nandɨsak.
Ji yo morapji taŋ damaŋ uŋun yopba amɨn da yumaŋ noni. Yaŋ aba moneŋ tɨmɨgek yoni mɨni amɨn do yomni. Aŋek yo kabɨsi tagɨsi Kwen Kokupmon paŋmuwuk yopba uŋudon tagɨsi tokdaŋ. Uŋun tamokon toni kaŋ, yo kabɨsi dɨma pasɨldaŋ, ae kabo noknok da dɨma tɨmɨtdaŋ, ae yo monɨŋ da dɨma nokdaŋ.
Yo kabɨsi tagɨsi dukwan toŋ, but nandak nandakyosi kɨsi uŋudon gɨn tokdɨsak.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji ɨmalji paŋek lamji koleŋek tagap taŋek egɨpni.
Oman monjɨ da tagap taŋek amɨn tagɨni da mɨŋat pakpak dakon soŋnogon da tobɨl apjak do jomjom aŋek ekwaŋ ji yaŋ gɨn tagap toni. Do ni bɨsapmon abɨŋ yoma domon tɨdosak ji yoma tepmɨ wɨtdal ɨmni.
Oman monjɨ amɨn tagɨni da pɨndakban tagap taŋek ekwaŋ kaŋ tagɨsi. Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn tagɨni da iyɨ oman dakon ɨmal paŋek oman monjɨ yoyɨŋban jap tamokon pabɨŋ yɨgakwa iyɨ jap yomdɨsak.
Amɨn tagɨ uŋun kalbi binap bo wɨsa dagokdosi abɨŋ pɨndakban tagap taŋek egɨpni kaŋ tagɨsi.
Ji yaŋ nandani. Yut kɨnda dakon ami kalbi kabo noknok ni bɨsapmon apjak yaŋ nandagɨt tam, kɨla aŋakwan arɨpmɨ dɨma tuwɨlban.
Ji kɨsi tagap taŋek egɨpni. Dɨma apjak yaŋ nandaŋakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋudon apdɨsak.”
Pita da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, tɨlak gen yal uŋun nin dogɨn yal, bo ae amɨn kɨsi do yal?”
Yaŋban Amɨn Tagɨ da yagɨt, “Oman monjɨ kɨnda nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi ae pi agakni tagɨsi, uŋuden oman monjɨ amɨn tagɨni da oman monjɨni dɨwarɨ kɨlani asak do manjɨsak. Yaŋ aban jap yomyom bɨsapmon japni yomɨŋ yomɨŋ asak.
Oman monjɨ uŋun amɨn tagɨni da tobɨl abɨŋ kaŋban pini tagɨsi asak kaŋ tagɨsi.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn tagɨni da uŋun oman monjɨ iyɨŋban yo morapni kɨla akdɨsak.
Mani uŋun oman monjɨ burɨkon da amɨn tagɨni tepmɨ dɨma apdɨsak yaŋ nandaŋek oman monjɨ gat ae oman mɨŋat gat dapmaŋek jap pakbiyo madep aŋek pakbi tebanyo kɨsi naŋ but upbal asak kaŋ,
dɨma apdɨsak yaŋ nandaŋakwan amɨn tagɨni da but pɨsogɨ mɨni abɨŋ uŋun oman monjɨ tepmɨ pi ɨmɨŋek gen kɨrɨŋɨt amɨn kabɨ gat yopban egɨpdaŋ.
Oman monjɨ kɨnda amɨn tagɨni dakon galaktokni nandaŋek tagap taŋek galaktokni dɨma yoljak kaŋ, amɨn tagɨ da kosirɨ morapmɨ baljokdɨsak.
Mani oman monjɨ kɨnda amɨn tagɨni dakon galaktokni dɨma nandaŋek aŋpak yokwi si baljoni da arɨpmon asak kaŋ, amɨn tagɨni da kosirɨ morapmɨ dɨma baljokdɨsak. Yo morapmɨ tɨmɨkgaŋ amɨn uŋun yo morapmɨ paŋtobɨl yomyomɨ. Yo morapmɨ kɨla ani do dabi amɨn uŋun yo morapmɨ paŋtobɨl yomyomɨ.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak mɨktɨmon kɨndap sokeŋ do pɨgɨm. Kɨlɨsi kwaŋ sok tam tagɨ.
Nak tepmɨ madepsi pakdɨsat. Butno jɨk tosok, do pako dagosak dosi nandɨsat.
Nak amɨn da mɨktɨmon but yawot pani yaŋ do pɨgɨm yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Uŋun dɨma. Yaŋ dayɨsat, nak mɨktɨm amɨnon pɨdok pɨdok paŋalon ak do pɨgɨm.
Abɨsok da wasaŋek amɨn yurɨ kɨndakon amɨn 5 kabɨ da pɨdaŋ kɨŋek bamorɨ da kapbɨ gat uwal uwal akdaŋ. Ae kapbɨ da bamorɨ gat uwal uwal akdaŋ.
Waseŋ kɨŋek dat da monji gat pɨdok pɨdok akdamal, ae meŋ da gwi gat pɨdok pɨdok akdamal, ae mɨŋat kɨnda gat namdi gat pɨdok pɨdok akdamal.”
Amɨn kabɨ madepsi yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji gɨldat da si pɨgɨsak tetgɨn do meŋi wamaŋdak yaŋ pɨndagek ‘Sɨkak mokdɨsak’ yaŋ yaŋakwa asi sɨkak mosok.
Ae saut tetgɨn dakon mɨrɨm madep abɨŋakwan ji da yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Gɨldat tepmɨsi wusɨkdɨsak.’ Yaŋ yaŋakwa asi gɨldat tepmɨsi wusɨsak.
Jamba but amɨn, ji da mɨktɨmon ae kwen yo morap toŋ pɨndagek kokwin tagɨsi aŋ. Mani abɨsok yo morap altoŋ uŋun pɨndagek kokwin nido tagɨ dɨma aŋ?”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji dɨsi aŋpak yokwi tagɨyo nido dɨma kokwinɨkgaŋ?
Amɨn kɨnda da gen yaŋ gam do aban gen kokwin tamokon kɨk do kosiron kɨnjil bɨsapmon genjil uŋun yaŋ aŋmɨlɨp ak do pi anjil. Yaŋ dɨma aŋek kwal gen kokwin kɨla agak amɨn da obip amɨn da kɨsiron gepban uŋun da dam teban yutnon gepdɨsak.
Nak asisi gayɨsat, gak dam tebanon sigɨn egaki wɨgɨ moneŋ niaŋ yopbi do gayɨni uŋun kɨsisi yopmaŋek don waŋga kɨkdɨsal.”
Yesu da gen uŋun yaŋ mudaŋakwan amɨn dɨwarɨ da Pailat da yo agɨt uŋun do iyɨwit. Pailat da obip amɨni yoyɨŋban kɨŋ Galili amɨn dɨwarɨ Piŋkop do mukwa soŋakwa uŋun dapba kɨmakgwit. Do uŋun amɨn dakon yawini gat ae paret do yo mukwa sowit dakon yawini kɨsi mawit.
Uŋun do iyɨŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Niaŋ nandaŋ? Galili amɨn kɨmakgwit uŋun dakon yokwini da Galili amɨn dɨwarɨ dakon yokwini yapgut, uŋun do aŋek jɨgɨ uŋun pawit yaŋ nandaŋ?
Uŋun dɨmasi! Nak asisi dayɨsat, ji but tobɨl dɨma ani kaŋ, uŋun amɨn kabɨ da kɨmakgwit jiyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn kɨmotdaŋ.
Bo Silom yut dubak tuwɨl kɨ maŋ amɨn 18 kabɨ wɨtjɨŋban kɨmakgwit do nandani. Uŋun amɨn kabɨ dakon yokwini da Jerusalem amɨn dɨwarɨ dakon yokwini yapgut uŋun do aŋek pasɨlgwit yaŋ nandaŋ?
Uŋunyo kɨsi dɨmasi! Nak asisi dayɨsat, ji but tobɨl dɨma ani kaŋ, jiyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn kɨmotdaŋ.”
Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da wain pinikon pik kɨndap kɨnda kwaokgɨt. Bɨsap kɨnda bamɨ wɨsɨk do kɨgɨt, mani bamɨ mɨni pɨndakgɨt.
Bamɨ mɨni pɨndagek pi kɨla amɨni yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Nandaki. Nak bɨlak kapbɨ abɨŋ pik kɨndap dakon sopmɨ wɨsɨŋ wɨsɨŋ aŋek mɨni pɨndakdat. Yaŋ do kɨndap on si pasɨki. Mɨktɨm dakon tapmɨm nido ɨsal dogɨn ɨlɨk mudosok?’
“Yaŋban pi kɨla amɨn da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, yum kaŋbɨ bɨlak kɨnda gat atjak. Aŋakwan mibɨlɨkon mɨktɨm wayɨgek yalɨk yopbeŋ.
Bɨlak kwenikon bamɨ tosak kaŋ tagɨsi. Mani bamɨ dɨma tosak kaŋ, tagɨ pasɨki.’ ”
Sabat bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu da Juda amɨn dakon muwut muwut yut kɨndakon amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
Uŋudon mɨŋat kɨnda egɨpgut. Uŋun koŋ kɨnda da yɨgek abɨdaŋakwan sot aŋakwan bɨlak 18 agɨt. Manji gɨroŋɨkgɨt, do kwen kɨlegɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma akgɨt.
Yesu da kaŋek iyɨŋban opban yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mɨŋat, sotgo kɨlɨ gepmaŋ dek kɨk.”
Yaŋ iyɨŋek kɨsirɨ kwenikon wutjɨŋban uŋudon gɨn manji kɨlek taŋakwa Piŋkop aŋkɨsigɨt.
Mani muwut muwut yut dakon kɨla amɨn da Sabat bɨsapmon Yesu da amɨn aŋmɨlɨp agɨt uŋun do butjap nandagɨt. Butjap nandaŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Pi agak dakon gɨldat 6 kabɨ toŋ. Uŋun bɨsapmon sot amɨn apba tagɨ paŋmɨlɨp ani. Mani Sabat bɨsapmon dɨmasi ani.”
Yaŋban Amɨn Tagɨ da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ji jamba but amɨn! Ji Sabat bɨsapmon bulmakausi gat ae donkisi gat yutnikon baŋ wɨtdal ɨlɨk paŋkɨ yopba pakbi noŋ, ma?
Mɨŋat on Abraham dakon gwi, Sunduk da tebai abɨdaŋakwan bɨlakni 18 agɨt. Sabat bɨsapmon dɨma pulugaŋ kɨsak do nandaŋ, ma?”
Yaŋ yaŋban uwalni mayagɨ nandawit. Mani mɨŋat amɨnyo Yesu da yo morap wagɨl tagɨsisi agɨt uŋun do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk awit.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni uŋun niaŋsi? Yo ni gat tɨlak abo?
Uŋun mastat yet yombem. Amɨn kɨnda da mastat yet kɨnda pigagani kwaokgɨt. Aŋakwan mastat uŋun kwaŋ madep taŋ kɨndap kɨnda da yaŋ agakwan mɨnam da abɨŋ kɨlɨŋɨkon yutni uŋudon awit.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni yo ni gat tɨlak abo?
Uŋun yis yombem. Mɨŋat kɨnda da plaua ɨdap madep kɨnda gat ɨktagɨldak. Yaŋ aŋakwan plaua uŋun kɨsisi paptaŋ madep tawit.”
Yesu uŋun Jerusalem kokup papmon kɨk do aŋek kokup pap ae kokup monɨŋ monɨŋ tawit uŋudon agek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
Aŋakwan amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, Piŋkop da amɨn kaloŋɨsok dɨ baŋgɨn yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjak bo niaŋ?” Yaŋban Yesu da yoyɨgɨt,
“Nak yaŋsi dayɨsat, amɨn morapmɨ da egɨp egɨpmon wɨgɨk do pini akdaŋ, mani arɨpmɨ dɨma wɨgɨkdaŋ. Do ji yoma kosit gwagak monɨŋɨ naŋ wɨgɨk do pi tebai ani.
Yut dakon ami da pɨdaŋ yoma sopban ji da kɨŋ yomakon agek yoma tɨdaŋek yaŋ yokdaŋ, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ, nin do yoma wɨtdal nim.’ “Mani gen kobogɨ yaŋ dayɨkdɨsak, ‘Nak dɨma nandaŋ damɨsat. Ji dukon nani amɨn?’
“Yaŋ yaŋban ji da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨkdaŋ, ‘Nin gak gat kɨsi egek jap pakbiyo agɨmaŋ. Ae kokup papnin dakon kosit madepmon agek niyɨŋ dekgɨl.’
“Mani uŋun da yaŋ dayɨkdɨsak, ‘Nak asisi dayɨsat, nak dɨma nandaŋ damɨsat. Ji dukon nani uŋun dɨma nandɨsat. Yokwi pakpak ji kɨsisi nepmaŋ dek kɨt!’
“Ji Abraham, Aisak, Jekop, ae kombɨ amɨn kɨsisi Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak kokupmon ekwa pɨndatdaŋ. Mani ji maba waŋga kɨŋ mudokdaŋ. Uŋun bɨsapmon ji kunam tagek iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋ tɨdaŋek egɨpdaŋ.
Amɨn da gɨldat wɨsak ae si pɨgɨsak tet, ae not tet ae saut tet da Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak kokupmon abɨŋek jap noknok tamo madepmon yɨtdaŋ.
Nandani, amɨn dɨwarɨ abɨsok buŋon ekwaŋ, uŋun don mibɨltok amɨn akdaŋ. Ae amɨn dɨwarɨ abɨsok mibɨltok ekwaŋ, uŋun don buŋon amɨn akdaŋ.”
Uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn Parisi amɨn dɨwarɨ da abɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak ɨdon dɨma egɨpbi, kokup dɨgwan kɨki. Erot da gak gɨkban kɨmokgi do nandɨsak.”
Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kɨŋ uŋun top amɨn yaŋ iyɨni, ‘Nandaki. Nak abɨsok ae aŋwa koŋ yolgeŋ, ae sot amɨn paŋmɨlɨp abeŋ. Ae pɨdaŋɨ do pi abeŋ do nandagɨm uŋun aŋwasɨp abeŋ.’
Kombɨ amɨn Jerusalem kokup papmon gɨn dapba kɨmokgoŋ. Kokup ŋwakŋwarɨkon dɨma dapba kɨmokgoŋ, do nak abɨsok ae aŋwa ae pɨdaŋɨ do sigɨn kɨkeŋ.
“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem amɨn, ji kombɨ amɨn dapba kɨmokgoŋ. Amɨn Piŋkop da yabekban jikon abaŋ uŋun ji da tɨpbaŋ dapba kɨmokgoŋ. Pup meŋi da monjini paŋmuwuk pɨrɨgwan yopmaŋdak, uŋun da tɨlak nak da bɨsap morapmɨ ji paŋmuwut do nandagɨm, mani ji da kurak taŋ namgwit.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, kokup yomasiyo yokwi taŋek yumsi tokdɨsak. Ji nak dɨma nandaŋek egɨ wɨgɨ ni bɨsapmon nak do ‘Amɨn on Amɨn Tagɨ da manon abɨsak, uŋun Piŋkop da gɨsamɨgakwan abɨsak’ yaŋ nak do yoni uŋun bɨsapmon nandakdaŋ.”
Sabat kɨndakon Yesu jap nok do Parisi amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn kɨnda da yutnon kɨgɨt. Aŋakwan yɨpba kɨk aŋek kaŋ yɨkgwit,
nido Yesu da buron gɨptɨmɨ paptaŋbi amɨn kɨnda yɨkgɨt.
Yesu da uŋun amɨn kaŋek gen teban mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn gat ae Parisi amɨn gat yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Sabat bɨsapmon sot amɨn tagɨ paŋmɨlɨp aneŋ bo dɨma? Gen teban da niaŋ yosok?”
Mani gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma iyɨwit. Yaŋ aŋakwa Yesu da amɨn uŋun abɨdaŋek aŋmɨlɨp aŋek dɨgo kɨ yaŋ iyɨŋban si kɨgɨt.
Kɨŋakwan yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jikon da kɨnda dakon monji bo bulmakauni Sabat bɨsapmon pakbi gapmakon maŋban tepmɨ tagɨ ɨlɨkba wɨsak bo dɨma?”
Yaŋban gen kobogɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma iyɨgɨ yaŋ kawit.
Yesu da amɨn jap nok do apgwit uŋun pɨndakban tamo mibɨltogɨ nanikon gɨn yɨt do awit. Do tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
“Amɨn kɨnda da mɨŋat pakpak dakon soŋnogon yaŋ gaban kɨki kaŋ, tamo mibɨltogɨ nanikon dɨma yɨkgi. Tamo uŋun amɨn madep kɨnda gak gwapmaŋdak uŋun do manjɨkbi naŋ dɨ yɨkbɨm.
Yaŋ kaŋ amɨn yaŋ daban kɨki uŋun da abɨŋ yaŋ gayɨsak, ‘On tamo on amɨn do ɨmɨŋ.’ Yaŋ gayɨŋban gak gaga do mayagɨsi nandaŋek tamo amɨn pɨŋbisi do yopbi uŋudon paŋkɨ yɨtdɨsal.
Amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ gaban kaŋ, gak tamo amɨn pɨŋbisi do yopbi uŋudon paŋkɨ yɨkgi. Yɨgaki amɨn yaŋ gamjak uŋun da ‘Not, on tamo tagɨkon pawɨŋ yɨt’ yaŋ gayɨŋban pawɨŋ yɨgaki amɨn dɨwarɨ da amɨn mani toŋ kɨnda yaŋ gandani.
Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ do nandaban wugɨsak kaŋ, Piŋkop da uŋun amɨn abɨŋ yɨpdɨsak. Mani amɨn kɨnda iyɨ do nandaban pɨsak kaŋ, Piŋkop da mani awɨgɨkdɨsak.”
Yesu da amɨn uŋun yaŋ ɨban kɨgɨt uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak jap noknok kɨnda asal kaŋ, notgo, bo ae pego padɨk padɨkgo bo ae yawi dɨwatgo bo ae yoni morapmɨ amɨn dɨbaŋ dɨma yaŋ yobi. Uŋun da kobogɨ do don yaŋ gamdaŋ.
Gak jap noknok kɨnda abi kaŋ, yoni mɨni amɨn, ae gɨptɨmɨ yokwi taŋbi, ae kandap yokwi ae dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn baŋgɨn yaŋ yobi.
Yaŋ abi kaŋ, gak kɨsɨk kɨsɨgɨ toŋsi egɨpbi. Uŋuden amɨn kobogɨ tagɨ dɨma gamni, mani Piŋkop da amɨn kɨlegɨ kɨmoron baŋ paban pɨdoni bɨsapmon don kobogɨ gamdɨsak.”
Amɨn kɨnda jap nawitgwan da gen uŋun nandaŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak kokupmon yɨgek jap nokdaŋ amɨn uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.”
Mani Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da jap madepsi kɨnda paŋkosit aŋek amɨn morapmɨ yaŋ yomgut.
Jap noknok bɨsapmon oman monjɨni kɨnda yabekban amɨn yaŋ yomgut uŋun yoyɨk do kɨgɨt. Kɨŋ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Yo morap kɨlɨ paŋkosit abi, do ji tagɨ opni.’
“Mani amɨn kɨsisi dɨma op do yawit. Kɨnda da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Nak pi kɨnda kaluk yumɨt uŋun kɨŋ kokeŋ. Do nandaŋ namɨŋaki dɨma opbeŋ.’
“Ae kɨnda da yagɨt, ‘Nak pi agak bulmakau 10 kabɨ yumɨt, uŋun kɨŋ paŋkɨlɨk pɨndatgeŋ. Do nandaŋ namɨŋaki dɨma opbeŋ.’
“Ae kɨnda da yagɨt, ‘Nak mɨŋat kaluk pat, do arɨpmɨ dɨma opbeŋ.’
“Oman monjɨni tobɨl obɨŋ amɨn tagɨni amɨn yoyɨŋban gen yawit dakon mibɨlɨ iyɨgɨt. Iyɨŋban yut uŋun dakon ami uŋun da butjap nandaŋek oman monjɨni tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak tepmɨsi kokup madep da kosit madep ae kosit monɨŋon kɨŋ, amɨn yoni mɨni, ae gɨptɨmɨ yokwi taŋbi, ae dabɨlɨ mɨni, ae kandap yokwi uŋun tɨmɨk paŋopbi.’
“Yaŋ iyɨŋban oman monjɨ da yaŋ gɨn aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, yo abeŋ dosi nayɨl uŋun kɨlɨ aŋmudat, mani tamo toŋ.’
“Iyɨŋban amɨn tagɨ da oman monjɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak kokup madep yɨpmaŋek kɨŋ kosit madepmon bo ae pigaga da dam kɨdɨpmɨŋ agek amɨn pɨndak tebai yoyɨŋbɨ abɨŋ yɨkba yutno tugosak.
Nak yaŋsi dayɨsat, amɨn uŋun kalɨp yaŋ yomgum uŋun da nak dakon jap jɨmjɨmjok kɨnda dɨmasi nokdaŋ.’ ”
Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi yolakwa Yesu da tobɨlek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
“Amɨn kɨnda nak nol do nandɨsak kaŋ, meŋi datni, ae mɨŋatni gwakniyo gat, ae peni samɨni padɨgeyo gat, ae iyɨ dakon egɨp egɨpni gat kɨsi do uwal dɨma aŋyomjak kaŋ, uŋuden amɨn nak dakon paŋdetno arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpjak.
Tɨlak kɨndapni guramɨgek dɨma noljak amɨn paŋdetno arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpjak.
Amɨn kɨnda yut madep kɨnda ak do kaŋ, mibɨltok yɨgek moneŋni manjɨsak. Aŋek yut tagɨ aŋ mudogɨ bo dɨma uŋun dakon nandak nandak asak.
Yaŋ dɨma aŋek yut gwak maŋek yo dɨwarɨ do wadaŋek yut dɨma aŋ mudosok kaŋ, amɨn morap koni uŋun kɨsi jɨgɨlak yaŋek yanjaŋ ɨmdaŋ.
Aŋek yaŋ yokdaŋ, ‘On amɨn yutni aŋ dɨwarɨkgɨt, mani wasɨp ak do aŋtɨdok asak.’
Bo kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda da uwalni gat emat wam do nandɨsak kaŋ, mibɨltok nandaŋ kokwin asak. Iyɨ dakon emat amɨn 10 tausen da uwalni dakon 20 tausen tagɨ yolni bo dɨma, yaŋ do nandak nandak asak.
Tagɨ dɨma yolni yaŋ nandɨsak kaŋ, uwalni kapmat dɨma abɨŋakwa amɨn kabi kɨnda yabekban kɨŋ emat dɨma wamni do gen yoyɨŋ paŋyawot aŋ.
Jiyo yaŋ gɨn yo morapji dɨma yopmaŋ mudoni kaŋ, paŋdetnoni tagɨ dɨma egɨpni.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Tap uŋun yo tagɨsi kɨnda. Mani galagɨni pasɨlni kaŋ, niaŋsi aŋek galagɨni aŋkaluk aneŋ?
Tap uŋuden mɨktɨm arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋpulugogɨ. Bo bulmakau dakon kok gat ɨktagɨlɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma. Tap uŋuden ɨsal mamno kwaŋ. Mɨrakni toŋ amɨn da gen on pakyaŋsi nandaŋek mibɨlɨ nandaŋ pɨsoni.”
Takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn gat ae yokwi pakpak amɨn gat da geni nandak do Yesu da kapmatjok opgwit.
Aŋakwa Parisi amɨn gat gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat da yaŋba yokwi tok aŋek yaŋ yawit, “On amɨn yokwi pakpak amɨn not aŋyoban yɨgek jap noŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
“Jikon da amɨn kɨnda sipsipni 100 baŋ kaloŋɨ da pasɨljak kaŋ niaŋ asak? Uŋun da sipsip 99 joŋ tɨmon yopban egakwa kaloŋɨ pasɨldak uŋun wɨsɨŋek don aŋalon asak.
Wɨsɨŋ kaŋ abɨdosok bɨsapmon but galak nandaŋek kwapmɨkon guramɨk aŋaŋ
yomanikon aŋkɨsak. Aŋkɨŋek notni gat ae kokup ɨsalni gat yaŋ yoban obɨŋ muwukba yaŋ yoyɨsak, ‘Sipsipno pasɨlak uŋun kɨlɨ wɨsɨŋ kat, do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ano.’ ”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, yokwi pakpak kɨnda da but tobɨl asak kaŋ, Kwen Kokupmon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi yaŋ gɨn akdaŋ. Amɨn 99 uŋun kɨlegɨ do but tobɨl agagɨ mɨni do uŋun dakon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madep dɨma ani. Mani yokwi pakpak kɨnda but tobɨl asak uŋun dakon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk uŋun madepsi noman tosok.”
Ae Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Mɨŋat kɨnda da silwa moneŋ tabɨlɨ 10 kabɨ baŋ kaloŋɨ da yutnon maŋ pasɨljak kaŋ uŋun niaŋ asak? Uŋun da lamni koleŋek yutni ɨkdɨgaŋek tebaisi wɨsɨŋek don kosak.
Kaŋ abɨdosok bɨsapmon but galak nandaŋek notni gat ae kokup ɨsalni gat yoyɨŋban obɨŋ muwukba yaŋ yoyɨsak, ‘Moneŋno pasɨlak uŋun kɨlɨ wɨsɨŋ kat, do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ano.’ ”
Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, yokwi pakpak kɨnda da but tobɨl asak kaŋ, Piŋkop dakon aŋelo da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk yaŋ gɨn akdaŋ.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut uŋun monji bamorɨ.
Monjɨ buŋon nani da datni yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Dat, gak peno gat nit do yo morap nim do nandɨsal uŋun nak dakon dɨwarɨno abɨsok kokwinɨk nabi.’ Yaŋ yaŋban datni da yo kabɨni kokwinɨk monjɨ bamotni do yomgut.
“Yoban bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok egek monji buŋon nani da yo kabɨni kɨsisi tɨmɨk dubagɨsi kɨŋ mɨktɨm kɨndakon paŋkɨ egɨpgut. Paŋkɨ egek aŋpak yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ aŋek moneŋni naŋ mudagɨt.
Moneŋni naŋ mudaŋakwan uŋun mɨktɨm amɨn da jap do madepsi aŋek dɨwarɨ da kɨmakgwit. Aŋakwa monji uŋun wadak wadak madepsi agɨt.
Do kɨŋ uŋun mɨktɨm dakon amɨn kɨndakon pi kɨnda abɨdagɨt. Aban amɨn tagɨni da yabekban bɨt damnikon kɨŋ bɨt jap yomgut.
Aŋek bɨt da bɨrap gɨp nawit uŋun pɨndak galak taŋek uŋun baŋ naŋek butno kadɨm tosak yaŋ nandagɨt. Mani amɨn kɨnda da jap kɨnda dɨma ɨmgut.
“Nandak nandakni kulabɨk aŋek yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Datno dakon oman monjɨ morapni uŋun japni arɨpmɨsi taŋ yomaŋakwa ekwaŋ, mani nak ɨdon egek jap do kɨmotdɨsat.
Do yaŋsi abeŋ, nak tobɨl kɨŋ datno yaŋ iyɨkeŋ: “Dat, nak Piŋkop da ɨŋamon ae gak yo kɨsikon yo yokwisi agɨm,
