do buŋon monjɨno yaŋ dɨma nayɨki. Yum oman monjɨgo yumaŋ naŋaki ekwaŋ uŋuden kɨnda da tɨlak egɨpbeŋ.” ’
Yaŋ nandaŋek pɨdaŋ datnikon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwan datni dubagɨkon da monji kaŋ bupmɨ nandaŋ tɨmtɨm yaŋek kɨŋ monji bedaŋek mandaŋ nagɨt.
Yaŋ aban monji da datni yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Dat, nak Piŋkop da ɨŋamon ae gagon yo yokwisi agɨm, do buŋon monjɨno yaŋ dɨma nayɨki.’
Mani datni da oman monjɨni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Monjɨno kɨmoron da yaŋ abɨsak. Pasɨlbikon naŋ aŋalon amaŋ. Do ji tepmɨ kɨŋ paba pɨgɨk dubagɨ tagɨsi kɨnda aŋabɨŋ paŋ ɨmni. Ae kɨsirɨkon sɨp tagɨsi kɨnda yɨpmaŋ ɨmɨŋek kandap gwɨl kɨsi paŋ ɨmni. Ae bulmakau monjɨ nelagɨ toŋ kɨnda naŋ aŋapba aŋak soŋ naŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ano.’ Datni da yaŋ yaŋakwan jap noknok aŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk awit.
<range>
<range>
Yaŋ aŋek egakwa monji mibɨltogɨ pigaga egɨpgut da yutnon obɨŋ aŋkapmat aŋek nandaban amɨn da kap kɨsɨk kɨsɨkyo awit.
Yaŋ aŋakwa nandaŋek oman monjɨ kɨnda yaŋ ɨban apban iyɨgɨt, ‘Uŋun nibaŋ aŋ?’
Yaŋ yaŋban iyɨgɨt, ‘Padɨgɨgo tagɨsi egɨsak da abɨk do datgo da kaŋek bulmakau monjɨ nelagɨ toŋ aŋwak.’
Yaŋ iyɨŋban monji mibɨltogɨ butjap nandaŋek yutnon wɨgɨk do kurak tagɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan datni da yomakon pɨŋek butni maŋakwan yutnon wɨgɨsak do iyɨgɨt.
Mani datni yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Dat, gak yaŋ nido asal? Nak oman monjɨ ɨsalɨ kɨnda da yaŋ bɨlak morapmɨ egek omango aŋ egɨsat. Aŋek gengo bɨsap kɨndakon dɨma kɨrɨŋɨkgɨm. Notnoni gat kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aneŋ do memesok kɨnda dɨmasi namgul.
Mani monjɨgo on yo morapgo kosit mɨŋat gat egek yomɨŋ mudagɨt, uŋun da apban kaŋek bulmakau monjɨ nelagɨ toŋ uŋun aŋwal.’
Yaŋban datni da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Monjɨno, bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ gak nak gat ekwamak. Ae yo morapno uŋun gak dakon gɨn.
Mani padɨgɨgo kɨmoron da yaŋ abɨk, ae pasɨlbikon naŋ aŋalon amaŋ, do nin but kwaktok nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨsi amaŋ.’ ”
Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yoni morapmɨ amɨn kɨnda gat ae yo morapni dakon kɨla amɨni gat egɨpgumal. Amɨn da abɨŋ yoni morapmɨ amɨn yaŋ iyɨwit, ‘Yo morapgo dakon kɨla amɨn ɨsal dogɨn yo morapgo naŋ mudok aŋgamɨsak.’
“Iyɨŋba nandaŋek yo kɨla amɨni uŋun yaŋ ɨban opban yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak niaŋ aŋaki gengo nandat? Gak kɨŋ yo morapno kɨlɨ niaŋ asal uŋun dakon but pɨso kɨnda mandaŋ nabi. Gak pi uŋun saŋbeŋek dɨma akdɨsal.’
“Iyɨŋban yo kɨla agak pi amɨni uŋun iyɨ yaŋ nandagɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨno da pikon noldak, do niaŋ abeŋ? Amɨn kɨnda dakon oman monjɨni egek mɨktɨmni pudaŋ ɨbeŋ dakon tapmɨmno mɨni. Ae amɨn moneŋ do bɨsit yoyɨk do mayagɨ nandɨsat.
Do pi yopbeŋ bɨsapmon amɨn da but galagon da yaŋ naba yutnikon kɨŋ kɨŋ akeŋ do niaŋ abeŋ uŋun kɨlɨ uŋun nandɨsat.’
Yaŋ nandaŋek amɨn kaloŋ kaloŋ amɨn tagɨnikon goman awit uŋun yaŋ yoban apgwit. Mibɨltok abɨŋ altagɨt amɨn yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak amɨn tagɨnokon goman niaŋ da agɨl?’
“Iyɨŋban yagɨt, ‘Olip pakbi tɨbɨrɨ madep 100 da arɨp.’ “Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak tepmɨsi yɨgek on papia tam gomango mandabikon olip pakbi tɨbɨrɨ 50 yaŋ manda.’
“Ae kɨnda abɨŋ altaŋban yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak gomango niaŋ da?’ “Iyɨŋban yagɨt, ‘Wit yɨgɨ 100 da arɨp.’ Yaŋ iyɨŋban yagɨt, ‘On gomango mandabi papia tamon wit yɨgɨ 80 yaŋ manda.’
“Yaŋ aŋakwan amɨn tagɨni da yo agɨt uŋun kaŋban amɨn nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi da arɨpmon agɨt, do yo kɨla agak pi amɨni yokwi uŋun do nandaban wukwan ɨmgut. On mɨktɨm dakon amɨn kabɨ da nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi aŋek notni gat yumaŋ gwayek pi aŋ. Uŋun teŋteŋɨ dakon amɨn kabɨ yapmaŋgaŋ.
Nak da yaŋ dayɨsat, on mɨktɨm dakon moneŋ baŋ amɨn not aŋyomni. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, moneŋgo mudoni bɨsapmon ji egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni da yutgwan tagɨsi wɨgɨni.
“Amɨn kɨnda yo monɨŋɨsisok kɨlani tagɨ asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn da yo madep kɨlani tagɨ asak. Ae amɨn kɨnda yo monɨŋɨsok kɨlani yokwi asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn yo madepyo kɨsi kɨlani yokwi asak.
Yaŋdo, ji on mɨktɨm dakon moneŋ kɨlani tagɨ dɨma ani kaŋ, namɨn da nandaŋ gadaŋ damɨŋek yo tagɨsi bamɨsi daban kɨlani ani?
Ae ji amɨn dakon yo kabɨ kɨlani tagɨ dɨma ani kaŋ, namɨn da yo kabɨ dɨsi do damjak?
“Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn tagɨ bamorɨ dakon oman arɨpmɨ dɨma asak. Yaŋ kaŋ, kɨnda naŋgɨn galak taŋ ɨmɨŋek kɨnda do nandaban yokwi taŋ ɨmdɨsak. Ae kɨnda dakon gen guramɨgek kɨnda manji ɨmdɨsak. Ji Piŋkop gat ae moneŋ gat kɨsi dakon oman monjɨni arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ.”
Parisi amɨn moneŋ do galagɨsi nandaŋ, do Yesu da gen yagɨt uŋun nandaŋek yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmgwit.
Mani Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji amɨn da amɨn kɨlegɨsi yaŋ dandani yaŋ do pi madep aŋ. Mani Piŋkop da butjigwan yo pasɨlɨ toŋ uŋun pɨndak mudosok. Amɨn da yo tagɨsi yaŋ yoŋ uŋun Piŋkop da dabɨlon yo wagɨl ɨŋanisi.
“Gen teban gat ae kombɨ amɨn dakon gen gat yaŋ teŋteŋaŋba Jon da bɨsapmon wugɨt. Mani Jon da bɨsapmon da wasaŋek Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋoŋ. Aŋakwa amɨn uŋungwan pɨgɨk do pi tebaisi aŋ.
Mɨktɨm gat kundu gat tagɨ pasɨljil. Mani gen teban dakon gen jɨmjɨmjok kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨmasi pasɨldɨsak. Kɨsisi bamɨ taŋ mudokdaŋ.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda mɨŋatni kwɨnɨk yɨpban kɨŋakwan mɨŋat kaluk pasak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn yumabi asak. Ae amɨn kɨnda mɨŋat kɨnda kalɨp eni da kwɨnɨkgɨt uŋun pasak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn kɨsi yumabi asak.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yoni morapmɨ amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut, uŋun bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkni kɨldani toŋ tagɨsi ae ɨmalni gami baŋ paŋek yoni arɨpmɨsi taŋ ɨmɨŋakwa yaworɨsi egɨpgut.
Yaŋ egakwan uŋun da yut yoma kagakon yoni mɨni amɨn kɨnda mani Lasarus uŋudon pak egɨpgut. Lasarus yaŋ nandagɨt, yoni morapmɨ amɨn dakon jap tamokon da jap jɨmjɨm moŋ uŋun baŋ nokeŋ kaŋ tagɨsi yaŋ nandagɨt. Ae pɨŋan da abɨŋ wudani asɨwukgwit.
<range>
“Yoni mɨni amɨn egek kɨmakban aŋelo da abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ yɨpba Abraham gat egɨpgumal. Egakwal yoni morapmɨ amɨn uŋun yo kɨsi kɨmakban wayɨkgwit.
Aba Tɨpdomon tepmɨ madepsi nandaŋek egɨpgut. Egek sɨŋtaŋban wɨkwanek Abraham dubagɨsikon Lasarus gat kapmat kapmat yɨgakwal pɨndakgɨt.
Pɨndagek yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Abraham dat, bupmɨ nandaŋ nam. Lasarus iyɨŋbɨ uŋun da pakbi jɨmjɨmjok dɨ kɨsirɨkon yopmaŋ paŋabɨŋ melnokon yopban tɨmɨsok dɨ yawotjak. Nak on kɨndapmon egek tepmɨ madepsi nandɨsat!’
“Mani Abraham da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Monjɨno, gak kalɨp egɨpgul do nandaki. Gak kalɨp yo kabɨgo tagɨsi baŋgɨn paŋek egaki Lasarus uŋun yo kabɨni yokwi baŋgɨn paŋek egɨpgut. Mani abɨsok Lasarus on kokupmon butni yaworɨsi taŋakwan gak da tepmɨ madepsi nandɨsal.
Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma. Nin da binapmon daŋgap dubagɨsi kɨnda tosok. Yaŋ tosok do ɨdon ekwaŋ amɨn jikon arɨpmɨ dɨma kɨkɨgɨ, ae uŋudon ekwaŋ amɨn ɨdon arɨpmɨ dɨma obopmɨ.’
“Yaŋ yaŋban yoni morapmɨ amɨn da gen tebaisi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Yaŋ kaŋ, dat, nandaŋ namɨŋek Lasarus iyɨŋbɨ datno da yutnon kɨŋ
padɨk padɨkno 5 kabɨ ekwaŋ uŋun nawa gen tebai yoyɨŋban nandaŋek on tepmɨ kokupmon dɨma apni.’
“Mani Abraham da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Moses gat ae kombɨ amɨn gat dakon gen do padɨk padɨkgo mɨrak yopmaŋek tagɨ nandani.’
“Yaŋban yoni morapmɨ amɨn da yagɨt, ‘Abraham dat, uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma. Mani amɨn kɨmakbi kɨnda da kɨŋ altaŋ yomjak kaŋ, padɨk padɨkno da but tobɨl tagɨ ani.’
“Yaŋban Abraham da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Moses gat ae kombɨ amɨn gat dakon gen dɨma nandani kaŋ, amɨn kɨnda kɨmoron da pɨdaŋban kaŋek nandaŋ gadat arɨpmɨ dɨma akdaŋ.’ ”
Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ da abɨŋ amɨn paŋkewalba yokwi aŋek maŋ mudokdaŋ. Mani uŋun yokwi ani do dayɨkdaŋ amɨn, awa!
Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn monɨŋ kɨnda yokwi asak do yabetjak kaŋ, uŋun dakon kobogɨ yokwisi. Yabet dɨma aŋakwan amɨn da wit mɨsɨŋɨt tɨp madep tegɨkon wamaŋ maba tap ɨlarɨgwan pɨgek kɨmotjak kaŋ uŋun da tagapmɨ.
Yaŋdo, ji dɨsi do kɨla tagɨsi ani. “Notgo kɨnda yokwi aban kaŋ, tebai iyɨŋbɨ egɨp egɨpni aŋmɨlɨp asak. Ae but tobɨl aban kaŋ, yokwini yɨpmaŋ ɨbi.
Uŋun gɨldaron gɨn kosirɨ 7 kabɨ yokwi aŋ gamɨŋek abɨŋ ‘But tobɨl at’ yaŋ gayɨsak kaŋ, yokwini yɨpmaŋ ɨmɨŋ ɨmɨŋ abi.”
Yabekbi kabɨ da Amɨn Tagɨ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nandaŋ gadatnin aŋpap a.”
Yaŋba Amɨn Tagɨ da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dakon nandaŋ gadatji uŋun mastat yet yombem monɨŋɨsisok taŋ damjak kaŋ, on kɨndap pɨlɨgɨ tap kagagwan pɨgɨsak do iyɨŋba genji tagɨ guramɨtjak.”
Ae Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Oman monjɨsi kɨnda pigaga da bo sipsip kɨla asagon da apban ‘Gak paŋabɨŋ yɨgek jap sot uŋun na’ yaŋ tagɨ iyɨni? Uŋun dɨmasi.
Amɨn tagɨ da oman monjɨni yaŋsi iyɨsak, ‘Gak tagap taŋek jap soŋ pɨlɨk nabɨ naŋ mudaŋapbo gak jap don noki.’
Oman monjɨ pini gɨn asak, do amɨn tagɨni da ya yaŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma iyɨgɨ.
Jiyo yaŋ gɨn, Piŋkop da oman morap ani do dayɨgɨt uŋun aŋ mudaŋek yaŋ gɨn yoni, ‘Nin oman monjɨ do, ɨsal pinin gɨn amaŋ.’ ”
Yesu uŋun Jerusalem kɨk do aŋek provins bamot Samaria ae Galili yo da kɨlapmɨkon da kɨgɨt.
Kɨŋek kokup kɨndakon wɨgɨk do aŋakwan amɨn wuda tebani toŋ 10 kabɨ da dubagɨkon agek
gen papmon da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yesu, Amɨn Tagɨ, bupmɨ nandaŋ nibi!”
Yaŋba pɨndagek Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kɨŋ mukwa sogok amɨn gɨptɨmji yolɨni.” Yaŋ yoyɨŋban kɨŋakwa gɨptɨmni kɨlek tawit.
Kɨlek taŋakwa kɨnda da gɨptɨmno kɨlek tak yaŋ kaŋ tobɨl obɨŋek Piŋkop gen papmon da aŋkɨsigɨt.
Aŋek Yesu da kandap mibɨlon gawak ɨmɨŋek ya yaŋ iyɨgɨt. Amɨn uŋun Samaria amɨn kɨnda.
Yesu da uŋun amɨn kaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn 10 kabɨ kɨsi gɨptɨmni kɨlek taŋ, ma? Mani 9 kabɨ uŋun dukwan ekwaŋ?
Uŋun kɨsi tagɨ dɨma abɨŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsini? On amɨn mɨktɨm ŋwakŋwarɨkon nani dagɨn abɨk.”
Yaŋ yoyɨŋek amɨn uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak pɨdaŋek kɨ. Nandaŋ gadatgo do aŋek gɨptɨmgo kɨlek tak.”
Parisi amɨn da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Ni bɨsapmon Piŋkop Amɨn Kɨla Agakni yɨpban apdɨsak?” Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Agakni yɨpban apban amɨn da dabɨlni da kaŋba pɨsosak dakon tɨlak altaŋba dɨma pɨndatdaŋ.
Bo amɨn da ‘Oni obɨk’, bo ae ‘Asoni obɨk’ yaŋ dɨma yokdaŋ. Nandani, Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni uŋun jikon kɨlɨ abɨk.”
Yaŋ yaŋek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji don Amɨn Dakon Monji dakon bɨsap kɨnda kok do galagɨsi nandakdaŋ. Mani dɨma kokdaŋ.
Mal kwen binap terɨ terɨ kɨsi teŋteŋoŋ, yaŋ gɨn Amɨn Dakon Monji apdɨsak. Do amɨn da ‘Asoni egɨsak’ bo ‘Oni egɨsak’ yaŋ dayɨŋba dɨma yolni.
<range>
Mani Amɨn Dakon Monji mibɨltok tepmɨ madepsi paŋakwan abɨsok ekwaŋ amɨn da manji ɨmdaŋ.
“Noa da bɨsapmon amɨn egɨpgwit uŋudeŋ gɨn Amɨn Dakon Monji apjak bɨsapmon yaŋ gɨn aŋ egɨpdaŋ.
Jap pakbiyo madep aŋek mɨŋat pakpakyo kɨsi awit. Yaŋ aŋek egakwa Noa tap wakgakon wɨgɨgɨt. Wugakwan pakbi madepsi paptaŋ wɨŋek amɨn kɨsisi wɨtjɨŋban pasɨlgwit.
“Lot da bɨsapmon yaŋ gɨn awit. Jap pakbiyo awit, ae yumaŋ gwayek awit, ae jap pi awit, ae yut kɨsi awit.
Mani Lot da Sodom kokup yɨpmaŋ degakwan uŋudon gɨn kɨndap gat ae salfa tɨp gat kundukon da sɨkak da yaŋ maŋek amɨn morap kɨsi paŋupbal aban pasɨlgwit.
“Amɨn Dakon Monji abɨŋ noman tosak bɨsap madepmon amɨn aŋpak yaŋ gɨn aŋ egakwa apdɨsak.
Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda yut kwenon egakwan yo kabɨni yutgwan toni kaŋ, yo kabɨni tɨmɨt do yutnon dɨmasi pɨgɨsak. Ae pigaga egɨpjak amɨnyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn yutnon yo kabɨni tɨmɨt do dɨmasi tobɨl kɨsak.
Lot dakon mɨŋatnikon yo noman taŋ ɨmgwit uŋun do nandani!
Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ dakon egɨp egɨp aŋkutnok do nandɨsak kaŋ, egɨp egɨpni pasɨl ɨmdɨsak. Mani amɨn kɨnda egɨp egɨpni paretjak kaŋ, egɨp egɨpni kutnaŋban taŋ ɨmdɨsak.
“Nak yaŋsi dayɨsat, uŋun kalbi amɨn bamorɨ dɨpmɨn pagakwal Piŋkop da kɨnda abɨdaŋek kɨnda yɨpdɨsak.
Mɨŋat bamorɨ bret sok do plaua wasaŋakwal, kɨnda abɨdaŋek kɨnda yɨpdɨsak.”
<range>
Paŋdetni da gen uŋun nandaŋek iyɨwit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, uŋun yo morap dukon noman toni?” Iyɨŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨmakbi dakon bumjotni dukwan toŋ, sɨŋgɨŋ uŋudon gɨn muwukgaŋ.”
Yesu da bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ bɨsit aŋek dɨma kurak toni do tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt.
“Kokup madep kɨndakon gen kokwin kɨla agak amɨn madep kɨnda egɨpgut. Uŋun Piŋkop do dɨma pasalgɨt. Ae amɨn do nandaban yo ɨsalɨ aŋakwa egɨpgut.
Uŋun kokupmon sakwabat kɨnda egɨpgut. Uŋun mɨŋat bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ gen kokwin kɨla agak amɨn madepmon abɨŋ abɨŋ aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Uwalno gen pikon yɨpmaŋek nak aŋkutna.’
“Bɨsap morapmɨ apban gen kokwin amɨn madep da aŋpulugok do kurak tagɨt. Mani don yaŋ nandagɨt, ‘Nak Piŋkop do dɨma pasoldot ae amɨn do nandako yo ɨsalɨ aŋ.
Mani mɨŋat uŋun bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ jɨgɨ namɨsak, do yumsi aŋpulugokeŋ. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ yaŋ gɨn apjak kaŋ, tagɨsi dɨma nandakdɨsat.’ ”
Amɨn Tagɨ da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Gen kokwin kɨla agak amɨn yokwi uŋun da gen yagɨt uŋun do nandani.
Ji niaŋ nandaŋ? Piŋkop da iyɨ do manjɨgɨt amɨn kabɨ gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ ae pɨlɨni pɨlɨni iyɨ do yaŋ tɨdoŋ, uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma bo paŋpulugosak? Bo jomjom aŋegek tepmɨ dɨma paŋpulugosak? Uŋun dɨmasi!
Yaŋsi dayɨsat, bɨsit yaŋ ani kaŋ, tepmɨsi paŋpulugokdɨsak. Mani, Amɨn Dakon Monji mɨktɨmon apjak bɨsapmon amɨn nandaŋ gadatni toŋ pɨndatjak, bo dɨma?”
Amɨn dɨwarɨ iyɨ do amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ nandaŋek amɨn dɨwarɨ do nandaba pɨwit. Yesu da uŋun amɨn do tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt.
“Amɨn bamorɨ bɨsit ak do Telagɨ Yut Madepmon wɨgɨgɨmal. Kɨnda uŋun Parisi amɨn, ae kɨnda uŋun takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn.
“Parisi amɨn uŋun agek iyɨ burɨkon da bɨsit yaŋ agɨt, ‘Piŋkop, amɨn yokwi dɨwarɨ ekwaŋ nak uŋuden amɨn dɨma, uŋun do nak ya yaŋ gayɨsat. Kabo noknok, bo yokwi pakpak, bo yumabi agak amɨn, bo ae takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn amon akdak, nak uŋuden dɨma.
Nak Sonda kɨnda da butgwan bɨsap bamot gak do nandaŋek jap kelek egɨ egɨ asat. Ae yo morap tɨmɨkdat uŋun kokwinɨkgo 10 kabɨ aŋakwa kabi kɨnda paret do yɨpmaŋ yɨpmaŋ asat.’
“Mani takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn dubagɨkon agek but yokwi nandaŋek Kwen Kokup sɨŋtok do mayak taŋek yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Piŋkop, nak yokwi pakpak, do bupmɨ nandaŋ nabi!’ ”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak yaŋsi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda iyɨ do nandaban wugɨsak kaŋ, Piŋkop da uŋun amɨn abɨŋ yɨpdɨsak. Aŋek iyɨ do nandaba paŋ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da pawɨgɨkdɨsak. Do takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn uŋun yutnikon tobɨl kɨŋek Piŋkop da dabɨlon dɨwarɨni mɨni egɨpgut. Mani Parisi amɨn uŋun dɨma.”
Amɨn da monjɨ ŋakŋak Yesu da kɨsitni kwenikon wutjɨsak do paŋopgwit. Uŋun pɨndagek paŋdetni da kɨrɨŋɨk yomgwit.
Mani Yesu da mɨŋat monjɨyo iyɨkon apni do yoyɨŋek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji mɨŋat monjɨyo yopba nagon apgut. Dɨma kɨrɨŋɨk yomni. Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun amɨn mɨŋat monjɨyo da tɨlagon ekwaŋ uŋuden amɨn dakon.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda amɨn monɨŋ da Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun abɨdoŋ uŋun da tɨlak dɨma abɨdoni kaŋ, uŋungwan arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨgɨkdaŋ.”
Kɨla amɨn kɨnda da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet tagɨsi, nak niaŋsi aŋek egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdokeŋ?”
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak nido nak do amɨn tagɨsi yaŋ nayɨsal? Piŋkop kaloŋɨ gɨn uŋun amɨn tagɨsi.
Gen teban uŋun gaga nandɨsal. ‘Mɨŋat eyo kɨlɨ abi ji yumabi dɨma ani. Amɨn dɨma dapba kɨmotni. Yo kabo dɨma noni. Top gen yaŋek amɨn ɨsal dogɨn gen pikon dɨma yopni. Meŋ dat do nandaba wukwanek geni guramɨtni.’ ”
Iyɨŋban kɨla amɨn da yagɨt, “Nak monɨŋɨsogon da gen teban morap uŋun kɨsi guramɨk aŋaŋ opgum.”
Gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak yo kaloŋɨsi kɨnda gɨn dɨma asal. Yo morapgo kɨsi yumaŋ naŋ mudaŋek, uŋun dakon moneŋɨ yoni mɨni amɨn do yobi. Yaŋ aŋaki yogo tagɨsi Kwen Kokupmon taŋ gamdɨsak. Yaŋ aŋek abɨŋ nak nol.”
Yaŋ iyɨŋban kɨla amɨn uŋun yoni morapmɨsi do but yokwi madepsi nandagɨt.
Yesu da amɨn uŋun kaŋek yagɨt, “Yoni morapmɨ amɨn Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun da kagagwan pɨgɨk do aŋtɨdok aŋ.
Asisi, bɨt madepsi kamel uŋun da ɨmal bupbup da kosit gwagagon arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨgɨgɨ asak. Mani uŋun yapmaŋek yoni morapmɨ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun da kagagwan arɨpmɨ dɨmasi pɨgɨgɨ asak.”
Amɨn da gen uŋun nandaŋek yawit, “Yaŋ kaŋ, namɨn da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdosak?”
Yaŋba Yesu da yagɨt, “Yo amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma agagɨ, uŋun Piŋkop da arɨpmɨ tagɨ asak.”
Yaŋban Pita da yagɨt, “Nin yo morapnin yopmaŋek gak naŋ gol awɨlgamaŋ.”
Yaŋban Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn morap Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni dakon pi do nandaŋek yutni, bo mɨŋatni, bo peni padɨk padɨkyo, bo meŋi datni, bo ae monjɨ gwayoni yopmaŋ detjak kaŋ,
on mɨktɨmon egɨpni bɨsapmon, Piŋkop da yo morapni yopmaŋ dekgwit uŋun si yapmaŋek morapmɨsi yoban tɨmɨtdaŋ. Ae buŋon bɨsap madep noman taŋban egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdokdaŋ.”
Yesu da yabekbini 12 kabɨ tɨmɨk iyɨ baŋgɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nandani. Nin Jerusalem kɨkdamaŋ. Kɨŋapno gen morap kalɨp kombɨ amɨn da Amɨn Dakon Monji do mandawit uŋun kɨsisi bamɨ toŋ akdaŋ.
Amɨn da Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da kɨsiron yɨpba jɨgɨlagon da abɨŋ yɨpdaŋ, ae yokwi aŋɨmɨŋek ɨlɨp sul ɨmdaŋ.
Yaŋ aŋek nap naŋ baljaŋek aŋakba kɨmotdɨsak. Mani gɨldat kapbɨ mudaŋakwa aeni kɨmoron da pɨdokdɨsak.”
Paŋdetni gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaba pɨsawit. Mibɨlɨ pasɨlɨ tagɨt, do gen uŋun mibɨlɨ nido yosok uŋun dɨma nandaba pɨsagɨt.
Yesu Jeriko kokup pap kɨŋ aŋkapmat aŋakwan dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn kɨnda da kosit ɨleŋon yɨgek amɨn da moneŋ ɨmni do bɨsit yoyɨgɨt.
Uŋun amɨn nandaban amɨn morapmɨ obɨŋ yapmaŋ kɨŋakwa nandaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nibaŋ aŋ?”
Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Yesu Nasaret amɨn da obɨgɨsak.”
Iyɨŋba yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yesu, Dewit Dakon Monji, bupmɨ nandaŋ nam!”
Amɨn mibɨltok opgwit uŋun da kɨrɨŋɨk ɨmɨŋek tayaŋgok yɨtjak do tebai iyɨwit. Mani tebai sigɨn yaŋ tɨdaŋek yagɨt, “Dewit Dakon Monji, bupmɨ nandaŋ nam!”
Yaŋban Yesu agek amɨn uŋun abɨdaŋ aŋopni do yoyɨgɨt. Yoyɨŋban kapmat aŋapba Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt,
“Niaŋsi aŋgabeŋ do nandɨsal?” Iyɨŋban yagɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nak sɨŋtok do nandɨsat.”
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Dabɨlgo kɨlek tosak. Nandaŋ gadatgo da aŋmɨlɨp asak.”
Iyɨŋban uŋudon gɨn dabɨlɨ kɨlek taŋban Yesu yolek Piŋkop aŋkɨsigɨt. Yaŋ aban mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi da kaŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiwit.
Yesu uŋun Jeriko kokup pap wɨgɨ yapmaŋek kɨk do agɨt.
Uŋun kokupmon amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut mani Sakius. Sakius uŋun takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn dakon amɨn madep kɨnda egɨpgut. Uŋun yoni morapmɨ amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut.
Yesu uŋun niaŋen amɨn kɨnda yaŋ kok do pi tebai agɨt. Mani Sakius uŋun amɨn pɨsɨpmɨ, ae amɨn morapmɨ da muwugek kosit sopgwit, do Yesu kok do aŋtɨdok agɨt.
Aŋtɨdok agɨt do Sakius uŋun tɨmtɨm yaŋek mibɨltaŋ kɨŋ pik kɨndap kɨndakon wɨgɨgɨt. Yesu uŋun onaŋ abɨsak do tagɨ kokeŋ yaŋon da nandaŋek wɨgɨgɨt.
Wɨgakwan Yesu uŋun pik kɨndap akgɨron abɨŋ kwen sɨŋtaŋek Sakius kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Sakius, gak tepmɨ pɨ. Nak abɨsok gak da yutnon paŋkɨ yɨtdeŋ dosi nandɨsat.”
Yaŋ yaŋban Sakius da tepmɨ pɨŋ but galak nandaŋek Yesu abɨdaŋban yutnikon wɨgɨgɨmal.
Wɨgakwal pɨndagek amɨn da yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ yawit, “Uŋun yokwi pakpak amɨn kɨnda da yutnon wɨgɨk.”
Yaŋ yaŋakwa Sakius pɨdaŋ agek Amɨn Tagɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nandaki. Nak abɨsok yo kabɨ morapno kokwinɨk kabi bamorɨ aŋakwa kabi kɨnda yoni mɨni amɨn do yobeŋ. Ae amɨn kɨnda aŋkewalek yo kabɨni dɨ tɨmɨkgɨm kaŋ, uŋun dakon kobogɨ do yo tɨmɨkgɨm uŋun do yo 4 kabɨ gat saŋbeŋek yomɨŋ yomɨŋ abeŋ.”
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “On amɨn kɨsi uŋun Abraham dakon monji kɨnda. Abɨsok Piŋkop da on yut amɨn kɨsi yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨk mudosok.
Nido Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun amɨn pasɨlbi yokwikon baŋ wɨsɨŋek tɨmɨt do pɨgɨt.”
Gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋ egakwa Yesu tɨlak gen kɨnda yoyɨgɨt. Yesu uŋun Jerusalem kɨlɨ kɨŋ aŋkapmat agɨt, ae amɨn da Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Akdɨsak dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ uŋun kwaŋ tokdɨsak yaŋ nandawit do
yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ kɨnda kɨla amɨn madep man paŋek tobɨl abɨŋ don amɨn kabɨni kɨla asak do kokup dubagɨ kɨndakon kɨk do agɨt.
Amɨn uŋun kokup yɨp do aŋek oman monjɨni 10 kabɨ yaŋ yoban apba gol moneŋ tabɨlɨ kɨnda kaloŋ kaloŋ do yomɨŋ yomɨŋ agɨt. Yaŋ aŋek yoyɨgɨt, ‘Ji moneŋ uŋun baŋ moneŋ ɨlɨt pi aŋakwa tobɨl apbeŋ bɨsapmon uŋudon wɨgɨsak.’
“Mani kokup ɨsalni da nandaba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmgwit. Yaŋ nandawit do amɨn tagɨ uŋun kɨŋakwan kokup amɨn dɨ yabekba kɨŋ yawit, ‘Nin uŋun amɨn da kɨla amɨn madepnin egɨpjak do dɨma galak tomaŋ.’
“Mani kɨla amɨn madep man ɨba don tobɨl kokupnikon apgut. Kokupnikon abɨŋek yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Moneŋ kokwinɨk yomgum oman monjɨ uŋun yaŋ yoba apba moneŋ ɨlɨt pi aba niaŋ da noman tawit uŋun do pɨndakgeŋ.’
“Yaŋban kɨnda da mibɨltok abɨŋek yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, nak gol moneŋ tabɨlgo uŋun naŋ moneŋ ɨlɨt pi abo tabɨlɨ 10 kabɨ noman tawit.’
“Yaŋban amɨn madep uŋun da iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak oman monjɨ tagɨsi! Pi tagɨsi agɨl! Yo monɨŋɨsok mani kɨlani tagɨsi agɨl, do kokup pap 10 kabɨ kɨlani abi do man madep gamɨsat.’
“Ae oman monjɨ uŋun da buŋon nani da abɨŋ yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, nak gol moneŋ tabɨlgo uŋun naŋ moneŋ ɨlɨt pi abo tabɨl 5 kabɨ noman tawit.’
“Yaŋban amɨn tagɨni da yagɨt, ‘Kokup pap 5 kabɨ kɨla aki do man madep gamɨsat.’
“Ae kɨnda da abɨŋ yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, gol moneŋ tabɨlgo oni. Gak teban teban amɨn kɨnda yaŋ gandɨsat. Yo amɨn da yopmaŋgaŋ uŋun gak da sɨgo tɨmɨkdal. Ae jap amɨn da kwaokgaŋ uŋun yo kɨsi sɨgo pasal. Yaŋ asal do pasalek ɨmal dɨwatjok kɨndakon wamaŋ yɨpbo tagɨt.’
<range>
“Yaŋban amɨn tagɨ da oman monjɨ uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak oman monjɨ wagɨl yokwisi! Gaga gen yosol uŋun dogɨn gen pikon gepbeŋ. Nak teban teban amɨn kɨnda ae amɨn da yo yopmaŋgaŋ tɨmɨkdat, ae jap amɨn da kwaokgaŋ uŋun pɨlɨkdat yaŋ nandaŋ namɨsal.
Gak mibɨlɨ nido moneŋno beŋon dɨma yopgul? Beŋon yopgul tam beŋ da dɨwarɨ saŋbeŋ namɨŋakwan abɨŋ uŋun kɨsi tɨmɨkgom?’
Yaŋ iyɨŋek amɨn kapmatjok akgwit uŋun yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Gol moneŋ tabɨl uŋun gwayeŋ amɨn moneŋ tabɨlni 10 kabɨ taŋ ɨmaŋ uŋun do ɨmni.’
“Yaŋ yaŋban iyɨwit, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, uŋun amɨn moneŋ tabɨlni 10 kabɨ kɨlɨ tɨmak!’
“Yaŋba yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Nandani. Amɨn morap yoni taŋ yomaŋ uŋun saŋbeŋek morapmɨ yomdɨsat. Mani amɨn kɨnda yoni mɨni kaŋ, yo kaloŋgok dɨ taŋ ɨmaŋ uŋun gwayekdɨsat.
Mani uwalno nak da kɨla amɨn madepni dɨma egɨ yobeŋ do nandawit, uŋun tɨmɨk ɨdon paŋabɨŋ dabɨlnokon dapba kɨmotni.’ ”
Yesu tɨlak gen uŋun yaŋ mudaŋek aeni Jerusalem wɨgɨk do kosit wasagɨt.
Yesu kɨŋ Betpage ae Betani paŋkapmat agɨt. Uŋun kokup bamot Ɨleŋ Olipmon tomal. Uŋudon da paŋdetni bamorɨ yabegek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
“Jil ason kokup tosok uŋudon kɨnjil. Uŋudon kɨŋ kaŋbal donki bɨlagɨ kɨnda amɨn da kwenikon dɨma yɨkbi uŋun napmon aŋteban abi da akban konjil. Napmɨ wɨtdalek aŋopjil.
Amɨn kɨnda da ‘Donki nido wɨtdalgamal?’ yaŋ dayɨŋban kaŋ, yaŋ iyɨnjil, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ da pisok kɨnda ak do aŋek yosok.’ ”
Amɨn bamot yabekban kɨŋ pɨndakbal gen yoyɨgɨt da arɨpmon yaŋ gɨn noman tawit.
Aba donki bɨlagɨ uŋun wɨtdalakwal donki uŋun dakon ami da yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Donki bɨlagɨ uŋun nido wɨtdalgamal?”
Yaŋba yoyɨgɨmal, “Amɨn Tagɨ da pisok kɨnda ak do aŋek yosok.”
Amɨn bamot donki bɨlagɨ uŋun aŋobɨŋek ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk dubakni donki kwenon yopmaŋek Yesu yɨpba uŋun kwenon yɨkgɨt.
Donkikon yɨgek kɨŋakwan amɨn da ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk dubakni kosiron yalɨŋ aŋaŋ kɨwit.
Aŋakwa Yesu abɨŋ Ɨleŋ Olip dakon kosit obandom naŋ pukwaŋ uŋun aŋkapmat aŋakwan paŋdet kabɨni madepsi da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ morap aban pɨndakgwit uŋun do nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi awit. Yaŋ aŋek madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiwit.
Yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yawit: “Kɨla Amɨn Madep on Amɨn Tagɨ da manon abɨsak, uŋun Piŋkop da gɨsamɨgakwan abɨsak. Kwen Kokupmon but yawot tosak. Piŋkop Wɨkwisi aŋkɨsino!”
Yaŋakwa amɨn madep uŋun da bɨkbɨgon Parisi amɨn dɨ akgwit uŋun da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, paŋdetgoni kɨrɨŋɨk yom.”
Iyɨŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nandani. Gen kagani sopni kaŋ, tɨp da iyɨ yaŋ tɨdokdaŋ.”
Yesu Jerusalem aŋkapmat aŋek kokup pap uŋun kaŋek kunam tagek
yaŋ yagɨt, “Gak abɨsok but yawot dakon kosit kosol tam tagɨsi, mani uŋun pasɨlɨ taŋakwan dabɨlgo da arɨpmɨ dɨma kokdɨsal.
Nandaki. Don bɨsap kɨnda noman tokdɨsak. Uŋun bɨsapmon uwalgo da gak aŋgwasɨŋek mɨktɨm paŋabɨŋ dam madepgokon yopba tugaŋ wɨgɨkdaŋ. Aŋakwa terɨ terɨ da abɨŋ paŋdagat akdaŋ.
Aŋek gak gat ae mɨŋat amɨn gak da dam madepgwan ekwaŋ uŋun kɨsi wagɨlsi tuwɨl paŋtasɨk akdaŋ. Tuwɨlba tɨp notni da kwenon dɨma taŋ taŋ akdaŋ. Nido Piŋkop gagon kɨlɨ abɨk, mani butgo dɨma pɨsak.”
Yesu Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalon pɨgɨ amɨn moneŋ ɨlɨt pi awit uŋun wasaŋek yolakwan abɨgɨwit.
Aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: ‘Nak dakon yut uŋun amɨn da abɨŋ bɨsit aŋnamni do tosok.’ Mani ji da kulabɨk aba ‘kabo noknok dakon pasɨlɨ tamo yombem asak.’ ”
Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ Telagɨ Yut Madepmon amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt. Aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep gat, ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat, ae amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn gat da Yesu niaŋ aŋek aŋatno kɨmotjak yaŋ do kosit wɨsɨwit.
Mani mɨŋat amɨn morapyo da geni nandak do galagɨ madepsi nandawit, do aŋakba kɨmotjak dakon kosit kɨnda dɨma kawit.
Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu da amɨn Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan yoyɨŋdet aŋek Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat, ae kɨla amɨn gat kɨsi da Yesukon abɨŋ
yaŋ iyɨwit, “Namɨn da pi uŋun abi do yaŋ mudaŋ gamgut da yo uŋun asal? Ae namɨn da man madep gamgut?”
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nakyo kɨsi gen kɨnda dayɨko kobogɨ nayɨni.
Jon telagɨ pakbi sogɨt bɨsapmon, pi agɨt uŋun Kwen Kokup dakon pi, bo amɨn dakon pi naŋ agɨt?”
Yaŋban iyɨ gɨn notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yawit, “ ‘Kwen Kokup dakon pi’ yaŋ iyɨneŋ kaŋ, gen kobogɨ yaŋ niyɨkdɨsak, ‘Yaŋ kaŋ ji nido dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit?’
Mani amɨn morapmɨ da Jon do kombɨ amɨn bamɨsi kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋ, do ‘Amɨn dakon pi’ yaŋ iyɨneŋ kaŋ, uŋun kɨsi tagɨ dɨma asak. Yaŋ kaŋ Jon dakon man bin aŋupbal ano mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep da tɨp baŋ nindapdaŋ.”
Yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu do gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin dɨma nandamaŋ.”
Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Nakyo kɨsi namɨn da yaŋ mudaŋ namgut da pi asat uŋun dɨma dayɨkeŋ.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da wain pini aŋek amɨn da moneŋ pini dɨ aŋek pi ami do bamɨ dɨ paŋ ɨmni yaŋ nandaŋek pi uŋun da kɨsiron yɨpmaŋek mɨktɨm tɨmɨ dɨgwan bɨsap dubagɨ egɨp do kɨgɨt.
Kɨŋ egɨ don wain sop pakpak bɨsap kwaŋ taŋakwan oman monjɨ kɨnda yabekban wain bamɨ tɨmɨk paŋopjak do kɨgɨt. Mani pi kɨla awit amɨn da oman monjɨ obɨsi aŋagek bamɨ dɨ dɨma ɨmɨŋek yolba kɨgɨt.
Yaŋ aba pi ami da aeni oman monjɨ kɨnda yabekgɨt. Mani uŋun pi monjɨ kɨsi obɨsi aŋagek yo yokwisi aŋ ɨmɨŋek bamɨ dɨ dɨma ɨmɨŋek yɨpba kɨgɨt.
Yaŋ aba kɨnda gat yabekban kwan madepsi aŋagek maba wain pi da waŋga pɨgɨgɨt.
“Yaŋ aba wain pi dakon ami da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Nak niaŋsi abeŋ? Nak monjino but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsat uŋun naŋ yabekgo kwan nandaba wukwan ɨmni bo.’
“Mani pi kɨla amɨn da monjɨ kaŋek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, ‘Amɨn on da egɨ don datni dakon yo morap tɨmɨtdɨsak, do amɨn on aŋagek wain pini nin do aŋawatneŋ.’
Yaŋ yaŋek monjɨ uŋun abɨdaŋ maba waŋga pɨgakwan aŋakba kɨmakgɨt. “Ji niaŋ nandaŋ? Don pi dakon ami da abɨŋ pi kɨla amɨn niaŋsi aŋyomdɨsak?
Pi ami da abɨŋ uŋun pi kɨla amɨn dapban kɨmotdaŋ. Dapban kɨmagakwa wain pi uŋun amɨn ŋwakŋwarɨ da kɨsiron yɨpdɨsak.” Yaŋban nandaŋek amɨn da yaŋ yawit, “Uŋun dɨmasi agagɨ!”
Yaŋba Yesu da amɨn pɨndagek yoyɨgɨt, “Yaŋ kaŋ Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ niaŋ? Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Yut agak amɨn da gwak yokwi yaŋ yaŋek maba kɨgɨt, uŋun gwak yut kodɨgɨkon tɨp kɨnda naŋ tɨdawit da akdak.’
Amɨn morap gwak kwenon da maŋ dapba bɨsal kɨkdaŋ, ae gwak da amɨn morap da kwenon mosak uŋun wagɨl bɨsal kɨ mudokdaŋ.”
Yesu da tɨlak gen uŋun yaŋban gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat ae mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat da nin pabɨŋ nip do aŋek yosok yaŋ nandawit. Yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu uŋudon gɨn abɨdokdosi nandawit, mani mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep uŋun do si pasalgwit.
Mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn gat ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat da Yesu aŋman ak do pi madep awit. Yaŋ aŋek amɨn dɨ yabekba abɨŋ Yesu aŋman awit. Uŋun amɨn topmon da Yesu dakon gen nandaŋ galak tawit. Suŋ kɨnda yaŋban abɨdaŋ gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn madepmon yɨpno gen pikon yɨpjak yaŋ do aŋkewal do awit.
Aŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, gen yosol ae yoyɨŋdet asal uŋun kɨlegɨsi asal yaŋ nandaŋ gadamaŋ. Amɨn mani toŋ ae mani mɨni uŋun kɨsi gen bamɨsikon da Piŋkop dakon aŋpak yoyɨŋ dekdal.
Do, niaŋ nandɨsal, Sisa do takis ɨmno tagɨ asak, bo dɨma?”
Yaŋba Yesu da niaŋon da aŋkewal do awit uŋun pɨndak mudaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
“Moneŋ tabɨlɨ kɨnda nolɨŋba koko. On wup gat ae man mandabi gat uŋun namɨn dakon?” Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Sisa dakon.”
Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Yo Sisa dakon uŋun Sisa iyɨ do ɨmdo, ae yo Piŋkop dakon uŋun Piŋkop iyɨ do ɨmdo.”
Yaŋban mɨŋat amɨn morapyo da dabɨlon Yesu aŋkewalno suŋ kɨnda yaŋban abɨdoneŋ yaŋ dakon kosit kɨnda dɨma kawit. Geni kobogɨ yoyɨgɨt do nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi aban tayaŋgok akgwit.
Sadyusi amɨn kabɨ dɨ Yesukon apgwit. (Sadyusi amɨn uŋun amɨn kɨmakbi arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨdoni yaŋ nandaŋ.)
Uŋun da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, Moses da gen kɨnda yaŋ mandagɨt: Amɨn kɨnda monjɨ mɨni da kɨmotjak kaŋ, sakwabatni padɨge da paban monjɨ paŋalanjil. Yaŋ aban peni dɨwatni toŋ da egɨpni.
“Kalɨp peni padɨgeyo 7 kabɨ egɨpgwit. Peni mibɨltok amɨn mɨŋat paŋek monjɨ mɨni da kɨmakgɨt.
Yaŋ aban uŋun da buŋon nani da kwabatni uŋun paŋek monjɨ mɨni da kɨmakgɨt.
Kɨmagakwan ae kɨnda da pagɨt. Peni padɨgeyo 7 kabɨ kɨsi da paŋek monjɨ mɨni egek kɨmakgwit.
Ae don mɨŋat uŋun kɨsi kɨmakgɨt.
Wɨli 7 kabɨ kɨsi da pawit, do pɨdot pɨdot bɨsap madepmon namɨn dakon mɨŋatni asak?”
Yaŋba Yesu da kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn mɨktɨmon ekwaŋ uŋun mɨŋat eyo aŋek ekwaŋ.
Mani amɨn kɨmoron da pɨdaŋek egɨp egɨpmon tagɨ egɨpni do kokwinɨkbi kabɨ uŋun bɨsapmon mɨŋat eyo dɨma akdaŋ.
Uŋun aŋelo da yaŋ egɨpdaŋ, do ae kɨnda gat arɨpmɨ dɨma kɨmotni. Uŋun kɨmoron da pɨdokdaŋ, do Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat monjɨyo egɨpdaŋ.
“Moses da kɨndap wal monɨŋgok sogɨt uŋun do gen mandagɨt uŋun manjɨŋek asisi nandamaŋ, amɨn kɨmoron da pɨdokdaŋ. Moses da Amɨn Tagɨ do yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Uŋun Abraham, Aisak, ae Jekop dakon Piŋkop.’
Piŋkop da amɨn kɨsi morap pɨndakban egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ ekwaŋ, do Piŋkop uŋun amɨn kɨmakbi dakon Piŋkop dɨma, uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ dakon Piŋkop.”
Yaŋban gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn dɨwarɨ da nandaŋek iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, gen tagɨsi yosol.”
Amɨn da Yesu gen kɨnda gat saŋbeŋek iyɨk do pasalgwit.
Mani Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn mibɨlɨ nido Kristo uŋun Dewit dakon monji yaŋ yoŋ?
Dewit da iyɨ Kap Papiakon gen yaŋ mandagɨt: ‘Amɨn Tagɨ da nak dakon Amɨn Tagɨno yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak abɨŋ nak da amɨnsi tet do yɨkbɨ
don uwalgo kandap mibɨlgogwan yopbo gengo guramɨtdaŋ.” ’
Dewit da Kristo uŋun Amɨn Tagɨno yaŋ iyɨgɨt. Do niaŋon da Kristo uŋun Dewit dakon monji egɨsak?”
Amɨn kɨsisi mɨrak paŋ egakwa Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
“Ji gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn do pɨndak kɨmotni. Uŋun ɨmal dubagɨ baŋ paŋek agɨp do galak toŋ. Ae yumaŋ gwayek tamokon amɨn da gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ yoyɨni do galagɨ nandaŋ. Ae muwut muwut yutnon tamo tagɨsikon yɨt do galak toŋ. Ae jap noknok bɨsap madepmon tamo amɨn mani toŋ do tɨlak abi uŋudon yɨt do galak toŋ.
Uŋun amɨn sakwabat paŋkewalek yutni tɨmɨkgaŋ. Ae amɨn da pɨndatni yaŋ do bɨsit dubagɨsi aŋ. Uŋuden amɨn gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon kobogɨ do yo jɨgɨsi pakdaŋ.”
Yesu pɨndak egakwan yoni morapmɨ amɨn Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon paret ɨdapmon paretni yopgwit.
Ae kaŋakwan sakwabat kɨnda uŋun yoni mɨni, uŋun da moneŋ gɨmanjok bamorɨ paret ɨdapmon yopgut.
Aban Yesu da yagɨt, “Asisi dayɨsat, sakwabat yoni mɨni on da amɨn morap da paret yopmaŋ uŋun yapmaŋek moneŋ madepsi yopmaŋdak.
Amɨn morap uŋun moneŋni morapmɨ taŋ yomaŋakwa dɨwarɨ gɨn paret ɨdapmon yopmaŋ. Mani on mɨŋat wadak wadaksi aŋek moneŋni kɨsi yopmaŋdak. Kɨlɨ jap yumaŋ nosak moneŋni dɨ dɨma taŋ ɨmaŋ.”
Paŋdetni dɨwarɨ da Telagɨ Yut Madep kaŋek yawit, “Amɨn da tɨp kɨldani toŋ tagɨsi gat, ae yo dɨwarɨ yo kɨldani tagɨsi Piŋkop do paret awit uŋun baŋ aŋtɨlɨm awit.” Yaŋba Yesu da yagɨt,
“Yo on pɨndakgaŋ uŋun bɨsap kɨnda apdɨsak uŋun bɨsapmon uŋun dakon tɨp notni kwenon dɨma taŋ taŋ akdaŋ. Tuwɨlba kɨsisi maŋ mudokdaŋ.”
Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, yo uŋun ni bɨsapmonsi altokdaŋ? Ni tɨlak da mibɨltok altaŋakwan kaŋek yo kɨlɨ uŋun altokdaŋ yaŋ nandaneŋ?”
Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn da paŋkewalni do kaŋ kɨmotni. Amɨn morapmɨ da nak da manon abɨŋek ‘Nak uŋun amɨn’, ae ‘Bɨsap madep kɨlɨ kwaŋ tosok’ yaŋ yokdaŋ. Mani uŋun amɨn dɨma yolni.
Amɨn morapmɨ emat aŋ, bo gapman gat emat aŋ, uŋun dakon geni apba nandaŋ kaŋ dɨma pasolni. Yo uŋun da mibɨltok altokdaŋ. Mani mibɨ bɨsap madep uŋudon gɨn dɨma altokdɨsak.”
Sigɨn saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Mɨktɨm kɨnda dakon amɨn da pɨdaŋba mɨktɨm kɨnda dakon amɨn gat emat wamdaŋ. Ae kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda dakon amɨn da pɨdaŋba kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda dakon amɨn gat emat wamdaŋ.
Wudɨp madepsi akdaŋ, ae mɨktɨm dɨkon amɨn da jap do madepsi aŋek amɨn dɨwarɨ da kɨmotdaŋ, ae amɨn morapmɨsi sot akdaŋ. Ae kundukon tɨlak masɨ masɨmɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ altaŋakwa pɨndagek pasal nɨmnɨmɨkyo akdaŋ.
“Mani uŋun yo morap dɨma noman taŋakwa amɨn da ji tɨmɨk yo yokwisi aŋdamdaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon gen yaŋ damɨŋek dam tebanon depdaŋ. Ae nak dakon man abɨŋ yɨp do aŋek ji tɨmɨk paŋkɨ depba kɨla amɨn madep gat ae gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn gat da ɨŋamon atdaŋ.
Uŋun bɨsapmon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋoni dakon bɨkbɨk pɨsaŋ damdɨsak.
Nak da naga gen dulumji paŋtagap aŋek nandak nandak tagɨsi damdɨsat. Dabo amɨn gen yaŋ damni uŋun da gen yoni uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma pabɨŋ depni. Do ji dɨsi kutnok do aŋek ni gen baŋ paŋtobɨl yomneŋ yaŋ do nandaba kɨk dɨma ani.
<range>
Meŋji datji, ae padɨk padɨkji, ae yawi dɨwatji, ae notji uŋunyo kɨsi da ji uwal da kɨsiron depba ji kabɨkon dɨ si dɨkba kɨmotdaŋ.
Nak dakon man jikon tosok do aŋek amɨn kɨsi da nandaba yokwi tok madepsi aŋdamdaŋ.
Mani busuŋ daŋgwanji kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma tasɨk tokdɨsak.
Ji tebai agek egɨp egɨp bamɨsi abɨdoni.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji pɨndakba emat amɨn da abɨŋ Jerusalem aŋgwasɨŋek akba kaŋ, yaŋ nandani, kokup pap wagɨl tasɨk tosak dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ uŋun abɨsak.
Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn Judia mɨktɨmon egɨpni uŋun pasal kabapgwan tepmɨsi wugɨni. Amɨn Jerusalem egɨpni uŋun wɨŋ waŋga kɨni. Ae amɨn kokup pap da waŋga egɨpni ae tobɨl kokup papgwan dɨma pɨgɨni.
Uŋun bɨsap uŋun Piŋkop da amɨn do kobogɨ yokwisi yomdɨsak dakon bɨsap. Yaŋ aban gen mandabi uŋun kɨsi bamɨ toŋ akdaŋ.
Uŋun bɨsapmon jɨgɨ madepsi Juda mɨktɨmon noman taŋakwan Piŋkop dakon butjap amɨn da kwenon mokdɨsak. Do mɨŋat monjɨ kwapni toŋ, ae mɨŋat monjɨ mum noŋ uŋun bupmɨsi.
Uwal da abɨŋ amɨn dɨwarɨ emat agak sɨbabaŋ dapba kɨmotdaŋ. Ae dɨwarɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ paŋkɨ yopba oman amɨni do egɨpdaŋ. Aŋakwa Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da Jerusalem bamaŋ ɨktagɨldaŋ. Uŋun amɨn da Jerusalem kɨlani aŋakwa Piŋkop da bɨsap yɨpgut uŋun mudosak.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Uŋun bɨsapmon tɨlak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ gɨldat dabɨlon, ae kanegon, ae gɨgon noman tokdaŋ. Aŋakwa mɨktɨmon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ morapmɨ nandaŋakwa tap da madepsi tamalɨgakwan pasol pasol madepsi aŋek butni tagɨ dɨma tokdɨsak.
Kwen kundukon yo tebai toŋ uŋun da kwakwalɨtdaŋ, do amɨn morapmɨ da jɨgɨ morap mɨktɨmon noman tokdɨsak do nandaba kɨk aŋek pasol pasol madepsi aŋek ɨŋam kɨmot akdaŋ.
Uŋun bɨsapmon kaŋakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji gɨkwemon da tapmɨmni gat tɨlɨm madepni gat apdɨsak.
Yo morap uŋun wasaŋek altoni bɨsapmon Piŋkop da ji tɨmɨtjak dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ uŋun kwaŋ tosok, do ji pɨdaŋ agek busuŋji kwen gwaŋ pɨdaŋ mudoni.”
Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda yoyɨŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji pik kɨndap ae kɨndap morap kɨsi do pɨndatni.
Tamɨ kaluk apmeŋon yopmaŋakwa pɨndagek gɨldat bɨsap kɨlɨ uŋun abɨsak yaŋ nandaŋ.
Uŋudeŋ gɨn yo morap dayɨt uŋun da altaŋakwa Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Akdɨsak dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ kwaŋ tosok yaŋsi nandani.
“Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn uŋun bɨsapmon nani dɨma kɨmagakwa yo morap uŋun kɨsi altaŋ mudokdaŋ.
Kundu gat mɨktɨm gat pasɨldamal, mani nak dakon gen uŋun dɨmasi pasɨldɨsak.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji kaŋ kɨmotni. Bɨsap morapmɨ pakbi teban naŋek but upbal dɨ abam. Ae on mɨktɨm dakon yo do nandaba kɨk dɨ abam. Uŋuden da ji pabɨŋ depjak kaŋ, uŋun bɨsap madep da but pɨso mɨni paron yaŋ depban yokwaldaŋ.
Mɨŋat amɨn morapyo mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun bɨsap madep altaŋban kokdaŋ.
Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ kalugɨsi egek Piŋkop da tapmɨm daban yo morap uŋun altokdaŋ uŋun tagɨ yapni, ae Amɨn Dakon Monji da ɨŋamon tagɨ atni yaŋ do bɨsit pi ani.”
Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ Yesu da amɨn Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan yoyɨŋ dekgɨt. Aŋek kalbi Ɨleŋ Olipmon yut kɨndakon paŋkɨ pak pak agɨt.
Aŋakwan amɨn kɨsi da wɨsa dagokdosi pɨdaŋ Telagɨ Yut Madepmon geni nandak do kɨŋ kɨŋ awit.
Bret Yisni Mɨni dakon bɨsap madep uŋun kwaŋ tagɨt. Uŋun bɨsap do Yapyap Bɨlak yaŋ yoŋ.
Aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep uŋun do pasalgwit, do Yesu niaŋon da abɨdaŋek aŋatno kɨmotjak uŋun do nandak nandak awit.
Aŋakwa Sunduk Judas da buron pɨgɨgɨt. (Mani kɨnda Iskariot yaŋ iyɨwit. Uŋun paŋdetni 12 kabɨkon nani kɨnda.)
Judas kwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon obip amɨn uŋun dakon mibɨltok amɨn gat gen yawit. Niaŋon da Yesu kɨsitnikon yɨpjak yaŋ do yaŋ nandat awit.
Aŋek but galak nandaŋek moneŋ dɨ tagɨ gamneŋ yaŋ iyɨwit.
Judas gen iyɨwit uŋun nandaban tagɨ aŋakwan Yesu abɨdaŋ kɨsitnikon yɨp do kosit wusɨk agɨt. Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu amɨn morapmɨ gat dɨma egakwa uŋudon uwal da kɨsiron yɨpbeŋ yaŋ do jomjom agɨt.
Uŋun bɨsapmon Bret Yisni Mɨni dakon bɨlak bɨsap madep noman tagɨt. Uŋun bɨsapmon Yapyap Bɨlak do sipsip bulagɨ baŋ dapmaŋgaŋ.
Do Yesu da Pita gat Jon gat yabegek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil kɨŋ Yapyap Bɨlak uŋun dakon jap paŋkosit abal noneŋ.”
Yaŋban iyɨgɨmal, “Kɨŋ dukwan paŋkosit andeŋ do nandɨsal?”
Yaŋbal yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil kɨŋ kokup papmon pɨgakwal amɨn kɨnda pakbi kwoba kɨnda guramɨk apban jil gat domdom akdaŋ. Uŋun amɨn da yut wɨgɨsagon jil uŋudon yol aŋaŋ wɨgɨnjil.
Wɨgɨ yut uŋun dakon ami yaŋ iyɨnjil, ‘Yoyɨŋdet da yaŋ yosok, “Nak gat paŋdetnoni gat da Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap noneŋ dakon yut burɨ dukwan tosok?” ’
Yaŋ iyɨŋbal yut burɨ madep kwen nani do dolɨkdɨsak. Uŋudon jap noknok tamo gat ae amɨn yɨtyɨt tamo gat kɨsi toŋ. Uŋudon jap paŋkosit anjil.”
Yesu da gen yoyɨgɨt da arɨpmon yaŋ gɨn pɨndakgɨmal. Yaŋ pɨndagek Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap paŋkosit agɨmal.
Jap noknok bɨsap aŋakwan Yesu jap noknok tamokon yabekbi kabɨni gat kɨsi yɨkgwit.
Yɨgek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak tepmɨ dɨma paŋek ji gat on Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap noneŋ uŋun do tagɨsi kɨlɨ nandagɨm da sigɨn nandaŋ egɨsat.
Nak yaŋ dayɨsat, jap on ae dɨma nokeŋ. Yaŋ aŋapbo wɨgɨ on jap dakon mibɨlɨsi Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak kagagwan bamɨ don noman tokdɨsak.”
Yaŋ yaŋek wain kɨnam abɨdaŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek yagɨt, “Nak yaŋ dayɨsat, nak wain ae dɨma naŋek egɨ wɨgɨ Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asagon don nokeŋ. Do abɨdaŋek dɨsi kokwin aŋek noni.”
<range>
Ae bret abɨdaŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek bret uŋun paŋdagaŋ yomɨŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “On nak dakon gɨptɨm tɨmno ji do parekdat. On naŋek nak do nandaŋek egɨpni.”
Naŋakwa ae wain kɨnam abɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Wain kɨnam on nak da ji gat saŋbek saŋbek kalugɨ asat uŋun dakon tɨlak. Nak yawino naŋ ji do tagaldat.
Mani uwal da kɨsiron nepjak amɨn nak gat kɨsi tamokon oni yɨkgamak.
Amɨn Dakon Monji niaŋon da kɨmotdɨsak do yaŋbi uŋun da tɨlak kɨmotdɨsak. Mani uwal da kɨsiron yɨpjak amɨn, awa!”
Paŋdetni gen uŋun nandaŋek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yawit, “Nin kabɨkon da namɨn dasi akdɨsak?”
Paŋdetni da namɨn dasi mibɨltok amɨnin egɨsak yaŋ do gen emat awit.
Aba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ dakon kɨla amɨn madepni uŋun man madepni toŋ, do iyɨ do nandaba wukwanek gen tebai yaŋek amɨn kabɨni kɨla aŋ. Aŋek ‘Nin amɨn dakon paŋpulugokni ekwamaŋ’ yaŋ topmon da yoŋ.
Mani ji yaŋ dɨma egɨpni. Amɨn kɨnda jikon man madepni toŋ, uŋun amɨn monjɨ kɨnda buŋonsi altagɨt uŋun da tɨlagon egɨpjak. Ae kɨla amɨnji da oman monjɨ da tɨlak egɨpjak.
Nandani. Jap nosok amɨn da mibɨltok amɨn bo jap pɨlɨkdak amɨn da mibɨltok amɨn? Jap naŋek yɨkdak amɨn uŋun da mibɨltok amɨn asak. Mani nak ji da binapmon oman monjɨsi egɨsat.
Paŋkewal altaŋ namgwit bɨsapmon ji nak dɨma nepmaŋ dekgwit. Nak gat kɨsi egɨpgumaŋ.
Datno da nak kɨla amɨn madep egɨpbeŋ do yaŋ mudaŋ namgut, yaŋ gɨn nak da ji kɨla amɨn madep pi ani do yaŋ mudaŋ damɨsat.
Do nak kɨla amɨn madep egɨpbeŋ bɨsapmon ji jap noknok tamonokon yɨgek jap pakbiyo akdaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek kɨla amɨn madep yɨyɨt tamokon yɨgek Israel amɨn 12 kabɨ gen kokwin pi aŋ yomdaŋ.”
Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Saimon, nandaki. Wit dakon sɨbɨt sɨbɨtni tarapmɨkgaŋ uŋudeŋ Sunduk da nandaŋ gadatgo aŋkewalban moki do yagɨt.
Mani nandaŋ gadatgo dɨma mosak yaŋ do bɨsit kɨlɨ agɨm. Gak tobɨl apbi bɨsapmon notgoni paŋteban abi.”
Mani Pita da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nak gak gat dam tebanon kɨŋek ae gak gat kɨsi kɨmotdeŋ do tagap tosot.”
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Pita, nak yaŋ gayɨsat, abɨsok kalbi pup gen dɨma yaŋakwan gak da kosirɨ kapbɨ nak do wasɨp yokdɨsal.”
Yaŋ yaŋek paŋdet kabɨni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nak da pino ani do yabekgɨm bɨsapmon, moneŋ sɨmɨl yɨk monɨŋ, ae yɨk madep, ae kandap gwɨlyo dɨma tɨmɨkgwit. Uŋun bɨsapmon ji yo kabɨ do wadak wadak awit bo dɨma?” Yaŋ yoyɨŋban iyɨwit, “Dɨma.”
Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Mani abɨsok moneŋ sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨk monɨŋji taŋ damaŋ kaŋ, uŋun si tɨmɨtni. Ae yɨk madepji kɨsi tɨmɨtni. Ae emat agak sɨbani mɨni amɨn uŋun ɨmal dubakni yumaŋ naŋek uŋun dakon moneŋ baŋ emat agak sɨbani yumni.
Piŋkop gen papiakon gen kɨnda nak do mandabi uŋun bamɨ noman tokdɨsak. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn da kaŋba amɨn yokwisi kɨnda agɨt.’ Yaŋsi dayɨsat, gen morap nak do mandabi uŋun kɨsi bamɨ noman tokdaŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋban iyɨwit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, pɨndat! Nin emat agak sɨbanin bamorɨ oni.” Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Uŋun arɨpmɨ.”
Yesu bɨsap morapmɨ agɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn kokup pap yɨpmaŋek Ɨleŋ Olipmon wɨgɨgɨt. Wɨgakwan paŋdetni kɨsi yolba wɨgɨwit.
Ɨleŋon wɨgɨ altaŋek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Paŋkewalon dɨma moni yaŋ do bɨsit ani.”
Yaŋ yoyɨŋek dubagɨsok amɨn da tɨp maba kwaŋ uŋun da arɨpmon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋ ŋwakbeŋ aŋek bɨsit aŋek yaŋ yagɨt,
“Dat, gak tagɨ nandɨsal kaŋ, tepmɨ dɨma pakeŋ. Mani nak dakon galaktok dɨma yolgi. Gaga dakon galaktok yolgi.”
Yaŋakwan Kwen Kokup aŋelo kɨnda da pɨŋ Yesu aŋteban agɨt.
Yesu nandaban jɨgɨ madepsi aŋakwan bɨsit tebai sigɨn agɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan kɨŋkɨŋni yawi da yaŋ mɨktɨmon mawit.
Bɨsit aŋ mudaŋek pɨdaŋ paŋdetnikon tobɨl kɨŋ pɨndakban bupmɨ but yokwiyo madepsi nandawit do dɨpmɨn pakgwit.
Yaŋ pɨndagek yoyɨgɨt, “Nido dɨpmɨn pokgoŋ? Paŋkewalon dɨma moni yaŋ do pɨdaŋ bɨsit abɨt.”
Yesu gen sigɨn yaŋakwan amɨn kabɨ madep kɨnda apgwit. Paŋdet 12 kabɨkon da kɨnda mani Judas uŋun da mibɨltok aban apgwit. Uŋun da Yesu mandaŋ nok do kapmatjok apgut.
Mani Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Judas, gak Amɨn Dakon Monji mandaŋ naŋek uŋun kosiron da uwal da kɨsiron yɨpdɨsal, ma?”
Paŋdet kabɨ yo uŋun noman tok do aban kaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, emat agak sɨbanin baŋ tagɨ dapneŋ?”
Yaŋ iyɨŋek kɨnda da emat agak sɨbanaŋ mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn dakon oman monjɨ aŋagek mɨrakni amɨn tet nani mandaban dagaŋ kɨgɨt.
Mani Yesu da yagɨt, “Yaŋ dɨma a!” Yaŋ iyɨŋek kɨsitni uŋun amɨn da mɨragon wɨtjɨŋban aeni kɨlek tagɨt.
Aŋek Yesu da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon obip amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn, ae kɨla amɨn gat Yesu abɨdok do apgwit uŋun yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji emat agak sɨba gat ae kɨndap kɨrɨŋ gat tɨmɨgek kabo noknok amɨn kɨnda naŋ yaŋ abɨdok do abaŋ, ma?
Nak gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalon ji gat kɨsi egɨ egɨ agɨmaŋ, mani nak dɨma abɨdawit. Mani abɨsok on ji dakon bɨsap. Abɨsok pɨlɨn tuk dakon tapmɨm da madepsi asak.”
Yesu gen uŋun yaŋ mudaŋakwan abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn uŋun da yutnon awɨgɨwit. Aŋakwa Pita kagɨsok da yolgɨt.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ uŋun yut da nagalon kɨndap soŋek yɨgakwa Pita yo kɨsi uŋun gat yɨkgwit.
Yɨgakwa oman mɨŋat kɨnda da Pita uŋun kɨndap da teŋteŋɨkon yɨkban kagɨt. Pakyaŋsi kaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “On amɨn Yesu gat kɨsi egɨpgumal.”
Mani Pita da wasɨp yaŋek yagɨt, “Mɨŋat, uŋun amɨn dɨma nandaŋ ɨmɨsat.”
Tɨmɨsok dɨ egek amɨn kɨnda da kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gakyo kɨsi uŋun da kabɨkon nani kɨnda.” Iyɨŋban Pita da yagɨt, “Nak dɨma!”
Awa kaloŋɨ da tɨlagon egek amɨn kɨnda da tebaisi yagɨt, “On Galili amɨn kɨnda! Do asisi, on amɨn uŋun gat kɨsi egɨpgumal!”
Mani Pita da yagɨt, “Gen yosol uŋun dɨmasi nandɨsat.” Gen uŋun yaŋakwan pup uŋudon gɨn yagɨt.
Yaŋban Amɨn Tagɨ da tobɨl Pita nomansi sɨŋtaŋban kwanek kagɨt. Kaŋakwan Pita Amɨn Tagɨ da gen iyɨgɨt uŋun do nandagɨt: “Abɨsok kalbi pup gen dɨma yaŋakwa gak da kosirɨ kapbɨ nak do wasɨp yokdɨsal.”
Pita uŋun do nandaŋek nagalon da waŋga pɨgɨ kunam madepsi takgɨt.
Yesu abɨdawit amɨn da Yesu abɨŋ yɨp do jɨgɨlak yaŋ ɨmɨŋek baljawit.
Aŋek ɨmal naŋ dabɨlɨ wamaŋ sopmaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Uŋun namɨn da gɨkdak yaŋ do kombɨ gen yaŋ ka!”
Ae abɨŋ yɨp do aŋek gen yokwi morapmɨ dɨ gat kɨsi iyɨwit.
Wɨsa dagaŋakwan Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn gat mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat gen kokwin ak do muwukgwit. Muwugek Yesu gen kokwin tamokon aŋkɨ yaŋ iyɨwit,
“Gak asi Kristo kaŋ, niyɨŋbɨ nandano.” Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Dayɨkeŋ kaŋ, ji arɨpmɨ dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ namni.
Ae nak da dayɨkeŋ kaŋ, kobogɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma nayɨkdaŋ.
Mani Amɨn Dakon Monji Piŋkop Tapmɨm Ami da amɨn tet do kɨlɨ uŋun yɨtdɨsak.”
Yaŋban amɨn morap kɨsi da iyɨwit, “Do asi gak Piŋkop dakon Monji, ma?” Iyɨŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Ji bamɨsi yoŋ. Nak uŋun mani.”
Yaŋban yawit, “On amɨn gulusuŋni dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do amɨn dɨ gat yaŋ yomno nido apni? Iyɨ dakon gen kaga da kɨlɨ uŋun yaŋban nandamaŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋek uŋun amɨn kabɨ muwukgwit kɨsi da pɨdaŋ Yesu iyɨŋ ɨlɨk aŋaŋ Pailaron kɨwit.
Aŋkɨ wasaŋek gen yaŋ ɨmɨŋek yawit, “On amɨn da Israel amɨn kabɨ nin paŋupbal aŋek nin da Sisa do takis dɨma ɨmneŋ do yosok. Ae iyɨ do nak kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda, nak Kristo yaŋ yosok.”
Yaŋ yaŋba Pailat da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep, ma?” Yaŋban Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yagɨt, “Yosol uŋun mani.”
Yaŋ iyɨŋban Pailat da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae mɨŋat amɨn morap egɨpgwit yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak on amɨn dakon yokwini kɨnda dɨma kosot.”
Yaŋban gen tebaisi yaŋ yawit, “On amɨn Juda mɨktɨm kɨsisi agek amɨn yoyɨŋ degakwan kwen wɨgɨk aŋ. Galili mɨktɨmon da pi wasaŋek aŋakwan obɨŋ ɨdon obɨk.”
Yaŋba nandaŋek Pailat da yoyɨgɨt, “On amɨn Galili amɨn kɨnda bo dɨma?”
Erot da Galili mɨktɨm kɨla agɨt, do Yesu uŋun Galili amɨn kɨnda yaŋ yaŋba nandaŋek Pailat da Yesu yɨpban Erot ron kɨgɨt. Uŋun bɨsapmon Erot yo kɨsi Jerusalem egɨpgwit.
Erot da Yesu kaŋek tagɨsi nandagɨt. Bɨsap dubagɨsok amɨn da gen bini yaŋba nandagɨt, do Yesu da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda aban kokeŋ kaŋ tagɨsi yaŋ nandagɨt.
Erot da Yesu dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do gen morapmɨ iyɨgɨt, mani gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma yagɨt.
Aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat da kapmatjok agek gen yaŋ ɨm do pi tebaisi awit.
Aŋakwa Erot gat emat amɨn kabɨni gat da jɨgɨlak gen yaŋek abɨŋ yɨpgwit. Aŋek paba pɨgɨk dubak kɨldani tagɨsi kɨnda naŋ paŋ ɨmɨŋek yɨpba aeni tobɨl Pailat ron kɨgɨt.
Kalɨp Erot gat Pailat gat uwal aŋek egɨpgumal, mani uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn not agɨmal.
Pailat da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae kɨla amɨn gat, ae amɨn kɨsi yaŋ yoban opba
yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji da on amɨn nagon aŋabɨŋ uŋun da amɨn kwen wɨgɨk ani do yoyɨsak yaŋ nayeŋ. Mani kɨsin egek uŋun yo morap dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do iyɨt. Ji da gen morap yaŋ ɨmaŋ uŋun nak da koko bamɨ dɨma asak.
Ae Erot yo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn nandaŋek aeni yɨpban ninon tobɨl abɨsak. Aŋatno kɨmotjak da tɨlak yokwi kɨnda dɨma agɨt kosot.
Yaŋdo, nak yum baljaŋek yɨpbo kɨsak.”
<range>
Mani amɨn kɨsi da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “On amɨn aŋakbɨ kɨmagakwan Barabas naŋ yɨpbɨ ninon apjak!”
(Barabas uŋun kalɨp amɨn kɨnda aŋakban kɨmakgɨt, ae Jerusalem kokup papmon Rom gapman gat emat wamgwit, uŋun do dam tebanon yɨpgwit.)
Pailat da Yesu pulugaŋ yɨpban kɨsak dosi nandagɨt, do mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep dakon burɨ moni do aeni gen yoyɨgɨt.
Mani aeni sigɨn yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakgɨt! Tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakgɨt!”
Yaŋ yaŋba aeni yoyɨŋakwan kosirɨ kapbɨ aŋakwan yaŋ yagɨt, “Mibɨlɨ nido? Ni gulusuŋ naŋ agɨt? Aŋatno kɨmotjak da arɨpmon yokwi kɨnda dɨma agɨt kosot. Do yum baljaŋek yɨpbo kɨsak.”
Yaŋban amɨn da Yesu tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋatni do tebaisi sigɨn yawit. Yaŋ yaŋakwa Pailat dakon gen tapmɨmni maŋakwan
amɨn dakon geni nandaŋ yomɨŋek Yesu kɨmotjak do yaŋ dagok agɨt.
Aŋek amɨn dakon galaktok yolek amɨn uŋun kalɨp gapman gat emat wamgut, ae amɨn kɨnda aŋakban kɨmakban dam tebanon yɨpgwit, uŋun yɨpban kɨgɨt. Ae galaktokni yolek Yesu aŋakba kɨmotjak do emat amɨn da kɨsiron yɨpgut.
Emat amɨn da Yesu abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ kosiron kɨŋakwa amɨn kɨnda kokup papmon kɨk do apban kawit, mani Saimon, uŋun Sairini kokupmon nani kɨnda. Saimon gen tebai iyɨŋek tɨlak kɨndapni kwapmɨkon yɨpba guramɨgek Yesu yolban kɨwit.
Kɨŋakwa amɨn morapmɨsi yolba kɨwit. Aŋakwa mɨŋat dɨwarɨ da yolek Yesu do bupmɨ kap kɨnda yaŋek kunam tagek yolgwit.
Mani Yesu uŋun mɨŋat kabɨ tobɨl pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jerusalem dakon gwani, ji nak do kunam dɨma tatni. Dɨsi gat ae mɨŋat monjɨyosi gat do tatni.
Bɨsap kɨnda apdɨsak uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da yaŋ yokdaŋ, ‘Mɨŋat monjɨ suŋ ekwaŋ ae mɨŋat monjɨ mɨni ae mɨŋat monjɨ da mumɨ dɨma naŋbi, uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.’
Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da kabap yaŋ yoyɨkdaŋ, ‘Ji tuwɨl kɨ maŋ nin wɨtjɨŋba pasɨlneŋ!’
Wasok yokwi on kɨndap kalugɨ pakbini toŋon aŋ kaŋ, ae si kɨbɨdosagon niaŋ ani?”
Emat amɨn da uŋun bɨsapmon yokwi pakpak bamorɨ gat kɨsi Yesu gat dapba kɨmotni do tɨmɨk paŋpaŋ kɨwit.
Kɨŋek mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda mani Busuŋ Kɨdat uŋudon Yesu tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋagek yokwi pakpak kɨnda amɨn tet do, ae kɨnda gwandeŋ tet do yaŋ dapgwit.
Aŋakwa Yesu da yagɨt, “Dat, dɨwarɨni wɨrɨrɨk yobi. Yo aŋ uŋun dɨma nandaŋ pɨsaŋek aŋ.” Yaŋ yaŋakwan emat amɨn da ɨmalni namɨn da tɨmɨtjak yaŋ do wasok kɨnda awit.
Aŋakwa amɨn kaŋ agakwa kɨla amɨn da yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ yawit, “Amɨn dɨwarɨ paŋpulugagɨt, do uŋun asi Kristo, Piŋkop da pini asak do manjɨgɨt amɨn kaŋ, iyɨ tagɨ aŋpulugosak.”
Yaŋ yaŋakwa emat amɨn uŋun kɨsi da abɨŋek jɨgɨlak gen yaŋ ɨmɨŋek wain ɨsɨpmɨ ɨba nosak do
aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Gak asi Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep kaŋ gaga aŋpuluga!”
Tɨlak kɨndapmon but pɨso gen kɨnda busuŋni da kwen yaŋ mandawit: ON AMƗN UŊUN JUDA AMƗN DAKON KƗLA AMƗN MADEPNI
Yokwi pakpak kɨnda Yesu gat dapbi uŋun da yaŋba yokwi tok aŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Kristo, ma? Gak gaga aŋpulugaŋek nityo kɨsi paŋpuluga!”
Yaŋ yaŋban yokwi pakpak terɨ kɨnda aŋakbi uŋun da gen tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Piŋkop do dɨma pasoldol, ma? On amɨn da tepmɨ pasak nityo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn pamak.
Nit asi yokwi agɨmak, do kobogɨ yokwi pamak, mani on amɨn yokwi kɨnda dɨma agɨt.”
Yaŋ yaŋek yagɨt, “Yesu, gak kɨla amɨn madep man paki bɨsapmon nandaŋ nabi.”
Yaŋban Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Asisi gayɨsat, gak abɨsok nak gat Paradais kon egɨpdamak.”
Uŋun bɨsapmon gɨldat dabɨl pɨlɨn tuksi agɨt, do 12 kilok aŋakwan mɨktɨm kɨsi pɨlɨn tuk aŋakwan kɨŋ pɨlɨndo 3 kilok agɨt. Aŋakwan Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon yoma ɨmal uŋun kwen da sulugɨ pɨŋ mibɨlɨkon dagaŋ kɨ tɨmɨ bamorɨ agɨt.
<range>
Aŋakwan Yesu uŋun gen papmon da yaŋ yagɨt, “Dat, wupno gak da kɨsiron yɨpmaŋdat!” Yaŋ yaŋek kɨmakgɨt.
Yaŋ aban kaŋek emat amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn da Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Asisi, on amɨn kɨlegɨsi egɨpgut.”
Amɨn kabɨ madepsi yo noman tawit uŋun pɨndat do apgwit uŋun pɨndagek bupmɨsi nandaŋek tobɨl yutnikon kɨwit.
Mani mɨŋat amɨn morap nandaŋ ɨmgwit gat, ae mɨŋat Galili da Yesu yolek apgwit uŋun gat dubagɨkon da agek yo noman tawit uŋun pɨndakgwit.
Amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut mani Josep. Uŋun Juda dakon kokup pap kɨnda mani Arimatea uŋudon nani. Uŋun amɨn tagɨsi ae aŋpakni kɨlegɨsi. Ae uŋun Piŋkop da amɨn kɨla akdɨsak uŋun do jomjom aŋek egɨpgut. Uŋun Juda amɨn dakon gen kokwin amɨn kabɨkon nani kɨnda, mani gen kokwin amɨn kabɨ notni Yesu do nandak nandak awit ae yo awit uŋun do but kaloŋ dɨma agɨt.
<range>
Josep uŋun Pailat ron kɨŋ Yesu dakon bumjotni abɨdok do iyɨŋban nandaŋ ɨmgut.
Aban Yesu dakon bumjotni tɨlak kɨndapmon naŋ abɨdaŋ abɨŋ ɨmal kwakwagɨ kɨnda naŋ wamgut. Wamaŋek aŋkɨ kɨmakbi tamo kɨnda kalɨp tɨpnaŋ pasɨwit, ae bumjot kɨnda uŋudon dɨma yɨpbi, uŋudon yɨpgut.
Sabat dakon yo paŋtagap ak bɨsap, Neŋgokon yɨpgut. Sabat bɨsap uŋun kɨlɨ wasok do agɨt.
Mɨŋat Galili da Yesu gat apgwit uŋun Josep yol aŋkɨŋek tɨp kɨnam uŋun kawit. Ae Josep da Yesu dakon bumjotni niaŋon da yɨpgut uŋun kɨsi kawit.
Kaŋek yutnikon tobɨl kɨŋ bumjotnikon yop do marasin gat ae pakbi kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi gat paŋkosit awit. Mani Sabat dakon gen teban yolek yɨk yawot awit.
Sonda wɨsa dagokdosi mɨŋat kabɨ uŋun yo kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi kɨlɨ paŋkosit awit uŋun tɨmɨgek tɨp kɨnamon kɨwit.
Kɨŋ kaŋba tɨp madep tɨp kɨnam sopgut uŋun kɨlɨ aŋtobɨlba kɨgɨt kawit.
Mani pɨgɨ Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu dakon bumjotni dɨma kawit.
Bumjotni dukwan tosok yaŋ nandaŋek but morap aŋek egakwa uŋudon gɨn amɨn bamorɨ kapmatjok altaŋek akbal pɨndakgwit. Uŋun dakon ɨmalni da mal dakon teŋteŋɨ yombem madepsi teŋteŋawit.
Aŋakwan mɨŋat da pasol pasol madepsi nandaŋek mukgwan gawagakwa amɨn bamot da yaŋ yoyɨgɨmal, “Ji nido kɨmakbi tamokon amɨn egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ uŋun wɨsaŋ?
Uŋun ɨdon dɨma egɨsak. Kɨlɨ pɨdak. Galili mɨktɨmon egek gen kɨnda dayɨgɨt do nandani.
Yaŋ dayɨgɨt, ‘Amɨn da Amɨn Dakon Monji yokwi pakpak da kɨsiron yɨpba tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmotdɨsak. Ae gɨldat kapbɨ egɨ mudaŋek aeni pɨdokdɨsak.’ ”
Yaŋ yaŋbal nandaŋek Yesu da gen kɨlɨ yoyɨgɨt uŋun do burɨ pɨsawit.
Burɨ pɨsaŋba tɨp kɨnamon da tobɨl kɨŋek yo pɨndak nandaŋyo awit uŋun yabekbi 11 kabɨ gat, ae amɨn dɨwarɨ gat kɨsi yoyɨwit.
Mɨŋat gen yoyɨwit dakon mani uŋun yaŋ: Maria Makdala kokupmon nani, Joana, Maria Jems dakon meŋi, ae mɨŋat notni dɨwarɨ uŋun kɨsi da yoyɨwit.
Gen uŋun yoyɨŋba yabekbi kabɨ da nandaba ŋugɨgɨ gen aban dɨma nandaŋ yomgwit.
Mani Pita pɨdaŋ tɨmtɨm yaŋek tɨp kɨnamon kɨŋ pagadaŋek pɨndakban ɨmal dagɨn tawit. Yaŋ pɨndagek yutnon tobɨl kɨŋek uŋun yo morap niaŋon da altawit yaŋ do nandak nandak agɨt.
Uŋun gɨldaron gɨn paŋdetni bamorɨ Emeas kokupmon kɨk do kɨgɨmal. Emeas uŋun Jerusalem da dubagɨsi, 11 kilomita da arɨp tosok.
Uŋun amɨn bamot kɨŋek yo morap altawit dakon geni yaŋ nandat agɨmal.
Yo morap uŋun do yaŋ nandat aŋek kɨŋakwal Yesu iyɨ opban kɨsi kɨwit.
Dabɨl da kagɨmal, mani uŋun Yesu yaŋ dɨma kaŋ nandaŋyo agɨmal.
Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil ni gen baŋ yaŋ nandat aŋek kwamal?” Yaŋ yoyɨŋban bupmɨ tomno dabɨlyo aŋek akgɨmal.
Kɨnda, uŋun mani Kliopas, uŋun da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Dubagɨkon amɨn Jerusalem apgwit da ekwaŋ uŋun da bɨkbɨgon gak kaloŋ dagɨn yo on bɨsapmon noman taŋ uŋun dɨma nandal?”
Yaŋban Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ni yo?” Yaŋban yagɨmal, “Yesu Nasaret amɨnon yo altawit uŋun do yomak. Uŋun kombɨ amɨn kɨnda. Gen yagɨt, ae pi agɨt, uŋun Piŋkop da dabɨlon, ae amɨn kɨsi da dabɨlon, tapmɨmɨ toŋsi aban kawit.
Mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae kɨla amɨnin gat da Yesu gapman da kɨsiron yɨpgwit. Yaŋ aba gapman da si aŋakba kɨmotjak do gen yaŋ aŋteban aŋek tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmakgɨt.
Mani nin uŋun amɨn Israel amɨn yokwikon baŋ pulugaŋ nipdɨsak amɨn yaŋon da nandaŋ ɨmgumaŋ. Uŋun yo morap altaŋakwa Yesu aŋakba kɨmakgɨt dakon gɨldatni abɨsok kapbɨ asak.
Ae nin da kabɨkon nani mɨŋat dɨ da gen ŋwakŋwarɨsi niyɨŋba nandamaŋ. Uŋun wɨsa dagokdosi tɨp kɨnamon kɨŋ
Yesu dakon bumjotni dɨma taŋban kaŋek tobɨl abɨŋ yaŋ niyɨmal, ‘Nin kɨŋ dɨpmɨn yombem kɨnda kaŋapno aŋelo da yaŋ niyeŋ “Uŋun kalugɨ egɨsak.” ’
Yaŋ niyɨŋba notnin dɨ da tɨp kɨnamon kɨŋ yo mɨŋat da niyeŋ yaŋ gɨn taŋba pɨndaŋ. Mani Yesu iyɨ dɨma kaŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋbal Yesu da amɨn bamot yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil nandaŋ kokwinjil tagɨ mɨni. Kombɨ amɨn da gen morap yawit uŋun butjilon da tepmɨ dɨma nandaŋ gadamal.
Kristo mibɨltok tepmɨ madep paŋek don Piŋkop da man madep ɨmjak, jil uŋun dɨma nandamal, ma?”
Yaŋ yaŋek Moses gat ae kombɨ amɨn morap dakon gen gat baŋ wasaŋek Piŋkop da papia morapmon gen iyɨ do mandabi uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨt.
Kokup uŋun kɨk do agɨmal uŋun aŋkapmat aŋakwa Yesu da saŋbeŋek kɨk do yaŋ agɨt.
Mani amɨn bamot da kɨrɨŋɨk ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Pɨlɨn tokdɨsak do gak nit gat egɨpneŋ.” Yaŋ iyɨŋbal amɨn bamot gat kɨsi yutnon wɨgɨwit.
Wɨgɨ jap noknok tamokon yɨgek bret abɨdaŋ Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek bret pudaŋek yomgut.
Yaŋ aban amɨn bamot dabɨlni pɨsaŋban kaŋ nandaŋyo agɨmal. Yaŋ aŋakwal uŋudon gɨn pasɨlakwan ae saŋbeŋek dɨma kagɨmal.
Aŋakwan amɨn bamot yaŋ yagɨmal, “Kosiron Piŋkop da papiakon gen toŋ dakon mibɨlɨ niyɨŋakwan butnit madepsi pɨdaŋ.”
Amɨn bamot yaŋ yaŋek uŋudon gɨn tobɨl Jerusalem kɨgɨmal. Kɨŋ paŋdet 11 kabɨ gat ae notni dɨwarɨ gat muwuk egɨpgwit uŋun pɨndagakwal
yaŋ yawit, “Amɨn Tagɨ kɨlɨ pɨdak da Saimon altaŋ ɨmɨk!”
Yaŋ yaŋba amɨn bamot da yo kosiron altawit uŋun do yoyɨŋek yagɨmal, “Bret pudaŋakwan uŋudon kaŋ nandaŋyo amak.”
Uŋun dakon gen yaŋ nandaŋek egakwa Yesu bɨkbɨk nikon altaŋ yomɨŋek akgɨt. Agek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “But yawot jikon tosak.”
Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn wup kɨnda da agek yosok yaŋ nandaŋek wurɨpdagek pasalgwit.
Pasalakwa yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nido pasalek but bamot aŋ?
Kɨsit kandapyono do pɨndakgɨt. Nak naga akdat. Gɨptɨmno abɨdaŋek nandabɨt. Nak kɨdat sabamyono toŋ do nandani. Amɨn wup uŋun kɨdat sabamyoni mɨni.”
Yaŋ yoyɨŋek kɨsit kandapyoni yolɨgɨt.
Yolɨŋban pɨndagek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madep awit, mani but morap nandaŋek nandaba bamɨ dɨma agɨt. Yaŋ nandaŋakwa yoyɨgɨt, “Jikon jap dɨ toŋ?”
Yaŋban tap kɨlap kɨlɨ paŋkɨbɨt abi tɨmɨsok kɨnda ɨmɨŋba
abɨdaŋek naŋban kawit.
Kaŋakwa yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak ji gat egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon yaŋ kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm: Moses da gen tebanon, ae kombɨ amɨn da genon, ae Kap Papiakon nak do gen mandabi da toŋ uŋun kɨsisi bamɨ altaŋ mudokdaŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋek Piŋkop da papiakon gen toŋ uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandaba pɨsoni do paŋpulugagɨt.
Aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ mandabi: Kristo uŋun tepmɨ paŋek gɨldat kapbɨ egek kɨmoron da pɨdokdɨsak.
Aban paŋdet kabɨni da uŋun da manon but tobɨl dakon gen gat, ae dɨwarɨ wɨrɨrɨt dakon gen gat yoyɨŋ teŋteŋaŋba amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun da nandakdaŋ. Pi uŋun Jerusalem kokup papmon da wasaŋek akdaŋ.
Ji uŋun yo morap altawit uŋun pɨndakgwit, do uŋun dakon gen bin mɨŋat amɨn morapyo yoyɨŋ teŋteŋokni.
Nandani! Dat da yo dam do yaŋ teban tok agɨt uŋun nak da jikon yabetdɨsat. Ji tepmɨ dɨma kɨŋek kokup papmon egakwa Piŋkop dakon tapmɨm Kwen Kokup da jikon pɨkdɨsak.”
Yaŋ yoyɨŋek paŋdetni mibɨltaŋ yomɨŋek Betani kokupmon kɨwit. Kɨŋ uŋudon kɨsirɨ paŋenagek gɨsam yomgut.
Gɨsam yomɨŋakwan gɨn paŋdetni yopmaŋ degek Piŋkop da aŋaŋ Kwen Kokup wɨgɨgɨt.
Wɨgɨkwan gawak ɨmɨŋek tobɨl kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi nandaŋek Jerusalem kɨwit.
Kɨŋ Telagɨ Yut Madepmon saŋbek saŋbek egek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiwit.
Yo morap dɨma altaŋakwa wasok wasogɨkon Gen uŋun egɨpgut. Gen uŋun Piŋkop gat egɨpgumal, ae Gen iyɨ Piŋkop uŋun.
Uŋun kalɨpsigwan yo morap dɨma altaŋakwa Piŋkop gat egɨpgumal.
Piŋkop da uŋun Gen naŋ gɨn yo morap kɨsisi wasaŋ mudagɨt. Kosit ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨndakon da yo kɨnda dɨma noman tagɨt.
Iyɨ uŋun egɨp egɨp dakon malunsi egɨpgut. Uŋun egɨp egɨp da amɨn teŋteŋaŋ yomgut.
Aŋakwan uŋun teŋteŋɨ da pɨlɨn tukgwan teŋteŋaŋban pɨlɨn tuk da dɨma aban kɨmakgɨt.
Piŋkop da amɨn kɨnda yabekban apgut, uŋun mani Jon.
Uŋun da abɨŋ amɨn kɨsisi geni nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek teŋteŋɨ nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni do teŋteŋɨ dakon but pɨso gen yagɨt.
Jon iyɨ teŋteŋɨ dɨma. Uŋun da teŋteŋɨ dakon but pɨso gen gɨn yagɨt.
Teŋteŋɨ bamɨsi uŋun mɨktɨmon pɨŋek mɨŋat amɨn morapyo teŋteŋaŋ yomɨsak.
Gen uŋun mɨktɨmon pɨŋ egɨpgut. Mɨktɨm gat ae yo morap mɨktɨmon toŋ uŋun iyɨ wasagɨt, mani mɨktɨmon ekwan mɨktɨm amɨn da niaŋen amɨn kɨnda yaŋ dɨma kaŋba pɨsagɨt.
Iyɨ da kokupmon apban dabɨni da dɨma abɨdawit.
Mani amɨn morap not aŋ ɨmɨŋek mani nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop dakon monjɨ gwayonisi ani do yagɨt.
Uŋun meŋ datyo da yawikon da dɨma altawit. Ae amɨn da galak togon da dɨma. Piŋkopmon da altawit.
Gen uŋun amɨn dagaŋban nin gat egɨpgumaŋ. Egakwan Dat da monji kaloŋɨ yabekban pɨgɨt uŋun dakon tɨlɨmni kagɨmaŋ. Nandaŋ yawot ae aŋpak bamɨsi uŋun amɨnon tugagɨt.
Uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ Jon da madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak uŋun amɨn dakon mibɨlni do yaŋ kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm, ‘Uŋun amɨn nak da buŋon abɨsak, mani nak dɨma altaŋapbo kɨlɨsi egɨpgut, do nak ŋwapmaŋdak.’ ”
Nandaŋ yawot uŋun amɨnon tugagɨt da tosok, do nin kɨsisi gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ paŋpulugaŋakwan gɨsamɨ toŋ ekwamaŋ.
Nido Piŋkop da Moses iyɨŋban gen teban nimgut, mani nandaŋ yawot gat ae aŋpak bamɨsi uŋun Yesu Kristokon da apgut.
Piŋkop uŋun amɨn kɨnda da dɨmasi kagɨt. Mani Monjɨsi kaloŋɨ, Datni da kapmatjok egɨsak, uŋun da Piŋkop dakon mibɨlɨ kɨlɨ nolɨgɨt.
Juda amɨn Jerusalem egɨpgwit uŋun da mukwa sogok amɨn ae Liwai amɨn yabekba Jonon kɨŋ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak niaŋen amɨn kɨnda?”
Yaŋba Jon da iyɨ dakon mibɨlni dɨma aŋkɨsɨbɨgɨt. Yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak Kristo dɨma.”
Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Yaŋ kaŋ gak namɨn? Gak Elaija bo?” Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Dɨma.” Aeni iyɨwit, “Gak kombɨ amɨn uŋun apjak do jomjom amaŋ, uŋun bo?” Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Dɨma.”
Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Gak namɨn? Gak da gen kobogɨ niyɨŋbɨ kɨŋ amɨn yabekba abɨmaŋ yoyɨno. Gak gaga do namɨn yaŋ yosol?”
Iyɨŋba Jon da kombɨ amɨn Aisaia da kalɨpsigwan gen kɨnda yagɨt uŋun da arɨpmon yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak amɨn kɨnda mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yosot, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ dakon kosit yulba kɨlegɨsi asak.’ ”
Parisi amɨn da uŋun amɨn yabekba apgwit.
Uŋun amɨn da Jon saŋbeŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak Kristo dɨma, ae Elaija dɨma, ae uŋun kombɨ amɨn dɨma kaŋ, nido amɨn telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomɨsal?”
Yaŋ yaŋba Jon da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak amɨn pakbisi baŋ telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomɨsat, mani amɨn kɨnda ji da bɨkbɨgon akdak, uŋun amɨn ji dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ.
Uŋun nak da manjikon noldak. Nak yombem yokwi da kandap gwɨl napni tagɨ dɨma wɨtdalgeŋ.”
Jon gat gen yaŋ nandat awit uŋun Betani kokupmon Jodan Pakbi usugap tet uŋudon awit. Jon uŋudon egek amɨn telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomgut.
Gɨldat kɨnda do Jon da Yesu iyɨkon opban kaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Kabɨt, on Piŋkop dakon Sipsip Monɨŋni. Uŋun mɨktɨm amɨn dakon dɨwarɨni wɨrɨrɨkdak.
On amɨn do nak kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm, ‘Amɨn kɨnda nak da buŋon abɨsak uŋun da nak si ŋwapmaŋdak, nido nak dɨma altaŋapbo kɨlɨsi egɨpgut.’
Nak naga dɨma nandaŋ ɨmgum, mani Israel amɨn kabɨ da uŋun amɨn kaŋ nandaŋyo ani do aŋek telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomɨŋek apgum.”
Jon yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek aeni yagɨt, “Nak kaŋapbo Telagɨ Wup kɨnarɨm da mɨktɨmon paŋ uŋun da tɨlak Kwen Kokup da Yesukon pɨgɨt.
Nak naga uŋun amɨn dɨma nandaŋ ɨmgum. Mani Piŋkop da nak telagɨ pakbi soŋ yobeŋ do yabegek yaŋ nayɨgɨt, ‘Gak kaŋbɨ Telagɨ Wup amɨn kɨnda da kwenon pɨŋ yɨkban kaŋ yaŋ nandaki, uŋun amɨn da amɨn Telagɨ Wup naŋ telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomdɨsak.’
Uŋun amɨn nak naga kagɨm, do yaŋsi dayɨsat, uŋun amɨn uŋun Piŋkop dakon Monji.”
Gɨldat kɨnda do Jon gat paŋdetni bamorɨ gat uŋudon gɨn akgwit.
Agek Yesu obɨŋakwan kaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kabɨt, on Piŋkop dakon Sipsip Monɨŋni!”
Jon da gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek paŋdetni bamot Yesu yolgɨmal.
Yolakwal Yesu da tobɨl pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yo ninaŋ wɨsamal?” Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Rabai, gak dukon egɨsal?” (“Rabai” uŋun gen dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun “Yoyɨŋdet.”)
Yaŋ yaŋbal Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Jil abɨŋ konjil.” Yaŋ yaŋban kɨŋ yutni kagɨmal. Kaŋek pɨlɨndo 4 kilok agɨt do Yesu gat egɨpgwit.
Amɨn bamot Jon dakon gen nandaŋek Yesu yolgɨmal, kɨnda mani Andru uŋun Saimon Pita dakon padɨge.
Andru Yesu yɨpmaŋek uŋudon gɨn Saimon wɨsɨŋ kaŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nin Mesaia kɨlɨ kamaŋ.” (“Mesaia” dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun “Kristo”).
Yaŋ iyɨŋek abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ Yesukon kɨŋ altaŋbal Yesu da Saimon kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Saimon, Jon dakon monji. Buŋon amɨn da Sipas yaŋ gayɨni.” (“Sipas” uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun “Pita”)
Wɨsa dagokdo Yesu Galili Provinskon kɨk do aŋek Pilip kaŋ kwaŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Abɨŋ nak nol.”
Pilip uŋun Betsaida kokupmon nani, Andru gat Pita gat dakon kokup ɨsalni.
Pilip uŋun kɨŋ Nataniel kaŋ kwaŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Moses da gen teban papiakon amɨn kɨnda do gen mandagɨt, ae kombɨ amɨn da gen mandawit, uŋun amɨn kɨlɨ kaŋ kwamaŋ. Uŋun Yesu, Nasaret kokupmon amɨn, Josep dakon monji.”
Yaŋban Nataniel da iyɨgɨt, “Yo tagɨ kɨnda Nasaret kokupmon tagɨ dɨma altogɨ nandɨsat.” Yaŋban Pilip da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Abɨŋek ka.”
Yesu da Nataniel apban kaŋek Nataniel do yaŋ yagɨt, “Kabɨt, Israel amɨn bamɨsi kɨnda abɨsak. Uŋun amɨn topni mɨnisi.”
Yaŋban Nataniel da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Niaŋ aŋek nak dakon mibɨlno nandɨsal?” Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Pilip dɨma yaŋ gamɨŋakwan gak pik kɨndap mibɨlon yɨgaki kɨlɨ gandat.”
Nataniel uŋun gen nandaŋek yaŋkwok yaŋ agɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, gak Piŋkop dakon Monji. Gak Israel amɨn dakon Kɨla Amɨn Madep.”
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak da gak pik kɨndap mibɨlon yɨkbɨ gandat yaŋ gayɨko uŋun do aŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨsal. Don uŋun si yapmaŋek wasok ŋwakŋwarɨsi pɨndatdɨsal.
Nak asisi gayɨsat, don Kwen Kokup wɨtdal kɨŋakwan kokdɨsal. Kaŋaki Piŋkop dakon aŋelo kabɨ da Amɨn Dakon Monjikon wɨkwaŋ paŋgɨn akdaŋ.”
Pi agak bamorɨ mudaŋakwal Kana kokup, Galili mɨktɨmon mɨŋat pakpak kɨnda dakon soŋnok madep kɨnda awit. Aba Yesu dakon meŋi da kɨŋ pɨndakgɨt.
Yesu gat paŋdet kabɨni gat kɨsi yaŋ yoba opba uŋun mɨŋat pawiron kɨsi egɨpgwit.
Egek wain naŋ mudaŋba Yesu meŋi da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Wain kɨlɨ mudaŋ.”
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Meŋ, gak da nak dɨwat dɨma nayɨki. Abɨsok uŋun nak dakon bɨsap dɨma.”
Yaŋban meŋi da oman amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yo kɨnda do dayɨŋban kaŋ uŋun ani.”
Pakbi tɨbɨt madep daman 100 lita da tɨlak tɨp baŋ wasaŋbi 6 kabɨ yaŋ tawit. Juda amɨn da aŋpakni yolek Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlek tok do uŋun pakbi tɨbɨt baŋ koleŋ soŋ soŋ ani do tawit.
Yesu da oman amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji pakbi koleŋ tɨbɨrɨkon tagalba pɨkwan.” Yoyɨŋban yaŋ aba genikon wɨŋ tugawit.
Yaŋ aba yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dɨwarɨ koleŋ paŋpaŋ jap noknok kɨla amɨnon paŋkɨt.” Yoyɨŋban paŋkɨ ɨmgwit.
Pakbisi da wain dagagɨt do jap noknok kɨla amɨn da aŋkɨlɨk kok do naŋ nandaban galagɨsi agɨt. Oman amɨn pakbi kolewit uŋun da Yesu da yo agɨt uŋun kawit, mani kɨla amɨn dɨma kagɨt, do wɨli mɨŋat pagɨt uŋun yaŋ ɨban
opban yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mibɨltok wain galagɨsi yomno morapmɨ naŋakwa, don wain ɨsalɨbaŋ yomno noŋ. Kositnin yaŋ tosok, mani gak wain tagɨsi paŋkutnaŋbɨ taŋ baŋ buŋon don yomɨsal.”
Uŋun wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ Yesu da Kana kokup Galili mɨktɨm uŋudon mibɨltoksi wasaŋek agɨt. Yaŋ aŋek tɨlɨmni yolɨŋban paŋdetni da uŋun kaŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit.
Yesu Kana kokup yɨpmaŋek meŋi gat padɨge kabɨ gat ae paŋdet kabɨni gat Kapaneam kokupmon kɨŋ uŋudon gɨldat kabi kɨnda egɨpgwit.
Juda amɨn dakon Yapyap Bɨlak kapmat taŋakwan Yesu Jerusalem kɨgɨt.
Kɨŋ Telagɨ Yut Madep uŋun da nagalgwan pɨgɨ pɨndakban amɨn moneŋ ɨlɨt pi awit. Amɨn dɨwarɨ uŋun bulmakau, sipsip ae mɨnam baŋ moneŋ ɨlɨt pi awit. Aŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ da tamonikon yɨgek moneŋ kulabɨk aba pɨndakgɨt.
Yaŋ pɨndagek nap dɨwat dɨwat tɨmɨgek uŋun baŋ amɨn ae bulmakau ae sipsip kɨsi baljaŋ yolban telagɨ yut yɨpmaŋek waŋga abɨgɨwit. Yaŋ aŋek Rom dakon moneŋ baŋ Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon moneŋ kulabɨk aŋ aŋ awit amɨn dakon moneŋni wɨrɨrɨkban kɨŋakwa tamoni paŋtobɨlgɨt.
Aŋek mɨnam baŋ moneŋ ɨlɨt pi awit yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Mɨnamji tɨmɨk waŋga paŋabɨgɨt! Ji da kulabɨk aba Datno dakon yut moneŋ ɨlɨt tamo yombem dɨma asak!”
Yaŋban paŋdetni da gen kɨnda Piŋkop da papiakon tosok uŋun do nandawit. Gen uŋun yaŋ tosok: “Gak dakon yut do galagɨsi nandɨsat, uŋun do aŋek uŋun yut da tagɨsi tosak do pini asat.”
Juda amɨn da yo agɨt uŋun kaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Ni wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda naŋ nolɨŋbɨ kaŋek gak yaŋ mudaŋ gamɨŋbi da uŋun yo asal yaŋ gandaneŋ?”
Yaŋba Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On telagɨ yut tuwɨlba gɨldat kapbɨ da butgwan nak da kaluk wɨtjɨkdɨsat.”
Yaŋban Juda amɨn da yawit, “Nin bɨlak 46 kabɨ da butgwan telagɨ yut on agɨmaŋ. Gak da gɨldat kapbɨ dogɨn wɨtjɨk do yosol, ma?”
Mani telagɨ yut uŋun iyɨ dakon gɨptɨm do yagɨt.
Don Piŋkop da Yesu kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt uŋun bɨsapmon paŋdetni da gen uŋun yagɨt uŋun do nandawit. Aŋek Piŋkop dakon gen gat ae Yesu da gen yagɨt kɨsi do nandaba bamɨsi agɨt.
Yesu Yapyap Bɨlagon Jerusalem kokup papmon egɨpgut bɨsapmon amɨn morapmɨ da wasokni tapmɨmɨ toŋ madepsi aban pɨndagek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit.
Mani Yesu da mibɨlni nandaŋ mudagɨt, do but uŋun do dɨma yopgut. Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn dakon mibɨlni iyɨŋdetjak do dɨma nandagɨt, nido iyɨ amɨn dakon butni kɨlɨ pɨndak mudagɨt.
<range>
Parisi amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut mani Nikodemus. Uŋun Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn kɨnda.
Uŋun amɨn kalbi kɨnda Yesukon kɨŋ altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, amɨn kɨnda Piŋkop gat gadat gadat dɨma asak tam, gak da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ asal uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma aban. Do gak yoyɨŋdet kɨnda Piŋkopmon da apgul yaŋ nandaŋ gamamaŋ.”
Yaŋban Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi gayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda aeni dɨma altosak kaŋ, Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni arɨpmɨ dɨma kosak.”
Iyɨŋban Nikodemus da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn pelaŋ kɨlɨ abi kɨnda da niaŋ aŋek aeni altosak? Meŋi da butgwan pɨgek aeni tagɨ altosak?”
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi gayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda pakbi ae Telagɨ Wupmon dɨma altosak kaŋ, Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asagon arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨgɨsak.
Amɨnon da altaŋbi uŋun amɨn, ae Wupmon da altaŋbi uŋun wup.
Gak aego altoki dosi gayɨt uŋun do dɨma wɨrɨpdakgi.
Mɨrɨm uŋun galaktokni yolek dukwan dukwan tagɨni kɨsak. Wuwɨgɨ nandamaŋ mani dukwan da abɨsak ae dukwan kɨsak uŋun dɨma kaŋ pɨsomaŋ. Amɨn morap Wupmon da altoŋ uŋun yaŋ gɨn.”
Yaŋban Nikodemus da iyɨgɨt, “Uŋun niaŋon da noman toni?”
Yaŋban Yesu da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Israel amɨn dakon yoyɨŋdet kɨnda da yo morap on dɨma nandabɨ pɨsosok, ma?
Nak asisi gayɨsat, nin yo si nandamaŋ uŋun do yomaŋ, ae yo si pɨndakgɨmaŋ uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋok amaŋ. Mani dayɨno ji gen uŋun tɨmɨt do dɨma galak toŋ.
Nak mɨktɨmon yo toŋ uŋun do dayɨko nandaba bamɨ dɨma asak. Yaŋ aŋ do Kwen Kokupmon yo toŋ uŋun do dayɨko niaŋsi aŋek nandaba bamɨ asak?
Amɨn kɨnda da Kwen Kokup dɨmasi wɨgɨgɨt. Amɨn Dakon Monji Kwen Kokup da pɨgɨt uŋun dagɨn wɨgɨgɨt.
Kalɨp Moses da mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon tuŋon amɨn aŋenakgɨt, yaŋ gɨn amɨn da Amɨn Dakon Monji aŋenotdaŋ.
Aŋenakba nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni amɨn uŋun kɨsisi egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdokdaŋ.
“Piŋkop amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek Monjɨ kaloŋɨ yomgut. Uŋun do nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni amɨn Tɨpdom do amɨn dɨma ani. Egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni do amɨn ani.
Piŋkop da Monji mɨŋat amɨnyo aŋpakni kokwin aŋek gen pikon yopjak do mɨktɨmon dɨma yabekgɨt. Yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjak do yabekban pɨgɨt.
Monjɨ nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn uŋun kobogɨ yokwi dɨma tɨmɨtni. Mani nandaŋ gadagɨ mɨni amɨn uŋun Piŋkop dakon Monji kaloŋɨ dakon mani dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ, do kobogɨ yokwi tɨmɨtni dakon yaŋ dagok kɨlɨ aŋyobi.
Kobogɨ yokwi tɨmɨtdaŋ dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ: Teŋteŋɨ da mɨktɨmon teŋteŋaŋban amɨn da aŋpakni yokwi noman toni do pasalek teŋteŋɨ manji ɨmɨŋek pɨlɨn tuk do galak tawit.
<range>
Mani gen bamɨ paŋek egɨsak amɨn uŋun teŋteŋɨkon abɨsak. Abɨŋek teŋteŋɨkon egakwan amɨn da kaŋba Piŋkop da aŋpulugaŋban aŋpak tagɨsi asak.”
Uŋun da kwenon Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Judia mɨktɨmon kɨwit. Paŋkɨ paŋdetni gat egek amɨn telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomgut.
Aŋakwan Jonyo kɨsi amɨn telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomgut. Ainon kokupmon pakbi morapmɨ tawit do amɨn uŋudon apba telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomgut. Ainon uŋun Salim kokup da kapmatjok tosok.
(Uŋun bɨsapmon Jon dam tebanon dɨma yɨpbi.)
Uŋun bɨsapmon Jon dakon paŋdetni gat ae Juda amɨn kɨnda gat gen emat awit. Ni kosiron da pakbi soŋek Piŋkop da dabɨlon tagɨ kɨlek togɨ yaŋ do gen emat awit.
Aŋek Jon dakon paŋdetni da kɨŋ Jon yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, amɨn uŋun Jodan Pakbi terɨ kɨnda gak gat egek mibɨlni yaŋbɨ nandagɨmaŋ, abɨsok amɨn kɨsisi da uŋun amɨnon kwa telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomɨsak.”
Yaŋba Jon da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun da amɨn kɨnda do pi kɨnda dɨma ɨmɨsak kaŋ tagɨ dɨma asak.
Nak kalɨp gen yagɨm uŋun dɨsi nandaŋ, uŋun yaŋ: ‘Nak Kristo dɨma. Piŋkop da nak yabekban mibɨltaŋ ɨmɨŋek abɨsat.’
Wɨli kɨnda da mɨŋat kɨnda pasak kaŋ, mɨŋat uŋun iyɨ do pasak. Paŋakwan wɨli dakon notni da agek mɨrak yopmaŋek geni nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk asak. Abɨsok kɨsɨk kɨsɨk da nak da buron tugosok.
Uŋun dakon man da wukwisi tosak, aŋakwan nak dakon man da pɨŋbi tosak.
“Amɨn kwen da pɨgɨt uŋun da amɨn morap kɨsi yapmaŋ mudosok. Mɨktɨm amɨn uŋun on mɨktɨm dakon, ae nandak nandakni uŋun on mɨktɨm dakon. Amɨn Kwen Kokup da pɨgɨt uŋun da amɨn morap kɨsi yapmaŋ mudosok.
Uŋun da yo morap pɨndak nandaŋyo agɨt uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋok asak, mani amɨn da nandaba bamɨ dɨma asak.
Geni do nandaba bamɨ asak amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da gen bamɨ yosok yaŋ nandaŋ gadaŋ.
Amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da yabekban apgut uŋun Telagɨ Wupni tagapmɨsok dɨma, tugok tugogɨsi taŋ ɨmɨsak, do Piŋkop dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋosok.
Dat da Monji but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨŋek yo morap kɨlani asak do uŋun da kɨsiron yopgut.
Amɨn morap Monjɨ nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdoŋ. Mani amɨn morap Monjɨ dakon gen dɨma guramɨkgaŋ uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨp dɨma abɨdoni. Piŋkop dakon butjapni uŋun amɨnon toktogɨsi tosok.”
Yesu da amɨn telagɨ pakbi soŋ yoban paŋdetni morapmɨsi awit, yaŋ Parisi amɨn da gen bini nandawit. Jon da paŋdet tɨmɨkgɨt dakon tɨlakni uŋun yapgut yaŋ amɨn da yaŋba nandawit. (Yesu iyɨ telagɨ pakbi dɨma soŋ yomgut, paŋdetni da soŋ yomgwit.)
<range>
Yesu da Parisi amɨn da gen bino kɨlɨ nandaŋ nameŋ yaŋ nandaŋek Judia Provins yɨpmaŋek tobɨl aeni Galili Provinskon kɨgɨt.
Galili kɨk do Samaria Provins binap naŋ kɨgɨt.
Kɨŋ Samaria dakon kokup pap kɨnda mani Sika uŋudon kɨŋ altagɨt. Sika uŋun da kapmatjok mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda tosok, uŋun mɨktɨm tɨm kalɨpsigwan Jekop da monji Josep do ɨmgut.
Pakbi gapma kɨnda Jekop da kalɨp wayɨkgɨt uŋun mɨktɨmon tagɨt. Gɨldat binap aŋakwan Yesu kosit agɨpgut do wararɨ nandaŋek uŋun pakbi gapma da ɨleŋɨkon yɨk yawokgɨt.
Yɨk yawogakwan Samaria mɨŋat kɨnda pakbini kolek do apgut. Apban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Pakbi tagɨ koleŋ nabɨ nokeŋ?”
(Paŋdetni jap yum do kokup papmon kɨlɨ kɨwit.)
Yaŋban Samaria mɨŋat da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Juda amɨn kɨnda, ae nak Samaria mɨŋat kɨnda, do nido pakbi nabɨ noko yaŋ nayɨsal?” (Mɨŋat uŋun mibɨlɨ yaŋ do yagɨt, Juda amɨn da Samaria amɨn gat not dɨma aŋek egɨpgwit.)
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Gak Piŋkop da but galak yo amɨn do ɨsal yomɨsak uŋun nandɨsal tam, ae namɨn da pakbi nabɨ noko yaŋ gayɨk uŋun nandɨsal tam, iyɨŋbɨ uŋun amɨn da pakbi egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ tagɨ gaban.”
Yaŋban mɨŋat da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, gak pakbi tɨbɨtgo mɨni, ae pakbi gapma uŋun dubagɨ. Do gak pakbi egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ uŋun dukon naŋ aŋapbi?
Babɨknin Jekop da pakbi gapma on nin do nimgut. Jekop iyɨ gat ae monjini gat on gapmakon pakbi koleŋ nawit, ae bulmakau sipsipyoni gat kɨsi nawit. Gak da Jekop yapmaŋdal, ma?”
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn morap on pakbi naŋek ae pakbi do akdaŋ.
Mani nak da amɨn kɨnda do pakbi ɨbo nosak kaŋ, ae pakbi do dɨma akdɨsak. Nak da pakbi ɨbeŋ uŋun da butnikon pakbi dabɨl kɨnda mudok mudogɨ mɨni taŋ ɨmdɨsak. Pakbi dabɨl uŋun da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni ɨmdɨsak.”
Yaŋ yaŋban mɨŋat da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, uŋun pakbi nam. Nabɨ naŋek pakbi do dɨma akeŋ. Aŋek buŋon pakbi kolek do ɨdon saŋbeŋek dɨma apbeŋ.”
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak kɨŋ ego iyɨŋbɨ tobɨl apjil.”
Yaŋ yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Nak eno mɨni.” Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Gak kalɨp amɨn paŋ kwɨnɨt abɨ kosirɨ 5 agɨt, da abɨsok amɨn yɨkgamal uŋun ego dɨma. Gak eno mɨni yaŋ bamɨsi yosol.”
<range>
Yaŋban mɨŋat da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, gak kombɨ amɨn kɨnda yaŋ gandɨsat.
Samaria amɨn nin dakon babɨknin on ɨleŋon Piŋkop gawak ɨmgwit. Mani Juda amɨn ji da yaŋ yoŋ, Jerusalem gɨn kɨŋek Piŋkop gawak ɨmneŋ kaŋ tagɨsi.”
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Mɨŋat, nak gen gayɨsat uŋun nandabɨ bamɨ asak. Bɨsap kɨnda apdɨsak, uŋun bɨsapmon Dat gawak ɨmɨm uŋun on ɨleŋon dɨma tokdɨsak, ae Jerusalemyo kɨsikon dɨma tokdɨsak.
Samaria amɨn ji Piŋkop dakon mibɨlɨ pakyaŋsi dɨma nandaŋek gawak ɨmaŋ. Amɨn yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt dakon kosit uŋun Juda amɨn ninon tosak do yaŋbi, do nin Piŋkop bamɨsi nandaŋek gawak ɨmamaŋ.
Mani bɨsap kɨnda apjak, ae kɨlɨ abɨk, uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn Telagɨ Wup da tapmɨmon da, ae aŋpak bamɨsikon da Dat gawak ɨmdaŋ. Dat da uŋuden amɨn da gawak ɨmni do galak tosok.
Piŋkop iyɨ uŋun Wup, uŋun do aŋek gawak ɨmaŋ amɨn uŋun Telagɨ Wup da tapmɨmon da, ae aŋpak bamɨsikon da gawak ɨmni kaŋ uŋun kɨlegɨsi.”
Yaŋ yaŋban mɨŋat da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mesaia, mani Kristo yaŋ iyaŋ, uŋun don apjak yaŋ nandɨsat. Uŋun da abɨŋ yo morap niyɨŋ paŋteŋteŋ aŋ mudokdɨsak.”
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Nak gak gat gen yomak nak uŋun amɨn mani.”
Yesu gen yaŋ yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn paŋdetni da tobɨl abɨŋ kaŋba Yesu mɨŋat kɨnda gat gen yaŋbal pɨndagek wɨrɨpdakgwit. Mani “Gak yo nido galak tosol?” bo “Nido on mɨŋat gat gen yomal?” yaŋ kɨnda da Yesu dɨma iyɨwit.
Aŋakwa mɨŋat uŋun pakbi tɨbɨtni yɨpmaŋek tobɨl kokup papmon kɨŋek amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
“Ji abɨŋ amɨn kɨnda koni. Uŋun amɨn da yo morap kalɨp agɨm uŋun nayɨŋ mudak. Uŋun Kristo bo?”
Yoyɨŋban kokup pap yɨpmaŋek Yesukon apgwit.
Kosiron abɨŋakwa paŋdetni da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, gak jap dɨ na.”
Mani yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak japno toŋ, uŋun jap dakon mibɨlɨ ji dɨma nandaŋ.”
Yoyɨŋban paŋdetni da notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Amɨn kɨnda da jap paŋabɨŋ ɨmɨk bo?”
Yaŋakwa Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun dakon galaktokni yolek pi namgut uŋun aŋ mudokeŋ uŋun da japno asak.
Ji da yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Kanek 4 kabɨ mudaŋakwan jap pakpagɨ.’ Mani nak da yaŋ dayɨsat, ji sɨŋtaŋek jap pi do pɨndak mudoni. Jap morap uŋun kɨlɨ bamɨ taŋ mudaŋ.
Jap bamɨ pakpak amɨn uŋun tomni tɨmɨkdak. Jap bamɨ paŋmuwukdak uŋun egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni do paŋmuwukdak. Yaŋdo, jap kwaot kwaot amɨn gat ae jap bamɨ pakpak amɨn gat kɨsi da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ anjil.
Yaŋdo, gen kɨnda yoŋ uŋun bamɨ, ‘Amɨn kɨnda da jap kwaokdak, ae kɨnda da bamɨ pasak.’
Ji pigaga kɨnda pi dɨma awiron jap bamɨ pani do nak da yabekgɨm. Amɨn da pi madepsi awiron ji da pini dakon bamɨ paŋ.”
Mɨŋat da, “Uŋun amɨn da yo morap kalɨp agɨm uŋun nayɨŋ mudak” yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek Samaria amɨn morapmɨ uŋun kokup papmon nani da Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit.
Yaŋ awit do Yesukon abɨŋek “Gak nin gat egɨpneŋ” yaŋ iyɨŋba gɨldat bamorɨ uŋun kokupmon egɨpgwit.
Egek amɨn morapmɨsi Yesu iyɨ dakon geni nandaŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit.
Aŋek mɨŋat yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gen yaŋbɨ nandaŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmamaŋ. Mani uŋun dogɨn dɨma. Nin da nin iyɨ dakon gen nandaŋek yaŋsi nandamaŋ, uŋun amɨn asi mɨktɨm amɨn morap yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn yaŋ nandamaŋ.”
Yesu uŋun gat gɨldat bamorɨ egɨ mudaŋek uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋek Galili Provinskon kɨgɨt.
Yesu iyɨ gen kɨnda yaŋ yagɨt, “Kombɨ amɨn kɨnda iyɨ da mɨktɨmon amɨn da dɨma nandaba wɨkwan ɨmaŋ.”
Galili amɨn uŋun kɨsi Yapyap Bɨlak bɨsapmon Jerusalem kokup papmon egek Yesu da yo morap agɨt uŋun pɨndak nandaŋyo awit, do Yesu uŋun Galili kɨŋ altaŋakwan but galagon da abɨdawit.
Yesu aeni Galili mɨktɨmon Kana kokupmon kɨgɨt. Kalɨp uŋun kokupmon uŋun da wasok aban pakbisi uŋun da wain dagagɨt. Kana kokupmon kɨla amɨn madep dakon kɨla amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut. Monji Kapaneam kokupmon sot agɨt.
Uŋun kɨla amɨn da Yesu Judia yɨpmaŋek Galili abɨk uŋun dakon geni nandaŋek Yesukon kɨŋek monji sot aŋ palɨ kɨmot do agɨt uŋun aŋmɨlɨp asak do bɨsit tebai iyɨgɨt.
Iyɨŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ji wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ dɨma pɨndatni kaŋ, nandaŋ gadat dɨma akdaŋ.”
Yaŋban kɨla amɨn da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, monjino dɨma kɨmagakwan tepmɨ pɨki.”
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Gak kɨki. Monjɨgo egɨpdɨsak.” Yaŋban kɨla amɨn Yesu da gen yagɨt uŋun do nandaban bamɨ aban tobɨl kɨgɨt.
Tobɨl kɨŋakwan pi monjɨni da apba kosiron domdom aŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Monjɨgo sot yɨpmak da tagɨ egɨsak.”
Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Ni bɨsapmon sotni yɨpmaŋ dek?” Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Apma gɨldat tobɨl do 1 kilok gɨptɨmɨ kɨndap sogɨt uŋun yawokgɨt.”
Yaŋba datni da yaŋ nandagɨt, apma uŋun bɨsapmonsi Yesu da yaŋ nayɨgɨt, “Monjɨgo egɨpdɨsak.” Yaŋ nandaŋek iyɨ gat ae amɨn kabɨni yutnikon egɨpgwit uŋun gat kɨsi nandaŋ gadat awit.
Yesu Judia yɨpmaŋek Galili kɨŋ wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ uŋun aban kosit bamot agɨt.
Egɨ don Juda amɨn dakon jap noknok bɨsap madep kɨnda altaŋakwan Yesu Jerusalem kɨgɨt.
Jerusalem kokup papmon pakbi ɨdap kɨnda tosok, Ibru genon da Betesda yaŋ yoŋ. Uŋun pakbi ɨdap tɨp dam madep dakon wigat kɨnda mani Sipsip Wigat uŋun da kapmatjok tosok. Pakbi ɨdap ɨleŋɨkon yɨk nandat yut 5 yaŋ toŋ.
Uŋun yɨk nandat tamokon sot amɨn morapmɨ egɨpgwit: dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn, ae kandapmɨ yokwi amɨn, ae kɨdarɨ alek taŋbi amɨn kɨsi egɨpgwit.
<range>
Amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut uŋun sotni taŋ ɨmɨŋakwan gɨn egakwan bɨlak 38 agɨt.
Yesu da uŋun amɨn pagakwan kaŋek sot kɨlɨsi agɨt yaŋ nandaŋek iyɨgɨt, “Gak gɨptɨmgo kɨlek tosak do nandɨsal?”
Yaŋban sot amɨn da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, pakbi da wayɨŋ asak bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda da nak aŋpulugaŋ pakbi ɨdapmon abɨgɨ dɨma nepmaŋdak. Nak pɨgɨk do aŋapbo amɨn dɨwarɨ da ŋwapmaŋek pɨgɨ pɨgɨ aŋ.”
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Gak pɨdaŋ yalɨŋ potgo tɨmɨgek kosit agɨp!”
Gen yaŋ iyɨŋakwan uŋudon gɨn amɨn uŋun gɨptɨmɨ kɨlek taŋban yalɨŋ potni tɨmɨgek kosit agɨpgut. Yo uŋun Sabat bɨsapmon altagɨt,
do Juda amɨn da kɨlek tagɨt amɨn yaŋ iyɨwit, “Abɨsok uŋun Sabat bɨsap. Gak gen teban yapmaŋek yalɨŋ potgo tɨmɨgek agɨsal.”
Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn uŋun nak aŋmɨlɨp ak uŋun da yaŋ nayɨk, ‘Gak pɨdaŋ yalɨŋ potgo tɨmɨgek kosit agɨp!’ ”
Yaŋban iyɨwit, “ ‘Gak pɨdaŋ yalɨŋ potgo tɨmɨgek kosit agɨp!’ yaŋ uŋun namɨn da gayɨk?”
Yesu amɨn morapmɨ da bɨkbɨgon da kɨlɨ kɨgɨt, do kɨlek tagɨt amɨn uŋun namɨn da iyɨgɨt uŋun dɨma nandagɨt.
Don Yesu da Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalon pɨgek amɨn uŋun kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nandaki, gak kɨlek tal. Yo yokwi saŋbeŋek dɨma aki. Aki kaŋ sot agɨl uŋun yapmaŋek yo jɨgɨsi da altaŋ gamdɨsak.”
Iyɨŋban amɨn uŋun kɨŋ Juda amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yesu da nak aŋmɨlɨp agɨt.”
Yesu uŋun Sabat bɨsapmon yo yaŋ agɨt, do Juda amɨn da wasaŋek yo yokwi aŋɨmgwit.
Mani Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Datno yɨk nandarɨ mɨni pi agɨt da aŋaŋ obɨsak, ae nakyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn asat.”
